Inɛ jaŋu ii laa ei jaa nɛ boonaajɛ ye, e yai ibɛɛ wɔi ye, kinɛjugɔ jarugu sɔɔ biyɛnɔu dɛi, selumu kunɔlu go e bɛrɛ kijɛ wo obojɛ puu kayai.
Kaa inɛ turu u bɛrɛ sɔwaa, nawan kɔɔ ɔmɔlɔ nawain gi ye, inɛ u bɛrɛ taganɛ gɔ lee, kinɛjugɔ jarugu sɔɔ lee dɛi, nawan kɔɔ tɛnwɛnnɔu.

Kinɛjugɔ jarugu sɔɔ mu gi gɔ, kinɛjugɔ uwɔ ui jarugajɛ dɛi laa, kaa inɛ u bɛrɛ taganɛ gɔ kinɛjugɔ womɔ woi jarugajɛ dɛi sɔɔuwɔn. Nɛɛ inɛw gamuu ɔn gin’ selumu bɛbɛɛɲu: «Inɛ waja kinɛ jugɔ womɔ woi jarugajɛ dɛi, maa kijɛ mu dɛnɛjɛ kanrannɔu yɔɔ ma?
Mu kijɛ mu kayajɛ dɛi Amai birɛpoo tagaabɔn ye, birɛ poo tagu le pana mu kayajɛ dɛi inge dɛi boi ma yanwanjɛ?»
Wogɔ digɛu, jaai kayajɛi ma, kijɛi nɔɔjɛi ma, kijɛ ingei kanran e kanranjɛ puu, Amai baba ga kanrain.
Yahutunw ma, tɔgu waja inɛw ma, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu ma, kinɛ bemɛ, e le digɛnu yanwaain biyɛmɔnɔugi.

Mu yaa kijɛ puu nɛ, inɛw puu bɛrɛ bana ɛju gin’ kanran ga mainiyɛunwɔn. Mu kuu ma bɛrɛ kijɛ ɛju dɛnɛɛlɔn. Kaa inɛw puu yayabu gɔ bɛɛ ga, inɛw puu bɛrɛ kijɛ ɛju kanranjɔn. E yaa mu kanranjɛ gin’ kanrain.
Mu Kirisito deenɛi biyaa mu wɔɔ gin’, e yaa mui deewin biyɛi.
E kijɛ wooi nɛ mui ahajubajɛi, iyaa, e bɛrɛ deeru bana mu obu le kɛukɛu e sɔɔ ma yabaa wɔi. Wogɔ digɛu, mu ei sɔmɔuwɔn.
Kaa sɔɔ ɔn paamu e kanrun ye mu ibɛɛ wɔun. Ainɛ tuturu puu kuu gɔ Kirisitoi. Yaanran kuu gɔ, wo igɛi. Iyaa Kirisito kuu gɔ, Amai.
Wogɔ digɛu, Ama gɛɛnnu ma, Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔɔnu ma, ainɛ aai kanran kuu womɔ sɔi le goraa kanranjɛ ye, wo kuu womɔ baŋa Kirisitoi gailiyɛmɔuwɔ.
Kaa yaanran, Ama gɛɛnnu ma, Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔɔnu ma, kuu womɔ nɛ sɔi gorola ye, wo kuu womɔ baŋa, wo igɛi gailiyɛmɔuwɔ. Yaanran kuu kaa sɛɛ be lɛi kɛkɛu.
Yaanran, kuu womɔ nɛ sɔi goroidolo ye, kukuli womɔ wo sɛɛmɔ. Kaa yaanran, kukuli sɛɛ ye biyɛ ma, kuu kai ye biyɛ ma, wogɔ dɔgɔi. Kɔɔi biyaa ye, sɔi le kuu womɔ wo goromɔ.
Ainɛi, Ama le murin maŋaaɲu. Wo Ama dooroi. Kodigɛu, ainɛ kai, kuu womɔ sɔi le goru kai sɛlɛ. Kaa yaanran wo igɛ dooroi.
Waaru ainɛ maŋi le, woi yaanran nɛ goolu. Kaa yaanran, ainɛ nɛ goi.
Iyaa, ainɛi yaanran ga maŋanɛ. Kaa yaanrain ainɛ ga maŋi.
Wogɔ digɛu, mɛlɛnkɛbe sabu dɛi, yaanran, kuu womɔ nɛ inɛ yadaan sɛɛrɛi giye, kuu womɔ goroun jaain wɔɔ.
Kaa kokanran, Inɛw Baŋa le bana emɛ yaajɛ le kɛukɛu, yaanran wɔlɔ ye, ainɛ kanran wɔlɔ. Iyaa ainɛ wɔlɔ ye, yaanran kanran wɔlɔ.
Sabu, yaanran, ainɛ nɛ bana goi gin’, ainɛ yaa yaanran woi naranjɛ. Kunrin kijɛ puu Ama maŋajɛ.
E kanran, kuu ebe le ajubu yɛnɛi: Ama babu yalu nɛ, yaanran kuu dɛbɛla go, Ama gɛɛn ga, wogɔ dagaa wɔɔ ma?
Bana wɔɔ le kɛukɛu, ainɛ kukuli pala siyɛ ga, wogɔ woi gailiyɛmui laa ma?
Kaa yaanran kukuli diyɛ yasɛ ye, wogɔ wo bɛrɛ baba sɔɔi. Yaanran bɛrɛ kukuli womɔ gɔ, kuu dɛbi ga obin.
Kaa nimɛ kanran inɛ turu sɔɔ kɔɔ kuu nɛ jiiru jiire ibɛɛ wɔɔ ye, emɛ kai kɔɔ sibɛ go bana biyɛɲu waja sɛnɛ. Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔbe yaa bana waja sɛnɛ.
Nɛɛ kanɛ sɔɔ e bɛrɛ mu sɔɔido sibɛ go, mu ei sɔmɔuwɔlɔn. Mɔɔnu ebe gɔ, ei ɛjii biyɛ dɛi mɔrinyɛɛnlɛi. Mɔɲii biyɛ dɛi mɔrinyɛnjɛi.
Sɔɔ pɔlɔ gɔ unwɔ: Ebaa Ama inɛw mɔɔnu sɔɔ dɛi waaru e mɔrinyaanjɛ, logoro ebe nɛ kabu dɛin dɛin yɔɔ ga mu bɛrɛ tagin. Wogɔ nɛ mu bɛrɛ naran uji yato gin’ wɔɔ.
Gagawu tɔitɔi le inɛw wɔin gɔbei jugɔmɔ ga, waajibi logoro ebe nɛ gojo biyɛun jaain wɔɔ.
Waaru e mɔrinyaanjɛ, naran go Inɛw Baŋa pana kaya dɛi mɔrinyɛɛnlɛi.
Kaa pana nɛ dɛinyɛnnu digɛnu, inɛ kanma puu tunmɔ dɔmiyɛnlu go, jaa wo jɛɛlu gɔ kayajɛɛjɛ. Kunrin, inɛw gamuu giyɛ le wɔin, gamuu kayaa nɔwaan bimiliyaa wɔin.
Kɔɔi ye, ginrun ebe nɛ jaa kayi ye nɔɔ bɛɛlɛi ma? Maa e Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔi gailiyɛmɔu, inɛw kijɛ sɛnɛ gɔbe bɛrɛ dɔgɔ tagarauwɔi? Mu e le inge gɛɛdɔn? Ei sɔsɔmɔdɔn ma? Ai, sɔɔ kɔɔ nɛ mu ei sɔmɔlun.
Deeru Inɛw Baŋa bɛrɛ biyaa, e bɛrɛ mu tagu gɔ ɔn woi: Inɛw Baŋa Yesu, digɛ woi numɔ nɛ kuni gɔ, buru jeɲaa,
Amai birɛpoo tagaatiyaa, kabalaa kijɛ wo gi: «Ɔn goju mai, e dɛi obin gɔ woi. Mui ajuba ga kunrin kanrain.»
Pana kayaajiyaa, wo kɔɔ gin’ resɛndii ilɛ gɔ jeɲaa, ɔn gin’ sɔi: «Resɛndii ilɛ ɔn, Ama aaru kanai, ili ma gɔ le aaru kuni gɔ woi. Waaru ɔn e nɔɔjɛ wooi, mui ajuba ga kunrin kanrain.»
Kunrin, buru ɔn gin’ waaru e kayajɛ wooi, resɛndii ilɛ waaru e nɔɔjɛ wooi, e Inɛw Baŋa wɛɛido baa, yiun womɔ sɔɔi sɔɔjɛi.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, inɛ aai kanran, wo le dagalu wo wɔu, Inɛw Baŋa buru gɔ kayaajɛ ma, gelu womɔ nɛ nɔwaanjɛ ma biyaai ye, Inɛw Baŋa goju lee, ili womɔ lee wo gailiyɛmu dɛi, baŋa jarugu le wɔɔ.
Wogɔ digɛu, inɛ kanma puu unruin maraan yɛnaatiyaa ye, kɔɔ gin’ buru gɔ kaya, kɔɔ gin’ gelu gɔ nɛ nɔɔ.
Inɛ aai kanran, Inɛw Baŋa goju le sɔɔ bana digɛ lugolu go, buru gɔ kayaajɛ ma, gelu gɔ nɛ nɔwaanjɛ ma biyaai ye, kɔɔbaŋa, wo kayi lee, wo nɔi lee dɛi jarugu yaduyɔ.
Sɔɔ kɔɔ digɛu, logoro ebe nɛ inɛw joo jinwaan paŋa dogaain, iyaa gamuu yinwaain.
Emɛ, kuu emɛ le, bana emɛ marun yɛyɛnɛɲu biyaai ye, saliyɛ nɛ numɔidenɛ.
Kaa aduna le bari ye saliyɛ nɛ jarugu kuu emɛ nɛ sugonɔu giye, Inɛw Baŋa wo saliyɛ emɛ kiraa ye, emi oju nɛ kukunɔjɛ.
Ba unrunw mabe, Inɛw Baŋa pana kaya dɛi waaru e mɔrinyaanjɛ, tunmɔ dɔmiyɛin.
Inɛ turu giyɛ woi yasɛ ye, ginrun womɔ nɛ pana kayi ye wɛɛ. E mɔrinyɛnjɛ gɔ, kuu ebe nɛ jarugu duurɔjɛi biyɛmɔnɔu dɛi kunrin kanrain. Selumu waja ebe gɔbe, mu wiyaaun ye e le sɔɔdɔn.
Ba unrunw, nɛɛ, Ama Kikinu sin obu gɔbe sibɛ go, sɔɔ jugɔlu go e bii ye mu ibɛlaun.
Waaru Ama inin e bee le, ɔmɔlɔ sɔɔ sɔi bɛɛnɛ, suguru ɛgɛɛnɛ tɔgu dɛin dɛin bɛrɛ diŋɛ ebe tolo go, bana e yaabe e igii wɔi.
Wogɔ digɛu, sɔɔ ɔn ɛjii jugɔi: Inɛ turu kanran, Ama Kikinu gɔnrɔn le sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ ye, Yesui jɛbaaɲu gɛɛ bɛɛidolo. Iyaa inɛ turu kanran, Kikinu Pilu gɔnrɔn le laa ye, Yesui Inɛw Baŋai gɛɛ bɛɛidolo.
Ama Kikinu sin obu gɔbe, tɔgu dɛin dɛin jooi wɔin. Kaa wogɔbe puu Kikinu turu gɔ obojɛ.
Birɛ bana birɛɲu gɔ tɔgu dɛin dɛin jooi wɔɔ. Kaa Inɛw Baŋa turu gɔ dɛi birɛɲu.
Birɛ gɔbe yaa tɔgu dɛin dɛin wɔɔ. Kaa Ama turu gɔ, inɛw wooi bɛrɛ, kɔɔ puu gɔnrɔn gɔ wo obojɛ.
Inɛw puu niwɛn dɛi, Ama Kikinu, inɛ tuturu bɛrɛ sin obu wo obojɛ le digɛnu unruin tagarajɛ.
Wo inɛ turu bɛrɛ hakilɛ ɛju le sɔɔ sɔi sin obu obojɛ. Ama Kikinu turu gɔ iyaa, inɛ waja bɛrɛ jugɔ ɛju le sɔɔ sɔi sin obu obojɛ.
Iyaa Kikinu turu wogɔ, inɛ turu bɛrɛ gagawu sin obu obojɛ, inɛ waja bɛrɛ jiun tɔgu dɛin dɛin bajamu sin obu obojɛ.

Inɛ turu bɛrɛ taanrinyɛn birɛ biru sin obu obojɛ, inɛ waja bɛrɛ Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔi sin obu obojɛ. Iyaa inɛ waja bɛrɛ, kikinu ɛju lee, mɔɲu lee kabu kunu bɛi sin obu obojɛ. Inɛ waja bɛrɛ iyaa, sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔi sin obu obojɛ. Inɛ waja bɛrɛ sɔɔ kɔɔbe tiyɛ tagu sin obu obojɛ.
Ama Kikinu turu gɔ sɔɔ kɔɔbe puu wo kanranjɛ. Wo bɛrɛ bana ɛju gin’ inɛ tuturu puu bɛrɛ sin obu gɔ obojɛ.
Yɛnɛi, inɛ goju nɛ digɛ jooi yato. Kaa goju gɔ koturu. Digɛ gɔbe bana jooi be bii puu, goju gɔ kai koturu wɔɔ. Kirisito yaa kɔɔ gin’ wɔɔ.

Emɛ Yahutunw gɔbe lee, Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe lee, gunɔw gɔbe lee, inɛw gunɔwin laain gɔbe lee, emɛ wooi puu goju turu biyɛ ga, Ama Kikinu turu gɔ nɛ emi batise kanraanɲu. Emɛ wooi puu bɛrɛ Kikinu turu wogɔ dii gin’ nɔɔmaabɛin.
Goju, digɛ turu sai sɛlɛ, kaa digɛ womɔ jooi wɔin.
Kubɔ, unruin numɔi laa digɛnu, goju digɛi laa gi kanran, wogɔ giye woi goju digɛ turui laa biyɛɛlɛ.
Suguru, unruin girii laa digɛnu, goju yalu turui laa gi kanran, wogɔ giye woi goju yalu turui laa biyɛɛlɛ.
Goju gɔ puu girii bee ye, yani kanraan ye suguru ɛgɛmɔdo? Goju gɔ puu sugurui bee ye, yani kanraan ye jiɲu sama bɛɛmɔdo?
Kaa, Ama, diŋɛ unrunmɔ le kɛukɛu, goju digɛ gɔbe maŋaa, yalu dɛin dɛin nɛ wo kunu.
Goju gɔ puu digɛ koturu sai bee ye, goju naa gɔ yalu yagɔi biyɛdo?
Kaa digɛ jooi wɔin. Goju turu wɔɔ.
Kɔɔi biyaa ye, giri numɔ kai sɛlɛ gɛɛ bɛɛlɛ. Kuu yaa unrun kubɔbe kai sɛlɛ gɛɛ bɛɛlɛ.
Kaa goju yalu paŋa sɛnɛ gin’ wɔin gɔbe, emɛ kai bemɛ yasin.
Iyaa goju yalu gaai maala ga emɛ wɔɔ gɔbe, yalu wajunw dɛi sigɛ bei babaɲu. Kunrin goju yalu dɔgɔgu gɔbe, emɛ sigɛ le bei babaŋaranɲu.
Kaa goju yalu dɔgɔgui laain gɔbe, boŋurun wogɔ kai sɛnɛ. Ama, sɔɔ gɔ puu yegeraa, goju yalu baba sɛnɛ gɔbe bɛrɛ sigɛ le baba obaabe.
Goju nɛ kabu biyɛnɔu, kaa goju yalu dɛin dɛin gɔbe tunmɔi kajuba ga, Ama kɔɔ gin’ kanraanbe.
Goju yalu turu ɔɲɛ le wɔɔ ye, wajunw gɔ puu, wo le bari ye ɔɲɛ le biyɛɲu. Goju yalu turu baba biyaajɛ ye, wajunw gɔ puu, wo le bari ye kinɛ ɛhɛɛliyɛmɔɲu.
Kirisito goju gɔ ei. E inɛ tuturu puu goju womɔ yalu turui biyaai.

Kunrin, Ama, inɛw unrunmɔ mɔɔnu nɛ, inɛ puu bɛrɛ yalu womɔ obaa daanaabe. Yalu pɔlɔ gɔ nɛ Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbei daanaabe. Yalu lɛiye gɔ nɛ, inɛw Ama titiyaanw daanaabe. Yalu taaniye gɔ nɛ jaŋudeerenw daanaabe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ taanrinyɛn kanranw gɔbei, kɔɔ onu nɛ jiun bajamu sin obu ma, inɛ baru sin obu ma, inɛ teeremu sin obu ma, sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔi sin obu ma wɛɛjɛ.
Inɛw puu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲui laain, inɛw puu inɛw Ama titiyaanwin laain, inɛw puu jaŋudeerewin laain. Iyaa, inɛw puu taanrinyɛn kanrun sin obu sɛnɛ,
jiun bajamu sin obu sɛnɛ, sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔi sin obu ma, sɔɔ inɛmɔ tiyɛ tagu sin obu ma sɛnɛ.
Kɔɔi biyaa ye, sin obu sigɛ le maai wɔɔ gɔbe, e wogɔbe daariyɛi. Kaa kɔɔ wooi dɛi sigɛ, oju ɛju nɛ yaaun e jaan gɔ, mu e bɛrɛ tatagadɔn.
Halu mu inɛw sɔɔ sɔɔɲu ma, mɛlɛnkɛbe sɔɔ sɔɔɲu ma sɔsɔɔjɔn kanran, ihibɛ sɛlɔn ye, sɔɔ ma inrun ma, gaŋaran ma, siɲɛ gin’ wɔɔ.
Halu mu Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goii sɔɔjɔn kanran, halu jugɔ puu lee, kijɛ boŋurun puu lee igii wɔun kanran, halu gagawu diyɛ kokoo yalu womɔ nɛ goonɔjɛ yasɔn kanran, ihibɛ sɛlɔn ye, mui kijɛ kanmai laa.
Halu mu arusɛgɛ ma puu dɛgugunw bɛrɛ gamalaa obaajɔn kanran, halu goju ma tɛgɛrɛ ga obaajɔn kanran, ihibɛ sɛlɔn ye, wogɔ mu bɛrɛ niwɛn turu kanran sɛlɛ.
Ihibɛ muyɔn yasɛ. Ihibɛ ɛhɛju le jowaa wɔɔ, inɛ waja kijɛ daariyɛɛlɛ. Kuu unrunmɔ unɔɔlɛ, kuu ulo sɛlɛ.
Ihibɛ kijɛ dagalu turu kanran kanraanlɛ, kuu unrunmɔ too tee toolɛ, kinɛbanrun sɛlɛ, ajubu mɔɲu sɛlɛ.
Ihibɛ teitai laa dɛi kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔɔlɛ. Kaa naran dɛi kinɛ ɛhɛɛliyɛmɔjɛ.
Ihibɛ sɔɔ puu mumuyɔnjɛ, kijɛ wooi nɛ, ihibɛ gagawu le biyɛjɛ, kijɛ wooi nɛ diyɛdɔn le biyɛjɛ, kijɛ wooi tatariyɛjɛ.
Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔi bai turu dodogodo, sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔi dodogodo, jugɔ dodogodo, kaa ihibɛ asuu sɔsɔgɔjɛ.
Emɛ kijɛ puu sɛɛu jugaa wɔnɛ, jugɔ emɛ kibelu. Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi emɛ sɔɔjɛ gɔ yaa kibelu.
Kaa kijɛ kibaai gɔ waaru wiyaajɛ, kijɛ kibelu gɔ mamanado.
Waaru dagi mu bee le, mu ii dagi bana le kɛukɛu sɔɔ sɔɔubɔn, ii dagi bana le kɛukɛu sɔɔ iyeubɔn, ii dagi bana gin’ ajubu ajubaubɔn. Kaa waaru inɛ na mu taŋu le, mu ii bana gɔ pajaatun.

Kanɛ kijɛ bana emɛ iyejɛ gɔ purugi wɔɔ. Kikinu yɛni nɛ kijɛ emɛ yɛnɛjɛ gin’ wɔɔ. Kaa bai turu, emɛ giri le giri le kijɛ ihiyedɛin. Iye, jugɔ emɛ kibelu. Kaa bai turu, emɛ sɛɛu sɔɔ jujugɔdɛin. Ama bana sɛɛu mui jugɔjɛ gin’, mu yaa kunrin kijɛ jujugɔdɔn.
Nɛɛ, kijɛ taanu ɔnbe sɔsɔgɔɲu: Gagawu lee, diyɛdɔn lee, ihibɛ lee. Kaa be taanu logoro nɛ, diyɛnɛ gɔ ihibɛi.
Kijɛ puu dɛi sigɛ ihibɛ nɛ giri dɛɛraajɛi ye, woi dɛnɛi. Kaa Ama Kikinu sin obu wajunw gɔbe yaa ɛjii daariyɛi. Sigɛ le Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔi sin obu daariyɛi.
Sabu sɔɔ inɛmɔ le inɛ sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ, inɛ turu kanran sɔɔ womɔ ɛgɛɛlɛ gɔ digɛu, wo sɔɔ womɔ inɛw le sɔɔuwɔlɔ, kaa Ama le sɔɔuwɔ. Wo Ama Kikinu gɔnrɔn le, sɔɔ boŋurun sɔɔuwɔ.
Kaa, Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi inɛ sɔɔjɛ gɔ, inɛw le sɔɔuwɔ. Wo sɔɔ womɔ gɔ le inɛwin babariyɛmɔjɛ, anrangaju ohobojɛ, kinɛ kakaaliyɛmɔjɛ.
Inɛ sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔɔjɛ baŋa gɔ, kuu unrunmɔi sai bariyɛmɔjɛ. Kaa Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi inɛ sɔɔjɛ, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu puu bariyɛmɔjɛ.

E wooi puu sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔi sin obu bɛɛ ga mu ibɛɛ wɔun. Kaa kɔɔ dɛi sigɛ, Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔi sin obu e bɛi ye, mu dɛnɛjɔn. Inɛ sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔɔnɛ, sɔɔ gɔ tiyɛ tagaa ye, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔi babariyɛmɔjɛ ye, ɛjii wɔɔ. Kɔɔi laa ye, Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi inɛ sɔɔjɛ wo dɛi sigɛ niwɛn sɛɛ.

Ba unrunw, e bɛrɛ selumɛuwɔn: Sɔɔ inɛmɔ e bɛrɛ wiyaa sɔwaajɔn ye, e bɛrɛ inge niwɛin sɛɛ? Kaa Ama mu bɛrɛ sɔɔ jugɔmu turu le ma, jugɔ sɔɔ turu le ma, Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi turu le ma, deeru turu le ma e bɛrɛ wiyaajɔn ye, mui e bɛrɛ niwɛn yato.
Ajubu yɛnɛi, kijɛ nii nii, kere gin’ ma, kɔni gin’ ma, mii bemɛ kabu kunu bɛɛmɔɔlɛ biyaai ye, kijɛ be gɛɛjɛ gɔ yani paamu kanrun bɛɛmɔdo?
Iyaa kaan sujɔnɛ, kaan gɔ, tiyɛ le sujɔɔlɛ ye, sɔludasu ii aa kɔmɔ taa ga unruin yegeredo?
Kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’, sɔɔ inɛmɔ le sɔɔ e sɔɔjɛ gɔ ɛjɛlu ye, kijɛ e gɛɛjɛ gɔ aa paamu kanrando? E sɔɔ ebe ooɲɔ le sɔii.
Aduna nɛ sɔɔ tɔgu dɛin dɛin jooi wɔɔ. Kaa puu ɛhɛgɛmɔjɛ, tiyɛ yasin.
Kaa mu inɛ turu sɔɔ ɛgɛɛlɔn ye, inɛ wogɔ mu bɛrɛ yerunɛi. Wo bɛrɛ yaa mui yerunɛi.
E Ama Kikinu sin obu gɔbe daariyɛjɛi digɛu, sigɛ le sin obu Ama inɛw mɔɔnu bariyɛmɔjɛ gɔ, wogɔbe joo dɛnɛi.
Wogɔ digɛu, u sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔɔnɛ gɔ, sɔɔ inɛmɔ tiyɛ taga bɛɛ sin obu bɛɛ ga, Ama gɛɛn.
Kɔɔi laa ye, sɔɔ inɛmɔ le mu Ama gɛɛnjɔn ye, narain, kikinu ma amagɛɛn nɛ too, kaa, hakilɛ wogɔ nɛ tolo.
Kɔɔ biyaai ye mu yani kanrandɔn? Kikinu ma le Ama gɛgɛɛndɔn, iyaa hakilɛ ma le yaa gɛgɛɛndɔn. Mu kikinu ma le nii niniidɔn, hakilɛ ma le yaa niniidɔn.
Kɔɔ gin’ wɔlɔ biyaa ye, Amai birɛpoo taganu, u kikinu sai le sɔɔjɛu ye, inɛ waja mɔɔnu nɛ daan gɔ, sɔɔ u gi gɔ inɛɛ wɔnu, wo Amai birɛpoo tagu uwɔ dɛi amina yani gɛɛ bɛɛdo?
Amai birɛpoo tagu uwɔ sɔɔ yani baa ɛjii bee kanran, woi kijɛ nɛ bari turu kanran wɔlɔ.
Mu e puu dɛi sigɛ sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔɔjɔn gɔ dɛi Ama birɛ poo.
Kaa Ama inɛw mɔɔnu nɛ, sɔɔ inɛmɔ le sɔɔ muɲu joo sɔɔ dɛi, inɛw deere ga, mu bɛrɛ sɔɔ inɛw paamu kanranjɛ, sɔɔ ii numɔrɔn sɔɔ ire.
Ba unrunw, sɔɔ bana e iyejɛ sibɛ nɛ unrunw gin’ biyɛnɔugi. Mɔmɔɲu sibɛ go unrunw gin’ biyɛi, kaa, sɔɔ paamu kanrun nɛ anranw kibaain biyɛi.
Tɔɔru dɔn nɛ kijɛ tɔŋɔ unwɔ: “Inɛw Baŋa Ama kijɛ gi: ‘Mu sɔɔ dɛin sɔɔnw le tɔgu ɔn le sɔɔ sɔɔdɔn. Tɔgu waja inɛw le be le sɔɔdɔn. Kaa kɔɔ wooi nɛ, be mui keŋiyɛindenɛ.’”
Nɛɛ kɔɔ gin’ wɔɔ biyaai ye, sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔi gɔ, inɛw gawanɛbe sɛɛrɛi. Inɛw gawaaɲu bɛrɛ, sɛɛrɛi laa. Kaa Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔi gɔ, wogɔ inɛw gawaaɲu sɛɛrɛi. Inɛw gawanɛbe bɛrɛ sɛɛrɛi laa.
Nɛɛ, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu puu nɛ, inɛw gɔ puu sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔɔnu be wɔnu, jaŋu unrunw wajabe ma, inɛw jaŋu unrunwin laain ma wiyaa tɛmaaɲu ye, be ebaa weje ulaain gɛɛidenɛ ma?
Kaa e puu Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔɔnu e wɔnu, jaŋu ii waja ma, inɛ jaŋu ii laa ma, logoro ebe nɛ wiyaa yowaai ye, sɔɔ ebe gɔ, hakɛ womɔ wo bɛrɛ jujugɔmɔdo, iyaa woi jajarugado,
kinɛ womɔ nɛ sɔɔ baŋaraan wo sɛɛ gɔ puu ɛlu gogoodo. Kɔɔ waaru le, wo numaa sugaa ye, girupala minɛ nɛ dujaa gɛlɛnu, Amai bababado. Iyaa, naran go Ama logoro ebe nɛ yato gɛgɛɛdo.

Nɛɛ ba unrunw, yani wɔɔ? Ama baba ga waaru e mɔrinyaanjɛ, inɛ turu Amai birɛpoo tagu nii sɛɛ, inɛ waja mɔ deerui, inɛ waja mɔ Ama wo bɛrɛ sɔɔ jugɔmui, inɛ waja mɔ sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔii, inɛ waja mɔ sɔɔ inɛmɔ tiyɛ tagi. Kɔɔ wooi, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu paŋa bariyɛmu sɔɔi biyɛmɔi.
Sɔɔ inɛmɔ le Ama sɔɔ sɔɔɲu ye, dinrɛn le dinrɛn le, inɛw lɛi ma, taanu ma dɛi joo biyɛmɔnɔugi. Iyaa, inɛ turu sɔɔ gɔ tiyɛ wo tagamɔi.
Kaa sɔɔ gɔ tiyɛ inɛ taganɛ wɔlɔ ye, sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔɔnɛ gɔ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu logoro nɛ kelemu wo biyɛmɔ. Baŋa kuu womɔ lee, Ama lee bɛrɛ wo sɔɔmɔ.
Inɛw Ama titiyaanw, inɛw lɛi ma, taanu ma sɔɔ be sɔɔmɔi. Wajunw gɔbe sɔɔ bemɛ gɔ marun be yɛnɛmɔi.
Kaa sɔɔ u sɔɔnu, inɛ waja dɛinyaan wɔɔ bɛrɛ, Ama, sɔɔ turu jugɔmaajɛ ye, u inɛ laa baŋa gɔ kelemu biyɛ.
Inɛw gɔ puui deere ye, anrangaju obo ga, e wooi puu dinrɛn le dinrɛn le, Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔɔ bɛbɛɛdei.
Ama, oju sɛlɛ go wɔlɔ. Wo jamu Amai. Wogɔ digɛu, inɛ Ama titiyainɛ gɔ, sin obu wo sɛɛ gɔi gɔgɔnrɔnjɛ. Ama inɛw mɔɔnu puu nɛ bana kanranɲu gin’,
mɔɔnu nɛ, yaanw gɔbe kelemu be biyɛmɔi. Sɔɔ sɔɔ ga be bɛrɛ tɔɔrɔnɛ. Tɔɔru bana gɛɛjɛ le kɛukɛu, tubi ye be biyɛmɔi.
Be sɔɔ turu paamu kanrun ibɛɛ wɔin ye, ginrun yaa ye be igɛ bɛrɛ selumɛ. Sabu yaanran, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu nɛ sɔɔ sɔɔ ga, wogɔ dɔgɔi.
Maa, Ama sɔɔ gɔ ebe nɛ goi ma? Maa e bɛrɛ sai Ama sɔɔ dɔi?
Inɛ turu, unruin inɛ Ama titiyainɛi ga wɔɔ ma, Ama Kikinu sin obu turu yasɛ ga wɔɔ ma biyaai ye, e bɛrɛ sɔɔ tɔŋaa mu tiijɛ ɔn, Inɛw Baŋa tɔɔru turui ga baŋa wo jugɔ.
Kaa inɛ turu wogɔ jugaa bɛɛlu ye, woi yapajai, woi lugonɔugi.
Ba unrunw mabe, Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔi sin obu gɔ daariyɛi. Kaa sɔɔ inɛmɔ sɔi sin obu gɔ yaa tɛŋɛnɔugi.
Sɔɔ gɔ puu oju le ɛjii kanrain.
Ba unrunw, Kibɛru Ɛju e bɛrɛ mu tagu gɔ, Kibɛru Ɛju le yabaa, gain gain aa e gɛlɛ gɔ, mu wogɔ e bɛrɛ naŋaranmɔuwɔn.
Kibɛru Ɛju wogɔ le ei yabin. E bɛrɛ bana mu tagu gin’ e kunrin gɛliyaa wɔi ye, ei yabaaɲu. Kɔɔi laa ye, e gawu gɔ niwɛn sɛlɛ.
Deeru biyaa e bɛrɛ mu obu gɔ nɛ, sɔɔ maai wɔɔ gɔ unwɔ: Ama Dɔn nɛ bana tɔŋɔ le kɛukɛu, Kirisito hakɛ emɛ dɛi yinwun.
Ama Dɔn nɛ bana tɔŋɔ le kɛukɛu, woi bojaa, bai taaniye gɔ, wo bulaai.
Wo Piɛru bɛrɛ unruin tagaraabe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ wo jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ gɔbe bɛrɛ unruin tagaraabe.
Kɔɔ onu nɛ, wo jaŋu unrunw womɔ suŋu numɔrɔn dɛi joo, yalu turu nɛ be wɔu, unruin be bɛrɛ tagaraabe. Inɛw wogɔbe logoro nɛ, iye dɔɔ, pɛjɛrɛ dɛi gaa ɔnmɔi yɔɔin. Kaa gamuu yinwaain.
Kɔɔ onu nɛ, wo Jake bɛrɛ unruin tagaraabe. Kɔɔ onu nɛ jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu womɔ puu bɛrɛ unruin tagaraabe.
Be wooi puu onu nɛ, mui inɛ ii narun dɔɔlu gin’ wɔɔ gɔ, wo mu bɛrɛ yaa unruin tagaraabe.
Sabu Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu logoro nɛ mu dagi. Naran go mu Ama inɛw mɔɔnu ɔɲɔmaabɔn dɛi, jaŋu ii tiyaaɲu boi gɔ mu le jaanla bee.

Kaa Ama nɛɛma dɛi, kijɛi mu wɔɔ gɔ, mui kijɛ wogɔi. Iyaa Ama mu bɛrɛ nɛɛma kanrun gɔ ijei biyɛlu. Kaa mu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu wajunw puu dɛi sigɛ birɛ biraabɔn. Narain, birɛ gɔ kuu ma le mu birɛlu. Kaa Ama nɛɛma mu le wɔɔ gɔ, birɛ gɔ wo biru.
Bana biyaai puu, mui ma, bei ma, waaju emɛ tagajɛ gɔ kɔɔ woi. Kijɛ le gawaa e wɔɔ gɔ yaa woi.
Kirisito yiun nɛ bulaai ga, emɛ wogɔ waajui kanranɲu. Nɛɛ logoro ebe nɛ, inɛw gamuu, yiun buloidolo ga yani sɔɔɲu?
Wogɔ narain biyaai ye, Kirisito kanran yiun nɛ bulolu.
Iyaa Kirisito yiun nɛ bulolu biyaai ye, waaju emɛ tagajɛ gɔ, waaju kooloi. Gagawu ebe gɔ yaa gagawu ijei.
Sigiyaa, emɛ Ama kuu nɛ kakalu maŋawin biyaain. Sabu Ama, Kirisitoi yiun nɛ bulomaabe ga emɛ sɛɛrɛ yingoouwɔin. Nɛɛ yiun buloolɛ ye, Ama Kirisitoi bulomɔlu.
Yiun buloolɛ ye, Kirisito kanran bulolu.
Kirisito bulolu biyaai ye, gagawu ebe gɔ gagawu ijei. E nimɛ kanran hakɛ ebe nɛ piriyaa yatoi.
Iyaa Kirisito nɛ tou inɛw yinwin gɔbe puu suiyaain.
Kirisito le diyɛdɔn emɛ sɛɛ gɔ, aduna nɛ unkaliyɛjɛ ye, inɛw puu dɛi sigɛ emi amasɔgɔi.
Kaa naran go Kirisito yiun nɛ bulaai. Kunrin, inɛw wo nɛ yinwaain gɔbe puu bubulodɛin tagara ga, dɛnrɛn ii pɔlɔ gin’, wo laa yiun nɛ bulaa gowaabe.
Yiun gɔ inɛ turu le digɛu wɛi. Kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’, yiun bulogu gɔ yaa, inɛ turu le digɛu wɛi.
Adama dɛi, inɛw puu bana yinwɛnɲu gin’, Kirisito dɛi inɛw puu pilemu ye ɔnmɔi bibiyɛdɛin.
Kaa, inɛ puu dinrɛn womɔ le bulodo: Kirisito kai, puu logoro nɛ wo pɔlɔi. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, inɛw Kirisito mɔi wɔin gɔbe, waaru pilemu ye wo wɛɛido le bubulodɛin.
Kɔɔ onu nɛ, aduna dumɔ gɔ dɔdɔɔdo. Kirisito, kuui bii wooi lee, paŋa wooi lee, gɔnrɔn wooi lee donugaatiyaa ye, laamu gɔ Ba Ama numɔ nɛ kukunɔdo.
Ama, Kirisito jaŋuw gɔbe puu gɔnrɔn ye, kubɔ womɔ doɲu nɛ wo kunɔido baa, laamu gɔ Kirisito numɔ nɛ toiyoun jaain wɔɔ.
Jaŋunɛ dumɔrɔn gɔnrɔindɛin gɔ, yiun woi.
Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaa, “Ama kijɛ puu gɔnraan, kubɔ womɔ doɲu nɛ kunaajɛ” gi. Kaa kijɛ puu gɔnraan Kirisito le tubiyemaaɲu gin ye, Ama, kijɛ puu wo le tubiyemaabe baŋa gɔ, woi wogɔ nɛ tolo ga jɛnrɛin wɔɔ.
Ama, kijɛ puu Kirisito le tubiyemaa dogaai ye, Aini gɔ kuu womɔ le, Ama kijɛ puu wo le tubiyemaabe baŋa gɔ le tutubiyedo. Kunrin, kijɛ puu kuu nɛ, Ama sɛɛu laamu kakanrando.
Iyaa, yiunbe giye inɛw unrunbei batise kunɔmɔu gɔbe, bemɛ yani biyɛdo? Naran go yiunbe buloonɛ bɛin ye, inge dɛi be giye unrunbei batise kunɔmɔɲu?
Emɛ yaa, inge dɛi waaru puu paruju nɛ yooɲu?
Ba unrunw, Kirisito Yesu, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ nɛ e dɛi kuu ulo mu sɛɛ gɔ dɛi sɔɔjɔn, mu bai puu yiun le bɛrii wɔun.

Aduna ɔn tinɛ bɛɛ dɛi, mu ɔn nɛ Epɛse ana nɛ olunawanbe le jai jaiyɛdɔn ye, mu bɛrɛ wogɔ inge niwɛin sɛɛ? Yiunbe buloonɛ bɛin ye, inɛw bana gɛɛɲu le kɛukɛu: “Yogo emi yiyinwɛndo digɛnu, maini ye, kayi ye nɔɔmɔi.”
Ai, kuu ebe lelemɔnɔugi. “Digu mɔɲu, jige ɛju yayamalajɛ.”
Hakilɛ biyaajɛi ye, bana jaan gin’ biyaajɛi ye, hakɛ pajai. Naran go logoro ebe nɛ inɛw gamuu Ama inin. Mu ei dɔgɔ tagara dɛi wogɔ gɛɛjɔn.
Inɛ turu ajubaa yɛnaa ye, yani kanraan ye yiun bulojɛ ma selumɛjɛ? Yiun bulaa ye, goju bemɛ goju inge tɔgui ma gɛɛjɛ?
Kɔɔ gin’ inɛ selumɛnɛ gɔ, u bomɔginɛi. Dɛnrɛn ii minɛ nɛ u tɔɔjɛ gɔ, ɔmɔlu ye, pilemɛ ye tɛiyi bɛɛlɛ.
Iyaa, minɛ nɛ kijɛ u tɔɔjɛ gɔ, wogɔ dɛnrɛn ii peerei. Alukamai ma, toi ii wajai ma biyɛjɛ. Kaa, kijɛ tɛiyɛjɛ gɔ wo le murunla.
Ama, bana wo bɛrɛ ɛju gin’, toi ii gɔ bɛrɛ goju gɔ wo obojɛ. Wo toi ii tuturu bɛrɛ, goju womɔ tɔitɔi gɔ obojɛ.
Kijɛ ɔnmɔ puu, gojunawan bemɛ turu laa. Inɛ goju nawan dɛin, arusɛgɛ bemɛ dɛin, sasaa bemɛ dɛin, iiju bemɛ dɛin.
Iyaa, alagala kijɛ yɔɔ, minɛ kijɛ yɔɔ. Kaa alagala kijɛ dooro gɔ dɛin, minɛ kijɛ dooro gɔ yaa dɛin.
Nai dooro dɛin, iyepilu dooro dɛin, tolo dooro yaa dɛin. Halu tolobe logoro nɛ, tolo turu dooro dɛin, tolo waja dooro dɛin.
Yiun bulogu yaa kɔɔ gin’ wɔɔ. Goju ɔmɔjɛ minɛ nɛ kunaa ye, goju ɔmɔɔlɛ goojɛ.
Goju yɛnɛ ɛjula, minɛ nɛ kunaa ye, goju dooro le wɔɔ bulo ye goojɛ. Goju yɛbɛlɛgu kunaa ye, goju paŋagu bulojɛ.
Gojunawan peere ɔn kunaa ye, goju kikinugu bulojɛ. Gojunawan peere ɔn yɔɔ ye, waajibi goju kikinugu kanran yɔɔ.
Wogɔ digɛu, Ama Dɔn sɔwaa, “Adama, ainɛ pɔlɔ gɔ, ɔnmɔi biyaai” gi. Kaa Adama dumɔrɔn gɔ, inɛ bɛrɛ, kikinu ɔnmɔ obojɛi biyaai.
Kaa kɔɔ wooi nɛ, kijɛ pɔlɔ wɛɛjɛ gɔ, inɛ kikinugu gɔi laa, inɛ goju nawangu gɔi. Inɛ kikinugu gɔ onu womɔ nɛ wɛɛjɛ.
Adama pɔlɔ gɔ, minɛ ugunu nɛ goi. Wo minɛ kijɛi. Adama lɛiye gɔ alagala goi.
Minɛ unrunw puu, inɛ minɛ nɛ goi gɔ gin’ wɔin. Alagala unrunw puu, alagala goonɛ gɔ gin’ wɔin.
Minɛ nɛ inɛ goi le murin emɛ wɔɔ gin’, alagala goonɛ gɔ le yaa murin emɛ yinbiyɛdɛin.
Ba unrunw, sɔɔ gɛɛ mu ibɛ gɔ unwɔ: Gojunawan ɔn, ili le, asuu Ama diinɛ kɛn gin’ bɛɛidolo. Kijɛ ɔmɔjɛ, kijɛ ɔmɔɔlɛ sii bɛɛidolo.

Mu sɔɔ boŋurun turu e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn. Emɛ wooi puu yinwɛindenɛ. Kaa ginsɛsai, giri kɛmɛjɛ kanranmɔ nɛ, kaan dumɔrɔn waaru sujaaɲu gɔ, emɛ puu duduliyedɛin. Kaan gɔ waaru sujaaɲu, yiun gɔbe goju asuu ɔmɔidolo gɔ le bulodɛin. Emi duduliyedo.
Waajibi goju ɔmɔjɛ ɔn duli ye, goju ɔmɔɔlɛi wo biyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Goju yinwɛnjɛ ɔn duli ye, yinwɛɛnlɛi wo biyɛun jaain wɔɔ.

Goju ɔmɔjɛ ɔn duliyaa, ɔmɔɔlɛi biyaai ye, iyaa goju yinwɛnjɛ ɔn duliyaa, yinwɛɛnlɛi biyaai ye, Ama Dɔn nɛ sɔɔ tɔŋɔ ɔn gɔ kikibedo: “Yiun kuu nɛ gɔnrɔn bɛɛmaajɛ. Ɔnhɔn, yiun kuu nɛ gɔnrɔn bɛɛmaa, woi suyaatin.”
“Aa, yiun, gɔnrɔn uwɔ yago wɔɔ? Aa, yiun, kijɛ inɛ barumu uwɔ gɔ yago wɔɔ?”
Yiun kijɛ inɛ barumu gɔ, wogɔ hakɛi. Hakɛ yaa paŋa womɔ Tɔɔru nɛ goojɛ.
Kaa Ama birɛpoo. Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito le digɛu, wo yiun kuu nɛ emɛ bɛrɛ gɔnrɔn obaajɛ.

Kɔɔbe wooi sabu dɛi, ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, e ɛɛn go iŋiyɛin. Kijɛ turu bɛrɛ kanran ei jigemɔnɔugi. Inɛw Baŋa le birɛ e birɛjɛ gɔ bamai biyɛidolo ga e igii wɔi gɔ digɛu, waaru puu maini ye, birɛ gɔ nɛ giru go yaai.
Ama inɛw gɔbei bara ga, buudu mɔɔnɔu wɔin gɔ sibɛ nɛ, Galasi gana Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔbe bɛrɛ bana mu tɔɔru gin’, e yaa kunrin kanrain.
Buudu sɛgu gɔ mu dɔwaaun ye biyɛnɔu ga, jugu bai pɔlɔ puu, inɛ tuturu wooi, kijɛ bana wo bɛi le kɛukɛu, buudu dɛiin ginrun nɛ goonu bojo.
Waaru mu wiyaajɛ, inɛw e yɛmɛido gɔbe, mu be dɛi lɛtɛrɛ tɔŋaa obaa ye, sin obu ebe gɔ le bei Jerusalɛmu yintiidɔn.
Kuu ma le mu yaaun gin’ wɔɔ ye kanran, inɛw e yɛmu gɔbe mu le yayaadɛin.
Mu Maseduanɛ gana kɛjɛ tataŋadɔn. Gana wogɔ kɛjaa taŋaa ye, kunrin e bɛrɛ wɛɛdɔn.
Mu waaru gaila logoro ebe nɛ totoiyodɔn biyɛdo. Halu kaali waaru gɔ puu e le kanrandɔn biyɛdo. Kunrin, yalu yaa mu ibɛ nɛ yaa ga e mui baru bɛbɛɛdei.
Iye mɔ ɔn, oju galanu sai e bɛrɛ waŋaa ye koi kanran ibɛlaun. Inɛw Baŋa yabaajɛ ye, mu bai gaila e le bii ibɛɛ wɔun.
Kaa, Pantekɔte janwan dɔɔido baa, mu Epɛse ana nɛ unbiyɛdɔn.
Halu jaŋuw gɔbe jooi wɔin kanran, birɛ diyɛ birɛ ga, ɔn nɛ mu dɛi taan gɔ gaai pinɛlaa wɔɔ.
Timɔte e bɛrɛ wɛwɛi ye, logoro ebe nɛ liyɛ sɛlɛ go wo biyɛmɔi. Sabu wo kanran, mu gin’, Inɛw Baŋa birɛ nɛ too.
Inɛ turu kanran woi gailiyɛmɔnɔu. Kaa woi baraa ye, jamu le mu bɛrɛ dɔɔ ga woi niinɛi. Wo lee, ba unrunw wajunw gɔbe lee, mu bei dɔmiyaan wɔun.
Bainɛ Apɔlɔsu kai, mu kubɔ joo woi gɛnyaan, ba unrunw gɔbe le ei yai yɛnɛ giyaabɔn. Kaa kanɛ kai, wo e bɛrɛ yaai goolu. Waaru ɛju biyaajɛ ye, wo e bɛrɛ wɛwɛɛdo.
Ba unrunw, inɛ giri yeiyaa wɔɔ gin’ biyɛnɔugi. Gagawu nɛ ɛɛn go biyɛi, anrangaju le biyɛi, paŋa siyɛi.
Logoro ebe nɛ, kijɛ puu, ihibɛ le kanrain.
Ba unrunw, tinwinrun waja kanran unwɔ: Sutepanasu lee, wo maranw lee, e sɔɔ bemɛ igii wɔi. Akayi gana nɛ be laa tubu yoin. Be iyaa Ama inɛw dɛi ɛjii birɛ biraabɛin.
Inɛw kɔɔbe tunmɔ lee, be le mɔrinyaan, inɛw ɛjii birɛ birɛɲu gɔbe lee, be le tubiyei.
Sutepanasu lee, Pɔrutunatusu lee, Akayikusu lee, mui yɛnɛi be wɛi gɔ, ɛjii kinɛ ma aabe. E ɔn nɛ yabei ye, kijɛ mu bɛrɛ kanrando ga e bee gɔ puu, be kanraantin.
Sabu be kinɛ ma kaaliyɛmaa, kinɛ ebe yaa kaaliyɛmaatin. Inɛw ɛju kɔɔ tunmɔbei e kajubaun jaain wɔɔ.
Rɔmɛ laamu Asi numɔ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔbe ei poonɔuwɔin. Akilasu lee, Pirisilu lee, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu ginrun bemɛ nɛ mɔrinyɛnjɛ gɔ lee, Inɛw Baŋa boi le ei ɛjii poonɔuwɔin.
Ba unrunw ɔn nɛ wɔin gɔ puu ei poonɔuwɔin. Ama inɛw gin’ ihibɛ le tunmɔi poonɔi.
Mu Pɔlu, numɔ ma le poo ɔnbe mu tɔŋɔuwɔ.
Inɛ, Inɛw Baŋai ibɛla gɔ, jebu wo le wɔɔ. Maranata! ee, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ wɛɛ.
Inɛw Baŋa Yesu nɛɛma gɔ e le biyɛ.
Mu Kirisito Yesu nɛ e puui ibɛɛ wɔun.
Mu Pɔlu, Ama diŋɛ le Kirisito Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲu gɔ, bainɛ Timɔte le lɛtɛrɛ ɔn tɔŋɔuwɔn. Ama inɛw mɔɔnu Kɔrɛnte ana nɛ wɔɔ gɔ lee, Ama inɛw Akayi gana puu nɛ wɔin gɔ lee bɛrɛ tiiuwɔn.
Ama emɛ Ba lee, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito lee, e bɛrɛ nɛɛma lee, jamu lee obo.
Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito Ama gɔ, iyaa wo Ba gɔ, Ba amasɔgɔjugɔ baŋa gɔ, kinɛ kaalu wooi obonɛ Ama gɔ, woi sɔmɔmɔi.
Wo bɛrɛ goi ye kinɛ kaalu emɛ bɛɛjɛ gɔ le digɛnu, emaa inɛw ɔɲɛ tɔgu dɛin dɛin nɛ toin kinɛ kaaliyɛmu bɛɛ ga, wo ɔɲɛ emɛ puu nɛ kinɛ emɛ kakaaliyɛmɔjɛ.
Kirisito ɔɲɛ ɔɲu tunkanrin joo bana emɛ bɛɛjɛ gin’, Kirisito le digɛnu emɛ kinɛ kaalu diyɛ yaa bɛbɛɛɲu.
Emɛ ɔɲɛ nɛ toin ye, ebaa kinɛ kaalu lee, yayabu lee bɛɛ dɛi bii. Emɛ kinɛ kaalu biyaaɲu ye, ebaa ɔɲɛ emɛ muyɔnjɛ tunkanrin tari bɛɛ ga, kinɛ kaalu gɔnrɔn ei oboido bɛɛ dɛi bii.
Kodigɛu, e sibɛ go diyɛ emɛ dɛinyaan wɔɔ. Sabu, ɔɲɛ emɛ nɛ gamulu bana e bɛɛjɛ gin’, kinɛ kaalu emɛ nɛ yaa gamulu yinbɛɛdei ga, emɛ igii wɔin.
Ba unrunw, sɔɔ ɔn jugɔlu go e bii ye, emɛ ibɛlain. Rɔmɛ laamu Asi numɔ nɛ ɔɲɛ emɛ bɛi gɔ, demɛniyaan, dɔɔ emɛ dɛi gaa bee. Halu kinrun emɛ wogɔ nɛ ɛliyɛidolo ga emɛ sɛbɛin.
Emɛ kai, ajubu emɛ nɛ yiun emɛ sɔɔ kɛjaatin ga bɛin. Kaa emaa kuu emɛ gɔnrɔn le gawanɔu, Ama, yiun bulomɔjɛ baŋa gɔ nɛ gagawu emɛ bojo ga kunrin bii.
Yiun mɔɲu kɔɔ nɛ emi wo yabu, iyaa wo yabado. Ama nimɛ kanran emi yayabado ga, emɛ wo sibɛ go diyɛdɔn wogɔ le wɔin.
Sabu e yaa, emɛ dɛi Ama e gɛɛnjɛ le emi babaradei. Kunrin, inɛw joo amagɛɛn dɛi duba emɛ bɛɛido gɔ, inɛw joo bɛrɛ emɛ dɛi Amai birɛpoo tagu sɔɔi biyɛdo.

Kijɛ nɛ kuu unu emɛ bɛɛjɛ gɔ, wogɔ aduna nɛ, iyaa sigɛ le e sibɛ nɛ, emɛ daii, naran Ama bɛrɛ goojɛ gɔ le yoi yaauwɔin ga, kinɛjugɔ emɛ sɛɛrɛ emɛ nɛ goojɛ gɔ woi. Emɛ Adama ii hakilɛ le wogɔ kanrannɛ, kaa Ama nɛɛma le kanrin.

Sɔɔ jaŋau, paamau e wɔɔ gɔi laa ye, emɛ sɔɔ wajai e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔnɛ. Kanɛ baa gaila paamu kanraan e wɔɔ gin’, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu bai wɛɛido gɔ, e dɛi kuu emɛ uloido gin’, kuu ebe yaa emɛ dɛi ulodo. Kaa e wogɔ paamu ye dain dɔdɔɔdei ga mu gawaa wɔun.

Diyɛdɔn wogɔ mu le ɛjii yabe dɛi, mu e bɛrɛ laa yaadɔn ga yegeraabɔn. Ebe nɛ gowaai ye, Maseduanɛ galaai ye, iyaa Maseduanɛ gowaa e bɛrɛ wiyaa ye, ebaa Judea gana yai nɛ mui niinɛ ga bɔun. Kunrin ebaa kubɔ lɛi duba bɛɛ ga bɔun.
Sɔɔ kɔɔbe waaru mu yeguru le, mu inɛ iŋu sɛlɛi bɔun ma? Maa aduna bɛɛnw kanranjɛ gin’, sɔɔ nɛ «ee» gɛiti ye, yalu turu gɔ nɛ «ai» yaa mu gɛɛjɛ ma?
Kaa Ama sɔɔ turu baŋai wɔɔ gin’, e bɛrɛ sɔɔ emɛ sɔi nɛ, «ee» lee, «ai» lee biyɛlu.
Sabu mu lee, Silasu lee, Timɔte lee, logoro ebe nɛ, Ama Aini Yesu Kirisito sɔɔ waaju emɛ kanrun gɔ, wo, «ee» lee, «ai» lee inɛi biyɛlu. Waaru puu womɔ «eei» bee.
Iyaa, Ama pui gɔbe puu wo le digɛu «eei» biyaain. Wogɔ digɛu, emɛ Ama sɔmɔnu, «amina» gɔ Yesu Kirisito le digɛnu gɛɛɲu.
Kirisito nɛ, emɛ lee, e lee puui ɛɛin bojonɛ baŋa gɔ, iyaa emi yɛmɛnɛ gɔ, Ama woi.
Wo, emi womɔi ga, sɛɛrɛ womɔ emɛ nɛ kunaa, kijɛ ɛju emɛ dɛi wo bojaajɛ giru duuni ga, Kikinu womɔ obaa, kinɛ emɛ nɛ daanaabe.
Ama sɛɛrɛ mai, wo kinɛ ma igii wɔɔ. Mu amasɔgɔ ebe jugaa, Kɔrɛnte wɛɛlun kanrun.
Emɛ kijɛ e gawaun jaan paŋa le e bɛrɛ gawamɔ ibɛlain, sabu gagawu nɛ e ɛɛn go iŋiyaan wɔi. Kaa ebaa kinɛ ɛɛli bɛɛ ga, emɛ e le bariyaa birɛ birɛuwɔin.
Kunrin, waja pilemu ye kinɛ jiun e bɛrɛ obonɔu ga, mu e bɛrɛ pilemɛ yaaidolɔn ga, kinɛ ma nɛ kɛjaabɔn.
Yɛnɛi, kinɛ ebe mu jinwɛnmɔjɛ ye, aa mu bɛrɛ kinɛ ɛɛlu obodo? Inɛw kinɛ mu jinwɛnmu gɔbei laa ma?
Lɛtɛrɛ kɔɔ kijɛ dɛi tɔŋaa mu tii gɔ, e inɛw kinɛ ma ɛɛliyɛmɔu jaan gɔbe, e bɛrɛ dɔwaaun ye kinɛ ma jinwɛnmɔnɔu dɛi tɔŋun. Kinɛ ɛɛli ma e puu kinɛ ɛɛlii ga mu gawaa wɔun.
Mu kinɛ aalu le, kinɛ jiun diyɛ le, giridii goou lɛtɛrɛ kɔɔ tɔŋun. Kinɛ ebe jinwɛnmɔ dɛi laa, kaa ihibɛ diyɛ e sibɛ go mu sɛɛ gɔ ebaa jugɔ ga tɔŋu.
Inɛ turu kinɛ jiun sɔɔ kanraanti ye, wo kinɛ mai jinwɛnmɔlu, e puu kinɛi jinwɛnmu. Kaa sɔɔ biɲɛnu doori dɛi, e gamuu kinɛi jinwɛnmu gɛɛmɔi.
E inɛw joo woi jarugaa, kijɛ wo bɛrɛ e kanrun gɔ, woi baa wɔɔ.
Nɛɛ kai, wo bɛrɛ jinwɛn galu ye, kinɛ womɔ yanwannɔu ga, woi yaabu kanraan ye kinɛ kaalu wo bɛrɛ e oboun jaain wɔɔ.
Kɔɔ dɛi mu e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn, e woi ibɛɛ wɔi ga wo bɛrɛ jugɔmɔi.
Sabu lɛtɛrɛ gɔ, mu iyaa kijɛ puu nɛ ebaa sɔɔ ma yayabajɛi ma, ei marun yɛnɛdɔn ga tɔŋu.

Nɛɛ kai e inɛ bɛrɛ yaabu e kanranjɛ gɔ, mu yaa woi yaabu kanraunwɔn. Sɔɔ yaabu mu kanrun gɔ, mu sɔɔ yaabu kanranɲu yasɔn ma laa ye, Setanu kuu emɛ nɛ gɔnrɔn bɛɛnɔu ga, Kirisito giru nɛ e dɛi yaabu kanrun. Sabu Setanu sɔɔ kanranjɛ ga wɔɔ, emɛ igii wɔin.
Kirisito Kibɛru Ɛju taga ga, Toroasu ana nɛ waaru mu dɔi le, maa kɔɔ nɛ birɛ birɛ ga, Inɛw Baŋa Ama, taan pinɛlaabe.
Kaa mu bainɛ Titei tɛmɛlun gɔ dɛi, kinɛ ma jamu sɛbele. Kodɛi ba unrunw bemaa jamu biyɛmɔ giyaatiyaa, mu Maseduanɛ gana nɛ wiyaabɔn.
Ama birɛpoo, sabu Kirisito gɔnrɔn bɛɛjɛ gɔ nɛ, wo waaru puu emi yatoiyomɔjɛ. Iyaa lajukɔrɔ jiɲu, yalu puu bana dɔɔjɛ gin’, yalu puu nɛ emi Kirisito jugɔ tagarawin bojojɛ.
Naran go, inɛw yabaaɲu lee, inɛw suiyou wɔin lee logoro nɛ, Ama bɛrɛ Kirisito lajukɔrɔ gɔ emi.
Inɛw suiyou wɔin bɛrɛ emɛ yiun jiɲu, inɛ daajɛi jiɲiyɛnɲu. Inɛw yabaaɲu bɛrɛ ɔnmɔ jiɲu, ɔnmɔ obojɛi jiɲiyɛnɲu. Inɛ aa birɛ kɔɔbe birɛ bɛɛdo?
Inɛw joo Ama sɔɔ le tɔŋu tɔŋɔuwɔin gɔbe, emɛ be gin’ wɔnɛ. Kaa Ama emi tii dɛi, emɛ kinɛpilu le Ama giru nɛ Kirisito le pagu turu biyaa sɔɔ sɔɔuwɔin.
Nɛɛ iyaa emɛ pilemaa kuu emɛ le emi sɔmɔuwɔin ma? Maa inɛw gamuu gin’, lɛtɛrɛ boi ɛju emɛ sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ e bɛrɛ emɛ jɛɛlɛun jaain wɔɔ ma? Maa emɛ bɛrɛ e oboun jaain wɔɔ ma?
Lɛtɛrɛ boi ɛju emɛ sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ, kinɛ emɛ nɛ tɔŋaa too gɔ, ei. Inɛw puu jugɔ ye jaŋa bɛbɛɛɲu.
Ei Kirisito lɛtɛrɛ, emɛ le tiin ga jɛnrɛin wɔɔ. Wogɔ dii tɔŋu tɔŋu le tɔŋɔnɛ, kaa Ama ɔnmɔ Kikinu birɛi. Tibu kɛbiriyɛun nɛ tɔŋɔnɛ, kaa kinɛ nɛ tɔŋɔ.
Kirisito le digɛu Ama giru nɛ diyɛdɔn emɛ sɛɛ gɔ dɛi, emɛ sɔɔ kɔɔ sɔɔɲu.
Emɛ kuu emɛ le birɛ kɔɔ birɛɲu gɔnrɔn yasin ga ajubaa wɔnɛ. Gɔnrɔn emɛ, Ama bɛrɛ goojɛ.
Aaru kana birɛbirɛnwin biyɛ ga, gɔnrɔn gɔ emɛ bɛrɛ wo obu. Wogɔ tɔɔru tɔŋaaɲu aarui laa, Ama Kikinu aarui. Sabu tɔɔru tɔŋaaɲu gɔ, yiun wo nɛ goojɛ. Kaa Ama Kikinu ɔnmɔ obojɛ.

Tɔɔru, lɛtɛrɛ ii tuturu tibu kɛbiriyɛun nɛ tɔŋaa waaru obobɛin le, Ama dooro iyemaabe. Halu dooro kɔɔ dooro galajɛi bee kanran, Isɛrɛlu unrunw Mɔisei yɛnɛ bɛɛubenɛ. Tɔɔru yiun jɛɛlɛjɛ gɔ dooro kɔɔ tunmɔ le wɛi ye,
Kikinu birɛ gɔ kɔɔ dɛi sigɛ Ama dooro tagaraidolo ma?
Tɔɔru birɛ, jarugu inɛ kuu nɛ duurɔjɛ gɔ dooro le bee ye, Kikinu birɛ, inɛwin teitai bojojɛ gɔ sigɛ le ɛjii dooro le biyɛidolo ma?
Naran go, pɔɔlɔ kijɛ dooroi bee gɔ, iye dooro diyɛ gɔ le tunwaan ye, kijɛ kanmai laa.
Sabu kijɛ galajɛ, dooro unrunmɔ yasɛbe biyaai ye, kijɛ galaalɛ dooro gɔ wogɔ dɛi sigɛ.
Emɛ diyɛdɔn ɛju kɔɔ yasin dɛi, liyɛ sɛlɛ le wɔin.
Emɛ Mɔise gin’ kanraannɛ. Wo, Isɛrɛlu unrunw bemaa dooro galajɛ gɔ mananu wo wɔnu iyenɔu ga, girupala unrunmɔ sɔi le dɛbɛube.
Kaa Isɛrɛlu unrunw wogɔ paamu bɛɛubenɛ. Iye bai dɔɔ, aaru pɛi sɔɔ waaru be jaŋajɛ le, sɔi girupala dɛbu tunmɔ gɔ le, hakilɛ bemɛ dɛdɛbɛ. Sɔi gɔ dɛbɛlɛla, sabu Kirisito le digɛnu dɛbɛlɛjɛ.
Halu, iye bai dɔɔ Mɔise dɔn gɔbe waaru be jaŋajɛ puu, hakilɛ bemɛ nɛ sɔi yadɛbɛ.
Kaa Inɛw Baŋa sibɛ nɛ kigelemaa ye, sɔi dɛbɛ gɔ goiyaajɛ.
Sɔɔ ɔn nɛ Inɛw Baŋa gɔ, Kikinu gɔ woi. Iyaa Inɛw Baŋa Kikinu yalu wɔɔ nɛ, liliyɛ wɔlɔ. Inɛw puu hɔɔlɔwin.

Emɛ puu, girupala emɛ nɛ sɔi dɛbɛla. Wogɔ digɛu, emɛ kikinuyɛni Inɛw Baŋa dooro tagarajɛ gin’ wɔin. Kunrin, Inɛw Baŋa Kikinu gɔnrɔn le, waaru puu dooro bɛɛ bɛɛ yaanu, emɛ duli ye, Yesu Kirisito bana gin’ biyɛdɛin.
Ama, amasɔgɔ emɛ jugaa birɛ ɔn nɛ emi kunaabe dɛi, anrangaju emɛ dogoolɛ.

Emɛ sɔɔ aboŋu le ma, sɔɔ dɔgɔgu ma, wogɔbe le onu dulaatin. Emɛ sakulu le yaauwɔnɛ. Iyaa, emɛ Ama sɔɔ gɔ dulomɔɔnɛ. Kaa naran gɔ wɛjɛii sɔi ye ɛjɛmɔɲu. Kunrin emɛ Ama giru nɛ, inɛ tuturu puu bɛrɛ, kinɛjugɔ womɔ nɛ boi ɛju emɛ boomu dɛnɛɲu.
Kaa Kibɛru Ɛju emɛ tagajɛ ɔn sɔɔ gɔ nimɛ wɛjɛii wɔlɔ ye, inɛw suiyoidɛin bɛrɛ wɛjɛii wɔlɔ wɔɔ.
Be sɔɔ gɔ le gawaanɛ, sabu aduna ɔn ama gɔ, bemaa Kirisito, Ama le murin wɔɔ baŋa gɔ, dooro womɔ Kibɛru Ɛju wijɛ be bɛrɛ wɛɛjɛ gɔ iyenɔu ga hakilɛ bemɛ dɛbaati.
Emɛ, waaju emɛ tagajɛ nɛ kuu emɛ dɛi sɔɔnɛ. Yesu Kirisito, Inɛw Baŋa gɔ woi ga, emɛ waaju emɛ nɛ wogɔi tagaɲu. Emɛ kai Yesu dɛi, emi birɛbirɛnw ebei gɛɛɲu.
Wijɛ, ɔlɔ logoro nɛ dodoorodo ga Ama sɔɔnɛ gɔ, kinɛ emɛ nɛ yaa wijɛ womɔ dooriyemɔnɛ gɔ woi. Ama dooro, Kirisito girupala nɛ iyemɔjɛ gɔ emaa ɛjii jugɔ bɛɛ ga, kinɛ emɛ nɛ wijɛ gɔ wo dooriyemu.
Emi pɔnu toroi le kɛkɛu. Kokanran, kijɛ dɔnrun dɔɔmɔɔlɛ kɔɔ emɛ nɛ too. Kibɛru Ɛju gɔnrɔn diyɛ gɔ emɛ nɛ goolɛ, kaa Ama nɛ goojɛ inɛw bemaa jugɔ ga kɔɔ gin’ wɔɔ.
Sabu, bana dɛin dɛin puu le emi ɔɲɔmɔuwɔin, kaa emɛ iŋiyaan wɔin. Emɛ jiire le wɔin, kaa diyɛdɔn emɛ dogolu.
Emi tɔɔɲɔuwɔin, kaa Ama emi pajalu. Emi laga sunugouwɔin, kaa emi suiyolu.
Emɛ waaru puu goju emɛ le Yesu yiun sɔɔ tagarauwɔin. Goju emɛ nɛ ɔnmɔ womɔ sɔɔ iyemɔ ga wogɔ biyɛuwɔ.
Sabu, aduna nɛ kinrun le waaru emɛ too le, emɛ Yesu sabu dɛi waaru puu yiun le bɛrii wɔin. Goju yinwɛnjɛ emɛ nɛ, Yesu ɔnmɔ iyemɔ ga wogɔ biyɛuwɔ.
Kunrin yiun, birɛ womɔ kɔlɔ emɛ nɛ birɛjɛ. Kaa ɔnmɔ gɔ, birɛ womɔ e nɛ birɛjɛ.
Ama Dɔn sɔwaa gi: “Mu gawaabɔn. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi mu sɔɔ sɔwaabɔn.” Emɛ kanran gagawu turu wogɔ ajubui sɛin digɛu, emɛ gawaa wɔin. Iyaa wogɔ sabu dɛi emɛ sɔɔ sɔɔuwɔin.
Emɛ igii wɔin, Inɛw Baŋa Yesui yiun nɛ bulomɔnɛ baŋa gɔ, emi yaa Yesu le bulogu ye, e lee, emɛ lee mɔɔnu ye Yesu giru nɛ jɛjɛɛlɛdo.
Sɔɔ kɔɔbe puu e dɛi biyɛuwɔ. Kunrin, Ama nɛɛma gɔ bariyɛnu yaa, inɛw joo bɛrɛ dɔwaai dɛi, Amai birɛpoo tagu sɔɔ bari ye, boi sɔmu gɔ Ama mɔi biyɛ ga sɔɔ kɔɔbe biyɛuwɔ.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, anrangaju emɛ dogoolɛ. Halu goju emɛ pɛyaa yanwaunwɔ kanran, kinɛ emɛ nɛ bai puu emɛ inɛ kanai taŋa taŋa yaauwɔin.
Waaru gaila le ɔɲɛ dagi emɛ bɛɛjɛ gɔ, dooro diyɛ, kale jugɔmɔɔlɛ asuu sɔgɔjɛ emɛ dɛi yegerejɛ.
Wogɔ digɛu, emɛ kijɛ iyemɔjɛ nɛ giru emɛ dɛɛraa gɛlɛlain. Kijɛ iyemɔɔlɛ nɛ giru dɛɛraa sɛin. Kijɛ iyemɔjɛ, waaru gaila kijɛi. Kijɛ iyemɔɔlɛ, asuu kijɛi.
Aduna ɔn nɛ kuru emɛ too ɔn, tiyɛ gɔ goju emɛ ɔn wologaatin ye, alagala nɛ, inɛ numɔ ginrun ujɔlu, kaa Ama kuu womɔ le ginrun wo ujaajɛ, asuu biyɛido gɔ emɛ yasin ga igii wɔin.
Kunrin, kuru ɔn nɛ toun, emɛ duru durouwɔin. Emɛ alagala ginrun emɛ gɔ arugoi gin’ yoo ga dadaaru diyɛ le wɔin.
Emɛ wogɔ yowaain ye, emi duŋu le biyɛidolo.

Kuru ɔn nɛ waaru emɛ too gɔ le, emɛ duru durouwɔin. Emɛ dɔɔ duiyaa wɔin. Kokanran, emɛ goju ɔn arugoi gin’ pomɔ ibɛɛ wɔin gin’ wɔlɔ. Kaa emɛ alagala goju gɔ arugoi gin’ yoo ibɛɛ wɔin. Ɔnmɔ gɔ, kijɛ yinwɛnjɛ gɔi donugaati ga emɛ wogɔi dɛnɛɲu.
Emi sɔɔ kɔɔ dɛi yegerenɛ baŋa gɔ, Ama woi. Wo giru duuni ga, Kikinu gɔ emɛ bɛrɛ obaabe.
Emɛ kodɛi waaru puu anrangaju le jowaa wɔin. Emɛ goju ɔn le wɔin ye, Inɛw Baŋa le emi wagee wɔɔ ga emɛ igii wɔin.
Emɛ giru iye le yoi yaauwɔnɛ, kaa gagawu le yaauwɔin.
Emɛ anrangaju le jowaa wɔin. Iyaa goju ɔn nɛ goi ye, Inɛw Baŋa giru nɛ biyɛ ga, emɛ bɛrɛ wogɔ ire.
Wogɔ digɛu, emɛ goju le wɔin ma, goju gɔ nɛ gowaain ma, kijɛ puu dɛi sigɛ sɔɔ emɛ Inɛw Baŋa kinɛ aamɔ ga ibɛɛ wɔin.
Sabu waajibi, emɛ puu Kirisito saliyɛ kiru yalu gɔ nɛ wɛwɛɛdɛin. Inɛ tuturu puu goju womɔ le wɔu kijɛ wo kanrun, ɛjui ma, mɔɲui ma, wogɔ tujɔ bɛbɛɛdo.
Inɛw Baŋai bana liyɛun jaan gɔ, emɛ wogɔ igii wɔin. Kodigɛu, inɛw bemaa tinwinrun emɛ le gawa ga emɛ be bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔin. Ama emi ɛjii igii wɔɔ. E kanran kinɛjugɔ ebe nɛ emi igii wɔi ga wɔun.

Emɛ pilemaa kuu emɛ le boi ɛju emɛ sɔɔi e bɛrɛ sɔɔuwɔnɛ. Kaa ebaa emɛ dɛi kuu ebe unu bɛɛ ga, e bɛrɛ banai obouwɔin. Kunrin, kinɛ bemɛ bana wɔɔ dɛi laa, kaa bain nɛ aŋai bei wɔɔ dɛi inɛw kuu bemɛ unɔw gɔbe, e aŋa bemɛ sai bɛbɛɛdei.
Kuu emɛ duliyaa ye, emɛ Ama dɛi kunrin wɔin. Kaa kuu emɛ kɛu wɔɔ ye, wogɔ tinɛ ebei.
Sabu inɛ turu inɛw puu dɛi yinwun ye, tiyɛ gɔ, inɛw gɔ puu yinwaain. Emɛ inɛw wogɔ le gawaa wɔin gɔ, Kirisito ihibɛ gɔ emi mamainiyɛnmɔjɛ.
Wo, inɛw ɔnmɔi wɔin gɔbe bemaa kuu bemɛ dɛi ɔnmɔi biyɛnɔu, kaa inɛ be dɛi yinwaan bulu gɔ dɛi ɔnmɔi biyɛ ga, inɛw puu dɛi yinwun.
Wogɔ digɛu, emɛ kanɛ baa, inɛ turui kanran, Adama unrunw bana inɛi yɛnɛjɛ gin’ yɛnɛɛnɛ. Halu emɛ Kirisitoi Adama ii bana inɛ yɛnɛjɛ gin’ yɛnaabɛin kanran, kanɛ emɛ kɔɔ gin’ woi yɛnɛuwɔnɛ.
Inɛ aai kanran Kirisito le too ye, woi maŋu kanai. Sɔɔ pɛi gɔbe puu galaain, kijɛ puu kanai biyaai.
Kɔɔbe puu Ama bɛrɛ goi. Wo Kirisito le digɛu, unrun lee, emɛ lee logoro nɛ sɔɔ yegeraati. Iyaa inɛw lee, wo lee logoro nɛ sɔɔ yeguru birɛ gɔ, wo emɛ bɛrɛ gawaraabe.
Tiyɛ gɔ Ama, inɛw bɛrɛ hakɛ bemɛ lugolu kanraan, unrun lee, inɛw lee logoro nɛ sɔɔ yegere ga, Kirisito nɛ birɛ birɛube. Iyaa unrun le sɔɔ yeguru waaju taga ga emɛ bɛrɛ gawaraabe.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Kirisito dilɛ nɛ emɛ iŋɛ. Emɛ le digɛu, Ama kuu womɔ le ei tinwɛnrɛunwɔ gin’ wɔɔ. Emɛ Kirisito boi le e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔin, Ama lee, e lee logoro nɛ sɔɔ yegere ga yabai.
Kirisito, inɛ hakɛ inɛɛ bee gɔ, emɛ sabu dɛi Ama woi hakɛi bojaabe. Kunrin wo nɛ, inɛw teitai ga Ama lugojɛ gɔbe, emi taŋaai.
Emɛ Ama le birɛbirɛnw bɔɔwin dɛi, e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔin, Ama nɛɛma e bɛi gɔ, niwɛn sɛlɛ biyɛmɔnɔugi.
Sabu Ama sɔwaa gi: “Waaru sɛgɛraa gɔ le mu gɛɛn uwɔ nɛ suguru dɛɛraabɔn. Yayabu bai gɔ le, mu jobudigilu uwɔ saabɔn.” Nɛɛ waaru sɛgɛraa gɔ kanɛi. Yayabu bai gɔ iyei.
Birɛ emɛ nɛ lelu bɛɛmɔnɔu ga, emɛ kijɛ turu nɛ kanran inɛ tomɔmu sabaabui bii ibɛlain.
Kaa kijɛ wooi nɛ, emɛ emi Ama birɛbirɛnwin ga jugɔmɔuwɔin. Ɔɲɛ lee, nau lee, kinɛ ɔɲɛ lee tari nɛ, emɛ wogɔ jugɔmɔuwɔin.
Emi lagauwɔin, kaju kunɔuwɔin, emɛ dɛi giru giru sɔɔ biyɛuwɔ, emɛ birɛ nau nau birɛuwɔin, giri yeiyeenɛ, pana kayaanɛ.
Emɛ, teitai nɛ lee, jugɔ nɛ lee, muyɔn nɛ lee, ɛjii bii nɛ lee, Kikinu Pilu gɔnrɔn gɔ nɛ lee, ihibɛ tɔitɔi emɛ sɛɛ gɔ nɛ lee,
naran sɔɔ emɛ tagajɛ gɔ nɛ lee, Ama gɔnrɔn gɔ nɛ lee wogɔ jugɔmɔuwɔin. Teitai bii gɔ kɔmɔgelu emɛi. Kole taaɲu, kole togoɲu.
Emi bababaɲu, iyaa dɔgɔ emɛ bɛrɛ tatagaraɲu. Boi mɔɲu emɛ sɔsɔɔɲu, boi ɛju emɛ kanran sɔsɔɔɲu. Emi kakalu maŋaw gin’ yɛnɛuwɔin, kaa emɛ narain sɔɔɲu.
Emi inin gin’ wɔin, kaa ɛjii igii wɔin. Emi yinwɛin yaajɛ gin’ wɔɔ, kaa ɔnmɔi kowɔin. Ɔɲɔmaaɲu gin’ wɔin, kaa daanɛ.
Kinɛ jiun yasin gin’ wɔin, kaa waaru puu kinɛ ɛɛli le wɔin. Dɛgugunw gin’ wɔin, kaa inɛw joo ɔgɔ unɔuwɔin. Kijɛ kanma sɛnɛ gin’ wɔin, kaa kijɛ puu yasin.
Kɔrɛnte ba unrunw, emɛ naran gɔi e bɛrɛ tagin, kinɛ emɛ nɛ sɔɔ turu kanran baŋarannɛ.
Emɛ kinɛ emɛ nɛ ei ɛjii paa wɔin. Kaa emɛ sibɛ go ihibɛ ebe gaila.
Mu unrunw mabe gin’ ei tinwɛnrɛunwɔn, e kanran kinɛ ebe nɛ kunrin emi ɛjii paai.
Inɛw Ama le gawanɛ le mɔrin ye, pagu turu biyɛnɔugi. Sabu teitai lee, teitai laa lee mɔɔnu ingei too? Maa wijɛ lee, ɔlɔ lee bɔɔ ingei too?
Iyaa Kirisito lee, jinrun puu kuu baŋa lee, aaru ingei too? Inɛ Ama le gawaajɛ lee, Ama le gawalu lee gamulu ingei too?

Ama Ginrun Diyɛ lee, ɔmɔlɔ lee yani yegi bɛɛjɛ? Ama ɔnmɔ Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ emi. Ama wo kuu womɔ le ɔn gin’ sɔi: “Mu logoro bemɛ nɛ toi ye be le yoi yayaadɔn. Mu Ama bemɛi bibiyɛdɔn. Be tɔgu mai bibiyɛdɛin.”
Wogɔ digɛu, Inɛw Baŋa Ama sɔwaa gi: “Logoro bemɛ nɛ gooi. Be le kabiyɛi. Kijɛ lɔgɔgu tabanɔugi. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, mu ei sɛsɛgɛrɛdɔn.
Mu e bai biyɛdɔn. E anranw unrunw ma lee, unrunw yaanw ma leei biyɛdei. Inɛw Baŋa Ama, kɔmɔnumɔbe kuu baŋa gɔ kunrin gi.”
Ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, pui kɔɔbe emɛ le kuni wɔɔ. Kodigɛu, emɛ goju lɔgɔ ma, kinɛ lɔgɔ ma wooi nɛ emi ɛjɛmɔmɔi. Ama giriliyɛ le emi ɛjɛmu ye kale dɔɔnɔmɔi.
Kinɛ ebe nɛ emi paai. Emɛ inɛ turu bɛrɛ kanran mɔɲu kanrannɛ, inɛ turui kanran suyonɛ, inɛ turui kanran punɔnɛ.
Mu, jarugu kuu ebe nɛ duurɔdɔn dɛi sɔɔ kɔɔ gɛɛuwɔlɔn. Sabu bana sɔwaa mu galu gin’, ɔnmɔi ma, yinwin ma, ei kinɛ emɛ nɛ paa wɔin.
Mu e le ɛjii gawaa wɔun. E dɛi kuu ma gaai unɔuwɔn. Kinɛ ma kaaliyaa dain dɔwaai. Ɔɲɛ logoro nɛ mu kinɛ ɛɛli diyɛ le wɔun.
Naran go Maseduanɛ gana nɛ emɛ dɔi nɛ, emɛ deeliye turu kanran bɛɛnɛ. Emɛ ɔɲɛ tɔgu puu iyaabɛin. Bain go jaii, kinɛ emɛ nɛ liliyɛi.
Kaa Ama, inɛw ɔɲaa wɔin kinɛ kaaliyɛmɔnɛ gɔ, Tite wɛɛgu le kinɛ emɛ kaaliyɛmaabe.

Wɛɛgu womɔ sai laa, kaa iyaa kinɛ kaalu e le wo bɛi gɔ le, wo kinɛ emɛ kaaliyɛmaabe. Wo ebaa dadaaru ma le wɔi, kinɛ sɔmiyɛn le wɔi, mu dɛi maini diyɛ le wɔi ga emɛ bɛrɛ tagaabe. Wogɔ kinɛ ɛɛlu ma bariyɛmaabe.
Halu lɛtɛrɛ ma gɔ kinɛ ebe jinwɛnmaabe kanran, kinɛ ma kɔɔliyaa wɔlɔ. Lɛtɛrɛ gɔ waaru gaila le kinɛ ebe jinwɛnmaabe ga iyaa, kinɛ ma kɔɔliyaabe.
Kaa kanɛ mu kinɛ ɛɛli le wɔun. Kinɛ ebe jinwaan dɛi laa, kinɛ jiun gɔ e bɛrɛ bana duli wo obu gɔ dɛi. Kinɛ jiun ebe gɔ Ama diŋɛ le sɛgɛraa digɛu, emɛ e bɛrɛ mɔɲu dɔɔnɔnɛ.
Kinɛ jiun Ama diŋɛ le sɛgɛraa gɔ, bana duli yayabu nɛ inɛi jɛyaajɛ jɛɛlɛjɛ. Wogɔ dɛi kinɛ kɔɔliyɛɛlɛ. Kaa aduna kinɛ jiun gɔ yiun jɛɛlɛjɛ.

Iyaa, kinɛ jiun Ama diŋɛ le sɛgɛraa kɔɔ, sɔɔ gɔ dɛi aŋai kinɛ ɔgu le ei wo boju gɔ yɛnɛi. E sɔɔ gɔ nɛ ei pilɛmɔuwɔi, sɔɔ gɔ kinɛ ebe tɛgaa, sɔɔ gɔ liyaai. Mui iyi dadaaru le wɔi, maini diyɛ le wɔi, jarugu duuru dabulu dɛnaabei. E mainiyaan ei sɔɔ gɔ nɛ tolo ga tagaraabei.
Nɛɛ e bɛrɛ lɛtɛrɛ mu tii gɔ, mɔɲu kanrannɛ gɔ dɛi laa, inɛ bɛrɛ mɔɲu kanrin gɔ dɛi laa. Kaa emɛ dɛi bana e mainiyɛnjɛ gɔ, Ama giru nɛ ebaa wogɔ jugɔ dɛii.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi kinɛ emɛ kaaliyaa wɔɔ. Kinɛ emɛ kaaliyaa gɔi laa go, e puu Tite hakilɛ e daanu gɔ dɛi, kinɛ ɛɛli wo bɛi gɔ sigɛ le kinɛ emɛ ɛɛliyɛmaabe.
Mu giru womɔ nɛ e dɛi, kuu ma gaila unaabɔn. E dɔgɔ mu bɛrɛ tagarali. Waaru puu e bɛrɛ naran emɛ sɔɔjɛ gin’, Tite giru nɛ ei kijɛ dɛi emɛ sɔmu gɔ yaa narain bii.
Kunrin, sɔɔ yabu ebe lee, bana woi liliyɛ lee, goju kinwun lee le, ɛjii e sɛguru gɔ lee ajubaa ye, e sibɛ nɛ ihibɛ womɔ sigɛ le bariyaai.
Kijɛ puu nɛ e le gawu mu bɛɛjɛ gɔ dɛi mu kinɛ ɛɛli le wɔun.
Ba unrunw, Maseduanɛ gana Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔbe nɛ Ama nɛɛma bana birɛ wo biru gɔ emɛ e bɛrɛ jugɔmɔuwɔin.
Halu be ɔɲɛ diyɛ subɔrɔ logoro nɛ toin kanran, halu nau ɛjii bei yasɛ kanran, kinɛ ɛɛli diyɛ be sɛɛ gɔ bei damaa, numɔ maa kunɔmɔlu go, be bɛrɛ sin gaai kanranmaabe.
Mu naran go e bɛrɛ sɔɔuwɔn, be gɔnrɔn bemɛ bana wɔɔ gin’ sin kanraanbɛin. Halu gɔnrɔn bemɛ dɛi gaa kanraanbɛin. Kuu bemɛ le,
be maini le emɛ bɛrɛ gɛnyaan, Ama inɛw Judea nɛ wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ sin kanrun birɛ gɔ nɛ numɔ unrunbemɛ kunɔmɔ gin.
Be, be le emɛ ajubu dɛi sigɛ kanraanbɛin. Be, laa gɔ, kuu bemɛ Inɛw Baŋa bɛrɛ obaabɛin. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Ama diŋɛ le kɛukɛu emɛ bɛrɛ obin.
Kodigɛu, emɛ Titei gɛnyaan, ebe nɛ sin kanrun birɛ kɔɔ bana wo tɔlu le kɛukɛu, yai donugo gin.
Kijɛ puu nɛ sɔɔ ebe sɛɛu wɔɔ. Gagawu nɛ wee, sɔɔ nɛ wee, jugɔ nɛ wee, sɔɔ tɔgu puu nɛ kuu kunu nɛ wee, emi ibɛɛ bii nɛ wee. Kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’, sin kanrun birɛ ɔn nɛ kanran sɔɔ ebe sɛɛu bojoi.
Mu tɔɔrui e bɛrɛ obouwɔlɔn, kaa inɛw wajunw maini gɔ e bɛrɛ jugɔmu ye, ihibɛ ebe yɔgɔ baa wɔɔ ma yɛnɛdɔn dɛii.
Sabu e Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito nɛɛma gɔ igii wɔi. Wo kijɛ baŋai bee kanran, ebaa nau unrunmɔ le digɛnu Ama oju dimi arusɛgɛ joo siyɛ ga, wo e sabu dɛi nauginɛi biyaabe.
Nɛɛ, sɔɔ kɔɔ sibɛ go kinɛ ma ajubu e bɛrɛ mu tagamɔi: Gari baa, buudu ɔn sɛgu gɔ e laa tɔlu. Kɔɔ sai laa, buudu gɔ sɛgu dadaaru kanran ei laa ai. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, buudu sɛgu gɔ e donugoun jaain wɔɔ.
Nɛɛ kai, wogɔ birɛ gɔ digi ye donugoi. Kinɛ ɛju le buudu gɔ sɛgu dadaaru ei ai gin’, kinɛ ɛju wogɔ le nimɛ kanran sɛgu donugoi. Gɔnrɔn ebe le kɛukɛu kanrain.
Sabu sin kanran ga kinɛ ɛju yasɛu ye, kijɛ u sɛɛ u obojɛ gɔi Ama yabajɛ. Kijɛ sɛlɛ u wɔɔ gɔi laa.
Ebaa inɛw wajunwin baradei giye ei dɛgugiyɛmɔ gɛɛnɛ. Kaa inɛw puu tunmɔ le kɛukɛu bii sɔɔi.
Kanɛ e kijɛ siyaa nau bemɛ goouwɔi. Nɛɛ, be kijɛ siyaa be wɔnu, nau e bɛrɛ dɔwaai ye, be kanran nau ebe goo bɛbɛɛdɛin. Kunrin, e wooi kɛukɛu biyɛdo.
Wogɔ, Ama Dɔn sɔɔ ɔn le sɛgɛraa wɔɔ: “Inɛ gaai turaabe baŋa gɔ, sigɛ sɛbele. Gaila turaabe baŋa gɔi baalu kanranlu.”
Mamaa e dɛi emɛ sɛɛ tunkanrin, Ama, Tite kinɛ nɛ wo kunu gɔ dɛi, wo birɛpoo.
Tite bɛrɛ gɛɛn emɛ gɛin gɔ, wo yabaabe. Sigiyaa, mamaa womɔ dɛi, wo kuu womɔ le gowaa e bɛrɛ yaado gi.
Emɛ wo le digɛraa, Kibɛru Ɛju waaju tagu dɛi, bainɛ boi ɛju womɔ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu puu nɛ ginaa wɔɔ gɔi tiiuwɔin.

Sigiyaa, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔbe woi yɛmaa, sin kanrun birɛ emɛ bɛrɛ gawaraaɲu ɔn nɛ, yoi yaanɛ emɛ bɔɔnɛi biyɛ gin. Emɛ birɛ wogɔ, Inɛw Baŋa boi sɔmɔ dɛi lee, inɛw wajunwin bara ga maini le emɛ wɔɔ tagara dɛi lee birɛɲu.
Buudu diyɛ ɔn le sin obu birɛ emɛ birɛjɛ gɔ dɛi, inɛw jarugu sɔɔ emɛ nɛ bɛɛnɔu ga, emɛ kajubauwɔin.
Emɛ sɔɔ ɛju gɔi kanrun dɛnɛɲu. Ama giru nɛ ɛjii wɔɔ sai laa, inɛw giru nɛ kanran ɛjii wɔɔ gɔi dɛnɛɲu.
Be le digɛraa emɛ, emɛ bainɛi kanran tiiuwɔin. Waaru joo, womaa maai wɔɔ ma, emɛ sɔɔ joo nɛ woi subɔraa yɛnaabɛin. Kanɛ iyaa e le ɛjii gawaa wo wɔɔ gɔ dɛi, mamaa womɔ sigɛ le bariyaai.
Nɛɛ Tite, wo kai mu bɔɔnɛi. Mu le bariyaa e dɛi birɛuwɔ. Ba unrunw wajunw gɔ, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu inɛw tiibei. Be Kirisito boi sɔmi biyɛ dɛi birɛuwɔin.
Kodigɛu, e ihibɛ yasɛi ga, emɛ kanran e dɛi kuu emɛ unɔu baa bee ga, wogɔ sɛɛrɛ, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔbe be iyemɔi.
Narain, Ama inɛw bɛrɛ baru tii dɛi, lɛtɛrɛ e bɛrɛ mu tiiun baalu.
Mu kinɛ ɛju ebe igii wɔun. Mu wogɔ dɛi Maseduanɛ bɛɛnw giru nɛ, e dɛi kuu ma unɔu, Akayi gana ba unrunw, gari baa, unrunbei yegeraa wɔin gɛɛuwɔn. Maini ebe gɔ inɛw jooi wo damu.
Kɔɔ sibɛ go ei mu sɔmu gɔ sɔɔ peerei biyɛnɔu, kaa mu sɔi gin’ e yeguru le wɔi biyɛ ga, mu ibɛɛ wɔun. Mu kodɛi ba unrunw gɔbei tiiuwɔn.
Maseduanɛ ba unrunw gɔbe waaru mu le be wiyaajɛ, e yeguru le wɔlɔi tɛmɛmɔnɔugi. Kɔɔi laa ye, e le emɛ gawu gɔ, emɛ dɔgɔi biyɛdo. Dɔgɔ ebe gɔ kai sɔɔnu doori.

Kodigɛu, ba unrunw gɔbe giru ma nɛ e bɛrɛ yaaun jaain wɔɔ ga ajubaa, mu bei gɛnyaanbɔn. Bemaa yaa ye sin obu pui e kunu sɔɔ gɔ kilɛmɔ gun. Kunrin, mu sin obu ebe gɔ yegeraa kilaai wɛɛ tɛmɛdɔn, iyaa, sin obu ebe gɔ kara sɛlɛ sɔɔi laa, kinɛpilu le sin obui ga jujugɔmɔdo.
E jugɔi, toi gaila tɔwaajɛ baŋa, gɛlu gaila gɛlɛdo. Gaai tɔwaajɛ baŋa, gaai gɛlɛdo.
Kodigɛu, inɛ tuturu puu kinɛ womɔ nɛ bana wo kɛjaajɛ gin’ obo. Kinɛ aalu le ma, waajibi ga ma obonɔu. Sabu kinɛ ɛɛlu le obonɛ gɔ, Ama wogɔ baŋai dɛnɛjɛ.
Ebaa, waaru puu, bana puu nɛ, kai ebe puu kilɛɲu kijɛ sɛnu, iyaa, birɛ ɛju wooi ebaa birɛ ga, kijɛ joo siyɛ ga, Ama e bɛrɛ nɛɛma tɔgu dɛin dɛin baru ye oboɲu gɔnrɔn yasɛ.
Ama Dɔn nɛ inɛ kɔɔ tunmɔ dɛi bana tɔŋɔ gin’: “Wo numɔ maa kunɔlu go naugunw bɛrɛ sin kanraanjɛ. Ɛju womɔ asuu bibiyɛdo.”
Ama, toi tɔɔnɛ bɛrɛ toi obonɛ gɔ, iyaa pana womɔ tɔɔnɛ gɔ, e bɛrɛ toi obo ye gaai narinyɛnmɔ ye, kole digɛnu wo ɛhɛju ebe ii gaai nanarinyɛnmɔdo.
Kunrin, sibɛ puu nɛ e kijɛ joo sii ye, waaru puu sin joo kanrun bɛbɛɛdei. Sin wogɔbe, emɛ le digɛnu Amai birɛpoo tagu jɛjɛɛlɛdo.
Sabu sin obu ɔn birɛ gɔ, Ama inɛw kai kikilɛmɔjɛ sai laa, kaa, Ama bɛrɛ birɛpoo tagu sɔɔ joo yaa nanarinyɛnmɔjɛ.

Inɛw, baru ebe birɛ le kinɛ ɛju ebe ihiyedɛin. Kole digɛnu, be Kirisito Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ le e gawaa wɔi ga, sɔɔ yabu le bana e taguru gɔ dɛi, Ama boi sɔsɔmɔdɛin. Iyaa, be lee, inɛw wajunw puu lee bɛrɛ sin kanrun le bana kijɛ ebe e gamulu dɛi, be Amai sɔsɔmɔdɛin.
Ama nɛɛma diyɛ naa diyɛ e bɛrɛ wo kanrun gɔ dɛi, be ihibɛ le e dɛi Ama gɛgɛɛndɛin.
Ama sin obu aŋa dɛi gaa wo kanrun gɔ dɛi, woi sɔmɔmɔi.
Mu Pɔlu, e le wɔnu inɛ kuu sunugu le wɔɔ gɛɛɲu gɔ, wageniyaan ye e le inɛ ɛɛin wɔɔ gɛɛɲu gɔ, Kirisito kinɛ ɛju sɛɛ gɔ lee, muyɔn wo sɛɛ gɔ lee dɛi mu kuu ma le e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔ,

e bɛrɛ waaru mu wiyaajɛ, mainiyaanjɛi ye, e le mu bɛrɛ ɛɛin biyɛ kaaramɔnɔugi. Sabu emaa Adama unrunw peere bana le kɛukɛu yoi yaaɲu inɛw gɛɛnw gɔbe sibɛ go liyɛ sɛlɛ go, mu ɛɛin bii bɛbɛɛdɔn ga igii wɔun.
Emɛ gojunawan le wɔin narain, kaa, Adama ii peere bana le jai jaiyɛɛnɛ.
Sabu gelu le kɔmɔ emɛ taajɛ gɔ, Adama ii peere kɔmɔtai gelui laa. Kaa Ama kɔmɔgelu paŋagui. Kɔmɔsɛguru ginrun gɔbei damu sunugoɲu gɔnrɔn yasɛ. Emɛ, ajubu kɔri wɔin gɔbe le jaii ye bei susuyoɲu.
Kijɛ kuu ulogu ingei kanran, Ama jugu tɛtɛŋɛjɛ, kole jajaiyɛjɛ ye, emɛ wogɔbe minɛ nɛ damu sunugoɲu. Emɛ ajubu puu aa pagaa ye, Kirisito sɔɔ yabamɔɲu.
Iyaa, sɔɔ yabu ebe gɔ waaru kibaajɛ, sɔɔ yabala puu kuu nɛ jarugu duurɔ ga emɛ yegeraa wɔin.
E, sɔɔ bain go yɛnɛjɛi. Inɛ turu kuu womɔ le unruin Kirisito mɔi ga lugaa sɛɛ ye, wo sɔɔ ɔn ajubu womɔ nɛ kunɔ gɛliyɛ: Woi Kirisito mɔi wɔɔ gin’, emɛi kanran Kirisito mɔi.
Inɛw Baŋa, emɛ bɛrɛ kuu ebe nɛ paŋa obu gɔ dɛi, mu gaila kuu ma unaa gaanaatun kanran, dɔgɔ mu aaun jaanla. Paŋa wogɔ, ei bariyɛmɔ ga emɛ bɛrɛ obin, ei suyo dɛi laa.
Mu lɛtɛrɛ ma gɔbe le ei liirɛmɔuwɔn ma e ajubu ye ibɛlaun.
Sabu inɛw sɔwaa, lɛtɛrɛ nɛ sɔɔ womɔ gɔbe ɛɛin wɔɔ, paŋa yasin. Kaa kuu womɔ le wiyaai ye, womaa inɛ yɛbɛlɛginɛi, sɔɔ sɔɔ inɛɛ gɛɛɲu.
Inɛ kɔɔ gin’ sɔɔnɛ gɔ wo sɔɔ ɔn jugɔ: Wɔlɔ wɔnu lɛtɛrɛ nɛ bana sɔɔ emɛ sɔɔjɛ gin’, wiyaa dɔwaain ye, emɛ wogɔ gin’ tee birɛɲu.
Narain, inɛw boi ɛju bemɛ be turu sɔɔɲu gamuu le kɛukɛu biyɛ ma, be le emi tunwɔn ma, emɛ kanraannɛ. Be kuu bemɛ gelu le unrunbei tunwɔnɲu. Tunmɔ tunmɔ le unrunbei tunwɔn yɛnɛɲu. Be bomɔgunwin.
Emɛ kai kuu emɛ unu ye kale gaanu ibɛlain. Ama, e bɛrɛ baa emi dɔɔmaa, birɛ emɛ bɛrɛ wo birɛmu gɔ, emɛ birɛ wogɔ kale gɔ nɛ biyɛdɛin.
E bɛrɛ baa dɔɔnɛ bɛin ye, emɛ kale gɔ nɛ gaanauwɔin. Kaa, emɛ kale gɔ nɛ gaanauwɔnɛ. Sabu emɛ naran go Kirisito Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ le e bɛrɛ baa dɔwaabɛin.

Kɔɔ biyaai ye, emɛ, kale biyɛun jaan gɔ nɛ gaananɛ. Emɛ inɛ waja birɛ dɛi kuu emɛ unɔuwɔnɛ. Kaa, gagawu e sɛɛ gɔ bariyaai ye, yalu birɛ biru emɛ logoro ebe nɛ sigɛ le wawanado ga emɛ wogɔ diyɛdɔn yasin.
Kunrin emɛ gana onu ebe nɛ wɔin gɔbe nɛ Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ taga bɛbɛɛdɛin. Inɛw wajunw minɛ nɛ biraa galin dɛi emɛ kuu emɛ unɔidenɛ.
Kaa Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaaɲu gin’: “Inɛ aai kanran, kuu womɔ uhunɔdo ye, Inɛw Baŋa kijɛ kanrun dɛi kuu womɔ unɔ.”
Sabu, inɛ le yabaidɛin gɔ, inɛ kuu womɔ le boi ɛju unrunmɔ sɔɔjɛ gɔi laa. Inɛw Baŋa, boi ɛju womɔ sɔɔjɛ gɔi.
E bomɔ daga ma gɔ tariyaabei ye ɛjii wɔɔ. Mainiyaan ye bomɔ ma muyɔin.
Mu e sibɛ go ele le wɔun. Ele Ama nɛ goojɛ gɔ le wɔun. Ingei ma giyaa ye, iyaa gulɔi aala gin’ ei igɛ obu bɛɛ ga, mu ainɛ turu sai bɛrɛ aŋa ma obun. Wogɔ Kirisitoi.
Kaa yuguru gɔ Hawai sosoŋɔ unrunmɔ le wo dɔburu gin’, hakilɛ ebe yanwan ye, naran le, ɛjaai go Kirisito sibɛ go bana e wɔɔ gɔ papajadei ma mu liyɛuwɔn.

Sabu, emɛ Yesu dɛi waaju tagin. Yesu wogɔi laa go, Yesu waja dɛi, inɛ wiyaa waaju tagaajɛ gɔ, e kobaŋai sɛɛu muyɔn bɛbɛɛjɛi. Iyenɛ, Kikinu e bɛi gɔi laa go, Kibɛru Ɛju le e yabu gɔi laa go, waja le yabu bɛbɛɛjɛi.
Mu, inɛw Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu sigɛbei ga kowɔin kɔɔbei, kijɛ nɛ dɔɔlu mu wɔɔ wɔlɔ ga wɔun.
Sɔɔ bana sɔɔun jaan sibɛ nɛ mu kijɛ kanma inɔn kanran, jugɔ sibɛ nɛ mu kunrin wɔlɔn. Emɛ bana puu le, sibɛ puu nɛ wogɔ e bɛrɛ jugɔmaabɛin.
Kibɛru Ɛju Ama bɛrɛ goojɛ gɔ, mu dɔnrun wɔlɔ go e bɛrɛ tagun. Mu kuu ma sunugu ye, kuu ebe unɔdɔn ga wogɔ kanrun. Nɛɛ, mu wogɔ hakɛi kanrun ma?
Mu ei baradɔn ga, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu wajabe bɛrɛ elu ɛlaa, be bɛrɛ tujɔ yabaabɔn.

Iyaa, ebe nɛ wɔu, kai biyaa, mu inɛ turu bɛrɛ kanran dɔɔ ma duurɔlun. Ba unrunw Maseduanɛ gowaa wɛin gɔbe, kai ma be kilɛmu. Kijɛ inge nɛi kanran, e bɛrɛ dɔɔ ma duiyɔmɔ ga mu yabalun. Iye dɔɔ mu wogɔ kanraindolɔn.
Naran Kirisito nɛ goojɛ, mu nɛ too gɔ dɛi sɔɔjɔn, Akayi gana puu nɛ kuu ma unu sɔɔ kɔɔ, inɛ mu bɛrɛ goonɔido wɔlɔ.
Kɔɔ gin’ sɔɔ mu sɔɔjɛ gɔ, inge dɛi? Ei ibɛlaun dɛi ma? Ei ibɛɛ wɔun ga Ama kai igii wɔɔ.
Kaa inɛw unrunbe kanran emɛ gin’ tee birɛɲu gɛɛuwɔin gɔbe, bemaa kuu bemɛ unu bana bɛɛnɔu ga, kanɛ bana kanraun mu wɔɔ gin’ mu kanrannu yinyaadɔn.
Inɛw kɔɔbe Kirisito jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu kakalugunwin. Birɛbirɛnw inɛw lelemɔwin, unrunbei Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲui gin’ bojaa sɛin.
Wogɔ yaa sɔɔ taanrinyɛin laa, sabu Setanu wo kuu womɔ le unruin mɛlɛnkɛ dooro le wɔɔi gin’ bojojɛ.
Kɔɔ biyaai ye, birɛbirɛnw womɔbe unrunbei teitai birɛbirɛnwin gin’ be bojojɛ gɔ sɔɔ yerui laa. Birɛ bemɛ bana wɔɔ gin’, dumɔrɔn bemɛ yaa yinbiyɛdo.
Mu pilemaa sɔɔuwɔn, inɛ turu kanran mui bomɔginɛi gin’ yɛnɛnɔu. Kaa, mui bomɔginɛi gin’ yɛnɛuwɔi ye, maa kanran, gaila kuu ma unu bɛɛ dɛi biyɛmɔi.
Sɔɔ sɔɔu mu wɔɔ gɔ, mu Inɛw Baŋa bɛrɛ biyaa sɔɔuwɔlɔn. Kaa kuu ma unu sɔɔ sɔɔu mu wɔɔ ɔn nɛ, mu bomɔginɛ gin’ sɔɔ sɔɔuwɔn.
Inɛw joo aduna ɔn nɛ kijɛ be kanrun dɛi kuu bemɛ unɔuwɔin. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, mu yaa kuu ma uhunɔdɔn.
E hakilɛgunwin digɛu, nɛɛ bomɔgunwin sɛɛu tari bɛbɛɛjɛi.
Ei gunɔ kunɔ ma, ei kaya ma, guju ebe pɔɔ ma, ei namanu gala ma, lege ebe laga ma, e wogɔ tatariyɛjɛi.
Sɔɔ ga mu bɛrɛ dɔgɔi, kaa emɛ yɛbɛlɛ emɛi tagurin gin’ biyaai. Nɛɛ inɛ turu unrun kuu unrunmɔ unu bɛbɛɛjɛ ga wɔɔ ye, mu bomɔginɛ gin’ sɔɔ sɔɔuwɔn laa ye, mu yaa kuu ma unɔ bɛbɛɛjɔn.
Bei Heburu tɔgui laa? Mu kanran woi. Bei Isɛrɛlu tɔgui laa? Mu kanran woi. Be Abarahamu nɛ goin laa? Mu kanran woi.

Be Kirisito birɛbirɛnwin laa? Aiwa, mu kuu ma mu le wɔlɔ gin’ sɔɔ sɔɔuwɔn laa ye, be dɛi sigɛ Kirisito birɛbirɛnɛi wɔun. Birɛ nɛ be dɛi sigɛun, kubɔ lugo kaju mu yoi nɛ be dɛi sigɛun, logi bɛi nɛ be dɛi sigɛun. Waaru gamuu mu yiun le bɛrii biyɛbɔn.
Yahutunw, kubɔ pɛnai nɛ turu tolo go, kubɔ numɔrɔn baa mui lagin.
Kubɔ taanu baga le mui lagin. Tibu le mui kamaa daadɛin ga kubɔ turu bii. Kubɔ taanu diikoro mu le piri. Aga turu digɛ turu mu nɛudii nɛ yabɔn.

Mu oji joo yaabɔn. Wogɔbe nɛ dibe dii paruju yabe, kuu numɔ numɔw paruju yabe, tɔgu ma inɛw lee, tɔgu ma inɛwin laa lee puu sibɛ nɛ paruju yabe, ana diyɛ kɔlɔ nɛ lee, olusolo nɛ lee, nɛudii nɛ lee, paruju yabe. Ba unrunw tɔitɔi laain paruju yabe.
Mu birɛ kirɛbe lee, ɔɲɛ lee joo iyaabɔn. Bai joo giri bɛɛlɔn, giyɛ lee, diinɔɔrin lee iyaabɔn. Waaru joo pana kayi bɔrɔlu go aŋapagu le biyɛbɔn. Kaali lee, duŋu lee iyaabɔn.
Sɔɔ wajunw gɔbe sɔɔ sɔɔlu go, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔbe dɛi, mu bai puu jiire le wɔun.
Turu baŋa yɛbiliyaai ye, mui yaa yɛbiliyaai. Turu baŋa hakɛ nɛ numaa yowaai ye, kinɛ ma jijinwɛnjɛ.
Kuu ma unɔ ga mu bɛrɛ waajibi ye, yɛbɛlɛ ma kijɛ tagarajɛ dɛi kuu ma unɔdɔn.
Ama, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Ba gɔ, boi womɔ asuu sɔmi biyɛmɔ. Mu kakalui maŋaalɔn ga wo igii wɔɔ.
Damasu ana nɛ, Ɔgɔnɛ Aretasu waaru le, sɛmɛginɛ kɔɔ nɛ daanbe gɔ, mui aado ga Damasu bɛɛnw bɛrɛ ana gɔ dɔmiyɛnmɔube.
Kaa tomɔ nɛ mui kunaa, dɔlu le mui jege gɔ doɲu nɛ sunugaabɛin. Mu kɔɔ gin’ numɔ womɔ nɛ ɛliyaa gowaabɔn.
Kuu ma unu gɔ waajibi laa ye, ɛju konɛ tolo. Kokanran, mu kuu iyebe lee, Inɛw Baŋa mu bɛrɛ sɔɔ jugɔmu lee sɔɔ nɛ wɛwɛɛdɔn.
Mu Kirisito jaŋu ii turu igii wɔun. Nɛɛ anranguju pɛli naisigɛ dɔwaai, wo goju womɔ nɛ yatobe ma, tobele ma, Ama igii wɔɔ laa ye, mu inɔn, kaa woi jeɲaa, ginsɛsai alagala taaniye go baa uni.
Ainɛ kɔɔi jeɲaa, alujɛnɛ nɛ baa uni ga mu igii wɔun. Kaa wo goju womɔ le bee ma, kole bele ma mu inɔn. Amai sai wogɔ jugɔjɛ.
Konɛ wo sɔɔ inɛ pilemu ye sɔɔ bɛɛlɛ, sɔɔ aŋa dɛi gaa ɛgaabe.
Inɛ kɔɔ tunmɔ dɛi mu kuu ma uhunɔdɔn. Kaa kuu ma le yɛbɛlɛ ma kijɛ tagarajɛ dɛi laa ye, mu kuu ma unɔidolɔn.
Mu kuu ma unɔ ibɛɛ wɔun ye, mui bomɔginɛi gɛiyɛɛlɛ. Sabu mu narain sɔɔdɔn. Kaa inɛ turu mu nɛ sɔɔ wo iyejɛ lee, wo ɛgɛjɛ lee dɛi sigɛ mui bojodo ma liliyɛ dɛi, mu wogɔ kanraindolɔn.

Kaa kɔɔ wooi nɛ kijɛ sigɛ naa sigɛ mu bɛrɛ jugɔmi kɔɔbe dɛi maa kuu ulo le joi ye biyɛnɔu ga, jijii turu goju ma nɛ digɛraa bojaaɲu. Jijii wogɔ, Setanu titiyainɛi biyaa, maa kuu ulo le joi ye biyɛnɔu ga mui ɔɲɔmɔuwɔ.
Kubɔ taanu mu Inɛw Baŋa bɛrɛ gɛnyaan, ɔɲɛ kɔɔ mu le wageniyɛnmɔ gun.
Wo mu le saa: «Nɛɛma ma gɔ ui baa. Sabu gɔnrɔn ma paŋa gɔ, yɛbɛlɛ nɛ iyemɔjɛ.» Kɔɔi biyaa ye, Kirisito gɔnrɔn gɔ mu nɛ toiyo ga, yɛbɛlɛ ma dɛi sigɛ le mu kuu ma uhunɔdɔn.
Kodigɛu, Kirisito dɛi yɛbɛlɛi ma, kuusugo sɔɔ ma, nau ma, tɔɔɲɔ ma, kinɛ ɔɲɛ sɔɔ ma mu bɛrɛ dɔwaai ye, kinɛ ma ahaajɛ. Sabu waaru mui yɛbiliyaajɛ, paŋa waaru mu sɛɛ gɔ woi.

Mu bomɔginɛi biyaaun. Kaa ei mui biyɛmaa kaaru. Sabu boi ɛju ma sɔɔ sɔɔnw gɔ ei biyɛun dagaa. Halu mui kijɛ kanmai laa kanran, Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu sigɛbei ga kowɔin kɔɔbei kijɛ nɛ dɔɔlu mu kanrun wɔlɔ.
Mui Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui ga birɛ le jugɔmɔjɛ gɔbe puu logoro ebe nɛ muyɔn tɔgu puu le tagaraabɛin. Sɛɛrɛ taanrinyɛn lee, yarabirɛ lee, taanrinyɛn lee wogɔ tagurin.
Dɔɔ ma e bɛrɛ duurɔlun mu kanrun gɔi laa go, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu wajunw kijɛ bɛin e bɛɛlu gɔ ingei? Teitai laa wogɔ mui yaabu kanrain.

Yɛnɛi, kubɔ taaniye e bɛrɛ mu wɛɛido dɛi, mu mui yegeraa wɔun. Nimɛ kanran dɔɔ ma e bɛrɛ duurɔidolɔn. Sabu mu numɔ ebe kijɛi dɛnɛɛlɔn, ei dɛnɛjɔn. Unrunw, bei naranw kai dɛi kijɛ mɔɔnɔɔnɛ, kaa, unrunw naranw gɔbei, unrunw gɔ kai dɛi kijɛ mɔɔnɔɲu.
Kunrin, mu kai kinrun ebe dɛi numɔ ma kijɛ puu kinɛ ɛɛli le obodɔn. Mu mui kanran ohobodɔn. Mu kɔɔ gin’ ei ibɛɛ mu wɔnu, e mui gaai ibɛlai biyɛdei ma?
E ajubaa yɛnaa ye, maa dɔɔ ma e bɛrɛ duurɔlun narain, kaa maa inɛ soŋɔi digɛu sosoŋɔ ma le ei bɛi gɛɛjɛi.
Inɛw e bɛrɛ mu tii gɔbe le mu ei punaa kayaabɔn ma?
Mu Titei gɛnyaan, e bɛrɛ yaa gun. Iyaa emɛ bainɛ gɔi wo le digɛraa tiyaabɔn. Tite ei punaa kayaabe ma? Wo lee, mu lee, birɛ emɛ gɔ ajubu turu gɔ le birɛnɛ ma? Yoiyaara emɛ bana gɔ turu laa ma?
Emaa giru ebe nɛ, anrin baa kuu emɛ nɛ narain obouwɔin ma ga e ajubauwɔi. Kaa, emɛ Kirisito le pagu turu go Ama giru nɛ sɔɔuwɔin. Koyɛ, ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, ebaa paŋa bɛɛ gai sɔɔɲu.

Waaru e bɛrɛ mu dɔwaajɛ, bana mu dɛnɛjɛ gin’ e yinwɔlɔi tɛmɛdɔn ma liyɛuwɔn. E kanran bana e dɛnɛɛlɛ gin’ mu biyɛdɔn ma liyɛuwɔn. Logoro ebe nɛ jai lee, ele lee, kinɛ ingelemu lee, tunmɔ tɛmurun sɔɔ lee, boi yamulu lee, jaara lee, kuu ulo lee, oju sɛlɛ birɛ lee tɛtɛmɛdɔn ma liyɛuwɔn.

Mu e bɛrɛ wiyaa dɔwaaun ye, Ama, giru ebe nɛ pilemu ye mu bɛrɛ dɔgɔ wo taguru ye, giru nɛ baa inɛw hakɛ kanrin gɔbe logoro nɛ joo, kanran lɔgɔgu bemɛ lee, sala bemɛ lee, kuu sɛlɛ birɛ bemɛ lee dɛi ajubuduli bɛɛnɛ giye, kuu bemɛ nɛ mu bɛrɛ pii pipiimɔ ma liyɛuwɔn.
Mu kubɔ taaniyei e bɛrɛ yaauwɔn. Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaaɲu gin’: “Sɔɔ puu sɛɛrɛ lɛi ma taanu ma aŋa sɛɛrɛ le kilɛmɔɲu.”

Kodigɛu, giru nɛ inɛw hakɛ kanrin gɔbe lee, wajunw puu lee bɛrɛ mu kanɛ baa tagauwɔn. Halu mu kanɛ e le wɔlɔn dɛi, kubɔ lɛiye e bɛrɛ mu wɛi gɔ le bana mu sɔi gin’, e bɛrɛ wiyaaun ye, inɛ mu paabaido wɔlɔ.
Kirisito mu le digɛnu sɔɔ sɔɔuwɔ ga, e wogɔ sɛɛrɛ iye ibɛɛ wɔi digɛu, e bɛbɛɛdei. Kirisito e sibɛ nɛ yɛbɛlɛ le wɔlɔ, kaa gɔnrɔn womɔ logoro ebe nɛ tagarauwɔ.

Yɛbɛlɛ womɔ sabu dɛi woi baga nɛ pɛgin narain. Kaa wo Ama gɔnrɔn dɛi ɔnmɔi wɔɔ. Emɛ kanran, wo le digɛu yɛbiliyaain. Kaa emɛ sɔɔ ebe kilɛmɔɲu gɔnrɔn yasin, sabu emɛ kanran, Ama gɔnrɔn dɛi, Kirisito le digɛu ɔnmɔi wɔin.
E tunmi kuu ebe marun yɛnɛi. Gagawu le yaauwɔi ma tunmi ei suburu yɛnɛi. Yesu Kirisito e nɛ yato ga jugɔuwɔlɔi ma? Kɔɔi ye e subɔrɔ gɔ nɛ gɔnrɔn bɛɛli ma laa ye kai.
Kaa emɛ subɔrɔ gɔ nɛ gɔnrɔn bɛɛnɛ kanrannɛ ga e jujugɔdei diyɛdɔn le wɔun.
Ebaa mɔɲu turu kanran kanrannɔu ga, emɛ e dɛi Ama gɛɛunwɔin. Emɛ subɔrɔ gɔ nɛ gɔnrɔn biyaaɲu tagaradɛin dɛi laa, kaa ebaa ɛju kanran gai. Halu emɛ subɔrɔ gɔ nɛ gɔnrɔn bɛɛnɛ gin’ wɔin kanran koi.
Sabu emɛ naran gɔ le yabiyɛ gɔnrɔin laa ye, naran le jaiyɛ gɔnrɔn sɛnɛ.
Waaru emi yɛbiliyaa, kole digɛnu paŋa e siyaajɛ, emɛ kinɛ ɛhɛɛliyɛmɔɲu. Iyaa ei kibaai biyɛ ga, amagɛɛn emɛ nɛ kijɛ emɛ dɛnɛjɛ gɔ woi.

Wogɔ digɛu, kanɛ e le wɔlɔ mu wɔɔ waaru gɔ le mu lɛtɛrɛ ɔn tɔŋɔ tiiuwɔn. Waaru e bɛrɛ wiyaa mu dɔwaajɛ, maa kuu ebe nɛ paŋa mu sɛɛ le kɛukɛu e sibɛ nɛ ɛɛin biyɛnɔu ga kodɛi tɔŋɔuwɔn. Inɛw Baŋa, maa paŋa ebe bariyɛmɔ ga kuu ebe nɛ mu bɛrɛ paŋa obu. Ei suyo gai laa.
Nɛɛ kai ba unrunw, jamu biyɛmɔi. Kibaai bii nɛ mainiyɛin, tunmɔi mainiyɛnmɔi, mii turu le biyɛi, tunmɔ le jamu le biyɛi. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, ihibɛ lee, jamu lee Ama gɔ e le bibiyɛdo.
Ama inɛw gin’ ihibɛ le tunmɔi poonɔi. Ama inɛw gɔbe puu ei poonɔuwɔin.
Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito nɛɛma gɔ lee, Ama ihibɛ gɔ lee, Kikinu Pilu bɔɔi bii gɔ lee, e wooi le biyɛ.

Mu Pɔlu, Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲu gɔ, lɛtɛrɛ ɔn mu tiiuwɔ. Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui bii ma gɔ, inɛw sɔɔ aaru le digɛla, iyaa inɛ turu kanran mui tiilu. Kaa Yesu Kirisito lee, Ba Ama yiun nɛ woi bulomɔnɛ gɔ lee, mui be tii.
Ba unrunw ɔn nɛ mu le wɔin gɔbe, mu le bariyaa lɛtɛrɛ ɔn Galasi gana nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔbe bɛrɛ tiiuwɔin.
Ama emɛ Ba lee, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito lee, e bɛrɛ nɛɛma lee, jamu lee obo.
Ama emɛ, emɛ Bai wɔɔ gɔ diŋɛ le kɛukɛu, hakɛ emɛ nɛ emi yaba ye aduna mɔɲu ɔn numɔ nɛ emi yabu goonɔ ga, Yesu kuu unrunmɔ obaabe.
Boi sɔmu gɔ asuu nasuu Ama mɔi biyɛmɔ. Amina.
Bana, Ama, Kirisito nɛɛma dɛi ei boonɔnɛ gɔi ɔgu pajaatiyaa, kibɛru ɛju waja sɔɔ e yabu gɔ, wogɔ mu bɛrɛ maunɛ kanrun.
Naran sɔɔ gin ye, kibɛru ɛju waja wɔlɔ. Inɛw hakilɛ ebe bimiliyemɔw, inɛw Kirisito Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ dulomaa ye yamulu ibɛɛ wɔin gɔbe sai yɔɔin.
Kaa, halu emɛ ma, mɛlɛnkɛ alagala gowaa wɛi ma wiyaa, Kibɛru Ɛju e bɛrɛ emɛ tagu gɔi laa go, kibɛru ɛju waja tagaajɛ ye, baŋai jɛbi biyɛmɔ.
Emɛ e bɛrɛ tagaabɛin, iyaa kanɛ pilemaa sɔɔuwɔn: Kibɛru Ɛju le e yabu gɔi laa go, waja inɛ e bɛrɛ tagaajɛ biyaai ye, baŋai jɛbi biyɛmɔ.

Nɛɛ kanɛ sɔɔ mu sɔi gɔ nɛ, mu inɛw bemaa mui sɔmɔ ga ibɛun ma, Ama womaa mui sɔmɔ ga ibɛun? Maa, mu inɛw kinɛ aamɔ ibɛun ma? Iye bai dɔɔ mu inɛw kinɛ aamui ibɛun ye, mu Kirisito birɛbirɛnɛi biyɛbelɔn.
Ba unrunw, sɔɔ ɔn ɛjii jugɔi: Kibɛru Ɛju mu tagajɛ gɔ, wogɔ inɛw bɛrɛ goolu.
Mu wogɔ inɛw le bɛɛlun. Iyaa inɛ turu kanran wogɔ mu bɛrɛ deerelu. Kaa Yesu Kirisito kuu womɔ le, mu bɛrɛ wogɔ wo jugɔmu.
Laa waaru Yahutunw oju mu dimɛbe le bana mu bee gɔ, e wogɔ ɛgaabei. Mu waaru wogɔ le Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔi gaai ɔɲɔmɔubɔn. Mu woi suyo ibɛɛ bɔun.
Yahutunw oju bana mu dimɛbe nɛ, mu kadagabe logoro nɛ, tɔgu ma inɛw joo dɛi sigɛ giru go yaaubɔn. Emɛ tirɛ anranw atɛmu sɔɔ nɛ mu kuu ma saii obaa sɛbɔn.

Kaa Ama, nɛɛma womɔ dɛi, mui naranmɔ nɛ baa, mui dɛiin bojaa, mui birɛ womɔ dɛi boonaabe. Kɔɔ gin’, maa inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe bɛrɛ Aini womɔ Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ taga ga, waaru Aini womɔ mu bɛrɛ jugɔmɔ ga kinɛ womɔ ai le, mu Adama ii turu kanran tinwinrun dɛnɛlun.
Iyaa, inɛw giru ma nɛ Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲui biyin gɔbei iye ga, mu Jerusalɛmu kanran yaalun. Kaa mu ɔgu kɛu Arabi gana nɛ yaabɔn. Kɔɔ onu nɛ Damasu ana nɛ pilemaa wiyaabɔn.
Kɔɔ onu nɛ anranguju taanu galaa wo yaa, mu kɔɔ gin’, Piɛrui iye dɛi Jerusalɛmu nɛ yaabɔn. Mu bai pɛli numɔrɔnsigɛ wo le biyaabɔn.
Jake, Inɛw Baŋa suŋɔrɔn gɔi laa ye, jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe logoro nɛ inɛ turu kanran iyelun.
Mu Ama dɛi sɔɔuwɔn, sɔɔ mu gɛɛjɛ ɔn narain. Mu kakalui maŋaalɔn.
Kɔɔ onu nɛ, mu Rɔmɛ laamu Siri numɔ nɛ lee, Silisi numɔ nɛ lee yaabɔn.
Ama inɛw mɔɔnu Judea gana nɛ Kirisito le bɔɔi biyaa wɔin gɔbe nimɛ girupala ma iyetɛnɛ bɛin.
Be inɛw wajunw mu dɛi sɔɔ sɔɔu be bee ɔn sai ɛgɛubɛin: «Inɛ pɔɔlɔ emi ɔɲɔmɔu bee gɔ, laa gagawu yamala ga saii mainiyɛun wo bee gɔ, wo gagawu wogɔ dɛi kanɛ waaju tagauwɔ.»
Kɔɔ gin’, be mu dɛi Ama boi sɔmɔubɛin.
Anranguju pɛli naisigɛ galaa wo yaa, kɔɔ waaru le mu Barunabasu le Jerusalɛmu nɛ pilemaa yaabɔn. Mu Titei kanran jijɛ yaabɔn.

Ama, maa yaa ga mui jugɔmaabe dɛi, mu yaiun. Ama inɛw mɔɔnu nɛ inɛw giru toin gɔbe lee, mu lee, mɔɔnu dɛiin emɛ kanrun gɔ nɛ, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe bɛrɛ Kibɛru Ɛju waaju mu tagajɛ gɔ tiyɛ gɔ be bɛrɛ jeɲaa tagaabɔn. Sabu birɛ biraa mu galu gɔ lee, birɛ birɛu mu wɔɔ gɔ lee, kijɛ tiyɛ sɛlɛi biyɛ ga ibɛla bɔun.

Halu inɛw unrunbei ba unrunwin gɛɛnw gɔbe, logoro emɛ nɛ nɛyaantiyaa yoonw gɔbe, woi araa nɔɔmu ibɛɛ bɛin kanran, Tite mui dimiyaan wɛɛnɛ gɔ, Gɛrɛku tɔgui bee gɔ, araa nɔɔ ga wo bɛrɛ waajibi biyɛlu. Inɛw kɔɔbe Kirisito Yesu le digɛnu hɔɔlɔi bii bɛɛmɔjɛ gɔ bana gɔ jugɔ ga baŋiyaan logoro emɛ nɛ yoin. Be wogɔ yamuluti ye emi Yahutunw tɔɔru gunɔ nɛ kunu ibɛɛ bɛin.
Kibɛru Ɛju naran gɔ, logoro ebe nɛ biyɛmɔ ga, emɛ sɔɔ bemɛ turu kanran keŋiyɛnnɛ.

Kaa, inɛw giru toiin ga lugaa sɛin gɔbe, bei inɛw inge tɔgui bɛin ma mu kai mai sɛlɔn, sabu Ama inɛwin kabu kunɔɔlɛ. Inɛw giru toin wogɔbe, Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ mu tagabe gɔ nɛ kijɛ baraun turu kanran sɛbenɛ.
Kaa, bana Yahutunw tɔgu dɛi Kibɛru Ɛju waaju tagu gɔ, Ama Piɛru bɛrɛ sagu gawaraabe gin’, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe bɛrɛ Kibɛru Ɛju waaju tagu gɔ, Ama mu bɛrɛ sagu gawaraabe ga, be jugaabɛin.
Sabu Ama, Piɛrui Yahutunw dɛi Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui biyɛmɔnɛ gɔ, mui inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe dɛi Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui wo biyɛmu.

Jake lee, Piɛru lee, Jan lee, inɛw ginrun jɛiin gin’ lugaa sɛbɛin gɔbe, birɛ dɛin kɔɔ Ama mu bɛrɛ sagu gawaraabe ga jugaabɛin. Kunrin, be mu lee, Barunabasu lee bɛrɛ numɔ dɛɛraa, numɔ emɛ aa, emɛ wooi birɛbirɛnw tunmɔ bɔɔi sɛɛrɛ gɔ kɔɔ gin’ tagaraabɛin. Emɛ tunmɔ le aaraa, mu lee, Barunabasu lee, emɛ inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe logoro nɛ yai ye birɛdɛin, be Yahutunw logoro nɛ yai ye birɛdɛin gin.
Kaa be emaa, Jerusalɛmu Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔ nɛ dɛgugunw toin gɔbei ajuba gin. Mu yaa wogɔ kanran ga mainiyaanbɔn.
Kaa waaru Piɛru Antiɔse ana nɛ wo wɛi le, bana wo kanrun gɔ ɛjula dɛi, mu inɛw giru nɛ woi jarugaabɔn.

Jake inɛw gamuu tii gɔbe Antiɔse nɛ be wɛɛmɔ nɛ, Piɛru, ba unrunw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe le mɔrin ye pana kayaube. Kaa inɛw kɔɔbe be wiyaa, Piɛru, jaŋu unrunw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbei inɛw araa nɔɔmɔu jaain wɔɔ gɛɛnw gɔbei liyɛube dɛi, wo ba unrunw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe le wageniyaan, be le dɛiin biyaabe.
Piɛru le bariyaa, Yahutunw ba unrunw wajunw gɔbe kanran aŋa lɛilɛi sɔɔ kanraanbɛin. Barunabasui kanran be le bariyaa lelu nɛ yoomaabe.

Kaa, be Kibɛru Ɛju naran gɔ le kɛkɛu yoi yaabenɛ ga waaru mu iye le, mu inɛw puu giru nɛ Piɛru le ɔn gin’ sɔiun: «U Yahutunw tɔgu gɔ, u Yahutunw atɛmu gɔ pajaatiyaa, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain atɛmu gɔ le kɛukɛu biyaabeu. Nɛɛ, u yani inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe bemaa Yahutunw bana wɔin gin’ tee biyɛ kaara giye tɔɔru ibɛɛ wɔu?»
Emɛ kai emi Yahutunw tɔitɔibei. Emi tɔgu waja inɛw, inɛw Ama tɔɔru digɛlain gɔbei laain.

Kɔɔ wooi logoro nɛ, Ama inɛ teitai wɔɔ ga wo lugojɛ gɔ, wogɔ inɛ Mɔise tɔɔru sɔɔ kibemɔnɛ gɔi laa. Kaa inɛ diyɛ womɔ Yesu Kirisito kuu nɛ daanaa wɔɔ gɔi ga emɛ igii wɔin. Emɛ, Tɔɔru gɔ sɔɔ sɛɛu kibemaaɲu dɛi laa, kaa Kirisito le gawaa emɛ wɔɔ gɔ dɛi emi teitai wɔɔ lugo ga, emɛ kanran kɔɔ dɛi Kirisito Yesu le gawaa wɔin. Kɔɔ gin’ inɛ turu kanran Tɔɔru sɔɔ kibemu dɛi Ama giru nɛ teitai wɔɔ giye lugoidenɛ.
Kaa nɛɛ waaru Kirisito dɛi Ama giru nɛ teitai bii emɛ dɛnɛjɛ le, emi inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe le kɛukɛu hakɛ kanranwin biyaain ye, tiyɛ gɔ Kirisito, hakɛ birɛbirɛnɛi biyaai ma? Ai, asuu!
Kijɛ mu yamulu gɔ iyaa pilemaa mu yegerejɛ ye, tiyɛ gɔ mu mui Tɔɔru yamalanɛi ga tagarauwɔn.
Ama sibɛ go mui ɔnmɔi biyɛ ga, Tɔɔru le digɛu, Tɔɔru sibɛ go mui yinwaain. Mui Kirisito le baga jai nɛ pɛgaaɲu.

Nɛɛ, kunrin ɔnmɔi mu wɔɔ gɔ, lee kuu ma le ɔnmɔi wɔlɔn. Kaa Kirisitoi mu nɛ ɔnmɔi biyaa wɔɔ. Kanɛ goju le ɔnmɔi mu wɔɔ gɔ, mu Ama Aini le gawaa mu wɔɔ gɔ digɛu ɔnmɔi wɔun. Wo mui ibiyaa, kuu womɔ mu dɛi obaabe.
Mu Ama nɛɛma gɔ jumɔlun. Sabu Ama giru nɛ teitai bii gɔ Tɔɔru le bɛɛmɔjɛ ye, Kirisito bamai yinwaain. yinwaain.
Hei, Galasi bɛɛnw, e hakilɛ sɛnɛ de! Yesu Kirisitoi bana baga jai nɛ pɛgaa dain gɔ, e inɛw bɛrɛ sɛɛu ɛjɛmaa jugɔmaabɛin gɔbe, inɛ aa ei dugaabe ma?
Mu selumu ɔn sai e sai ye ibɛɛ wɔun: E, Ama Kikinu gɔ, Tɔɔru sɔɔ kibemu le bɛɛi ma, maa, e Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ ɛgaa, wogɔ le gawaabei dɛi bɛɛi?
E yani kanraan ɔn gin’ hakilɛ sɛnɛ bii? E Ama Kikinu le tɔlaa, kanɛ kuu ebe gɔnrɔn le donugu ibɛɛ wɔi ma?
Sɔɔ ɔn puu e bɛrɛ bamai biyaabe ma? Bamai kai biyɛun jaanla.

Ama, Kikinu womɔ e bɛrɛ obaa, taanrinyɛn birɛ logoro ebe nɛ biraa wo taguru gɔ, wogɔ ebaa Tɔɔru kijɛ kanran gɛɛjɛ gɔbe kibemɔuwɔi ga kanrun ma, maa Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ ɛgaa, iyaa wogɔ le gawaabei dɛi kanrun?
Kɔɔ sibɛ go Ama Dɔn bana Abarahamu dɛi sɔɔjɛ gin’: “Abarahamu Ama le gawaabe. Gagawu womɔ digɛu, Ama, woi teitai wɔɔ ga lugaabe.”
Kɔɔ gin’ inɛw gagawu oju nɛ toin gɔbe, Abarahamu tirɛ unrunw tɔitɔi gɔbe bei ga e jugɔun jaain wɔɔ.

Ama Dɔn nɛ pɔɔlɔ baa sɔwaa, Ama, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe, gagawu bemɛ dɛi inɛw teitai wɔin ga lulugodo gi. Kunrin, wage nɛ baa, Ama Dɔn Abarahamu bɛrɛ kibɛru ɛju ɔn tagaabe: “Ama u dɛi tɔgu wooi duba kakanrando.”
Abarahamu, Ama le gawaabe dɛi, Ama woi duba kanraanbe. Kɔɔ gin’ inɛw gagawu oju nɛ toin gɔbe puu, Abarahamu gin’ Ama bei duba kakanrando.
Tɔɔru sɔɔ kibemu nɛ inɛw diyɛ bemɛ daanaa sɛin gɔbe, jebu kuu bemɛ nɛ yɔɔ. Sabu Ama Dɔn kijɛ gi: “Inɛ waaru wooi Tɔɔru dɔn nɛ sɔɔ tɔŋaaɲu gɔ puu kibemɔɔlɛ baŋa gɔ jɛbi biyɛmɔ.”
Inɛ turu kanran, Tɔɔru ɛjii kibemɔuwɔ dɛi, Ama woi teitai wɔɔ ga lugoidolo ga daii wɔɔ. Sabu Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaa gi: “Inɛ gagawu le digɛu teitai wɔɔ gɔ, woi ɔnmɔi bibiyɛdo.”
Tɔɔru kibemu gɔ gagawu le digɛla. Kaa, bana Ama Dɔn sɔɔjɛ gin’: “Inɛ Tɔɔru kijɛ kanran gɛɛjɛ kanranjɛ gɔ, Tɔɔru gɔ digɛnu woi ɔnmɔi bibiyɛdo.”
Kirisito, dilɛ emɛ nɛ woi jɛbi biyaa, Tɔɔru jebu gɔ nɛ emi dɔrugaabe. Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaa gi: “Inɛ baga nɛ jelaaɲu gɔ jɛbi biyɛmɔ.”

Ama, Abarahamu bɛrɛ duba ohobodo ga pui wo kunu gɔ, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe bemaa kanran Kirisito Yesu le digɛnu duba wogɔ bɛɛ ga, iyaa emaa gagawu gɔ dɛi, Ama pui kunaa Kikinu ohobodo wo gi gɔ bɛɛ ga, Kirisito emi dɔrugaabe.

Ba unrunw, emɛ, Adama unrunw bana kanranɲu gin’, sɔɔ gɔ emɛ wogɔ le tunwɔn yɛnɛmɔi: Inɛw lɛi tunmɔ le aaru aaraa, dɔn tɔŋɔmaa kilaai ye, inɛ waja turu kanran wogɔ kɔɔlɔmu ma, sɔɔ waja wogɔ nɛ bara ma kanrun bɛɛidolo.

Aiwa, Ama, Abarahamu lee, tiruwɛnɛ womɔ lee bɛrɛ pui kunaabe. Ama Dɔn nɛ, “tirɛ unrunw womɔ bɛrɛ” gɛɛnɛ, tiyɛ gɔ inɛw joo. Kaa, “tiruwɛnɛ uwɔ bɛrɛ” tɔŋaaɲu, tiyɛ gɔ inɛ turu sai. Tiruwɛnɛ wogɔ Kirisitoi.

Sɔɔ sɔi mu ibɛ gɔ unwɔ: Ama aaru aaraa, tɔŋaa duunaa yasɛbe. Wo wogɔ kikibemɔdo gi. Kunrin anranguju suŋu nai pɛtaanu galaa wo yaa Tɔɔru wɛi gɔ, Ama pɔɔlɔ baa aaru aaru gɔi kɔɔlɔmu ye, wogɔ le digɛnu Ama pui kunu gɔi yamulu bɛɛidolo.
Sabu Ama sin obu kɛn gin’ obojɛ gɔ, wogɔ Tɔɔru le digɛnu bɛɛmɔjɛ ye, nɛɛ kɛn gɔ waja pui le kijɛ digɛ wɔlɔ. Kaa Ama Abarahamu bɛrɛ pui le digɛu kɛn gɔ obu.

Nɛɛ kunrin biyaai ye, Tɔɔru gɔ inge dɛi daani? Tɔɔru gɔ pui kuni onu nɛ daani, Tɔɔru yamulu gɔ jugɔmɔ dɛi daani. Abarahamu tiruwɛnɛ, inɛ dɛi pui gɔ kuni gɔ wɛɛido baa, Tɔɔru gɔ biyɛun jaain bee. Tɔɔru wogɔ, mɛlɛnkɛ gɔbe le digɛu, iyaa sɔɔ yegerenɛ turu le digɛu obaabɛin.
Inɛ sɔɔ yegerenɛ, inɛw tɔgu turu sai dɛi yoi yaalɛ. Kaa Ama kai koturu.
Tɔɔru gɔ, Ama pui gɔ le jajaiyɛjɛ ma? Asuu! Kaa, inɛi ɔnmɔi biyɛido tɔɔru yabe biyaai ye, kɔɔ waaru le inɛw, tɔɔru le digɛnu Ama giru nɛ teitai bii bɛbɛɛbɛin.
Kaa, gagawu bemɛ dɛi, inɛw Yesu Kirisito le gawaa wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ Ama pui kunu gɔ obo ga, Ama Dɔn sɔwaa, Adama unrunw puu hakɛ gunɔ nɛ toin gi.
Gagawu gɔ waaru dɔɔmɔ nɛ, Tɔɔru gɔ emi kaju kunaa gɛlɛbe, gagawu waaru wɛɛido bai tagaraidɛin baa, emi aa pinaa gɛlɛbe.
Kɔɔ gin’, emaa Ama giru nɛ gagawu gɔ dɛi teitai biyɛ ga, Kirisito wɛɛido baa, Tɔɔru, emi teeremɔnɛi bii.
Nɛɛ, iye gagawu waaru gɔ wiyaa dɔwaai dɛi, emi lee Tɔɔru numɔ nɛ tolo.
E gagawu nɛ Kirisito Yesu le pagu turu e bii gɔ le digɛu Ama unrunwin bii.
E puu, ei batise kanranmaabei. Kɔɔ gin’ e Kirisito le tunmɔi biyaai. Kanɛ e Kirisito bana gɔ jeɲaa wɔi.
Nɛɛ, kɔɔ biyaai ye, waja Yahutunɛ ma, Yahutunɛi laa ma sɔɔ wɔlɔ, gunɔnɛ ma, gunɔ tolo ma sɔɔ wɔlɔ, ainɛ ma, yaanran ma sɔɔ wɔlɔ. E puu Kirisito Yesu pagu turu bii gɔ nɛ koturu.
Nɛɛ, ei Kirisito mɔi ye, ei Abarahamu tirɛ unrunwin. Kunrin, Ama pui kunu gɔ bɛbɛɛdei.
Kijɛ gɛɛ mu ibɛ gɔ unwɔ: Aini wo ba kɛn balanɛ gɔ, waaru ii wo wɔɔ gɔ le, halu woi naran go kijɛ wooi baŋai kanran, wo lee, gunɔnɛ lee kabu tolo.
Wo ba waaru kɛju gɔ bai yai dɔɔ baa, wo inɛw woi kɔɔnw lee, inɛw arusɛgɛ womɔ kajubanw gɔbe lee numɔ nɛ too.
Emɛ kanran kɔɔ gin’, waaru unrunw dagunw gin’ emɛ bee le, emi aduna ɔn kijɛ paŋagunw iyemɔɔlɛ gɔbe numɔ nɛ tobe.
Kaa waaru gɔ wo dɔwaa, Ama, Aini unrunmɔ tiyaabe. Inɛw, Tɔɔru numɔ nɛ tobɛin gɔbei dɔrugɔ ga, emaa kole digɛnu Ama unrunwin bii bɛɛ ga, yaanran woi narun, iyaa wo Yahutunw tɔɔru le yabaube.
Ei unrunw womɔ tɔitɔi tagara ga, Ama, kinɛ emɛ kɔlɔ nɛ Aini unrunmɔ Kikinu tiyaabe. Kikinu wogɔ kɔnwaan ye «Aba», tiyɛ gɔ “De” gɛɛjɛ.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi ui waja gunɔnɛi laa, kaa ainii. Nɛɛ ui aini womɔi dɛi, Ama, unrunw unrunmɔ dɛi kijɛ wo sɛɛ puu ui ohobodo.
E pɔɔlɔ waaru Ama inin e bee le, ei kijɛ ama tɔitɔi laain gɔbe gunɔwin bee.

Kaa kanɛ Amai waaru e jugaajɛ gɔ le, kɔɔ dɛi ire, Ama waaru ei wo jugaajɛ gɔ le, e yani kijɛ yɛbɛlɛgunw, paŋagunwin ga wɔin gɔbe, kijɛ koolo kɔɔbe bɛrɛ pilemaa wɛɛuwɔi? E yani iyaa lee gunɔw bemɛi bii ibiyaa wɔi?
E bai gamuu gɔbe lee, iyepilu gamuu gɔbe lee, anrandii nɛ waaru gamuu gɔbe lee, anranguju gamuu gɔbe lee koi taajɛi!
Mu e dɛi liyaa wɔun: E dɛi birɛ naa mu biru gɔbe puu niwɛn sɛlɛ biyɛdo ma?
Ba unrunw, mu e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn, mu e gin’ wɔun dɛi, e kanran mu gin’ biyɛi. E mu bɛrɛ mɔɲu turu kanran kanranli.
Mu kubɔ pɔlɔ gɔ, inge dɛi Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ e bɛrɛ tagun ma e igii wɔi: Mui jijinwɛnbe dɛii.
Goju ma jinwɛnbe gɔ e bɛrɛ wogɔ subɔrɔ diyɛi bee. Yinkanran e mui yau kanrun ma, mu sai paja ma kanranli. Kaa e mui mɛlɛnkɛ ma, Kirisito Yesu ma gin’ sɛgɛraabei.
Kinɛ ɛɛlu diyɛ e sɛbe gɔbe puu yago yai? Mu sɔɔ ɔn e dɛi sɔɔ bɛbɛɛgɔn: E kanrun bɛbɛɛbei ye, giri ebe kanran wɔguru goonu ye mu bɛrɛ ohobobei.
Nɛɛ, e bɛrɛ naran gɔ mu sɔi dɛi kanɛ mui jaŋunɛ ebei biyaai ma?
Inɛw ɔnbe, e dɛi mamaa gaai tagarauwɔin, kaa kinɛ bemɛ ajubu gɔ ɛjula. Ebaa, mu le kabi ye, mamaa ebe gɔ unrunbe sibɛ go kigelemɔ ga, kijɛ be ibɛ gɔ kɔɔ woi.
Ɛju dɛi biyaai ye, mamaa le bii gɔ ɛjii wɔɔ. Kaa waaru logoro ebe nɛ mu too le sai laa, waaru wooi biyɛun jaan.
Unrunw mabe, Kirisito e nɛ yato ga sɛɛu jugɔmɔido baa, mu e dɛi iyaa pilemaa nɔrun dɛinyaan wɔun.
Bana waja le e le sɔɔ sɔɔ ga, kanɛ genɛ ebe nɛ yabɔn ye, mu bɛrɛ saii ɛjii bibiyɛbe. Mu e dɛi bana le biyɛun inɔn.
E inɛw Mɔise tɔɔru sɔɔ le tubi ibɛin gɔbe, e Tɔɔru sɔɔ gɛɛjɛ gɔbe ɛhɛgɛjɛi ma mui tagai.
Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaa, Abarahamu womaa anranw unrunw lɛi sɛbe wa, turui gunɔ yaanran Hagaru le bɛi, lɛiye gɔ, yaanran gunɔnɛi laa bee, Sara le bɛi.
Gunɔ yaanran ii gɔ inɛw puu bana naranɲu gin’ woi narin. Kaa yaanran gunɔnɛi laa ii gɔ, Ama pui kunu gɔ le digɛu narin.

Sɔɔ ɔnbe le digɛu, Ama, emɛ bɛrɛ sɔɔ tagarajɛ gɔ unwɔ: Yaanw lɛi kɔɔbe, Ama aaru tɔgu lɛi wo kunu gɔbe sɛɛrɛ tagaraɲu. Aaru turu gɔ, wogɔ Sinayi kokoo nɛ goi, wo unrunw gunɔwin biyɛidɛin naranjɛ: Wogɔ Hagarui.
Hagaru gɔ, Arabi gana nɛ Sinayi kokoo gɔ sɛɛrɛi tagarajɛ. Iyaa Hagaru gɔ lee, iye Jerusalɛmu ana gɔ lee sɛsɛgɛrɛjɛ. Sabu Jerusalɛmu ana lee, unrunw womɔ lee gunɔwin.
Kaa, alagala Jerusalɛmu gɔ, wogɔ yaanran gunɔnɛi laa gɔ gin’ wɔɔ. Emɛ na gɔ woi.

Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaa gi: “U yaanran ii narantɛlu gɔ, kinɛ uwɔ ɛɛliyɛmɔ. U yaanran nɔrun dɛinyin inɛɛ gɔ, kinɛ ɛɛlu kɔun diyɛ kɔnwun tɔlɔ. Sabu yaanran wo igɛ woi pajaati gɔ, yaanran igɛ sɛɛ dɛi sigɛ unrunw bɛɛdo.”
E kai, ba unrunw, Isaka gin’ ei Ama pui kunu gɔ le kɛukɛu unrunw naraanɲui.
Waaru galaai gɔ le, inɛw puu aŋai naranɲu gin’ aini naraanɲu gɔ, aini Ama Kikinu gɔnrɔn le naraanɲu gɔi tɔɔɲɔube. Iye bai dɔɔ jaa kɔɔ gin’ wɔɔ.
Kaa, Ama Dɔn yani gi? Ama Dɔn kijɛ gi: “Gunɔ yaanran kɔɔ lee, aini womɔ leei digɛ tii. Sabu gunɔ yaanran aini gɔ, yaanran hɔɔlɔnɛ aini le bari ye banɛ kɛn gɔ bɛɛ gamalaidolo.”
Kɔɔ gin’, ba unrunw, emi gunɔ yaanran unrunwin laa, kaa yaanran hɔɔlɔnɛ unrunwin.
Emaa naran go hɔɔlɔwin biyɛ ga, Kirisito kodɛi emi gunɔ nɛ goonu. Kɔɔ dɛi waja pilemaa ye gunɔ baga lolugu kɔkɔlɔ ebe nɛ kunɔmɔnɔu ga, ɛɛn go bii ye kuu ebe kajubai.
Keŋiyɛin, mu Pɔlu, mu e bɛrɛ daii sɔɔuwɔn: E ei araa nɔɔmɔ ga yayabajɛi ye, Kirisito e bɛrɛ niwɛn turu kanran siyɛidolo.
Mu iyaa inɛ aai kanran, inɛ unruin araa nɔɔmaajɛ baŋa gɔ, Mɔise tɔɔru sɔɔ gɔ puu sɛɛu wo gɛliyɛun jaain wɔɔ ga daii sɔɔuwɔn.
E, inɛw Tɔɔru gɛli le Ama giru nɛ ei teitai biyɛ ga ibɛi gɔbe, e lee, Kirisito lee kabiyaai. E Ama nɛɛma gɔ le gowaai.
Kaa, emɛ kai Ama Kikinu gɔnrɔn le, Ama, giru unrunmɔ nɛ emi teitai wɔɔ lugodo ga, wogɔ diyɛdɔn le wɔin. Emɛ, wogɔi gagawu le dɔmiyaan wɔin.
Inɛ aai kanran Kirisito Yesu nɛ too gɔ, woi araa nɔɔmaaɲu ma, woi araa nɔɔmɔla ma, wogɔ kijɛ niwɛn sɛɛi laa. Kijɛ niwɛn sɛɛ gɔ, wogɔ, gagawu ihibɛ le birɛ birɛjɛ gɔi.
E bana ɛju le tɔlaabei. Inɛ aa ebaa naran gɔ sɔɔ yabanɔu ga ei tɛŋaabe ma?
Ajubu wogɔ Ama ei boonɔnɛ gɔ bɛrɛ goolu.
“Kijɛ buru pidemu gaila sai, punau lɔɔraaɲu gɔ puu ingelemɔjɛ” ga, inɛw yingɛɛɲu.
Kaa e lee, mu lee, emi Inɛw Baŋa nɛ pagu turu gɔ digɛu ajubu emɛ dɛiin biyɛidolo ga mu gawaa wɔun. Kaa, inɛ hakilɛ ebe bimiliyemɔjɛ gɔ, mu kai mu sibɛ go, woi inɛ aai kanran, tujɔ womɔ bɛbɛɛdo.

Ba unrunw, iye bai dɔɔ mu araa nɔɔmu gɔ jaain wɔɔ waaju gɔ kunɔu gɛlɔn gɔ narain biyaai ye, inɛw inge dɛi mui ɔɲɔmɔnu biyɛdɛin ma? Kunrin biyaai ye, Kirisito, baga jai kuu nɛ wo yinwun sɔɔ gɔ dɛi inɛ turu kanran kinɛ yanwanbele.
Mu inɛw ei bimiliyemɔw gɔbe bemaa kijɛ be kanranjɛ gɔbe nɛ kɔɔ dɛi sigɛ kanran gun: Bemaa kuu bemɛ le bei inɛw pɔrui biyɛmɔ wa!
Ba unrunw, e kai ei hɔɔlɔi biyɛ dɛi boonaaɲu. Kaa, e hɔɔlɔi bii kɔɔ le pari ye, gojunawan hakɛgu ebe kijɛ ebaa kanran gɛɛjɛ gɔ kanrannɔugi. Kaa, ihibɛ dɛi tunmɔ kai kilɛi.
Sabu sɔɔ ɔn turu nɛ Mɔise tɔɔru gɔ puu kikibejɛ: “Aŋai kuu uwɔ u ibɛ gin’, u bɔɔnɛi yaa kɔɔ gin’ ibɛi biyɛ.”
Kaa e olunawanbe gin’ tunmɔi barumanu, tunmɔ bɛrɛ mɔɲu dɔɔnɔuwɔi ye, e tunmɔi susuyodei ma giye kuu ebe kajubai.
Kijɛ gɛɛ mu ibɛ gɔ unwɔ: Ama Kikinui paju ye ei wo teeremɔmɔi. Kunrin e dadaaru mɔɲu kinɛ nɛ goojɛ gɔbe le yabaidelei.

Sabu gojunawan hakɛgu kijɛ kanrun ibɛ gɔ, Kikinu kijɛ kanrun ibɛ gɔ le jajaiyɛjɛ. Kikinu kijɛ kanrun ibɛ gɔ yaa gojunawan hakɛgu kijɛ kanrun ibɛ gɔ le jajaiyɛjɛ. Be tunmɔ le kɔmɔ tataaɲu. Nɛɛ, kɔɔ dɛi kijɛ kanrun e ibɛ gɔ, e kanrun bɛɛidelei.
Kikinu ei teeremɔu wɔɔ ye, e Tɔɔru le tubiyaa wɔlɔi.
Gojunawan hakɛgu birɛ gɔbe igimɛi wɔɔ. Wogɔbe unwɔin: Sala salu lee, lɔgɔji lee, kuu sɛlɛ birɛ lee,
ɔmɔlɔ bulu lee, dugu lee, tunmɔi ibili lee, jai lee, ele lee, kinɛ ingelemu lee, tunmɔ tɛmurun lee, mii kabu lee, gojo kunu lee,

dadaaru sɔɔ lee, kɔɲɔ nɔi bimili lee, yɔgɔrɔ mɔɲu sɔɔ lee, kijɛ kɔɔbe le murin wɔin kanrun leei. Laa e bɛrɛ tagaabɔn, iyaa pilemaa e bɛrɛ tagauwɔn: Inɛw kijɛ kɔɔbe tunmɔ kanranw gɔbe, be Ama diinɛ kɛn gin’ bɛɛidenɛ.
Kaa, Kikinu ii naranjɛ gɔ, wogɔ ihibɛ lee, kinɛ ɛɛlu lee, jamu lee, muyɔn lee, ɛjii bii lee, ɛhɛju lee, sɔɔ turu baŋai bii lee,
tɛgɛ sɛlɛ le bii lee, kuu gɛli sɔɔ leei. Tɔɔru, sɔɔ kɔɔbe le jaiyɛjɛ turu kanran wɔlɔ.
Inɛw Kirisito Yesu mɔi wɔin gɔbe, be gojunawan hakɛgu gɔ lee, dadaaru womɔ puu lee, diŋɛ womɔ puu lee, baga jai nɛ pɛgaa daatin.
Emi Ama Kikinu gɔnrɔn le ɔnmɔi wɔɔ. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, emɛ Kikinu diŋɛ le kɛukɛu yaamɔi.
Emɛ kuu ulo le biyɛmɔnɔugin, tunmɔ kinɛ kijɛ ɔgu tɛgɛjɛ kanranmɔnɔugin, tunmɔ le ele le biyɛmɔnɔugin.

Ba unrunw, inɛ turu hakɛ kanraun wo wɔu tɛmaajɛi ye, e, inɛw Ama Kikinu ei teeremɔjɛ gɔbe, oju naran gɔ nɛ woi pilemu ye kunɔi. Kaa, e kinɛ ɛju le wogɔ kanrain. Iyaa, uwaa yaa subɔrɔ nɛ yoonɔu ga, kuu uwɔ kajuba.
E tunmɔi baraa ye inɛw dɔɔ demɛ le ɔɲaa wɔin gɔbe dɔɔ duiyɔi: E kɔɔ gin’ Kirisito tɔɔru gɔ kikibemɔdei.
Inɛ turu, woi kijɛi laa wɔnu, unruin kijɛi ga lugaa wɔɔ ye, baŋa kuu unrunmɔ lelemɔuwɔ.
Inɛ tuturu puu bana wo wɔɔ gɔ marun wo yɛnɛmɔ. Bana womɔ gɔ ɛjii wɔɔ ye, inɛ waja birɛ le tunwɔnlu go, birɛ womɔ sai dɛi kuu womɔ wo unɔmɔ.
Inɛ tuturu puu dɔɔ womɔi wɔɔ gɔ wo duiyɔun jaan.
Inɛ bɛrɛ Ama sɔɔ deeraaɲu gɔ, wogɔ baŋa inɛ woi deerenɛ gɔ le kijɛ ɛju wo sɛɛ gɔ gamalaun jaain wɔɔ.
E kuu ebe lelemɔnɔugi, Amai mɔmɔɔnɛ. Inɛ kijɛ wo tɔi gɔi gɛgɛlɛdo.
Wo goju nawan womɔ bɛrɛ kijɛ ɛjui tɔi ye, goju nawan womɔ wo bɛrɛ yinwin gɛlɛmɔdo. Kaa wo Ama Kikinu bɛrɛ kijɛ ɛjui tɔi ye, Kikinu wo bɛrɛ ɔnmɔsɔgɔi gɛlɛmɔdo.
Ɛju kanrun nɛ emɛ ɔɲɔmɔnɔugin. Sabu emɛ ɔɲaa yaa pajanɛ ye, waaru sɛgɛraa gɔ le emɛ gɛlu gɛgɛlɛdɛin.
Kɔɔ gin’, bana waaru emɛ bɛɛ puu, inɛw wooi bɛrɛ ɛju kanranmɔi. Kaa sigɛ le gagawu nɛ ba unrunw gɔbe bɛrɛ kanranmɔi.
Bana lɛtɛrɛ ii tɔŋu poo le mu tɔŋɔjɛ gɔ e iyejɛ gin’, mu numɔ ma le e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔuwɔn.
Inɛw gojunawan sibɛ go inɛw kinɛ aamu ibɛin gɔbe, inɛw wogɔbei ei araa nɔɔmu gɔ waajibi bojo ibɛɛ wɔin. Be Kirisito baga jai gɔ dɛi unrunbei ɔɲɔmɔnɔu sai dɛi kunrin kanraunwɔin.
Inɛw araa nɔwaanɲu gɔbe be kuu bemɛ le Tɔɔru gɔ sɛɛu digɛlain. Be gojunawan ebe nɛ sɛɛrɛ kɔɔ waajibi kunaa biyaabɛin dɛi kuu bemɛ unɔ ga, be kɔɔ dɛi ei araa nɔɔmu ibɛɛ wɔin.
