Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito baga jai gɔ dɛi laa ye, mu kai kijɛ turu le kanran kuu ma unɔidolɔn. Baga jai wogɔ digɛu aduna gɔ mu sibɛ go yinwaain, iyaa mui aduna sibɛ go yinwaain.
Araa nɔɔmaaɲu ma, araa nɔɔmɔla ma, niwɛn turu kanran sɛlɛ: Kijɛ maai wɔɔ gɔ, wogɔ kijɛ maŋu kanai bii gɔi.
Inɛw oju kɔɔ dimiyɛnw gɔbe, jamu lee, amasɔgɔjugɔ lee be le biyɛ, be lee, iyaa Ama inɛw tɔitɔi wajunw gɔbe puu le kanran biyɛ.
Nɛɛ, inɛ turu kanran waja wɛɛ ye mui ɔɲɔmɔnɔu. Sabu nanawanran goju ma nɛ mu sɛɛ gɔbe, mui Yesu gunɔnɛi ga jugɔmɔuwɔin.
Ba unrunw, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito nɛɛma gɔ e le biyɛ. Amina.
Mu Pɔlu, Ama diŋɛ le Kirisito Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui wɔɔ gɔ, Ama inɛw, iyaa inɛw Kirisito Yesu nɛ sɔɔ turu bɛɛnwin biyaa, Epɛse ana nɛ wɔin gɔbe, e bɛrɛ lɛtɛrɛ ɔn tiiuwɔn.
Ama emɛ Ba lee, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito lee, e bɛrɛ nɛɛma lee, jamu lee obo.
Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito Ama gɔ, iyaa wo Ba gɔ, Kirisito le digɛu, kikinu sibɛ go duba tɔgu puu le alagalabe nɛ emi duba kanraanjɛ baŋa gɔ, woi sɔmɔmɔi.
Sabu Ama emaa giru unrunmɔ nɛ inɛw ɛjaa, jarugu sɛnɛi biyɛ ga, aduna maŋamɔ nɛ baa, Kirisito nɛ wo emi yɛmaabe. Ama, ihibɛ womɔ sabu dɛi,
giru nɛ baa, diŋɛ womɔ dɛnɛ le kɛukɛu, Yesu Kirisito le digɛnu emi unrunw unrunmɔi bojodo ga kɛjaatiyaabe.
Aini ibɛ womɔ le digɛu nɛɛma diyɛ emɛ bɛrɛ wo obu gɔ dɛi emaa unruin sɔmɔ ga wo wogɔ kanrun.
Aini gɔ ili le emɛ kuu goonu biyaa, hakɛ yaabu kanrun biyaaɲu. Ama, nɛɛma womɔ bana gaai wɔɔ gɔ kɔɔ gin’ emɛ bɛrɛ taguru.
Nɛɛma wogɔ, wo emɛ bɛrɛ gagaa gɔ tiyaa, jugɔ puu lee, hakilɛ puu lee emi obaajɛ.
Wo diŋɛ womɔ sɔɔ boŋurun, wo bɛrɛ ɛju gin’ kɛjaa, Kirisito le digɛnu kibemɔdo ga wo sɛbe gɔ, emɛ bɛrɛ jugɔmaabe.
Wogɔ unwɔ: Alagala nɛ kijɛ toin wooi lee, minɛ nɛ kijɛ wɔin wooi lee, puu mɔɔnaa ye kuu baŋa turu bojodɛin. Wogɔ Kirisitoi. Waaru gɔbe kibaain biyaai ye, Ama kijɛ kanrando ga kɛjaa wo wɔɔ gɔ kɔɔ woi.
Iyaa, Ama, Kirisito nɛ emaa inɛw unrunmɔi biyɛ ga emi yɛmaabe. Wo kuu womɔ diŋɛ le sɔɔ kɛjɛjɛ baŋa gɔ, giru nɛ baa diŋɛ womɔ le kɛukɛu sɔɔ wogɔ kɛjaatiyaabe.
Emɛ, inɛw emɛ laa Kirisito nɛ gagawu emɛ kuni gɔbe, Ama, boi womɔ gaai wɔɔ dɛi emaa unruin sɔmɔ ga wogɔ kanrun.
E kanran, naran sɔɔ gɔ, tiyɛ gɔ Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ le yayabu e bɛi gɔ, wogɔ e ɛgu onu nɛ, e Kirisito le gawaabei. Iyaa Kirisito nɛ pui kunaa Kikinu Pilu obin gɔ le e nɛ sɛɛrɛ kunaabɛin.
Kikinu Pilu wogɔ, kɛn emɛ giruduunu gɔ woi. Ama, boi womɔ gaai wɔɔ dɛi, unruin sɔmɔ ga, inɛw unrunmɔi wo boju gɔbe kuu goonu ye, be bɛrɛ kɛn wo oboido gɔ giruduuni.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu le gagawu e sɛɛ lee, Ama inɛw wooi le ihibɛ e sɛɛ lee sɔɔ sɔɔu be wɔu ɛgaa,
mu kai e dɛi Amai birɛpoo tagu pajalun. Mu amagɛɛn ma nɛ ei naŋauwɔlɔn.
Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito Ama gɔ, Ba dooro baŋa gɔ, ebaa woi jugɔ ga, Kikinu, hakilɛ lee, jugɔ lee ei obojɛ womaa e bɛrɛ obo ga gɛɛunwɔn.

Iyaa ebaa boonu ei wo boonu gɔ le diyɛdɔn digɛ gɔ jugɔ ga, ebaa inɛw womɔ bɛrɛ kɛn ɛju naa ɛju wo oboido gɔ bana gaai wɔɔ gɔ jugɔ ga, iyaa, emɛ inɛw gawaa wɔin nɛ gɔnrɔn diyɛ kale sɛlɛ womɔ bana birɛ birɛjɛ ebaa jugɔ ga, Ama womaa kinɛ ebe giri wijɛmɔ ga, mu gɛɛunwɔn. Gɔnrɔn kɔɔ, paŋa diyɛ womɔ le kɛukɛu birɛ birɛjɛ.
Paŋa diyɛ kɔɔ le Ama, Kirisitoi yiun logoro nɛ bulomaa goonaa, alagala nɛ woi numɔ iin unrunmɔ sibɛ nɛ dɛinyɛnmu.
Wo kɔɔ nɛ woi kuu bɛɛnw wooi kuu nɛ lee, paŋa wooi kuu nɛ lee, gɔnrɔn wooi kuu nɛ lee, laamu wooi kuu nɛ lee iyaa aduna ɔn nɛ sai laa, halu aduna wɛɛido nɛ boi boo bɛɛmɔjɛ puu kuu nɛ lee daanaa sɛɛ.

Ama, kijɛ puu Kirisito kubɔ doɲu nɛ kunaa, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu, Kirisito gojui wɔɔ gɔ nɛ kijɛ puu kuu baŋa gɔ woi bojaabe. Kirisito, kijɛ puu, yalu puu nɛ sɛɛu joonɔnɛ baŋa gɔ, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu nɛ sɛɛu jowaa wɔɔ.

Pɔɔlɔ e aduna ɔn bana jeɲaa yaaubei. Iyaa daa go kikinu mɔɲube kuu baŋa, inɛw Ama le yabaanɛbe nɛ kanɛ kikinu birɛjɛ gɔ, e bana womɔ le kɛukɛu yaaubei. Kɔɔ gin’, e sɔɔ yabala ebe le digɛu, hakɛ ebe le digɛu, ei yinwaan yaabe.

Emɛ kanran, emɛ puu inɛw kɔɔbe gin’ bɛin. Emɛ pɔɔlɔ dadaaru mɔɲu kinɛ emɛ nɛ goojɛ diŋɛ le kɛukɛu yaaubɛin. Emɛ goju emɛ lee, ajubu emɛ lee diŋɛi kanraunbɛin. Emi bana narin le kɛukɛu, emɛ kanran wajunw gin’, Ama kinɛbanrun panai bɛin.
Kaa Ama, amasɔgɔjugɔ womɔ gaai wɔɔ dɛi, iyaa ihibɛ diyɛ le emi ibɛɛ wo bii gɔ dɛi,
emɛ sɔɔ yabala emɛ le digɛu inɛw yinwaan yaabɛin gɔ, wo Kirisito le emi ɔnmɔi bojaabe. Nɛɛma le sai ei yabaaɲu.
Kirisito Yesu nɛ pagu turu emɛ wɔɔ gɔ nɛ, Ama, Kirisito le emi tunmɔ go bulogaabe. Iyaa, Kirisito le emi tunmɔ go alagala nɛ laamu kanranmaabe.
Waaru wɛɛido gɔbe nɛ, Kirisito Yesu nɛ, emɛ sibɛ go Ama ihibɛ wo sɛɛ gɔ le digɛnu, nɛɛma diyɛ kale jugɔmɔɔlɛ womɔ tagara ga, wo kɔɔ kanrun.
Sabu nɛɛma le sai ei yabin, gagawu le digɛu bii. Wogɔ e nɛ goolu, Ama sin obui.
Inɛ turu kanran kuu unrunmɔ unɔ bɛɛnɔu ga, wogɔ, birɛ le bɛɛmɔlu.
Sabu emi Ama numɔbirui. Emaa sɔɔ ɛju kanran ga, Kirisito Yesu nɛ emi maŋi. Emaa sɔɔ ɛju wogɔbe nɛ yaa ga, Ama, giru nɛ baa bei yegeraa boju.

Yahutunw, goju guju nɛ sɛɛrɛ inɛw kunɔɲu dɛi, unrunbe araa nɔwaan wɔin gɛɛɲu. E goju sibɛ go tɔgu waja inɛw gɔbe, ebaa araa nɔɔnɛi ga be ei yinboonɔɲu. E inɛw kɔɔ gin’ ei boonɔɲu gɔbe, e pɔɔlɔ bana e bee gɔ naŋanɔugi.
Pɔɔlɔ, e Kirisito e le wɔlɔ go bei, e yerunwin bɛin, Ama tɔgu yɛmu inɛwin laai bei. Ama, pui kunaa, aaru wo aaru gɔbe nɛ ei tolo bee. Aduna nɛ e Ama inin go bei, diyɛdɔn sɛbelei.
Kaa kanɛ, Kirisito Yesu nɛ, e pɔɔlɔ inɛw wagee bɛin gɔbe, Kirisito ili le digɛu, ei bɛruniyɛnmaaɲu.
Sabu Kirisito, emɛ bɛrɛ jamu wo jɛɛlu. Yahutunw lee, tɔgu wajunw lee logoro nɛ kabu kunu jege gɔ, jaŋu be logoro nɛ tobe gɔ, wo wogɔ wolugaa, bei turu bojaabe.

Wo tɔgu lɛi gɔbe, unrun le pagu turu wɔnu, bei tɔgu kana turu bojo ga, yiun womɔ le digɛu, Tɔɔru lee, Tɔɔru kijɛ kanran gi gɔ lee, bana kanran wo gi gɔ lee, kijɛi laa boju. Wo be lɛi logoro nɛ kunrin jamu jɛɛlu.
Kirisito, baga jai nɛ wo yinwun gɔ le digɛu, jaŋu bemɛ donugaati. Baga jai gɔ le digɛu, wo bei goju turu bojaa, Ama lee, be lee logoro nɛ sɔɔ yegeraabe.
Kunrin, e inɛw Ama le wagee bɛin gɔbe lee, be inɛw Ama le bɛrii bɛin gɔbe lee, e puu bɛrɛ Kirisito, jamu Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ tagai wɛi.
Sabu emɛ puu, Yahutunw gɔ ma, Yahutunwin laain gɔ ma, Kirisito le digɛnu, Ba Ama giru nɛ Kikinu Pilu turu gɔ le dɔɔ bɛɛɲu.
Kɔɔ biyaai ye, nɛɛ e yerunwin laai, kuuseguwin laai. Kaa e Ama inɛw baginrun unrunwin, Ama ginrun gonɔ bɛɛnwin.
Ei Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe lee, inɛw Ama titiyaanw lee bɔlɔtei gɔ nɛ daanaaɲu. Kirisito Yesu, wo kuu womɔ le ginrun sibɛ tibu gɔ woi biyaa wɔɔ.
Ginrun gɔ puu wo nɛ sɛɛu tunmɔ aa, Inɛw Baŋa nɛ Ama Ginrun Diyɛ dɛiin wɔɔi biyɛ ga ulouwɔ.
E kanran, Kirisito nɛ wajunw gɔ le mɔrinyaan, Ama, Kikinu womɔ le ginrun nɛ wo toi biyɛ ga, ei ujiyɛuwɔ.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi mu Pɔlu, Kirisito Yesu dɛi kajuginɛi wɔɔ gɔ, e inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe dɛi gɛɛnjɔn.
Ama, nɛɛma womɔ dɛi birɛ e dɛi birɛ ga mu bɛrɛ wo gawuru gɔ sɔɔ e ɛgaabei woi laa?
Tiyɛ gɔ, Ama, sɔɔ taguru le mu bɛrɛ sɔɔ boŋurun unrunmɔ wo jugɔmu sɔɔ gɔ woi. Mu kanɛ wogɔ kuu nɛ sɔɔ dumi tɔŋaabɔn.
E wogɔ jaŋaajɛi ye, Kirisito sɔɔ boŋurun bana jugaa mu wɔɔ paamu kanrun bɛbɛɛdei.
Waaru galu gɔbe nɛ, boŋurun kɔɔ sɔɔ, Adama unrunw bɛrɛ jugɔmɔnɛ. Kaa kanɛ, Ama, Kikinu womɔ le, jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu ɛjaa wɔin womɔbe lee, inɛw Ama titiyaanw ɛjaa wɔin womɔbe lee bɛrɛ jugɔmaabe.

Boŋurun sɔɔ wogɔ unwɔ: Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ le digɛu, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe, Kirisito Yesu nɛ Yahutunw le bari ye kɛn turu gɔi bɛɛɲu. Iyaa Kirisito nɛ be wooi goju turu gɔ digɛi biyaain, iyaa pui tunmɔ gɔ nɛ toin.
Ama, nɛɛma mu bɛrɛ wo obu le kɛukɛu, mu bɛrɛ sin kanraan, gɔnrɔn womɔ bana birɛjɛ le digɛu mu Kibɛru Ɛju wogɔ birɛbirɛnɛi biyaa wɔun.
Mu Ama inɛw puu logoro nɛ, dagunw nɛ inɛ mu gaila wɔɔ gɔ, Kirisito arusɛgɛ kale jugɔ dɔɔmɔɔlɛ gɔ Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain bɛrɛ taga ga, nɛɛma wogɔ mu bɛrɛ obaaɲu.
Iyaa Ama, sɔɔ boŋurun baŋaraan wo sɛbe kɔɔ, bana birɛ birɛido, maa inɛw puu bɛrɛ ɛjɛmɔ gin. Ama, kijɛ wooi maŋanɛ gɔ, waaru giru go galu puu nɛ sɔɔ boŋurun kɔɔ inɛw wooi bɛrɛ baŋaraan sɛbe.
Kunrin, alagalabe nɛ kuu bɛɛnw wɔin gɔbe lee, paŋa wɔin gɔbe lee, bemaa kanɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu le digɛnu, Ama hakilɛ, bana dɛin dɛin le aŋai jooi wɔɔ jugɔ dɛii.
Ama, asuu sɔɔ bana kɛjaa wo sɛbe le kɛukɛu sɔɔ kɔɔ kanrun. Kirisito Yesu, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ le digɛu wo wogɔ kibemu.
Kirisito nɛ, emɛ liyɛ sɛlɛ go, wo le gagawu emɛ sɛɛ gɔ le digɛnu, Ama giru nɛ dɔɔ bɛbɛɛɲu ga, diyɛdɔn le wɔin.
Kodigɛu, e dɛi ɔɲɛ mu bɛrɛ dɔɔjɛ gɔbe dɛi anrangaju ebe dogonɔu ga, mu e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn. Ebaa dooro bɛɛ ga wogɔbe biyɛuwɔin.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Ba Ama, alagala nɛ lee, minɛ nɛ lee tɔgu wɔin puu boi wo nɛ goonɛ baŋa gɔ, mu giru womɔ nɛ tuŋiyɛunwɔn.
Womaa, dooro womɔ bana gaai wɔɔ le kɛukɛu, Kikinu womɔ le kinɛ kɔlɔ ebe gɔi gɔnrɔn le paŋa siyɛmɔ ga,
iyaa gagawu le Kirisito kinɛ ebe nɛ toiyo ga gɛɛunwɔn. Iyaa ebaa ihibɛ nɛ duu ebe sibe ye, wogɔ nɛ ɛɛn go daana ga gɛɛunwɔn.

Ebaa kunrin Ama bana gɔ e nɛ joi ye kale dɔɔ ga, Ama inɛw puu le, Kirisito ihibɛ wawanu gɔ lee, papala womɔ lee, totoo womɔ lee, gagabu womɔ lee paamu bɛɛ ga gɛɛunwɔn. Iyaa Kirisito ihibɛ, jugɔ wooi dɛi sigɛ gɔ jugɔɲu gɔnrɔn bɛɛ ga mu gɛɛunwɔn.
Nɛɛ Ama, gɔnrɔn womɔ emɛ nɛ birɛjɛ gɔ le digɛnu, kijɛ puu emɛ gɛɛnjɛ dɛi sigɛ, halu emɛ ajubajɛ dɛi sigɛ kanrun bɛbɛɛjɛ.
Boi sɔmu gɔ, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu nɛ lee, Kirisito Yesu nɛ lee, waaru puu asuu womɔi biyɛmɔ, Amina.
Mu Inɛw Baŋa birɛ dɛi inɛ kaju too gɔ, mu e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn, yoiyaara ebe gɔ, boonu ei booni gɔ le sɛgɛrɛmɔi.
Waaru wooi puu kuu sunugu le biyɛi, tɛgɛ sɛlɛ go biyɛi, muyɔn le biyɛi. Ihibɛ le tunmɔ sɔɔ kanran muyɔin.
Mainiyaanjɛi ye, jamu tunmɔ le ei pagaa sɛɛ gɔ le digɛnu, turui bii Ama Kikinu e bɛrɛ jɛɛlu gɔ, wogɔ gɛliyɛi.
Ama boonu ei wo boonu gɔ le diyɛdɔn digɛ gɔ koturu wɔɔ. Emɛ goju turu wɔin, iyaa Ama Kikinu koturu sai wɔɔ.
Inɛw Baŋa koturu sai wɔɔ, gagawu koturu sai wɔɔ, batise koturu sai wɔɔ,
Ama koturu sai wɔɔ, inɛw puu Ba gɔ woi. Wo inɛw puu kuu nɛ wɔɔ, inɛw puu le digɛnu birɛjɛ, inɛw puu nɛ too.
Kaa emɛ tuturu puu, Kirisito, gamulu emɛ bɛrɛ wo obu le kɛukɛu, nɛɛma biyaa yasin.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Ama Dɔn sɔwaa gi: “Daa yalu gɔbe nɛ waaru wo ulu le, wo gunɔw kole yai. Wo inɛw bɛrɛ sin obube obaabe.”
Nɛɛ, “wo ulu” tiyɛ gɔ ingei? Wo laa gɔ, minɛ doɲu yalu too gɔ nɛ sugaabe gɔ woi laa ma?
Susugonɛ gɔ, aduna puu wo le jooi biyɛ ga, alagala puu daa nɛ ulonɛ gɔ yaa woi.
Kɔɔbaŋa, inɛw bɛrɛ birɛ bemɛ wo obu: Gamuu Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲui, wajunw inɛw Ama titiyaanwin, wajunw Kibɛru Ɛju tagawin, wajunw inɛw teeremɔw lee, jaŋudeerenw leebei.
Ama inɛw gɔbei, Ama birɛ dɛi yegere ye, Kirisito goju gɔ paŋa bariyɛmɔ ga wo kɔɔ gin’ boju.
Kunrin emɛ wooi puu gagawu nɛ turu, Ama Ainii jugu nɛ turu biyaain baa yai dɔɔ, iyaa inɛw na, Kirisito bana kibaa wɔɔ nɛ baa dɔwaain biyɛ ga kanrun.
Kɔɔ biyaai ye, waja emɛ unrunwin biyɛidenɛ. Ooɲɔ diikoro balaa ye sibɛ sibɛ nɛ yaajɛ gin’, inɛw nabaragunw, sosoŋɔ inɛ manamu bemɛ le inɛ lelemɔw gɔbe, deeru bemɛ emi jigemɔidolo.
Kaa, emɛ ihibɛ le naran sɔɔuwɔin ye, kijɛ puu nɛ bariyɛnu, Kirisito gin’ biyɛdɛin. Kirisito, goju kuu gɔ woi.

Wo kɔrumɔ le goju yalu dɛin dɛin gɔbe ɛjii tunmɔ aa gɛliyaa, goju na gɔ digu digu gɔbe puu le digɛu sɛɛu turu biyaa wɔɔ. Kunrin, goju yalu gɔ puu, birɛ womɔ bana jaan gin’ birɛu, goju na gɔ gabiyɛu, ihibɛ le paŋa bariyɛuwɔ.
Nɛɛ Inɛw Baŋa boi le sɔɔ e bɛrɛ sɔwaa, ɛjɛmɔu mu wɔɔ gɔ unwɔ: Inɛw Ama inin, ajubu koolo bemɛ le yaauwɔin gɔbe, yoiyaara ebe nɛ waja be gin’ yaanɔugi.
Be, hakilɛ bemɛ dɛdɛbɛ. Kuu ɛɛn bemɛ lee, sɔɔ jugɔla be nɛ too gɔ lee dɛi, ɔnmɔ Ama obojɛ gɔ sibɛ go bei yerunwin.
Kinɛ bemɛ, sɔɔ dɔgɔgu kabugu pajaati. Be kuu sɛlɛ nɛ unrunbei obaa, kanran lɔgɔgu tɔgu dɛin dɛin puu kanraun, iŋi bɛɛnɛ.
Kaa e kai, Kirisito sɔɔ e dei gɔ kɔɔ gin’ laa.
E bɛrɛ sɔɔ womɔ sɔwaabɛin, iyaa jaŋu unrunw bɛrɛ kanranɲu gin’ e Yesu nɛ naran too gɔ deeru biyaabei ye kai.
Waajibi jige pɛi le yaau e bee gɔ, dadaaru inɛ lelemu le digɛu ei yamalau wɔɔ gɔi pajai.
Kikinu ebe lee, ajubu ebe lee sɛɛu kanai e biyɛmɔu jaain wɔɔ.
Iyaa e jige kana gɔ kunɔi. Wogɔ Ama le murin maŋaaɲu. Iyaa teitai bii lee, Ama kinɛ aamu lee naran nɛ goojɛ gɔ le woi jugɔmɔjɛ.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, emɛ tunmɔ le goju turu digɛbei dɛi, kakalu pajati ye, e inɛ tuturu puu wo bɔɔnɛ bɛrɛ naran sɔɔ.
Kinɛ ebe banraain ye, kinɛbanrun ebe hakɛ nɛ ei jɛyaamɔnɔugi. Kinɛbanrun le wɔnu nai numɔnɔugi.
Jinrun puu kuu baŋa bɛrɛ yalu yooɲu obonɔugi.
Inɛ gunyɔn gunyɔun bee gɔ, waja gunyɔn gunyɔnnɔu, kaa inɛ kai le wɔɔi bara bɛɛ ga wo mainiyaan ye, numɔ womɔ le birɛ ɛjii wɔɔ birɛ.
Aŋa ebe nɛ sɔɔ mɔɲu turu kanran goomɔnɔugi. Kaa sɔɔ sɔsɔɔdei biyaai ye, sɔɔ ɛju, inɛw, kai bana be sɛɛ le kɛukɛu, sɔɔ bei bariyɛmɔjɛ, inɛw kekeŋiyɛnw bɛrɛ nɛɛma jɛɛlɛjɛ sɔɔi biyɛmɔi.
Ama Kikinu Pilu, kuu goonu bai dɛi kole ei sɛɛrɛ kunaaɲu gɔ, kinɛ womɔ jinwɛnmɔnɔugi.
Kinɛ mɔɲu puu lee, kinɛ ingelemu lee, kinɛbanrun lee, siɲɛ ingelemu lee, boi yamulu lee, iyaa mɔmɔɲu tɔgu puu lee, e nɛ be goomɔi.
Tunmɔ le ɛjii biyɛi, tunmɔ amasɔgɔ jugɔi. Kirisito le digɛu, Ama ei yaabu kanrun gin’, tunmɔi yaabu kanrain.
Ei unrunw Ama ibɛi dɛi, Amai deewin biyɛi.
Kirisito emi ibiyaabe. Sadaga jiɲu ɛju sin obu, Ama nɛ ɛɛlui biyɛ ga iyaa wo emɛ dɛi kinrun womɔ obaabe. E kanran, kɔɔ gin’ ihibɛ nɛ yoi yaai.
Ama inɛw le bana dagaa gin’, sala ma, lɔgɔji ma girukakala ma, halu wogɔ sɔɔ sɔɔuwɔi giye kanran logoro ebe nɛ ɛgɛmɔnɔugi.
Sɔɔ lɔgɔgu ma, sɔɔ bomɔgu ma, sɔɔ salagu ma, sɔɔ sɔi kanran e le jaanla. Kaa Amai birɛpoo tagu sɔɔ sɔɔi.
Sabu ɛjii jugɔi, inɛ salaginɛ ma, sɔɔ lɔgɔ kanrannɛ ma, girukakalaginɛ ma, wogɔ ɔmɔlɔ bulu le kɛkɛu, Kirisito lee, Ama lee diinɛ nɛ kɛn sɛlɛ.
Inɛ turu bɛrɛ kanran sɔɔ koolo le ei lelemɔnɔugi. Sabu sɔɔ kɔɔ tunmɔ dɛi, Ama kinɛbanrun, inɛw sɔɔ yabaanɛ kuu nɛ sugojɛ.
E be le bɔɔi biyɛnɔugi.
Pɔɔlɔ e ɔlɔ nɛ tobei. Kaa kanɛ Inɛw Baŋa nɛ e wijɛ nɛ toi. Wijɛ unrunw gin’ yoi yaai.
Sabu wijɛ, ɛhɛju tɔgu puu lee, teitai tɔgu puu lee, naran tɔgu puu lee naranjɛ.
Mainiyaan ye kijɛ Inɛw Baŋa kinɛ aamɔjɛ gɔ kabugu bɛɛi.
Birɛ niwɛn sɛlɛ, ɔlɔ birɛ gɔbe mai siyɛnɔugi, kaa wogɔbe ɛlu goonɔi.
Inɛw kɔɔbe baŋiyaan, sɔɔ be kanranjɛ, halu sɔɔɲu kanran dɔgɔi.
Kaa kijɛ puu wijɛ nɛ goonaatin ye, bana be wɔɔ tɔitɔi gɔ jujugɔmɔjɛ.
Sabu kijɛ daii jugɔmaaɲu puu, wijɛi taŋajɛ. Kodigɛu bana sɔɔɲu gin’: “U giri yeiyaa wɔɔ baŋa gɔ, giri yemɛ. U yiun logoro nɛ bulo goo. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, Kirisito ui wiwijɛmɔdo.”
Yoiyaara ebe bana ɛjii kajubai. Inɛw bomɔgunw yoiyaara yaanɔugi, kaa inɛw hakilɛgunw gin’ biyɛi.
Waaru koturu kanran kuu ebe nɛ galamɔnɔugi, sabu bai gɔbe mɔɲuniyaain.
Kodigɛu, hakilɛ sɛlɛ go biyɛnɔugi, kaa Inɛw Baŋa diŋɛ gɔ paamai.
Kɔɲɔ le bimiliyenɔugi, wogɔ yanwan jɛɛlɛjɛ. Kaa Ama Kikinu le joi ye biyɛi.
Ama sɔmu nii lee, Ama nii lee, nii Kikinu nɛ goojɛ lee sɔɔ le, tunmɔ le sɔɔ sɔɔi. Nii niinu, kinɛ ebe wooi le Inɛw Baŋai sɔmɔi.
Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito boi le waaru puu, kijɛ puu dɛi Ba Amai birɛpoo tagai.
Kirisito giriliyɛ dɛi, tunmɔ le tubiyei.
E yaanw gɔbe, Inɛw Baŋa le tubiyaa e wɔɔ gin’, e igɛbe le tubiyei.
Sabu Kirisito, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu kuui wɔɔ gin’, igɛnɛ, yaanran kuu gɔ woi. Kirisito, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu, goju womɔi wɔɔ gɔi yabanɛ gɔ woi.
Ama inɛw mɔɔnu, Kirisito le tubiyejɛ gin’, yaanw gɔbe, kijɛ puu nɛ be igɛbe le be tubiyemɔi.
E igɛnw gɔbe, Kirisito Ama inɛw mɔɔnui ibiyaa, kinrun unrunmɔ wo dɛi obu gin’, e yaanw ebei ibɛi biyɛi.
Kirisito kunrin Ama inɛw mɔɔnui dii le, Ama sɔɔ le digɛnu ɛjɛmɔ ye, Ama dɛi dɛiin bojo ga kinrun unrunmɔ obu.
Iyaa wo giru unrunmɔ nɛ woi dooro le bojo ga kanrun. Wogɔ nɛ lɔgɔ tarala, yalu sunwinyaain tolo, kijɛ kɔɔ tunmɔ turu kanran wɔlɔ, iyaa ɛjaai, jarugu sɛlɛ.
Kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’ igɛnw gɔbe, goju bemɛ bana be ibɛ gin’, yaanw bemɛ ibɛi biyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Inɛ yaanran unrunmɔ ibɛɛ wɔɔ gɔ, kuu unrunmɔ ibɛɛ wɔɔ.
Inɛ turu kanran asuu goju unrunmɔ ibiliyɛtɛlu, kaa woi kakayamɔjɛ, kakajubajɛ. Kirisito yaa Ama inɛw mɔɔnu dɛi yinkanranjɛ.
Sabu emɛ, goju womɔ digɛbei.
“Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, ainɛ, wo ba lee, wo na lee, be le kabi ye, yaanran womɔ le biyɛjɛ. Kunrin be lɛi inɛ turu taŋaɲu.”
Kɔɔ sɔɔ boŋurun diyɛi, kaa mu Kirisito lee, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu lee dɛi sɔɔuwɔn.
Kokanran e le yadigɛ. E igɛnw gɔbe, e inɛ tuturu, kuu bana ebe gin’ yaanran womɔi ibɛi e biyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Yaanran kanran wo igɛi babaun jaain wɔɔ.
E unrunw gɔbe, ei Inɛw Baŋa mɔi dɛi ei naranw gɔbei babai. Wogɔ teitai wɔɔ.
“U ba lee, u na lee baba.” Tɔɔru, pui wo le digɛraa wɔɔ pɔlɔ gɔ, tɔɔru kɔɔ woi.
Pui wo le digɛ gɔ unwɔ: “Kɔɔ biyaai ye, aduna nɛ u jamu lee, kinruntaun lee bɛbɛɛdou.”
E banw gɔbe, unrunw ebe kinɛ jinwɛnjɛ kanran kanrannɔugi, kaa Inɛw Baŋa teeremu le kɛukɛu, kɔi lee, tinwinrun womɔ lee le bei kɔɔi.
E gunɔw gɔbe, Kirisito sɔɔ e yabajɛ gin’, liliyɛ le, goju kinwun le, kinɛpilu le, aduna ɔn nɛ e baŋa wɔin gɔbe sɔɔ yabai.
Inɛw le boi ɛju bɛɛdei gin’, giru bemɛ nɛ sai wogɔ gin’ biyɛnɔugi, kaa Kirisito gunɔw, kinɛ ebe wooi le Ama diŋɛ kanranwin biyɛi.
Inɛw birɛi birɛɛlɛi, kaa Inɛw Baŋa birɛi birɛjɛi gin’, kinɛ ɛju le gunɔ birɛ ebe birɛi.
Sabu e igii wɔi, gunɔnɛi wee, hɔɔlɔnɛi wee, inɛ tuturu puu ɛju wo kanrun tujɔi Inɛw Baŋa bɛrɛ bɛɛdo.
E gunɔw baŋabe, e kanran gunɔw ebe le bana kɔɔ tunmɔ le biyɛi. Bei liirɛmu sɔɔ kanrannɔugi. Sabu e igii wɔi, be lee e lee Baŋa gɔ alagala nɛ yɔɔ, iyaa wo inɛ kabu kunɔɔlɛ.
Kɔɔbe wooi onu nɛ, nɛɛ e paŋa ebe Inɛw Baŋa nɛ bɛɛi. Gɔnrɔn paŋagu womɔ nɛ bɛɛi.
Jinrun puu kuu baŋa dabulu nɛ ɛɛn go iŋi bɛɛ ga, e Ama kɔmɔgelu gɔbe puu e nɛ kunɔi.
Sabu emɛ, Adama unrunw le kɔmɔ taauwɔnɛ. Kaa kuu bɛɛnw lee, paŋagunw lee, ɔlɔ aduna ɔn laamaw gɔbe lee, iyaa alagalabe kikinu mɔɲu gɔbe lee, be le taauwɔin.
Kodigɛu, Ama kɔmɔgelu gɔbe puu jeɲɛi. Kunrin bai mɔɲu wiyaai ye, e, jaŋunɛ gɔ le iŋi bɛbɛɛdei. Iyaa kunrin kɔmɔ taa donugaa ye, nimɛ kanran e ɛɛn go bii bɛbɛɛdei.
Nɛɛ ɛɛn go biyɛi, dɔin ebe nɛ, naran gɔ tɛmu gin’ pagiyɛi, teitai gɔ inrun arugoi gin’ kunɔi.
Jamu Kibɛru Ɛju inɛ mainiyɛnmɔjɛ gɔ, taga gin’ kubɔ ebe nɛ kunɔi.
Kɔɔbe puu kuu nɛ gagawu gɔ dɛdɛɛ gin’ jeɲɛi. Wogɔ le e Mɔɲu kuu baŋa kɛun, yaun bije goou wɔɔ gɔbe puu dai bɛbɛɛdei.
Yayabu gɔ, inrun goro gin’ kunɔi, iyaa Kikinu Pilu polukaaba, Ama sɔɔi wɔɔ gɔ jeɲɛi.
Amagɛɛn tɔgu dɛin dɛin le Ama bɛrɛ kai ebe taganu, waaru puu Ama Kikinu gɔnrɔn le Ama gɛɛin. Wogɔ le kaba kanranlu go ɛjii mainiyɛin. Ama inɛw puu dɛi waaru puu Ama gɛɛin.
Mu dɛi kanran Ama gɛɛin. Maa aŋa waaru mu koorojɛ puu, sɔɔ bɛi ye, Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ boŋurun gɔ inɛw bɛrɛ liyɛ sɛlɛ go jugɔmɔ ga, Ama gɛɛin.
Mu kaju gɔ nɛ Kibɛru Ɛju wogɔ dɛi sɔɔ sɔɔnɛi biyaa wɔun. Kodigɛu bana sɔɔun mu jaan gin’ maa liyɛ sɛlɛ go taga ga, mu dɛi Ama gɛɛin.
Ebaa kanran, sɔɔ ma lee, kijɛ mu kanranjɛ lee jugɔ ga, bainɛ ibɛ emɛ Tisike, Inɛw Baŋa birɛbirɛnɛ ɛju, sɔɔ turu baŋai wɔɔ gɔ, e bɛrɛ kibɛru gɔ puu tatagado.
Womaa bana emɛ wɔɔ e bɛrɛ jugɔmɔ ye, kinɛ ebe kaaliyɛmɔ ga, mu wogɔ dɛi tee woi e bɛrɛ tiiuwɔn.
Ba Ama lee, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito lee, ba unrunw bɛrɛ jamu lee, ihibɛ lee, gagawu lee obo.
Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisitoi, ihibɛ dogoolɛ le inɛw ibɛin puu, nɛɛma be le biyɛmɔ.

Lɛtɛrɛ ɔn, mu Pɔlu lee, Timɔte lee, emɛ, Kirisito Yesu birɛbirɛnw gɔbe, emɛ tiiuwɔ. Pilipi ana nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu kajubanw gɔbe lee, bei baranw gɔbe lee, inɛw Ama inɛwin wɔin puu, Kirisito Yesu nɛ toin gɔbe lee bɛrɛ emɛ lɛtɛrɛ ɔn tiiuwɔin.
Ama emɛ Ba lee, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito lee, e bɛrɛ nɛɛma lee, jamu lee obo.
Waaru ei mu ajubaajɛ puu, mu Ama mai birɛpoo tagajɔn.
E wooi puu dɛi, waaru Ama mu gɛɛnjɛ wooi, mu kinɛ ɛɛlu le gɛɛnjɔn.
Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ taga ga, bai pɔlɔ gɔ nɛ gowaa iye wɛɛ dɔɔ, e mu le bɔɔi biyaabei gɔ dɛi mu Amai birɛpoo tagauwɔn.
Kɔɔ gin’ mu kijɛ ɔn le tilai gawaa wɔun: Ama kinɛ ebe nɛ birɛ ɛju ɔn tɔlɔnɛ gɔ, Kirisito Yesu bai wɛɛido le, birɛ gɔ kibeido baa, wo birɛ wogɔ birɛnu biyɛdo.

Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ narain ga jugɔmɔ ga, woi bɔlɔtei ɛju nɛ daana ga pɔɔlɔ mui hɔɔlɔnɛi bee. Nɛɛ kanɛ mui kaju nɛ too. Kaa kaju nɛ mu too gɔ le ma, hɔɔlɔnɛi mu wɔɔ gɔ le ma, e puu, Ama nɛɛma mu bɛrɛ obu gɔ nɛ gamulu ebe biyaabei. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, e puu sibɛ go ajubu kɔɔ tunmɔ mu siyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Ei kinɛ ma nɛ saii paa wɔun.
Mu Kirisito Yesu bana ei ibɛ gin’, ihibɛ diyɛ wogɔ le ei ibɛɛ wɔun giyaajɔn ye, mu narain sɔɔjɔn ga Ama igii wɔɔ.

E dɛi Ama bɛrɛ gɛɛn mu gɛɛnjɛ gɔ unwɔ: Ebaa kijɛ ɛju gɔ yɛmu bɛɛ ga, ihibɛ ebe bariyɛ bariyɛ yaamɔ. Iyaa ihibɛ wogɔ kuu nɛ jugɔ tɔitɔi gɔ lee, paamukanrun kibaai gɔ lee bariyɛmɔ. Kɔɔ gin’ Kirisito bai wɛɛido gɔ le ei ɛjaai biyɛdo, iyaa kijɛ turu nɛ kanran ei jarugu bɛɛmɔidolo.
Amai baba dɛi, Ama boi sɔmi biyɛ dɛi, Yesu Kirisito turu sai ɛhɛju tɔitɔi obojɛ gɔ le ei jooi biyɛdo.
Ba unrunw, kijɛ mu bɛrɛ dɔi gɔ, Kibɛru Ɛju gɔi tɛŋɛlu. Kaa woi giru go yaamaabe ga jugi e bii ye ibɛɛ wɔun.
Kɔɔ gin’, Rɔmɛ ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ ginrun diyɛ dɔmiyɛnw gɔbe puu lee, inɛw wajunw ɔn nɛ wɔin gɔbe puu lee, maa Kirisito birɛbirɛnɛi dɛi kaju nɛ too ga igii wɔin.
Kaju nɛ mu too gɔ dɛi, ba unrunw joo gamuu Inɛw Baŋa nɛ diyɛ daanu bemɛ bariyaa, kɔɔ sabu dɛi be anrangaju bɛɛu, liliyɛ sɛlɛ le Ama sɔɔ tagauwɔin.
Inɛw gamuu kai, ele lee, jai lee mu sibɛ go be sɛɛ dɛi, Kirisito waaju gɔ tagauwɔin. Kaa, inɛw gamuu gɔbe kinɛ ɛju le tagauwɔin.
Be mui ibɛɛ wɔin dɛi kɔɔ gin’ kanraunwɔin. Sabu be, maa sɔɔ sɔɔ dɛi, maa inɛw bɛrɛ Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ narain ga jugɔmɔ dɛi, Ama ɔn nɛ mui tii ga be igii wɔin.
Kaa inɛw gamuu Kirisito waaju gɔ kuu unrunbemɛ kai dɛi tagauwɔin, be kinɛpilu le tagauwɔnɛ. Kɔɔ gin’, ajubu bemɛ nɛ, waaru kaju mu too gɔ le, ɔɲɛ ma bariyɛmu bɛbɛɛdɛin ga wɔin.
Wogɔ gaju turu kanran wɔlɔ. Be kinɛgɛun le birɛɲu ma, kinɛpilu le birɛɲu ma, bana biyaai wooi puu, Kirisito waaju gɔ tagi wɔɔ. Wogɔ dɛi kinɛ ma ɛɛli wɔɔ. Iyaa kinɛ ma kanran ɛɛliyɛmɔnu biyɛdɔn.
Sabu amagɛɛn ebe lee, Yesu Kirisito Kikinu baru gɔ lee digɛu, kijɛ mu bɛrɛ dɔi kɔɔbe wooi yayabu ma sɔɔ le kijɛ digɛi biyɛdo mu igii wɔun.
Dɔgɔ mui turu kanran aaidolo ga mu saii diyɛdɔn le dɔmiyaan wɔun. Kaa mu anrangaju gaai sii ye, ɔnmɔ ma le ma, yiun ma le ma, kanɛ goo ye, bai wooi mu dɛi Kirisito boi sɔmi biyɛdo.
Sabu, mu bɛrɛ kai ɔnmɔ gɔ Kirisitoi, iyaa yiun gɔ tinɛi.
Kaa iyaa, mu ɔnmɔi wɔnu birɛ niwɛn sɛɛ birɛ bɛbɛɛdɔn ye, nɛɛ mu kijɛ yɛmɛɲu inɔn.
Mui sibɛ lɛi nɛ biɲiyaan wɔɔ. Yinwaaun ye, Kirisito le biyɛ ga, wogɔ saii daariyaa wɔun, sigɛ le wogɔ ire.
Kaa e sabu dɛi, sɔɔ sigɛ le maa gɔ, wogɔ ɔnmɔi bii ma gɔ woi.
Mu kɔɔ daii jugaa wɔun dɛi, mu e wooi logoro nɛ bibiyɛdɔn ga igii wɔun. Ebaa Ama oju nɛ giru go yaa ga, ebaa iyaa kinɛ ɛɛlu le biyɛ ga mu bibiyɛdɔn.
Kɔɔ gin’, waaru logoro ebe nɛ pilemaa mu wiyaajɛ, e sigɛ le Kirisito Yesu nɛ mu dɛi kuu ebe unɔ bɛbɛɛdei.

Sigɛ le, Kirisito Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ le bana sɛgɛrɛjɛ gin’ yoi yaai. Kɔɔ gin’ mu ei yɛnɛi wɛwɛiun ma, logoro ebe nɛ toloun ma biyaai kanran, ebaa sɛɛu ajubu turu nɛ ɛɛn go iŋiyaan, gagawu Kibɛru Ɛju bɛrɛ goojɛ gɔ dɛi tunmɔ le mɔrinyaan jai jaiyɛuwɔi ga mu ɛhɛgɛdɔn.
Jaŋuw ebe bɛrɛ ei kijɛ turu nɛ kanran liirɛmɔnɔugi. Wogɔ bei suiyi sɛɛrɛi biyɛdo, kaa iyaa ei yabu sɛɛrɛi biyɛdo. Yayabu wogɔ Ama bɛrɛ goo ye wɛɛdo.
Sabu Ama, Kirisito le gawu kuu ɛɛlu sai e bɛrɛ obolu, kaa iyaa wo dɛi ɔɲu kuu ɛɛlu gɔ e bɛrɛ obaabe.
Kanɛ jai diyɛ gɔ nɛ e mu le bari bɛbɛɛdei. Wogɔ jai diyɛ pɔɔlɔ baa jaiyɛu mu bee gɔ woi, iyaa bana e igu gin’, iye bai dɔɔ jai jaiyɛu mu gɛlɛ gɔ woi.
Kirisito nɛ pagu turu e wɔɔ gɔ, anrangaju ei ohobojɛ ma? Ihibɛ womɔ kinɛ kaalu ei ohobojɛ ma? E Ama Kikinu le bɔɔi biyaa wɔi ma? E tunmɔ dɛi ihibɛ lee, amasɔgɔjugɔ lee yasin ma?
Kɔɔ biyaai ye, mu e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔ e tunmɔ le ajubu turu le bii ye, ihibɛ turu nɛ bii ye, kinɛ ebe lee, ajubu ebe lee koturu bojo ye, kinɛ ɛɛlu ma kibemɔi.
E, kuu ebe kai dɛi ma, kuu ulo tiyɛ sɛlɛ dɛi ma giye, kijɛ turu kanran kanrannɔugi. Kaa e tunmɔ le kuu sunugu le bii ye, inɛ tuturu puu, inɛw wajunw gɔbe wo dɛi ire gin’ lugo.
Inɛ turu kanran kuu womɔ too tee toonɔu. Kaa inɛw wajunw kijɛ tinɛjɛ kanrain.
Kirisito Yesu jige sɛbe gɔ, e wogɔ tunmɔ siyɛi.
Halu wo lee, Ama lee bana koturu bee kanran, wo lee, Ama lee kɛukɛu bee kanran, wo wogɔ kijɛ paju bɛɛmɔɔlɛi ga lugolu.
Kaa wo kijɛ wo sɛbe puu pajaatiyaa, birɛbirɛnɛ bana jeɲaabe. Wo Adama unrunw gin’ biyaa, inɛ peere le murin unruin tagaraabe.
Wo kuu unrunmɔ sunugaa, iyaa yiun gɔ baa, baga jai kuu nɛ yai wo yinwɛindo baa, sɔɔ yabanɛi biyaabe.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi Ama, alagala nɛ yalu baba wo sigɛ gɔ wo bɛrɛ obaabe. Iyaa boi puu dɛi boi wo sigɛ gɔ wo nɛ kunaabe.
Kɔɔ gin’ alagala nɛ lee, minɛ nɛ lee, minɛ doɲu nɛ lee kijɛ ɔnmɔi wɔin gɔbe puu, Yesu boi sɔmɔ dɛi tutuŋiyɛndɛin.
Iyaa Ba Ama boi sɔmi biyɛ dɛi, inɛw wooi Yesu Kirisitoi Inɛw Baŋai ga daii gɛgɛɛdɛin.

Kɔɔ gin’, ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, waaru e le mu bee le e waaru puu sɔɔ ma yabaabei. Nɛɛ, kanɛ e le wagee waaru mu wɔɔ gɔ le sɔɔ ma yabaabei ye sigɛ le wogɔ gaara maa. Yayabu ebe sɛɛu kibaai biyɛ ga, liliyɛ le, goju kinwun le birɛ birɛi.
Sabu, kijɛ diŋɛ womɔi wɔɔ gɔ ebaa ibɛɛ biyɛ ga, wogɔ kanrun kibemɔɲu gɔnrɔn ei obo ga, Ama, woi kinɛ ebe nɛ birɛ birɛuwɔ.

Aduna ɔn inɛw kakalugunw, inɛw mɔɲu gɔbe logoro nɛ ebaa inɛw jarugu sɛnɛ, inɛw tɛgɛ sɛnɛ, Ama unrunw nɛ lelu tolobei biyɛ ga, kijɛ puu guguun lee, jiiru lee wɔlɔ go kanrain. Be bɛrɛ sɔɔ ɔnmɔ obojɛ gɔ taganu wɔnu, logoro bemɛ nɛ alagala tolobe gin’ e dooroun jaain wɔɔ. E kɔɔ gin’ kanraanjɛi ye, Kirisito bai wɛɛido gɔ le mu e dɛi kuu ma unɔ bɛbɛɛgɔn. Sabu wogɔ birɛ mu biru gɔ lee, ɔɲɛ mu iye gɔbe lee bamai biyɛlu tagarado.

Mui daaɲu kanran, bamai laa biyɛdo. Sabu gagawu ebe gɔ, sadaga Ama bɛrɛ e obojɛ gin’ wɔɔ dɛi, kinrun ma sadaga gɔ sadaga ebe gɔ nɛ bariyɛidoi biyɛdo. Kunrin biyaai ye, kinɛ ma ahaado, mu e puu le bari ye kinɛ ɛhɛɛliyɛmɔdɔn.
E kanran kinɛ ebe aaun jaain wɔɔ, iyaa mu le bari ye kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔu jaain wɔɔ.
Kibɛru e bɛrɛ goo ye mu ɛgɛido gɔ le maa kuu ma le anrangaju siyɛ ga, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu diŋɛi biyaai ye, bɛrii Timɔte e bɛrɛ tii bɛbɛɛdɔn diyɛdɔn le wɔun.
Woi laa ye inɛ mu gin’ mai ebe sɛɛ wɔlɔ.
Inɛw wajunw gɔbe puu, kuu unrunbemɛ mai laa ye, Yesu Kirisito le sɔɔ digɛ mai sɛnɛ.
Timɔte kai, e jige ɛju womɔ igii wɔi. Sabu wo lee, mu lee, emɛ tunmɔ go Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ waaju tagaabɛin. Aini bana wo bai barajɛ gin’, wo birɛ gɔ nɛ kunrin mui barauwɔ.
Nɛɛ bana mu bɛrɛ biyɛido waaru mu jugaajɛ kɛu, mu woi e bɛrɛ titiidɔn diyɛdɔn le wɔun.
Mu iyaa, Inɛw Baŋa nɛ diyɛ ma daanaa, mu kuu ma le bɛrii ei yɛnɛi wɛwɛɛdɔn ga igii wɔun.
Emɛ bainɛ Epaporodite, kai ma kilɛ ga inɛ mu bɛrɛ e tii gɔ, birɛbirɛnɛ mu bɔɔnɛi, Kirisito dɛi kɔmɔ tai nɛ mui baranɛi. Kaa nɛɛ, woi e bɛrɛ pilemu ye mu tiiun jaain wɔɔ ga ajubaabɔn.
Sabu wo e puui iyi dadaaru le wɔɔ. Iyaa woi jinwaanbe ga e ɛgaabei dɛi, wo ɛjii ajubu le wɔɔ.
Narain, woi jinwaanbe, iyaa wo yiun le bɛrii bee. Kaa Ama amasɔgɔ womɔ jugaabe. Amasɔgɔ womɔ sai laa, kaa kinɛ jiun ma kuu nɛ kinɛjiun bariyɛnɔu ga, Ama, amasɔgɔ ma yaa jugaabe.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi mu sigɛ le kinɛ ɔgu le woi e bɛrɛ tii ibɛɛ wɔun. Kɔɔ gin’ waaru woi e iyaajɛ kinɛ ebe ɛhɛɛliyɛdo, kunrin kinɛjiun ma gɔ yaa gagamiyɛndo.
E kinɛ ɛɛlu diyɛ le, Inɛw Baŋa nɛ e bainɛ gin’ woi sɛgɛrɛi. E inɛw wo gin’ wɔin gɔbei babai.
Sabu Kirisito birɛ gɔ dɛi woi yinwɛndo ga bee. E kuu ebe le mu dɛi kijɛ nɛ mui baru bɛɛidelei e wɔɔ gɔ, wo wogɔ nɛ mui bara ga, kinrun unrunmɔ kunaa nɛwɛnlu.
Ba unrunw mabe, kɔɔ wooi onu nɛ, ei Inɛw Baŋa mɔi dɛi kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔi. Kijɛ e bɛrɛ tɔŋaatiyaa mu galu gɔ, wogɔ pilemu taga ga mu bɛrɛ doori laa. Iyaa e bɛrɛ wogɔ ire.
Inɛw birɛ mɔɲu birɛnw gɔbe, inɛw iju kɔɔbe, inɛw araa nɔɔmɔw tɔitɔi laain kɔɔbe dɛi kuu ebe kajubai.
Sabu inɛw araa nɔɔmɔw tɔitɔi gɔbe, inɛw Amai Kikinu womɔ le babanw gɔbe, inɛw Kirisito Yesu dɛi kuu emɛ unɔw gɔbe, iyaa atɛmu sɔɔ nɛ inɛw diyɛ emɛ daanaa sɛnɛ gɔbe emi.
Kaa mu kanran atɛmu sɔɔ nɛ diyɛ ma daanu bɛbɛɛbɔn. Inɛ turu atɛmu sɔɔ nɛ diyɛ unrunmɔ daanu bɛbɛɛgɔn ga ajubaa yɔɔ ye, mu gaara wogɔ baŋa dɛi sigɛ ajubaun jaan.
Mui narin bai gagaraye gɔ le mui araa nɔɔmi. Mu ba lee, mu na lee Yahutunwin, mui Bɛnjamɛ tɔgui, mui Heburu tɔgu tɔitɔii. Yahutunw tɔɔru sibɛ go mui Parisiɛin bee.
Ama dɛi maini sibɛ go mui inɛw Yesu le gawaa wɔiin tɔɔɲɔnɛi bee. Tɔɔru yabu le teitai dɛnu sibɛ go, inɛw, jarugu turu kanran mu nɛ tɛmɛnɛ.
Kaa pɔɔlɔ kijɛ tinɛ sɛin gin’ mu lugoube gɔbe, kanɛ Kirisito dɛi, kijɛ tinɛ sɛnɛ gin’ lugouwɔn.

Kijɛ sigɛ le maa gɔ, tiyɛ gɔ Kirisito Yesu, Inɛw Baŋa ma jugɔ gɔ le tunwaan yɛnaajɔn ye, mu kijɛ puu kijɛ tinɛ sɛnɛ gin’ lugouwɔn. Kirisito dɛi, kijɛ kuu ma tee tinɛjɛ gɔ puu pajaatun. Kirisitoi tinɛi gin’ bɛɛ ga, wo le pagu turui biyɛ ga, mu kijɛ puu lɔgɔ gin’ lugouwɔn. Mu waja Tɔɔru yabu ma dɛi mui teitai wɔɔ ajubu siyɛidolɔn. Kaa Kirisito nɛ gagawu mu sɛɛ gɔ dɛi mui teitai wɔɔ. Teitai bii Ama bɛrɛ goojɛ gɔ dɛi, iyaa inɛ gawaa wɔɔ baŋa bɛrɛ teitai bii Ama obojɛ gɔ dɛi mui teitai wɔɔ.

Mu kijɛ turu sai ibɛɛ wɔun. Wogɔ Kirisito lee, bulogu womɔ gɔnrɔn gɔ lee jugu gɔi. Kɔɔ gin’, bana biyaai puu mui kanran yiun nɛ bulo ye goo bɛɛ ga, yiun womɔ nɛ yaa wo le murin bii ye, bana ɔɲɛ wo iye gin’, ɔɲɛ iye ibɛɛ wɔun.
Mu kijɛ dɛi mu goi kanɛ baa biyaajɔn ga wɔlɔn, maa kanɛ baa mui kibaai ga wɔlɔn. Kaa maini ye maa jobu tujɔ gɔ bɛɛ ga, mu jɔbɔuwɔn, sabu Kirisito Yesu wogɔ dɛi mui aa galaai.
Ai, ba unrunw, mu wogɔ biyaajɔn ga kanɛ baa kole wɔlɔn. Kaa, kijɛ mu kanranjɛ turu yɔɔ: Kijɛ onu ma nɛ wɔɔ naŋaatiyaa ye, mu giru ma nɛ kijɛ wɔɔ gɔi bɛɛdɔn giye mainiyɛnjɔn.
Kɔɔ gin’, Kirisito Yesu le digɛnu, Ama, tujɔ daa go maa bɛɛ ga mui wo boonu gɔi bɛɛ ga, wogɔ onu nɛ jɔbɔuwɔn.
Emɛ, inɛw kikinu sibɛ go inɛw nawin taŋaai gɔbe, emɛ puu ajubu tutunmɔ wogɔ siyɛmɔi. Kaa kɔɔ wooi nɛ, inɛw gamuu logoro ebe nɛ ajubu wajai sɛin biyaai ye, Ama wogɔ ei daii tatagarado.
Bana biyaai wooi puu, emɛ iye bai dɔɔ oju nɛ emɛ too gɔ, wogɔi dimi yaamɔi.
Ba unrunw, e mui deewin biyɛi. Emɛ giretagurui biyaabɛin. Aiwa, giru taguru kɔɔbe bana le kɛukɛu yoi yaanw gɔbe, e bei yɛnɛi.
Sabu mu kubɔ joo e bɛrɛ tagaaginaabɔn, iyaa kanɛ giridii le e bɛrɛ pilemaa sɔɔuwɔn: Inɛw joo yɔɔin, be Kirisito baga jai jaŋuw gin’ yoi yaauwɔin.
Be suiyi oju nɛ toin. Bɛrɛ bemɛ gɔ ama bemɛi biyaai. Be kijɛ dɛi dɔgɔ le be biyɛun jaan gɔ dɛi kuu ulo le wɔin. Iyaa, be aduna ɔn kijɛ ajubu sai le wɔin.
Emɛ kai, emi alagala diinɛ unrunwin. Yabanɛ alagala goo ye wɛɛido gɔi emɛ kinɛ ɔgu le dɔmiyaan wɔin. Wogɔ Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisitoi.
Gɔnrɔn kijɛ wooi unrun le wo tubiyemɔjɛ gɔ le, wo goju peere emɛ gɔ dulomu ye goju doorojɛ womɔ gɔ gin’ bobojodo.
Kɔɔ gin’ ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, inɛw dadaaru le saii mu wɔɔ gɔbe, inɛw dɛi kinɛ ma ɛɛliyaa wɔɔ gɔbe, e inɛw dɛi kuu ma unɔu mu wɔɔ gɔbe, Inɛw Baŋa nɛ ɛɛn go bana iŋiyɛun e jaan kɔɔ woi.
Ewodi lee, Sintise lee, mu e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔ e Inɛw Baŋa nɛ tunmɔ le jamu le biyɛi.

U kanran, u birɛbirɛnɛ mu bɔɔnɛ sɔɔ turu baŋa gɔ, uwaa yaanw kɔɔbei bara ga ibɛɛ wɔun, sabu, inɛw bɛrɛ Kibɛru Ɛju waaju gɔ taga ga, be mu le bariyaa jai jaiyaabɛin. Iyaa be birɛ kɔɔ dɛi Kilema lee, inɛw birɛbirɛnw mu bɔɔnw wajabe lee le kanran bariyaabɛin. Inɛw kɔɔbe puu ɔnmɔ dɔn gɔ nɛ boi bemɛ tɔŋi wɔɔ.
Ei Inɛw Baŋa mɔi dɛi waaru wooi kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔi. Mu gimaa sɔɔuwɔn, kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔi.
E inɛw wooi bɛrɛ kinɛ kaalu ebe gɔi jugɔmɔi. Inɛw Baŋa wɛɛgu gɔ bɛrii wɔɔ.
Kijɛ turu kanran dɛi diyɛdai le biyɛnɔugi. Kaa, kijɛ wooi dɛi, kai e sɛɛ gɔ, gɛɛn nɛ Ama bɛrɛ tagai. Waaru wo bɛrɛ kijɛ e gɛɛnjɛ wooi, woi birɛpoo tagai.
Kunrin, Ama jamu obojɛ gɔ, inɛw paamukanrun dɛi sigɛ wɔɔ gɔ, kinɛ ebe lee, hakilɛ ebe lee, Kirisito Yesu nɛ sɛɛu gɛgɛliyɛdo.

Nɛɛ, ba unrunw, sɔɔ dumɔrɔn ma gɔ unwɔ: Kijɛ boi ɛju sɛɛ wooi lee, kijɛ sɔmu wo le dagaa wɔɔ wooi lee, tiyɛ gɔ kijɛ narain wɔɔ baba sɛɛ, teitai wɔɔ, ɛjaa wɔɔ, ɛjii wɔɔ, inɛw wooi kinɛ aajɛ gɔ, e kijɛ kɔɔbe puu ajubu le biyɛi.
Kijɛ e bɛrɛ mu deeru gɔ lee, mu le e bɛi gɔ lee, kijɛ sɔɔu mu wɔu e ɛgu gɔ lee, kijɛ kanraun mu wɔu e iye gɔ lee kanrain. Kunrin, Ama, jamu obonɛ gɔ e le bibiyɛdo.

Mui Inɛw Baŋa mɔi dɛi kinɛ gaai ɛɛliyɛmɔuwɔn. Sabu waaru joo onu nɛ, e iyaa lee pilemaa mai ma yasin ga kanraan tagaraabei. Ebaa mai ma sii gɔi pajaatiyaabei gɛɛlun, kaa e bana wogɔ tagaraun bɛɛli beei.
Kai le wɔun dɛi mu wogɔ gɛɛu wɔlɔn. Sabu kijɛ mu bɛrɛ dɔɔjɛ puu nɛ kinɛ ma aai biyɛ ga mu wogɔ le wɛɛjiyaa wɔun.

Mu dɛgu le bana biyɛɲu igii wɔun, kijɛ joo le bana biyɛɲu igii wɔun. Kijɛ kayaɲu yasɔn ma, giyɛ le wɔun ma, kijɛ joo yasɔn wee, mui baalu wee, yalu wooi nɛ, waaru wooi, mu bana sɛɛu biyɛun jaan deyaa wɔun.
Kirisito mui paŋa obojɛ gɔ digɛu, mu kijɛ wooi kanrun bɛbɛɛdɔn.
Yinkanran, ɔɲɛ nɛ waaru mu tobe le mui e baru gɔ, wogɔ sɔɔ ɛjui.

Pilipi bɛɛnw, e kuu ebe le bana e igu gin’: Waaru Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ logoro ebe nɛ tagu tɔlin le, Maseduanɛ nɛ gowaa waaru mu yai le, ei laa ye Ama inɛw mɔɔnu mui baru turu kanran wɔlɔ. Ei laa ye, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu turu kanran kɛɛlɛ sin obu mu bɛrɛ obu wɔlɔ.
Kunrin waaru Tesalonike nɛ mu bee le, e kubɔ turu dɛi sigɛ kijɛ kai ma kilɛido mu bɛrɛ tiyaabei.
Mu sin obu ebe tee dɛnɛɛlɔn, kaa kijɛ mu dɛnɛjɛ gɔ, wogɔ Ama, sin obu ebe dɛi ei sigɛ le duba wo kanraindo gɔi.

Kijɛ mu bɛrɛ e tii gɔ puu mu bɛrɛ dɔwaai, wogɔ kai ma dɛi gaa. Epaporodite numɔ nɛ kijɛ kunaa e tii gɔ waaru mu bɛrɛ dɔi le, kijɛ sɛbele mu bee turu kanran bele. Sin obu wogɔbe kijɛ jiɲu ɛjui, sadaga Ama yabaajɛi, wogɔ le kinɛ womɔ aa wɔɔ.
Kirisito Yesu nɛ arusɛgɛ dooro sɛɛ womɔ le kɛukɛu, Ama ma kai ebe wooi kikilɛdo.
Boi sɔmu gɔ asuu nasuu Ama emɛ Ba mɔi biyɛmɔ. Amina.
Ama inɛw, Kirisito Yesu mɔi wɔin gɔbe puu bemaa poo poo wa. Ba unrunw ɔn nɛ mu le wɔin gɔbe ei poonɔuwɔin.
Ama inɛw, ɔn nɛ wɔin gɔbe puu ei poonɔuwɔin. Sigiyaa, Rɔmɛ ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ ginrun gonɔ inɛw ei poonɔuwɔin.
Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito nɛɛma gɔ e le biyɛ.
Mu Pɔlu, Ama diŋɛ le Kirisito Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui wɔɔ gɔ lee, emɛ bainɛ Timɔte lee,
Ama inɛw Kirisito nɛ ba unrunw sɔɔ turu bɛɛnw, Kɔlɔse ana nɛ wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ lɛtɛrɛ ɔn tiiuwɔin. Ama emɛ Ba e bɛrɛ nɛɛma lee, jamu lee obo.
Emɛ e dɛi Ama gɛɛnnu, waaru puu Ama, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito Ba gɔi birɛpoo tagauwɔin.
Inge dɛi ma giyaa ye, emɛ, Kirisito Yesu nɛ gagawu e sɛɛ gɔ lee, Ama inɛw dɛi ihibɛ e sɛɛ gɔ lee kibɛru ɛgaabɛin.
Naran sɔɔ, Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ, e bɛrɛ waaru kubɔ pɔlɔ gɔ wo dɔi le, alagala nɛ kijɛ e dɛi wɔɔ diyɛdɔn gɔ e bɛrɛ jugɔmaabe dɛi, e gagawu kɔɔ lee, ihibɛ kɔɔ lee sɛi.
Kibɛru Ɛju kɔɔ e bɛrɛ dɔi gin’, aduna puu nɛ ginaa narinyaan bariyɛu yaauwɔ. E sibɛ nɛ kanran, bai pɔlɔ Ama nɛɛma sɔɔ ɛgaa, naran womɔ e jugɔ le baa, Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ kunrin bariyɛu yaauwɔ.
Birɛbirɛnɛ ibɛ emɛ bɔɔnɛ, Epaparase sɔɔ kɔɔ nɛ ei wo deeru. Wo Kirisito birɛbirɛnɛ sɔɔ turu baŋai. E dɛi birɛuwɔ.
Ama Kikinu ihibɛ e nɛ kunaa sɛɛ gɔ, wo emɛ bɛrɛ tagaabe.
Emɛ kanran kodigɛu, kibɛru ebe emɛ ɛgu nɛ, e dɛi Ama gɛɛn pajanɛ. Ebaa Ama Kikinu hakilɛ obojɛ gɔ puu lee, paamu kanrun obojɛ gɔ puu lee digɛnu, Ama diŋɛ jugu le jooi biyɛ ga emɛ gɛɛunwɔin.
Ebaa Inɛw Baŋa bɛrɛ aŋai dagaa gin’ yoi yaa ga, kijɛ puu nɛ kinɛ womɔ aamɔ bɛɛ ga, emɛ kodɛi gɛɛnɲu. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, e birɛ ɛju puu bibirɛdei, Amai jugu ebe bariyɛ bariyɛ yaado.
Ama, gɔnrɔn womɔ, dooro le wɔɔ gɔ le kijɛ wooi nɛ ei paŋa obo ye, kijɛ puu tari ye muyɔn e bɛɛmɔ.
Kinɛ ɛɛli le Ba Amai birɛpoo tagai. Ebaa wijɛ diinɛ gɔ nɛ, Ama inɛw kɛn nɛ gamulu bɛɛ ga e bɛrɛ gɔnrɔn obu baŋa gɔ woi.
Wo ɔlɔ paŋa nɛ emi ɛlaa, Aini ibɛ womɔ diinɛ nɛ emi gaanaabe.
Aini wogɔ le emɛ kuu goonu biyaa, hakɛ yaabu kanrun biyaaɲu.
Ama iyemɔɔlɛ gɔ, Kirisito nɛ iyemɔjɛ. Wo Aini pɔlɔi, kijɛ maŋaaɲu puu kuu nɛ wɔɔ.
Sabu kijɛ puu wo le maŋi: Alagala kijɛ ma, minɛ kijɛ ma, kijɛ iyemɔjɛ ma, iyemɔɔlɛ, ɔgɔbe gin’ ma, laamube gin’ ma, kuu bɛɛnw gin’ ma, paŋa gin’ ma, kijɛ puu wo le maŋi, wo dɛi maŋi.
Kijɛ puu biyɛmɔ nɛ wo yabe. Kijɛ puu wo kɔrumɔ le sɛɛu biyaa wɔin.
Goju gɔ kuu woi. Goju gɔ Ama inɛw mɔɔnui. Ɔnmɔ kana gɔ wo nɛ tɔlɔjɛ. Kijɛ puu nɛ girui biyɛ ga, wo yiunbe logoro nɛ Aini pɔlɔi bulu.
Sabu, Ama sɛɛu kibaa, Aini womɔ nɛ toiyo ga wo bɛrɛ ɛjii biyaai.
Iyaa Aini gɔ le digɛnu, kijɛ puu, minɛ kijɛ ma, alagala kijɛ ma, unrun le mɔɔnɔ ga Ama bɛrɛ ɛjii biyaai. Aini gɔ ili baga jai nɛ togi gɔ le, Ama jamu jɛɛlaa, kunrin kijɛ puu unrun le mɔɔnu.
E kanran, pɔɔlɔ e Ama sibɛ go inɛw yerunwin bɛin. Iyaa ajubu mɔɲu ebe lee, birɛ mɔɲu ebe lee dɛi e jaŋuw womɔi bɛin.
Kaa kanɛ Ama, ei giru unrunmɔ nɛ ɛjaai, lɔgɔ tarala, jarugu sɛlɛ bojo ga, Aini womɔ inɛi taŋaa goju wo jeɲu yiun gɔ le ei unrun le mɔɔnaati.

Kaa Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ, alagala doɲu nɛ inɛw toin puu bɛrɛ Kibɛru Ɛju waaju tagin gɔ, mu Pɔlu, Kibɛru Ɛju dɛi birɛbirɛnɛi biyaa mu wɔɔ gɔ, Kibɛru Ɛju e ɛgu wogɔ e bɛrɛ diyɛdɔn obu gɔ nɛ jigelu go, gagawu nɛ duu ebe daanaa ye, ɛɛn go e biyɛun jaain wɔɔ.
Kanɛ e dɛi ɔɲɛ mu bɛɛjɛ gɔ, kinɛ ɛɛli ma konɛ too. Sabu Kirisitoi ɔɲɔmu nɛ kijɛ wajaai gɔ, mu wogɔ goju womɔ, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu dɛi, goju ma nɛ kibemɔuwɔn.
Ama sɔɔ sɛɛu kibaa e bɛrɛ taga ga, bana Ama, mu bɛrɛ sagu wo duuru le kɛukɛu, mu Ama inɛw mɔɔnu birɛbirɛnɛi biyaa wɔun.
Tiyɛ gɔ sɔɔ boŋurun asuu inɛw wooi bɛrɛ babaŋa bee gɔ dɛi mu birɛuwɔn. Kaa Ama kanɛ, inɛw womɔ bɛrɛ jugɔmaajɛ.

Sabu inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain sibɛ go sɔɔ boŋurun kɔɔ arusɛgɛ le bana jowaa wo wɔɔ gɔ lee, bana dooro le wo wɔɔ gɔ lee, inɛw womɔ bɛrɛ jugɔmɔ ga Ama bɛrɛ ɛjii biyaai. Sɔɔ boŋurun wogɔ unwɔ: Kirisito e nɛ yato. Iyaa wo e bɛrɛ Ama dooro bɛi diyɛdɔn obaajɛ.
Waaju emɛ nɛ, emɛ Kirisito wogɔ sɔɔi sɔɔɲu. Inɛw puu Kirisito nɛ, inɛw kibaain, Ama giru nɛ tagara ga, emɛ inɛwin hakilɛ puu le tinwɛnrɛunwɔin, deereuwɔin.
Sɔɔ nɛ giru dɛɛraa, birɛ birɛu, Kirisito gɔnrɔn paŋa mu nɛ birɛjɛ gɔ sabu dɛi jai jaiyɛu mu wɔɔ gɔ, kɔɔ woi.
Mu e lee, Laodise ana bɛɛnw lee, inɛw nimɛ giru le giru le mui iyetɛnɛ gɔbe lee dɛi jai diyɛ mu jaiyɛuwɔ gɔ ebaa jugɔ ga ibɛɛ wɔun.
E puu waa kinɛ kaalu bɛɛ ga, ihibɛ nɛ turui biyɛ ga, iyaa paamu kanrun tɔitɔi diyɛdɔn obojɛ gɔ le jooi biyɛ ga mu jaiyɛuwɔn. E kunrin Ama sɔɔ boŋurun gɔ jujugɔdɛin. Wogɔ Kirisito woi.
Ama hakilɛ lee, Ama jugɔ lee nɛ tinɛ diyɛ too gɔ puu wo nɛ baŋiyaan wɔɔ.
Inɛ turu kanran sɔɔ ɛɛlu le ei lelemɔnɔu ga mu kɔɔ sɔɔuwɔn.
Sabu halu mu goju le e le wɔlɔn kanran, kikinu sibɛ go e le yɔɔun. Bana oju le sɔɔ e kanranjɛ gɔ lee, Kirisito nɛ gagawu ebe bana ɛɛn go wɔɔ gɔ lee yɛnɛu, mu kinɛ ɛɛli le wɔun.
Kirisito Yesui Inɛw Baŋa ebei ga e yabu le kɛukɛu, kunrin wo nɛ toiyo ye yoi ebe yaai.
Duu ebe wo nɛ sibaa, ɛɛn go daanaa ye bariyɛi. E bɛrɛ bana deerin le kɛukɛu, gagawu nɛ ɛɛn go biyɛ biyɛ yaai, Amai birɛpoo tagu nɛ maai biyɛi.
Inɛ turu bɛrɛ kanran inɛw hakilɛ sɔɔ, sɔɔ koolo inɛ lelemu gɔ le ei aamɔnɔugi. Wogɔ inɛw atɛmu deeru lee, aduna ɔn kijɛ paŋagunw iyemɔɔlɛ gɔbe lee nɛ goojɛ. Kirisito sɔɔi laa.
Sabu Ama bana, sɛɛu kibaa, goju le Kirisito nɛ yato.
Iyaa wo nɛ e yaa kijɛ puu kibaa yasɛi. Wo kuui bii puu lee, paŋa puu lee kuu nɛ daan.
Iyaa wo nɛ ei araa nɔɔmaabɛin. Araa nɔɔmu inɛw numɔ le kanranɲu gɔi laa, kaa Kirisito araa nɔɔmu, gojunawan hakɛgu le ei kabiyɛmɔjɛ gɔi.
Bana wɔɔ le kɛukɛu, batise e yoi gɔ le digɛu, Kirisito yiun gɔ lee, e lee tunmɔ go bojin. Iyaa e tunmɔ go bulaai, sabu Ama gɔnrɔn, Kirisitoi yiun logoro nɛ bulomu gɔ le e gawaabei.
Hakɛ ebe lee, gojunawan hakɛgu ebe araa nɔɔla gɔ lee dɛi, e yinwaan yaabei. Kaa Ama, Kirisito le ei ɔnmɔi bojaati. Wo hakɛ emɛ puu yaabu kanraanti.
Yoru emɛ tɔŋaa duunaaɲu gɔ, tɔɔru bemɛ le, emɛ le jaiyɛubɛin gɔbe, Ama, wogɔ sujaa goonaati. Wo wogɔ baga jai nɛ pɛgaa, niwɛn tolo bojaati.
Wo baga jai gɔ le, kuu bɛɛnw iyemɔɔlɛ gɔbe lee, paŋagunw iyemɔɔlɛ gɔbe lee kuu nɛ gɔnrɔn biyaa, paŋa bemɛ donugaa, inɛw puu giru nɛ bei tagaraabe.
Kunrin, kijɛ e kayajɛ dɛi ma, e nɔɔjɛ dɛi ma, bai diyɛbe sɔɔ dɛi ma, iyepilu kana sɔɔ dɛi ma, deeliye bai sɔɔ dɛi ma, inɛ turu bɛrɛ kanran wogɔbe dɛi kuu ebe nɛ sɔɔ sɔɔmɔnɔugi.
Kɔɔbe puu kijɛ wɛɛido kikinɛi sai. Tɔitɔi gɔ Kirisitoi.

Inɛ aai kanran, kuu sunugu kakalugu ma, mɛlɛnkɛbe demɛniyɛnmu ma sɔɔ nɛ kuu kunaa sɛɛ bɛrɛ ei biɲɛ ye tujɔ ebe ɛlɛmɔnɔugi. Inɛ kɔɔ tunmɔ kuu iye womɔ nɛ diyɛ daanajɛ. Adama ii hakilɛ koolo dɛi kuu womɔ unaa wɔɔ.
Wo goju kuu, Kirisito le digiyɛɛlɛ. Goju gɔ puu, Kirisito kɔrumɔ le pana bɛɛu, digu digu gɔbe lee, wolu gɔbe lee digɛu, sɛɛu tunmɔ aa gɛliyaa, Ama diŋɛ le kɛukɛu gabiyɛuwɔ.
E Kirisito le tunmɔ go yinwin dɛi, aduna ɔn kijɛ paŋagunw iyemɔɔlɛ gɔbe sɔɔ nɛ gowaai bai, ei aduna mɔi gin’, ɔn jeɲɛnɔu, ɔn nɛwɛnnɔu, ɔn tabanɔu tɔɔru, inge dɛi kuu ebe nɛ daanamaa wɔi?
Kɔɔbe puu, kai nɛ kunaa ye dogo yaajɛ. Kɔɔbe Adama unrunw tɔɔrui, deeru bemɛi.

Narain, Ama demɛniyɛnmu sɔɔ kuu bemɛ le be yegeraajɛ nɛ inɛw bana kuu obaa sɛin lee, kuu sunugu le bana be wɔɔ lee, goju bemɛ nɛ ɔɲɛ bana be tagarajɛ lee yɛnaa ye, tɔɔru kɔɔbe nɛ hakilɛ sɔɔ yato gin’ wɔɔ. Kaa gojunawan hakɛgu dadaaru tɛŋu sibɛ go, niwɛn turu kanran sɛnɛ.
E Kirisito le tunmɔ go bului dɛi, daa kijɛ gɔbe dɛnɛi. Kirisito konɛ Ama numɔ iin sibɛ nɛ yadaan.
Ajubu ebe daa kijɛ gɔbe nɛ bojoi, minɛ kijɛ nɛ bojonɔugi.
Sabu ei yinwaain. Iyaa ɔnmɔ ebe Kirisito le Ama nɛ yabaŋa.
Kirisito, ɔnmɔ ebe gɔ woi. Wo waaru unruin wo tagaraajɛ, ei yaa wo le dooro gɔ nɛ tatagaradɛin.
Aduna jige e nɛ too gɔ daitii. Tiyɛ gɔ sala lee, lɔgɔji lee, gojunawan ihibɛ lee, dadaaru mɔɲu lee, girukakala leei. Girukakala gɔ ɔmɔlɔ bulu le kɛkɛu.
Sɔɔ kɔɔbe dɛi Ama kinɛbanrun, inɛw sɔɔ yabaanɛbe kuu nɛ sugojɛ.
Pɔɔlɔ waaru hakɛ kɔɔbe nɛ e tobe le, e kɔɔ gin’ yoi yaaubei.
Kaa kanɛ e kanran ɔnbe puu pajai: Kinɛbanrun, kinɛ ingelemu, mɔmɔɲu. Boi yamulu ma, sɔɔ mɔɲu turu kanran aŋa ebe nɛ goomɔnɔugi.
Tunmɔ bɛrɛ kakalu maŋanɔugi. Sabu e jige pɛi gɔ lee, birɛ womɔ lee e nɛ goonaatiyaa,
jige kana gɔ e nɛ kunaa wɔi. Wogɔ inɛ kana, Amai jugu nɛ kibaai biyɛ ga kanai taŋa taŋa yaau, woi maŋanɛ gin’ tee biyɛuwɔ.

Wogɔ nɛ Yahutunw tɔgui ma, Yahutunw tɔgui laa ma sɔɔ wɔlɔ. Araa nɔwaan ma, araa nɔɔlu ma sɔɔ wɔlɔ, inɛw yerube ma, olu inɛw ma sɔɔ wɔlɔ, gunɔ tolo ma gunɔnɛ ma sɔɔ wɔlɔ, kaa puu Kirisitoi, puu nɛ woi too.
Ei Ama inɛw yɛmaajɛbei, Ama ei dɛiin bojaa, inɛw ibɛ womɔbei bojaabe. Kodigɛu, amasɔgɔjugɔ lee, ɛjii bii lee, kuu sunugu lee, tɛgɛ sɛlɛ lee, muyɔn lee, kɔɔbe e nɛ kunɔi.
Tunmɔ sɔɔ kanran muyɔin. Inɛ turu inɛ waja le sɔɔ yasɛ ye, e tunmɔ yaabu kanrain. Inɛw Baŋa ei bana yaabu kanrun gin’, e kanran tunmɔ yaabu kanrain.
Kaa kɔɔbe wooi kuu nɛ ihibɛ le biyɛi. Kibaai bii pagu gɔ woi.
Kirisito, jamu obojɛ gɔ kinɛ ebe kuu baŋai biyɛmɔi. Jamu wogɔ dɛi Ama ei boonaa goju turu bojaabe. Birɛpoo tagai.

Kirisito sɔɔ gɔ, arusɛgɛ womɔ wooi le e nɛ toiyomɔi. Hakilɛ wooi le tunmɔ deerei, tunmɔ tinwɛnrɛin. Kinɛ ebe wooi le Ama bɛrɛ birɛpoo tagu nii nii. Wogɔ Ama sɔmu lee, Ama nii lee, nii Kikinu nɛ goojɛ lee le kanrain.
Kijɛ ingei kanran e kanranjɛ wooi, sɔɔ nɛ ma, birɛ nɛ ma, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu boi le kanrain. Wo le digɛnu Ba Amai birɛpoo taganu kanrain.
E yaanw gɔbe, Inɛw Baŋa nɛ bana dagaa gin’, e igɛbe le tubiyei.
E igɛnw gɔbe, yaanw ebe ibɛi biyɛi. Be le gaari biyɛnɔugi.
E unrunw gɔbe, kijɛ wooi nɛ ei naranw gɔbe sɔɔ yabai. Inɛw Baŋa nɛ wogɔ ɛɛli wɔɔ.
E banw gɔbe, unrunw ebe kinɛ yanwannɔu giye, kinɛ bemɛ jinwɛnmɔnɔugi.
E gunɔw gɔbe, kijɛ puu nɛ inɛw e baŋabe sɔɔ yabai. Kinɛ bemɛ aamɔdei gin’ giru bemɛ nɛ sai wogɔ gin’ biyɛnɔugi. Kaa kinɛpilu le Inɛw Baŋa giri liyɛ dɛi kanrain.
Birɛ ingei kanran e birɛjɛ puu, kinɛ ebe wooi le Inɛw Baŋa mɔi gin’ kanrain. Inɛw mɔi gin’ kanrannɔugi.
Jugɔi, e Inɛw Baŋa bɛrɛ kɛn gɔ tujɔi go bɛbɛɛdei. Kuu Baŋa dɛi birɛ birɛu e wɔɔ gɔ, naran go Kirisitoi.
Inɛ teitai laa le birɛ birɛjɛ gɔ, teitai laa womɔ le woi tujɔdɛin, sabu inɛ kabu kunu sɔɔ wɔlɔ.
E gunɔw bɛɛnw gɔbe, e kanran alagala nɛ e baŋa yɔɔ igii wɔi digɛu, gunɔw ebe le teitaii biyɛi, aŋai jaan gin’ biyɛi.
Amagɛɛn nɛ mainiyɛin. Wogɔ le kaba kanranlu go, Ama bɛrɛ birɛpoo tagu le Ama gɛɛin.
Iyaa Ama sɔɔ tagu dɛi, Ama, emɛ bɛrɛ taan pinulu ye, emaa Kirisito sɔɔ boŋurun gɔ taga bɛɛ ga emɛ dɛi kanran Ama gɛɛin. Mu sɔɔ boŋurun wogɔ dɛi kaju nɛ toun.
Maa daii bana sɔɔun mu jaan gin’ sɔɔ bɛɛ ga mu dɛi Ama gɛɛin.
Inɛw jaŋu unrunwin laain sibɛ go yoiyaara ebe nɛ hakilɛ le biyɛi. Waaru koturu kanran kuu ebe nɛ galamɔnɔugi.
Inɛw puu aŋa bana ɛju saaɲu gɔ ebaa jugɔ ga, waaru puu sɔɔ ebe nɛɛma wo siyɛmɔi, nɛu wo toiyomɔi.
Bainɛ ibɛ emɛ Tisike, Inɛw Baŋa birɛbirɛnɛ mu bɔɔnɛ sɔɔ turu baŋai wɔɔ gɔ, kibɛru ma puu e bɛrɛ tatagado.
Womaa bana emɛ wɔɔ e bɛrɛ jugɔmɔ ye, kinɛ ebe kaaliyɛmɔ ga, mu wogɔ dɛi tee woi e bɛrɛ tiiuwɔn.
Bainɛ ibɛ emɛ sɔɔ turu baŋai wɔɔ, Onɛsimɛ, ebe bɛɛnnɛ gɔ, woi wo le tiiuwɔn. Ɔn nɛ sɔɔ biyɛu wɔɔ kibɛru puu, be e bɛrɛ tatagadɛin.
Arisutaruke, kajuginɛ mu bɔɔnɛ gɔ ei poonɔuwɔ. Barunabasu bainɛ, Maruka yaa ei poonɔuwɔ. Wo dɛi e bɛrɛ tɔɔru obaabɛin. Wo e bɛrɛ wiyaa dɔwaai ye, woi ɛjii sɛgɛrɛi.
Yesu, Jusutusu boonɔɲu gɔ yaa ei poonɔuwɔ. Yahutunw logoro nɛ inɛw kɔɔbe sai mu le bariyaa, Ama diinɛ birɛ birɛuwɔin. Be mu bɛrɛ kinɛ kaalu diyɛ obaabɛin.

Kirisito Yesu birɛbirɛnɛ, Epaparase, ebe bɛɛnnɛ gɔ ei poonɔuwɔ. Wo waaru puu e dɛi amagɛɛn nɛ ɛjii iŋiyaan gɛɛunwɔ. Ebaa ɛɛn go iŋiyɛn ga, kibaain biyɛ ga, iyaa Ama diŋɛ kanran ga sɛɛu kuu ebe obo ga wo e dɛi Ama gɛɛunwɔ.
Wo e lee, Laodise ana bɛɛnw lee, Hierapolise ana bɛɛnw lee dɛi ɛjii ɔɲɔuwɔ ga mu sɛɛrɛ wogɔ goo bɛbɛɛdɔn.
Jɔŋujɔŋɔnɛ ibɛ emɛ Luka ei poonɔuwɔ. Demasu kanran ei poonɔuwɔ.
Laodise nɛ ba unrunw wɔin gɔbei poonɔi. Nɛpa lee ginrun womɔ nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu wɔɔ gɔ lee yaa poonɔi.
Lɛtɛrɛ ɔn e jaŋaajɛi ye, Laodise bɛɛnw Ama inɛw mɔɔnu nɛ yaa jaŋamɔi. E kanran Laodise goi ye lɛtɛrɛ e bɛrɛ wɛɛido gɔ jaŋai.
Arusipe bɛrɛ tagai, womaa Inɛw Baŋa birɛ wo bɛrɛ gawurin gɔ, wogɔ kajubaa ye ɛjii birɛ donugo wa.
Sɔɔ ɔnbe mu numɔ ma le mu tɔŋɔuwɔ: Mu Pɔlu ei poonɔuwɔn. Mu kaju nɛ toun ga naŋanɔugi. Ama nɛɛma gɔ e le biyɛ.

E inɛw Tesalonike ana nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu nɛ toin gɔbe, e inɛw Ba Ama lee, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito lee mɔi wɔin gɔbe, mu Pɔlu lee, iyaa Silasu lee, Timɔte lee, emɛ lɛtɛrɛ ɔn e bɛrɛ tɔŋaa tiiuwɔin. Nɛɛma lee, jamu lee e le biyɛmɔ.
Emɛ e puu dɛi, waaru wooi Amai birɛpoo tagauwɔin. Iyaa waaru Ama emɛ gɛɛnjɛ wooi, emɛ e dɛi wo bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔin.
Gagawu ebe dɛi birɛ e birɛjɛ gɔ lee, ihibɛ ebe dɛi birɛ diyɛ e birɛjɛ gɔ lee, iyaa Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito nɛ diyɛ ebe bana ɛɛn go daan gɔ, emɛ waaru wooi, emɛ Ba Ama giru nɛ naŋaranɲu.
Ba unrunw, emɛ igii wɔin, Ama ei ibɛi biyaa, ei unrunmɔi biyɛ ga yɛmaabe.

Emɛ Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ gɔ e bɛrɛ tagaabɛin. Wogɔ, aŋa sɔɔi sai biyɛlu. Kaa Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ, gɔnrɔn diyɛ lee, Kikinu Pilu baru lee iyaa Kibɛru Ɛju wogɔ naran tɔitɔi ga emɛ gawaa wɔin dɛi e bɛrɛ tagaabɛin. Emɛ e sabu dɛi logoro ebe nɛ bana emɛ bee gɔ e igii wɔi.
E emi lee, iyaa Inɛw Baŋa lee deewin biyaabei. Iyaa ei ɛjii ɔɲaabe kanran, e Inɛw Baŋa Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ, kinɛ ɛɛlu Kikinu Pilu nɛ goo ye bɛɛmɔjɛ gɔ le yabaabei.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Maseduanɛ gana nɛ lee, Akayi gana nɛ lee inɛw gawaa wɔin gɔbe puu giru nɛ ei giretagurui biyaai.
Kunrin Inɛw Baŋa sɔɔ gɔ e le digɛu, Maseduanɛ nɛ lee, Akayi nɛ lee sai ginɛlu, kaa gagawu ebe kibɛru gɔ yalu wooi nɛ dɔwaai. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi emɛ sɔɔ turu kanran sɔɔnu doori ga wɔin.
Ei yɛnɛi emɛ wɛɛ le, bana emi e sɛguru gɔ sɔɔ, inɛw kɔɔbe kuu bemɛ le sɔɔuwɔin. Bana ɔmɔlɔ gɔbe pajaatiyaa, Ama ɔnmɔi wɔɔ gɔ, Ama tɔitɔi gɔ demɛniyɛnmɔ ga, wo le bana e tubi sɔɔ sɔɔuwɔin.
Iyaa, Aini womɔ Yesui yiun nɛ wo bulomu gɔ, alagala goo ye wo wɛɛido gɔ dɔmiyaan e wɔɔ gɔ sɔɔ sɔɔuwɔin. Wogɔ baŋa gɔ, Ama kinɛbanrun bɛrii wɛɛido gɔ nɛ emi yabanɛ gɔ woi.
Ba unrunw, e bɛrɛ emɛ wɛɛ gɔ sɔɔ tiyɛ sɛlɛi biyɛlu ga e kuu ebe le igii wɔi.

Tesalonike ana nɛ, e bɛrɛ emɛ wɛɛmɔ nɛ, bana Pilipi ana nɛ inɛw emi be ɔɲɔmu gɔ lee, emi be duyi gɔ lee, e wogɔ igii wɔi. Halu jai diyɛ yabe kanran, e bɛrɛ Kibɛru Ɛju wo bɛrɛ goojɛ gɔ taga ga, Ama emɛ gɔ emi anrangaju obaabe.
Sabu waaju emɛ gɔ nɛ lelemu sɔɔ tolo, ajubu lɔguju tolo, iyaa nabara sɔɔ yaa tolo.

Kaa Ama bana ibɛ gin’ emɛ sɔɔuwɔin. Sabu Ama Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ taga ga emɛ le jaain wɔɔ dɛi, wo wogɔ sagu emɛ bɛrɛ gawaraabe. Emɛ, inɛ kinɛ aamɔ ga dɛnɛɛnɛ, kaa Ama kinɛ aamɔ ibɛɛ wɔin. Wo kinɛ emɛ lubo lubo yɛnɛuwɔ.
E igii wɔi, emɛ sɔmu ma, sɔɔ emɛ sɔi nɛ kɛɛlɛ dɛnu dadaaru baŋaran ma, emɛ kanrannɛ. Wogɔ nɛ, Ama wo sɛɛrɛ emɛi.

Halu, emi Kirisito jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲui dɛi, paŋa emɛ e bɛrɛ dɔɔnu bɛbɛɛbɛin kanran, emɛ inɛw emi sɔmɔ ga dɛnɛnɛ. E ma, inɛw leebe ma, emi sɔmɔ ga emɛ dɛnɛnɛ. Kaa waaru logoro ebe nɛ emɛ tobe le, bana nanɛ unrunw womɔ ɛjii kajubajɛ gin’, emɛ e le tɛgɛ sɛlɛ le biyaabɛin.
Emɛ ei saii ibɛɛ bɛin dɛi, ei kinɛ emɛ nɛ paa wɔin dɛi, emɛ Kibɛru Ɛju Ama bɛrɛ goi gɔ e bɛrɛ obu ibɛɛ bɛin sai laa, kaa iyaa kinrun emɛ kanran obu ibɛɛ bɛin.

Ba unrunw, e naran go ɔɲɛ emɛ lee, birɛ kirɛ emɛ iyi gɔ lee naŋali. Waaru Kibɛru Ɛju Ama bɛrɛ goi gɔ e bɛrɛ emɛ tagau bee le, emɛ inɛ turu kanran bɛrɛ, logoro ebe nɛ dɔɔi biyɛnɔu ga, aga lee digɛ lee birɛ biraabɛin.
E inɛw gawaa wɔin gɔbe logoro nɛ bana emɛ bee gɔ Ama kinɛ aa bee, teitai bee, lelu turu kanran tobele. E lee, Ama lee sɛɛrɛ goonw emɛi.
E igii wɔi, banɛ aŋai unrunw womɔ le kanranjɛ gin’, emɛ e tuturu bɛrɛ kunrin kanraanbɛin.
Emɛ ei mainiyɛnmaa, diyɛ ebe dɛinyɛnmaabɛin. Iyaa Ama ebaa, diinɛ unrunmɔ nɛ lee, dooro unrunmɔ nɛ lee yoo ga ei boonɔnɛ gɔ, kinɛ womɔ bana aajɛ gin’ kunrin yoi yaa ga, emɛ e bɛrɛ tɔɔraabɛin.

Amai waaru wooi kijɛ dɛi birɛpoo emɛ tagajɛ waja kanran yɔɔ. Waaru Ama sɔɔ e bɛrɛ emɛ tagu le, e keŋiyaan, wogɔ le yabaabei. E wogɔ inɛ sɔɔi gin’ lugoli, kaa Ama sɔɔi ga lugaabei. Wogɔ Ama sɔɔi gɔ yaa narain. Sabu Ama, e inɛw gawaa wɔin gɔbe nɛ birɛ birɛuwɔ.

Ba unrunw, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu Kirisito Yesu nɛ toin, Judea gana nɛ wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ kijɛ dɔi gɔ e bɛrɛ kanran dɔwaabe. Yahutunw bana inɛw kɔɔbei ɔɲɔmi gin’, e ba unrunw gɔbe ɔɲɛ tutunmɔ wogɔ e bɛrɛ dɔɔmaabɛin.
Yahutunw, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu lee, inɛw Ama titiyaanw gɔbe lee daabɛin. Be emi ɛjii ɔɲɔmaabɛin, be Ama kinɛ ɛjii banranmɔuwɔin, bei inɛw puu jaŋuwin.

Be iyaa, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe bɛrɛ emaa waaju be bɛrɛ yayabu obojɛ gɔi taganɔu ga, be emi tɛŋɛ ga mainiyɛunwɔin. Be kɔɔ gin’ hakɛ mɔɔnu waaru wooi be kanrun gɔbe kibemɔuwɔin. Kaa nɛɛ dumɔ gɔ, Ama kinɛbanrun gɔ kuu bemɛ nɛ sugaai.

Emɛ kai, ba unrunw, waaru gaila le emɛ tunmɔ le kabiyaabɛin. Kinɛ emɛ le laa, kaa goju emɛ le tunmɔ le kabin. Kɔɔ onu nɛ, emɛ girupala ebe pilemɛ ye iye ga dadaaru diyɛ le bɛin dɛi, emɛ wogɔ kanrun bɛɛ ga mainiyaanbɛin.
Emɛ e bɛrɛ pilemu yaa ga ibɛɛ bɛin. Mu Pɔlu, e bɛrɛ wɛɛ ga, kubɔ turu dɛi sigɛ kanraan yɛnaabɔn. Kaa Setanu emi tɛŋaabe.
Sabu diyɛdɔn emɛ gɔ lee, kinɛ ɛɛlu emɛ gɔ lee, gɔnrɔn bɛi sɛɛrɛ le kuu emɛ unɔ emɛ bɛɛido gɔ lee, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu waaru unruin wo tagaraido gɔ le, giru womɔ nɛ, inɛw leei laa, kaa ei tee biyɛdo.
Ɔnhɔn, kuu ulo emɛ sɔɔ gɔ lee, kinɛ ɛɛlu emɛ gɔ lee ei.
Nɛɛ kunrin, emɛ ei iyelu go bii gɔ muyaan bɛɛnɛ kanraan, emɛ sai Atɛnɛ ana nɛ biyɛ ga yabaa,

Timɔte, emɛ bainɛ, Kirisito Kibɛru Ɛju tagu Ama birɛ gɔ nɛ emɛ bɔɔnɛ gɔ, e bɛrɛ tiyaabɛin. Logoro ebe nɛ tɔɔɲɔ diyɛ e bɛrɛ dɔɔuwɔ gɔ dɛi inɛ turu kanran kinɛ yanwannɔu dɛi, womaa ei tibemɔ ga, gagawu ebe nɛ womaa ei mainiyɛnmɔ ga, emɛ woi e bɛrɛ tiyaabɛin. E kuu ebe le igii wɔi, tɔɔɲɔ kɔɔbe tunmɔ emɛ bɛrɛ sɔɔ dɔdɔɔdo ga kɛjaa sɛbɛin gɔbei.
Kunrin waaru e le emɛ bee le, emɛ, ɔɲɛ emɛ bɛrɛ dɔdɔɔdo ga e bɛrɛ tagaaginaabɛin. E igii wɔi, kijɛ wogɔi biyaabe.

Kɔɔ sabu dɛi mu ei iyelu go bii gɔ muyaan bɛɛlu kanraan, gagawu ebe bana wɔɔ jugɔ ga, Timɔte e bɛrɛ tiyaabɔn. Setanu, inɛi subɔrɔnɛ gɔ ei susubɔrɔdo ma ga liyaabɔn. Iyaa wogɔ le digɛnu birɛ emɛ, birɛ niwɛn sɛlɛi biyɛnɔu ga mu liyaaun.

Kaa kanɛ Timɔte e bɛrɛ gowaa wiyaai. Wo gagawu ebe dɛi lee, ihibɛ ebe dɛi lee kibɛru ɛju jɛɛlaabe. Ebaa iye bai dɔɔ waaru wooi ihibɛ le emi ajubauwɔi gi, iyaa bana ei iye ga ɛjii daariyaa emɛ wɔɔ gin’, e ɛjii emi iyi dadaaru le wɔi ga emɛ bɛrɛ tagaabe.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, ɔɲɛ emɛ nɛ lee, tɔɔɲɔ emɛ nɛ lee, ba unrunw, emɛ e dɛi kinɛ emɛ kaaliyaai. Kijɛ kinɛ emɛ kaaliyɛmu gɔ, wogɔ gagawu ebei.
E Inɛw Baŋa nɛ ɛjii kinɛ daanu le wɔi dɛi, emɛ naran go kanɛ ɔnmɔi wɔin.
Kanɛ emɛ e dɛi Amai birɛpoo ɛjii tagu bɛbɛɛdɛin. Emɛ e dɛi giru womɔ nɛ kinɛ ɛɛlu emɛ sɛɛ gɔ puu dɛi woi birɛpoo tagauwɔin.
Emaa kuu emɛ le ei pilemu ye iye bɛɛ ga, iyaa gagawu ebe sibɛ go kijɛ dɔɔlu gɔ kibemɔ ga, aga lee digɛ lee, emɛ Ama bɛrɛ ɛjii gɛɛunwɔin.
Ama, wo emɛ Ba gɔ lee, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu lee, emaa ei yɛnɛi yai bɛɛ ga, oju gɔ be yegeremɔ.
Nɛɛ e kai, bana ei emɛ ibɛ gin’, tunmɔ ibɛɛ bii gɔ nɛ lee, inɛw puu ibɛɛ bii gɔ nɛ lee, Ama ei gabiyɛmɔnu, giru jɛyaa.
Kunrin Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu, inɛw womɔi wɔin gɔbe wooi le waaru wo wɛɛido, wo ei gɔnrɔn ohobodo, iyaa emɛ Ba Ama giru nɛ, wo bɛrɛ kuu ebe obu sibɛ go ei jarugusɛlɛ le biyɛmɔdo.

Kɔɔ wooi onu nɛ, ba unrunw, e yoiyaara ebe bana Ama kinɛ aaido gɔ emɛ le deyaabei. Narain, e kanɛ baa bana kanraun e wɔɔ gɔ kɔɔ woi. Iyaa kanɛ ebaa wogɔ dɛi sigɛ kanran ga, emɛ Inɛw Baŋa Yesu boi le e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔin, emɛ gimaa e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔin.
Inɛw Baŋa Yesu, emɛ bɛrɛ tɔɔru obaa ei obo gi gɔbe, e wogɔ igii wɔi.
Ama kijɛ ibɛ gɔ unwɔ: Wo ebaa unrun dɛi dɛiin biyɛ, iyaa sala sɔɔ turu nɛ kanran yoonɔu ga ibɛɛ wɔɔ.
Inɛw Ama inin gɔbe, dadaaru mɔɲu le bana be kanranjɛ gin’ laa, kaa Ama kinɛ bana aajɛ gin’, iyaa, inɛw bɛrɛ bana baba sɛɛ gin’, inɛ tuturu yaanran womɔ le ɛjii biyɛ.
Inɛ turu kanran, yaanw sɔɔ kɔɔ dɛi wo bɔɔnɛ bɛrɛ mɔɲu kanran ma, woi jama ma kanrannɔu. Inɛw Baŋa, inɛw kɔɔ gin’ kanranw gɔbei lalagado ga emɛ laa e bɛrɛ sɔwaabɛin, ei daii tagaaginaabɛin.
Sabu Ama, sala dɛi emi boonɔlu, kaa emaa dɛiin, womɔi biyɛ ga wo emi boonaabe.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi inɛ deeru kɔɔbe le yabalu gɔ, wo inɛ le yabalu kanranlu, kaa Ama, Kikinu Pilu womɔ ei obonɛ gɔ le yabalu kanrun.
Ba unrunw gagawu nɛ e bɔɔnw gɔbe ibɛɛ bii sibɛ go e bɛrɛ dɔn tɔŋu ye tiinu doori. Sabu Ama ebaa tunmɔi ibɛɛ biyɛ ga ei deeraabe.
Iyaa e ba unrunw Maseduanɛ gana puu nɛ wɔin gɔbe wooi, e bei yaa ibɛɛ wɔi. Kaa emɛ e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔin, ba unrunw, e nimɛ kanran wogɔ dɛi sigɛ kanrain.
Bana ebaa kanran ga laa baa emɛ tɔɔru gin’, e maini ye jamu le biyɛi, inɛw wajunw sɔɔ nɛ yoonɔugi, kuu ebe le birɛ birɛi.
Kɔɔ gin’, inɛw Yesu le gawaa wɔnɛ gɔbe, ei bababadɛin. Iyaa inɛ turu kanran bɛrɛ ei dɔɔi biyɛidolo.
Ba unrunw, inɛw Ama le bii diyɛdɔn sɛnɛ gɔbe aŋai kinɛ jiun le biyɛɲu gin’ ebaa biyɛnɔu ga, inɛw yinwaan wɔin gɔbe sibɛ go ebaa naran gɔ jugɔ ga emɛ ibɛɛ wɔin.
Sabu emɛ Yesu yinwaan bulaai ga gawaa wɔin. Inɛw Yesu le gawaa wɔu yinwin gɔbe kanran, Ama bei Yesu le bubulugodo ga emɛ gawaa wɔin.
Sɔɔ e bɛrɛ sɔɔi emɛ do ɔn Inɛw Baŋa deeraabe. Inɛw Baŋa bai wɛɛido, emɛ inɛw ɔnmɔi wɔin gɔbe, inɛw yinwaan diin gɔbe giru nɛ galaidenɛ.

Sabu, Ama mii diyɛ tɔɔru obu lee, mɛlɛnkɛbe puu kuu baŋa mii lee, Ama kaan mii gɔ lee waaru ɛgɛmaajɛ, Inɛw Baŋa, kuu womɔ le alagala goo ye susugodo. Inɛw Kirisito le gawaa wɔu yinwɛnw gɔbe laa bubulodɛin.
Kɔɔ onu nɛ emɛ inɛw ɔnmɔi wajaain gɔbe, emɛ be le bari ye daa go anrankulumɔ nɛ Inɛw Baŋai sɛgɛrɛ ga emi uhunɔdɛin. Kunrin emɛ asuu Inɛw Baŋa le bibiyɛdɛin.
E sɔɔ kɔɔbe le tunmɔ kinɛ kaaliyɛmɔi.
Ba unrunw, sɔɔ kɔɔbe biyɛidɛin bai gɔ ma, waaru gɔ ma dɛi e bɛrɛ tɔŋu tii ga e kai sɛlɛi.
Sabu, Inɛw Baŋa bai wɛɛido gɔ, gugunyɔnnɛ digɛ bana wɛɛjɛ gin’ wɛɛdo ga e ɛjii igii wɔi.
Inɛw waaru «Jamui, alupɛi» be gɛɛjɛ gɔ le, kɔɔ waaru le, yaanran bana nɔrun dɛinyɛnjɛ gin’, yanwan diyɛ gɔ kubɔ turu kuu bemɛ nɛ susugodo. Inɛw, wogɔ nɛ ɛli goi bɛɛidenɛ.
Kaa e kai, ba unrunw, e ɔlɔ nɛ toloi. Kɔɔ gin’ Inɛw Baŋa bai gɔ gugunyɔnnɛ gin’ ei dɛbɛidolo.
E puu, ei wijɛ inɛwin, aga inɛwin. Emi digɛ ma, ɔlɔ ma inɛwin laa.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, emɛ inɛw wajunw gin’ kikinu sibɛ go giri emɛ yeiyeun jaanla. Kaa emɛ giri yeiyelu go, kuu emɛ ɛjii gɛli ye biyɛun jaain wɔɔ.
Giri waaru yeiyeɲu gɔ digɛi, iyaa kɔɲɔ le bimili ye biyɛɲu gɔ digɛi.
Kaa emi aga mɔi, iyaa kuu emɛ ɛjii emɛ gɛliyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Gagawu lee, ihibɛ lee, inrun arugoi gin’ emɛ goriyeun jaain wɔɔ. Iyaa yayabu diyɛdɔn emɛ gɔ, inrun goro gin’ emɛ goriyeun jaain wɔɔ.
Ama, wo emaa kinɛbanrun unrunmɔ gɔ iye ga emi yɛmɛlu. Kaa Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito le digɛnu emaa yayabu gɔ bɛɛ ga emi yɛmaabe.
Sabu waaru Kirisito wɛɛido le, emɛ ɔnmɔi wɔin ma, yinwaain ma, wo emaa wo le ɔnmɔi biyɛ ga, emɛ dɛi yinwun.
Kunrin bana kanraun e wɔɔ gin’, e tunmɔi mainiyɛnmɔi, tunmɔ paŋa bariyɛmɔi.
Ba unrunw, emɛ e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔin, inɛw logoro ebe nɛ Ama birɛbirɛnw gɔbe, Inɛw Baŋa oju nɛ ei teeremɔw gɔbe, ei deerenw gɔbe, e bei babai.
Birɛ be birɛjɛ sabu dɛi e bei ɛjii babai, bei saii ibɛɛ biyɛi. E tunmɔ le jamu le biyɛi.
Ba unrunw, emɛ e bɛrɛ ɛjii gɛɛunwɔin, inɛw walagunw gɔbei tinwɛnrɛin, inɛw liliyɛgunw gɔbe diyɛ dɛinyɛnmɔi, inɛw yɛbɛlɛgunw gɔbei barai. Inɛw wooi le muyɔn le biyɛi.
Inɛ turu kanran mɔɲu, mɔɲu le tujɔmɔnɔu ga kuu kajubu le biyɛi. Kaa waaru wooi, tunmɔ bɛrɛ lee, inɛw wooi bɛrɛ lee ɛju kanran ga mainiyɛin.
E waaru wooi kinɛ ɛɛlu le biyɛi.
E waaru wooi Ama gɛɛin.
Kijɛ wooi nɛ Amai birɛpoo tagai. Sabu Kirisito Yesu nɛ, Ama kijɛ e nɛ wo ibɛ gɔ kɔɔ woi.
E Ama Kikinu birɛ gɔ tɛŋɛnɔugi.
Inɛw Ama titiyaanw sɔɔ gɔbe yau kanrannɔugi.
Kaa kijɛ puu ɛjii marun yɛnɛi: Kijɛ ɛju gɔbe gɛliyɛi,
kijɛ mɔɲu puu dɛi kuu ebe gɛliyɛi.
Ama, jamu obonɛ gɔ, ei kijɛ puu nɛ womɔi dɛiin biyɛmɔ. Iyaa kikinu ebe lee, kinrun ebe lee, goju ebe lee, bana ebe wooi nɛ, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito wɛɛido baa, Ama ei lelu wooi nɛ paaba.
Ama, ei boonɔnɛ gɔ, wogɔ kakanrando, sabu wo sɔɔ turu baŋai.
Ba unrunw, e emɛ dɛi kanran Ama gɛɛin.
Ba unrunw gɔbe wooi, Ama inɛw gin’ ihibɛ le poonɔi.
Mu Inɛw Baŋa boi le ei tɔɔrɔuwɔn, ba unrunw gɔbe wooi bɛrɛ lɛtɛrɛ ɔn jaŋai.
Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito nɛɛma gɔ e le biyɛ.
E inɛw Tesalonike ana nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu nɛ toin gɔbe, e emɛ Ba Ama lee, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito lee mɔi wɔin gɔbe, mu Pɔlu lee, iyaa Silasu lee, Timɔte lee, emɛ lɛtɛrɛ ɔn e bɛrɛ tɔŋaa tiiuwɔin.
Ba Ama lee, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito lee, e bɛrɛ nɛɛma lee, jamu lee obo.
E dɛi, ba unrunw, waaru wooi Amai birɛpoo emɛ tagaun jaain wɔɔ. Kunrin kanran ga jaain wɔɔ. Sabu gagawu ebe gaai bariyɛuwɔ, iyaa e tuturu wooi, tunmɔi ibɛɛ bii ebe bariyɛ bariyɛ yaauwɔ.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔbe nɛ, emɛ e dɛi kuu emɛ unɔuwɔin. Tɔɔɲɔ lee, ɔɲɛ lee muyaan e wɔɔ gɔbe logoro nɛ bana ɛɛn go iŋiyaan, gawaa e wɔɔ gɔ dɛi emɛ kuu emɛ unɔuwɔin.
Kɔɔ puu Ama saliyɛ kiru gɔ teitai wɔɔ ga daii tagarajɛ. Dumɔ gɔ, Ama diinɛ, diinɛ dɛi ɔɲɔu e wɔɔ gɔ nɛ yoo ga e le jaain biyɛdo. E diinɛ wogɔ dɛi ɔɲɔuwɔi.
Ama kijɛ teitai wɔɔ gɔ kakanrando: Wo inɛw ei ɔɲɔmɔw gɔbei ɔhɔɲɔmɔdo.

E inɛw kanɛ ɔɲaa wɔin gɔbe, Ama kinɛ ebe kakaaliyɛmɔdo, kinɛ emɛ yaa kakaaliyɛmɔdo. Inɛw Ama inin gɔbe, inɛw Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ le yabanɛ gɔbe ɔɲɔmɔ ga, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu, mɛlɛnkɛ paŋagunw womɔbe le, yaun bije nɛ, alagala goo ye waaru unruin wo tagaraido le, Ama kunrin kanrando.
Ama bei ɔhɔɲɔmɔdo, bei asuu susuyodo. Inɛw Baŋa bei unrun le wagee bobojodo, bei dooro diyɛ unrunmɔ le wagee bojodo.

Inɛw Baŋa bai pilemɛ ye wɛɛido gɔ sɔɔ kɔɔ bibiyɛdo. Waaru pilemaa wo wiyaajɛ, inɛw womɔi wɔin gɔbe woi dedemɛniyɛnmɔdɛin. Inɛw wo le gawaa wɔin gɔbe puu woi bababadɛin. E yaa logoro bemɛ nɛ totoiyodei, sabu e sɔɔ womɔ e bɛrɛ emɛ tagu gɔ le yabaabei.

Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, emɛ e dɛi Ama bɛrɛ waaru wooi gɛɛunwɔin. Ɔnmɔ nɛ ei boonaa wo jɛɛlu gɔ e le kijɛ jaain wɔɔi biyɛmɔ ga, womaa gɔnrɔn womɔ le, ɛju kanran ga daariyaa e wɔɔ puu ei kanrun bɛɛmɔ ga, iyaa gagawu ebe birɛ gɔ kibaai biyɛmɔ ga, emɛ wo bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔin.
Kunrin, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu boi gɔ e dɛi sɔsɔmɔdɛin, iyaa inɛw kanran wo dɛi boi ebe sɔsɔmɔdɛin. Ama emɛ lee, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito lee nɛɛma gɔ dɛi kunrin biyɛdo.
Nɛɛ, ba unrunw, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito wɛɛgu gɔ sɔɔ sibɛ go lee, iyaa emɛ wo le bari ye yalu turu nɛ emɛ mɔrinyɛindo sibɛ go lee kanran, emɛ e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔin:

Inɛ Ama titiyainɛ sɔɔ le digɛnu ma, waaju taganu ma, maa iyaa lɛtɛrɛ emɛ bɛrɛ goi ga gɛɛɲu sɔɔ le digɛnu, Inɛw Baŋa bai gɔ wiyaa dɔwaai giye, hakilɛ ebe ɔgiri bimiliyemɔnɔugi, iyaa kikinu manu le kanran biyɛnɔugi.
Inɛ turu kanran bɛrɛ, ei bana inge lei kanran lelemɔnɔugi. Sabu, Ama le murutu kanranw gɔbe wiyaa dɔɔnɛ ye, iyaa Ama jaŋunɛ gɔ, inɛ suiyi dɛi bojaaɲu gɔi tagaranɛ ye, bai diyɛ kɔɔ dɔɔidolo.
Ama jaŋunɛ kɔɔ, kijɛ amai gɛɛɲu, kijɛ demɛniyɛnmɔɲu puu le jajaiyɛdo. Unruin kijɛ kɔɔbe puu dɛi sigɛ bojodo. Wo unruin Amai giyaa ye, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ kɔlɔ nɛ baa yoi ye dɛinyɛndo.
Waaru e le mu bee le, mu sɔɔ kɔɔbe e bɛrɛ tagaabɔn ga e naŋaai ma?
Kɔɔ wooi nɛ, kijɛ kɔɔbe biyɛnɔu ga kijɛ tɛŋaa sɛɛ gɔ e kanɛ igii wɔi. Kunrin, Ama jaŋunɛ gɔ, waaru womɔ dɔwaai ye unruin tagarado.
Mɔmɔɲu gɔnrɔn babaŋa gɔ, kanɛ baa birɛ birɛuwɔ. Kaa, inɛ kanɛ woi tɛŋaa sɛɛ gɔ, oju womɔ nɛ goolu ye, kijɛ wɛɛido gɔ biyɛidolo.
Kɔɔ waaru le Ama jaŋunɛ gɔ tatagaradɛin. Inɛw Baŋa Yesu, aŋa uju unrunmɔ le woi dadaado, wɛɛgu unrunmɔ wijɛ diyɛ le woi susuyodo.
Ama jaŋunɛ gɔ waaru wɛɛido, wo Setanu gɔnrɔn le wɛɛdo. Wo taanrinyɛn lee, sɛɛrɛ taanrinyɛnbe lee, yarabirɛ lee tɔgu dɛin dɛin inɛ lelemu le wɛɛdo.
Wo, inɛw suiyoidɛin gɔbe, mɔɲu tɔgu dɛin dɛin puu le lelelemɔdo. Be Inɛw Baŋa sɔɔ naran bei yabado ga bee gɔi ibɛi biyɛ ga yabanɛ dɛi bei susuiyodo.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Ama, bemaa kakalu gɔ le gawa ga, lelemu paŋa sɛɛ be bɛrɛ tiiuwɔ.
Kunrin inɛw Inɛw Baŋa naran sɔɔ gɔ le gawanɛ kanraan, teitai laa gɔ dɛi kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔw gɔbe, Ama be bɛrɛ jarugu duduurɔdo.

Ba unrunw Inɛw Baŋa ibɛ gɔbe, emɛ kai e dɛi waaru wooi Amai birɛpoo emɛ tagaun jaain wɔɔ, sabu Ama Kikinu gɔnrɔn le ei Ama tɔgu dɛiin bojaaɲu gɔi digɛu, iyaa naran gɔ le gawaa e wɔɔ gɔ digɛu, yayabu gɔ dɛi Ama, tɔlɔgu gɔ le baa ei yɛmaabe.
Sɔɔ kɔɔ dɛi, Kibɛru Ɛju e bɛrɛ emɛ tagu gɔ digɛu, Ama ei boonaabe. Wo, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito dooro gɔ ebaa bɛɛ ga ei boonaabe.
Kɔɔ gin’, ba unrunw e ɛɛn go iŋiyɛin. Iyaa, sɔɔ le ma, lɛtɛrɛ le ma, deeru e bɛrɛ emɛ deeru gɔbei ɛjii gɛliyɛi.
Kunrin, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito, kuu womɔ le, iyaa Ama emɛ Ba gɔ, emi ibɛɛ biyaa, nɛɛma womɔ le kinɛ kaalu sɔgɔjɛ lee, diyɛdɔn ɛju lee emi obu baŋa gɔ,
kinɛ ebe be kaaliyɛmɔ, iyaa, birɛ ɛju wooi lee, sɔɔ ɛju wooi lee kanran ga e bɛrɛ paŋa be obomɔ.
Kɔɔ wooi onu nɛ, ba unrunw, bana logoro ebe nɛ bii gin’ Inɛw Baŋa sɔɔ gɔ ɔgu ginɛ ga, baba siyɛ ga, e, emɛ dɛi Ama gɛɛin.
Ama womaa inɛw mɔɲube lee, inɛw teitai laain lee numɔ nɛ emi yaba ga, e emɛ dɛi Ama gɛɛin. Sabu inɛw puu gawa ga yabaidenɛ.
Kaa Inɛw Baŋa wo sɔɔ turu baŋai. Wo paŋa ei ohobodo, iyaa Mɔɲu kuu baŋa numɔ nɛ ei papaabado.
Kijɛ ebaa kanran ga emɛ tɔɔru gɔbe, e wogɔbe kanraunwɔi, iyaa wogɔbe kakanrandei ga Inɛw Baŋa nɛ, emɛ e le gawaa wɔin.
Ama, kinɛ ebe, ihibɛ e dɛi wo sɛɛ sibɛ go lee, Kirisito muyɔn ei obojɛ sibɛ go lee kigelemɔ.
Ba unrunw, emɛ Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito boi le e bɛrɛ tɔɔrɔuwɔin, bainɛ aai kanran, wala le biyaa, deeru wo bɛrɛ emɛ obu gɔ le kɛukɛu yoi yaalɛ gɔ, e genɛ womɔ nɛ dɔrɔ gooi.
Bana emi e deeun dagaa gɔ e kuu ebe le ɛjii igii wɔi. Sabu waaru e le emɛ bee le, emɛ wala walanɛ.
Emɛ inɛ turu kanran pana tujɔlu go, bamai kayanɛ. Kaa ɔɲɛ lee, birɛ kirɛ lee emɛ iyaabɛin. Emɛ inɛ turu nɛ kanran logoro ebe nɛ dɔɔi biyɛnɔu ga, aga lee digɛ lee birɛ biraabɛin.
Kunrin emɛ kanrun gɔ, wogɔ emaa e sagi biyɛ ga, e bɛrɛ tɔɔrɔun paŋa sɛnɛ dɛi laa. Kaa ebaa emi deewin biyɛ ga, emɛ emi giru taguru gin’ tagaraabɛin.
Kunrin waaru logoro ebe nɛ emɛ tobe le, emɛ sɔɔ ɔn e bɛrɛ tagaubɛin: Inɛ aai kanran birɛ birɛ ga yabaalɛ ye, pana yaa wo kayaun jaanla.
Sabu, inɛw gamuu logoro ebe nɛ wala walawin biyaa, be birɛ birɛɛnɛ, kaa sɔɔ be tolo nɛ aŋa kukunɔɲu ga emɛ ɛgɛuwɔin.
Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito boi le, emɛ inɛw kɔɔbei tɔɔrɔuwɔin, be bɛrɛ gimaa gɛɛunwɔin: Bemaa sɛɛu birɛ birɛ wa, kuu bemɛ le pana be bɛi gɔ, wogɔ kaya wa.
Kaa, e kai ba unrunw, e ɛju kanrun nɛ ɔɲɔnɔugi.
Lɛtɛrɛ ɔn nɛ sɔɔ emɛ gi gɔ, inɛ turu wogɔ le yabalu ye, e inɛ wogɔi kajubai. Womaa dɔgɔ iye ga, e wo le mɔrin ye biyɛnɔugi.
Kɔɔ wooi logoro nɛ e woi jaŋunɛ gin’ lugonɔugi. Kaa bainɛ gin’ woi tinwɛnrɛin.
Inɛw Baŋa jamu obonɛ gɔ, yani biyaai kanran, waaru wooi, kuu womɔ le e bɛrɛ jamu obo. Inɛw Baŋa e wooi le biyɛ.
Poo kunu ɔn, mu Pɔlu, numɔ ma le mu tɔŋu. Mu lɛtɛrɛ mabe wooi nɛ boi ma kɔɔ gin’ tɔŋɔuwɔn. Dɔn tɔŋu ma bana gɔ kɔɔ woi.
Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito nɛɛma gɔ e wooi le biyɛ.
Mu Pɔlu, Ama emi Yabanɛ gɔ lee, Kirisito Yesu, diyɛdɔn emɛi wɔɔ gɔ lee, tɔɔru mu bɛrɛ be obu gɔ le kɛukɛu, Kirisito Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui biyaa wɔɔ gɔ,
mu, u Timɔte, gagawu nɛ ii ma tɔitɔi gɔ, lɛtɛrɛ ɔn u bɛrɛ tiiuwɔn. Ba Ama lee, Kirisito Yesu, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ lee, nɛɛma lee, amasɔgɔjugɔ lee, jamu lee ui obo.

Bana waaru Maseduanɛ gana yaa ga oju mu goi le u bɛrɛ mu tɔɔraabe gin’, mu uwaa Epɛse ana nɛ biyɛ ga ibɛɛ wɔun. Inɛw gamuu Epɛse ana nɛ yatoin. Be deeru kakalugu gɔ inɛwin deereuwɔin. Kɔɔ dɛi, mu uwaa Epɛse nɛ bii ye, inɛw kɔɔbei tɛŋɛ ga ibɛɛ wɔun.

Bei taga, bemaa elumɛ sɔɔ nɛ lee, tirɛ anranw boi digu le digu le, buu, dumɔ sɛlɛ boonu nɛ lee, waaru bemɛ yamalanu biyɛnɔu wa. Sɔɔ kɔɔbe jiiru koolo koolo sai ihingelemɔɲu. Kaa wogɔ, Ama, emɛ dɛi yayabu sɔɔ yegeraa sɛɛ gɔ nɛ giru go emi yaamɔɔlɛ. Yayabu sɔɔ wogɔ emɛ gagawu le jujugɔdɛin.
Emaa kinɛ hakɛ tolo nɛ lee, kinɛjugɔ jarugu sɛlɛ nɛ lee, gagawu tɔitɔi nɛ lee, ihibɛ goojɛ gɔ le tunmɔi ibɛɛ biyɛ ga, tɔɔru ma kijɛ dɛi mu daanu gɔ kɔɔ woi.
Inɛw gamuu sɔɔ kɔɔbe le onu dulaatiyaa, be jiiru koolo koolo nɛ manaa toin.
Be Ama tɔɔru deeru deerewin bii dɛnɛɲu, kaa be kuu bemɛ le sɔɔ be sɔɔjɛ inin, iyaa kijɛ dɛi ɛjii namaa gɛliyaa be sɔɔjɛ gɔ yaa paamau wɔnɛ.
Nɛɛ Ama tɔɔru gɔ, bana kanraun jaan le kɛukɛu dimiyaanɲu ye, Tɔɔru ɛjui ga emɛ puu igii wɔin.

Kɔɔ gin’, emɛ sɔɔ ɔn ɛjii paamu kanraun jaain wɔɔ: Tɔɔru kai, inɛ teitai wɔɔ dɛi daananɛ, kaa inɛw kɔkɔlɔmaagunw dɛi lee, inɛw sɔɔ yabaanɛ gɔbe dɛi lee, inɛw Ama babaanɛ gɔbe dɛi lee, inɛw hakɛ kanranw gɔbe dɛi lee, inɛw Ama lee, kijɛ ɛjaa wɔɔ wooi lee babaanɛ gɔbe dɛi lee, inɛw be babe lee, be nabe lee daanw gɔbe dɛi lee, inɛw inɛw daanw gɔbe dɛi lee,

inɛw salagunw gɔbe dɛi lee, anranw anranw be tunmɔ le diinw gɔbe dɛi lee, inɛw gunɔw dɔnrɔnw gɔbe dɛi lee, inɛw kakalumaŋaw gɔbe dɛi lee, sɛɛrɛ kakalu goonw gɔbe dɛi lee, maa inɛ aai kanran deeru nanaa dimiyɛun jaan gin’ inɛ kanraanlɛ gɔ dɛi lee, tɔɔru gɔ daanaaɲu.
Deeru nanaa ɔn, Ama mu bɛrɛ Kibɛru Ɛju taga ga tɔɔraabe gɔ le sɛgɛrɛuwɔ. Wogɔ, Ama, duba lee dooro lee baŋa gɔ bɛrɛ gowaa wɛɛ.

Mu inɛ birɛ womɔ dɛi mui paŋa obonɛ gɔ, Kirisito Yesu, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ gɔi birɛpoo tagauwɔn. Mu pɔɔlɔ inɛ Yesu boi yamalanɛi bee gɔ, jaŋu unrunw womɔ tɔɔɲɔnɛi bee gɔ, inɛ gaari bee gɔ, mui inɛ le gawaɲui ga lugaa, birɛ womɔ gɔ dɛi mui wo yɛmu gɔ dɛi, mu woi birɛpoo tagauwɔn. Kaa Ama amasɔgɔ ma jugaabe, sabu mu jugɔlu go, gagawu sɛlɛ dɛi kanraunbɔn.
Kaa nɛɛma Inɛw Baŋa nɛ goojɛ gɔ mu sibɛ go gaai narinyaan, gagawu lee, ihibɛ lee, Kirisito Yesu nɛ bɛɛmɔjɛ gɔ mu bɛrɛ jɛɛlaabe.
Sɔɔ ɔn sɔɔ narain, inɛw puu wogɔ le kinɛpilu le yabaun jaain wɔɔ. Kirisito Yesu, aduna nɛ hakɛ kanranwin yabai wɛi. Logoro bemɛ nɛ hakɛ kanrannɛ yɛmu gɔ mui.

Kaa Ama, amasɔgɔ ma jugaabe. Kunrin, Kirisito Yesu, muyɔn kibaai womɔ tagara ga wo mui hakɛ kanranw logoro nɛ diyɛnɛ gɔ, mu bɛrɛ laa muyɔn womɔ tagaraabe. Wogɔ le digɛnu maa inɛw ɔnmɔsɔgɔ dɛi wo le gawaidɛin gɔbe puu dɛi sɛɛrɛ gin’ biyɛ ga, Ama yabaabe.
Asuu Ɔgɔnɛ, asuu ɔnmɔi wɔɔ gɔ, giri le iyemɔɔlɛ gɔ, Ama wo turu gɔ, baba lee, boi sɔmu lee, asuu nasuu womɔi biyɛmɔ. Amina.
Ii ma Timɔte, waaru galaai gɔ le, inɛw, u dɛi Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi be sɔi gɔbe le kɛukɛu, tinwinrun ɔn ui obouwɔn. Sɔɔ u dɛi sɔin gɔbe ɛjii aa gɛliyaa ye, wogɔ le digɛnu kɔmɔ tai ɛju gɔ taa.
Gagawu gɔ lee, kinɛjugɔ jarugu sɛlɛ lee le biyɛ. Inɛw gamuu kinɛjugɔ jarugu sɛlɛ le bii gɔi pajaatin dɛi, be gagawu sibɛ go dii nɛ piriyaain.
Inɛw kunrin kanranw gɔbe logoro nɛ Himɛnɛ lee, Alɛsandere lee yatoin. Bemaa Ama boi yamulu ɛjula jugɔ ga, mu bei Setanu numɔ nɛ kunaabɔn.
Laa gɔ, inɛw puu dɛi amagɛɛn lee, Ama bɛrɛ gɛɛn kunu lee, kai Ama bɛrɛ tagu lee, Amai birɛpoo tagu lee nɛ, inɛw bemaa biyɛ ga mu ui tinwɛnrɛunwɔn.
Kunrin, emaa jamu lee, iyaa, diyɛ daanaa ye, Ama giri liyɛ nɛ lee, bana jaan gin’ sɔɔ wooi nɛ ɛjii biyɛ ga, ɔgɔnw lee, paŋagunw gɔbe puu lee dɛi Ama bɛrɛ gɛɛn ga, mu tinwinrun obouwɔn.
Wogɔ kanran ga Ama emi Yabanɛ gɔ bɛrɛ ɛjii wɔɔ, kinɛ womɔ aauwɔ.
Wo inɛw puu wa yayabu bɛɛ ga, bemaa naran gɔ jugɔ ga ibɛɛ wɔɔ.
Sabu Ama koturu sai yɔɔ, iyaa Ama lee, inɛw lee logoro nɛ sɔɔ yegerenɛ koturu sai yɔɔ. Wogɔ, inɛ Kirisito Yesu gɔ woi.
Wo inɛw wooi dɔrugɔ ga kuu unrunmɔ obaabe. Kunrin wo, Ama, inɛw wooi wa yayabu bɛɛ ga ibɛɛ wɔɔ sɛɛrɛ gɔ, waaru jaan gɔ le tagaraabe.
Wogɔ sabu dɛi mui waaju taganɛ lee, Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲu lee biyɛ ga bojaaɲu. Mui inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe dɛi, gagawu lee naran lee jaŋudeerenɛi bojaaɲu. Mu narain sɔɔjɔn, kakalui maŋaalɔn.
Kunrin iyaa, mu anranw bemaa kinɛ ɛjaai le numɔ daa go dɛɛraa ye, kinɛbanrun siyɛlu go, jiiru wɔlɔ go, yalu wooi nɛ Ama gɛɛn ga ibɛɛ wɔun.
Kɔɔ gin’ yaanw kanran, sɔi be le dagaa wɔɔ goriyaa ye, baba lee, kuu sunugu lee le bii ye, kuu ɛru sigɛ le ma, kange le ma, dugɔi le ma, sɔi dɔnrun gaa ɛju le ma, saŋa saŋi ye biyɛnɔu.
Kaa yaanw Ama birɛ nɛ toin bana le kɛukɛu, birɛ ɛju be birɛmɔ.
Yaanran, deeru wo bɛrɛ deereɲu gɔ, sɔɔ sɔɔlu go, sɔɔ sɛɛu yabaa ye dee.
Mu yaanran womaa deeru deere ma, anranw kuu nɛ paŋa le biyɛ ma ga yabaalɔn. Kaa wo kelemu biyɛun jaain wɔɔ.
Sabu Adama laa maŋaabɛin, kɔɔ onu nɛ Hawai maŋaabɛin.
Iyaa inɛ dɔburu yabu gɔ Adamai laa, kaa yaanran gɔi dɔburu yabaa, Ama sɔɔ gɔ le yabalu kanrun.
Kɔɔ wooi logoro nɛ, yaanran, gagawu nɛ lee, ihibɛ nɛ lee, ɛjaai bii nɛ lee, kuu sunugu nɛ lee, dumɔ gɔ baa biyaajɛ ye, ii nɔrun dɛi woi yayabadɛin.
Sɔɔ ɔn narain: Inɛ turu Ama inɛw mɔɔnu kajubanɛi bii ibɛɛ wɔɔ ye, wo birɛ ɛjui daaru.

Nɛɛ, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu kajubanɛ, inɛ jarugu wo le wɔlɔi wo biyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Woi yaanran turu igɛi, inɛ hakilɛ dɛinyaan wɔɔ, kuu kajubu le wɔɔ, inɛ sɔɔ sɛlɛ, ginrun sugo obonɛ, inɛ deeru deeru bɛɛjɛi biyɛun jaan.
Woi kɔɲɔnɔɔnɛi ma, inɛ koloi ma biyɛun jaanla. Kaa inɛ kaalu, jai jaiyɛɛlɛ, kɛɛlɛ dɛnɛnɛi laai wo biyɛmɔ.
Ginrun duu womɔ inɛ kajubaa sɛɛ, inɛ unrunw womɔ baba le sɔɔ womɔ yabawin biyɛmɔ.
Sabu inɛ ginrun duu unrunmɔ bana gɛliyɛɲu inɛɛ gɔ, kɔɔ baŋa yani Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔi gɛli bɛɛdo?
Ama inɛw mɔɔnu kajubanɛ, inɛ tubu kanai biyɛmɔnɔu. Kɔɔi laa ye, inɛ wogɔ tunmɔ kuu ulo le joo ye bii ye, Ama bana jinrun puu kuu baŋa nɛ jarugu wo duuru gin’, kuu womɔ nɛ yaa jarugu duduurɔdɛin.
Boi womɔ yanwannɔu ga, iyaa jinrun puu kuu baŋa woi pɛnrɛn unrunmɔ nɛ aanɔu ga, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu kajubanɛ, inɛw jaŋu unrunwin laain gɔbe giru nɛ boi ɛju siyɛun jaain wɔɔ.
Ama inɛw mɔɔnu kajubanw baranw gɔbe kanran, inɛw jige ɛjui sɛin biyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Bei inɛw aŋa lɛilɛi wɔin ma, inɛw kɔɲɔ gunɔ nɛ toin ma, inɛw nabara le kijɛ dɛnɛwin ma biyɛun jaanla.
Be kinɛjugɔ jarugu sɛlɛ le gagawu sɔɔ boŋurun jugɔmaaɲu gɔ gɛliyɛun jaain wɔɔ.
Bei yaa suburu yɛnɛu jaain wɔɔ. Kijɛ dagalu turu kanran be le tɛmɛmɔlu ye, kɔɔ onu nɛ birɛ gɔ nɛ bei kunɔ.
Iyaa kɔɔ gin’ yaanw bemɛ kanran, yaanw jige ɛju sɛin biyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Inɛw wajunw sɔɔ mɔɲu sɔɔwin biyɛun jaanla. Kaa yaanw hakilɛ dɛinyaan, kijɛ wooi nɛ be le gawu bɛbɛɛmɔjɛ biyɛmɔ.
Ama inɛw mɔɔnu kajubanw baranw gɔbe, yaanran turu igɛi be biyɛmɔ. Unrunw bemɛ lee, ginrun duu bemɛ lee inɛw ɛjii kajubawin be biyɛmɔ.
Inɛw Ama inɛw mɔɔnu birɛ ɛjii birɛnw gɔbe, baba bɛbɛɛdɛin. Iyaa, Kirisito Yesu nɛ bɔɔi bii emɛ le digɛu gagawu emɛ sɛɛ sɔɔ gɔ, be liliyɛ turu kanran wɔlɔ go, wogɔ sɔɔ sɔɔ bɛbɛɛɲu.
Mu lɛtɛrɛ ɔn u bɛrɛ tɔŋaa tiiuwɔn. Kaa u bɛrɛ bɛrii wɛwɛɛdɔn diyɛdɔn le wɔun.

Nɛɛ, mu u bɛrɛ wiyaa bɛɛlun ye, lɛtɛrɛ ɔn, bana Yesu jaŋu unrunwin emɛ biyɛido u bɛrɛ tatagarado. Emi Ama ginrun gonɔ maranwin, wogɔ Ama asuu ɔnmɔi wɔɔ gɔ inɛw mɔɔnui. Wogɔ tiyɛ gɔ, naran Ama bɛrɛ goojɛ jɛin gɔ lee, bɔlɔtei gɔ lee woi.

Gagawu emɛ sɔɔ boŋurun jugɔmaaɲu gɔ gaai wɔɔ. Inɛ turu kanran wogɔ le jiiru bɛɛidolo. Ama, inɛ taŋaa, unruin tagaraabe. Kikinu Pilu woi teitai wɔɔ ga jugɔmaabe, mɛlɛnkɛbe woi iyaabɛin. Tɔgube logoro nɛ waaju womɔ kunaaɲu. Aduna nɛ wo le gawaabɛin, woi alagala nɛ unaatin.
Ama Kikinu daii sɔwaa gi: «Waaru dumɔ gɔbe le, inɛw gamuu gagawu gɔ papajadɛin. Be kikinu kakalumaŋaw sɔɔ yayabadɛin, iyaa jinrunbe deeru onu nɛ didimiyɛndɛin.»
Be inɛw aŋa lɛilɛigunw lee, inɛw kakalumaŋaw lee bɛrɛ unrunbei liligijiyemɔdɛin. Inɛw, inɛw ligijiyemɔw wogɔbe, kinɛjugɔ bemɛ yanwaan, hakɛ gunɔ nɛ too.
Inɛw kɔɔbe purupagu lee, kijɛ gamuu kayi lee jaanla ga deereuwɔin. Kaa Ama, inɛw gawaa wɔin, naran jugaa wɔin gɔbe bemaa woi birɛpoo tagaatiyaa ye kunrin kaya gi. Ama, kakayɔn kɔɔbe kɔɔ dɛi boju.
Ama kijɛ maŋu gɔbe puu ɛjii wɔɔ. Kijɛ jumɔɲu turu kanran wɔlɔ. Kaa Amai birɛpoo tagu le kayaun jaain wɔɔ.
Sabu Ama sɔɔ gɔ lee, amagɛɛn gɔ lee dɛi kakayɔn gɔ ɛjaa wɔɔ.
U sɔɔ kɔɔbe, ba unrunw bɛrɛ deeraajɛu ye, ui Kirisito Yesu birɛbirɛnɛ ɛjui bibiyɛdo. Ui gagawu le kɔwaaɲu, u deeru ɛju gɔ sɛɛu dimiyaan wɔu ga jujugɔmɔdo.
Elumɛ tiyɛ sɛlɛ, gagawu sɔɔ le sɛgɛrɛɛlɛ gɔbe paja. Ama giriliyɛ nɛ bariyɛ bariyɛ yaa ga ɛjii mainiyɛn.
Gojutere le biyɛ ga maini gɔ niwɛn gaila sɛɛ. Kaa kanɛ lee, waaru wɛɛido gɔ lee dɛi, ɔnmɔ pui emɛ bɛrɛ kunaaɲu dɛi, Ama giriliyɛ gɔ kijɛ wooi nɛ niwɛn yasɛ.
Sɔɔ kɔɔ sɔɔ narain, iyaa inɛw puu wogɔ le sɛɛu yabaun jaain wɔɔ.
Emɛ birɛ birɛuwɔin, jaiyɛuwɔin. Sabu emɛ, Ama ɔnmɔi wɔɔ, Ama inɛw wooi Yabanɛ gɔ, sigiyaa inɛw wo le gawauwɔin gɔbe Yabanɛ gɔ le diyɛ emɛ daanaaɲu.
U sɔɔ kɔɔbe inɛw bɛrɛ taga, wogɔbe le bei deere.
Inɛ turu kanran bɛrɛ, uwaa ii dagi giye ui gailiyɛmɔnɔu. Kaa u sɔɔ nɛ lee, bana uwɔ nɛ lee, ihibɛ nɛ lee, gagawu nɛ lee, ɛjaai bii nɛ lee, inɛw gawaa wɔin gɔbe wooi giru nɛ ui giretagurui biyɛmɔ.
Mu wɛɛido baa, u Ama Dɔn inɛw puu giru nɛ jaŋu nɛ lee, inɛwin mainiyɛnmu nɛ lee, deeru deeru nɛ lee ɛjii kuu kunɔ.
Inɛw, u dɛi Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi be sɔi gɔ le digɛu, waaru inɛw naw kuu uwɔ nɛ numɔ yaŋaraan, Ama gɛɛin gɔ le, Ama uwaa kijɛ kanrun bɛɛ ga, gɔnrɔn u bɛrɛ wo obu gɔ, sin obu wogɔ pajanɔu.
Inɛw puu giru nɛ u mainiyaan, giru go yaauwɔu ga tagara dɛi, u sɔɔ kɔɔbe kanran. Wogɔ nɛ ɛjii kuu uwɔ obo.
U kuu bana uwɔ lee, deeru uwɔ gɔ lee ɛjii kajuba. Sɔɔ wogɔbe nɛ ɛjii mainiyɛn. U kunrin kanraunwɔu ye, kuu uwɔ lee, inɛw sɔɔ uwɔ keŋiyɛnw gɔbe lee yaa yayabadou.
U inɛ pɛii ganwannɔu. Kaa waaru wo le sɔɔ u sɔɔjɛ, u ba gin’ woi lugo. Sagatara unrunw gɔbe u ba unrunw gin’ lugo.
Yaanw naw gɔbe u nabe gin’ lugo, iyaa yaanw dagunw gɔbe u saabe gin’, manugu ɛju le bei tinwɛnrɛn.
Yapanuw tɔitɔi gɔbe baba.

Kaa yapanunɛ turu, unrunw ma, tirɛ unrunw ma yasɛ ye, gagawu bemɛ gɔ ginrun gonɔ bemɛ nɛ laa be tagaramɔ. Iyaa bei naranw gɔbe sibɛ go kijɛ kanraun jaain be wɔɔ gɔ puu be kanranmɔ. Wogɔ Ama bɛrɛ ɛjii wɔɔ.
Nɛɛ, yapanunɛ tɔitɔi gɔ, kuu womɔ turu sai wɔɔ gɔ, wo diyɛ womɔ Ama nɛ daanaa sɛɛ. Wo aga lee digɛ lee, Ama womaa unruin bara gɛɛuwɔ, iyaa, wo Ama bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔ.
Kaa yapanunɛ yɔgɔrɔ sɔɔ nɛ tee biyɛjɛ gɔ, halu woi ɔnmɔi wɔɔ kanran, kanɛ baa yinwaain.
Bemaa jarugu le biyɛnɔu ga sɔɔ kɔɔbe bei taga.
Inɛ wo maranw kai kilɛɛlɛ gɔ, sigɛ le ginrun duu womɔ maranw kai kilɛɛlɛ gɔ, kɔɔbaŋa gagawu oju gɔ pajaati, woi inɛ tubu tolo dɛi mɔɲu.
Yapanunɛ, anranguju womɔ pɛlukuloi dɔɔlu ye, boi womɔ dɔn nɛ tɔŋɔ kunɔnɔu. Iyaa woi yaanran igɛ kubɔ turu sai ɛyaabei biyɛmɔ.

Woi yaanran birɛ ɛju womɔ dɛi boi ɛju womɔ gowaa wɔɔi biyɛun jaan. Kunrin woi yaanran unrunw ɛjii kɔwaabe ga, yerunwin ɛjii sɛgɛraabe ga, Ama inɛw kubɔ mɔŋaabe ga, inɛw ɔɲɛ nɛ toin gɔbei baraabe ga, womaa birɛ ɛju tɔgu dɛin dɛin biraabe ga sɛɛrɛ ɛju gɔ inɛw wo dɛi gooun jaain wɔɔ.
Kaa yapanuw nimɛ pɛɛnɛ gɔbe boi tɔŋɔnɔu. Sabu igɛ ɛi dadaaru bei aa ye, be Kirisito le onu duduloɲu.
Wo le pui pɔlɔ be kunaabe gɔ yamalatiiɲu dɛi, jarugu le bibiyɛdɛin.
Iyaa kɔɔ kuu nɛ bariyaa, be wala deyaa, ginrun ginrun nɛ gɔgɔŋɔlɔɲu. Wala gɔ dɛi sigɛ, be mɛrun mɛrɛnwin biyɛɲu. Sɔɔ bei tolo nɛ aŋa kukunɔɲu. Kijɛ sɔɔun dagalu sɔɔnu biyɛɲu.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi yapanuw nimɛ pɛɛnɛ gɔbe bemaa igɛ bemɛ ɛɛ ga mu ibɛɛ wɔun. Bemaa unrunw bɛɛ, ginrun bemɛ kajuba, jaŋuw emɛ bɛrɛ, sɔɔ mɔɲu emɛ dɛi yalu sɔɔɲu turu kanran be obomɔnɔu.
Sabu kanɛ baa gamuu naran oju gɔ pajaatiyaa, Setanu onu nɛ dimiyaain.
Ama inɛw mɔɔnu womaa, yapanuw tɔitɔi gɔbe kai kilɛ dɛi, yaanran jaŋu ii aai kanran, yapanuw yasɛ ye, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu bɛrɛ dɔɔ duurɔnɔu ga, baŋa kai bemɛ kilɛ.
Inɛw naw, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu ɛjii teeremɔw gɔbe, tujɔ bemɛ sɔɔrɔ lɛi be le jaain wɔɔ. Sigɛ le inɛw waaju tagu nɛ lee, jaŋu deeru nɛ lee mainiyɛun wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ kanraun jaain wɔɔ.
Sabu Ama Dɔn sɔwaa gi: “Naa jiŋu dɛnrɛn kiju namaa ye ii goonɔjɛ aŋa nɛ aŋa pɔin e kunɔu jaanla.” Iyaa gi: “Birɛbirɛnɛ, tujɔ womɔ wo le jaain wɔɔ.”
Inɛw lɛi ma taanu ma sɛɛrɛ goonw wɔlɔ ye, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu inɛ na turu kanran dɛi jarugu yabanɔu.
Be logoro nɛ inɛw hakɛ kanranw gɔbe, inɛw wajunw gɔbe bemaa liliyɛ le biyɛ ga, inɛw puu giru nɛ be le sɔɔ.
Ama lee, Kirisito Yesu lee, mɛlɛnkɛ yɛmaaɲu gɔbe lee giru nɛ u le daii sɔɔuwɔn: Inɛ kabu kunɔlu go, inɛ turu waja dɛi ire bojolu go, u tɔɔru ɔnbe gɛliyɛ.
U inɛ turu kanran kuu nɛ ɔgu numɔ yaŋurun ye, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu birɛ nɛ woi kunɔ ga kanrannɔu. Inɛw wajunw hakɛ le mɔrinyɛnnɔu. Ui ɛjaai gɛliyɛ.
U waaru wooi dii saun sai nɔɔnu biyɛnɔu. Kaa bɛrɛ uwɔ sabu dɛi lee, waaru joo jiun ui aajɛ gɔ dɛi lee, u resɛndii ilɛ gaila nɔɔ.
Inɛw gamuu, hakɛ bemɛ, saliyɛ kiru baa dɔmiyɛindolo, kanɛ baa ɛlu gowaai. Kaa inɛw gamuu hakɛ gɔ dumɔ nɛ ɛlu goodo.
Kɔɔ gin’ birɛ ɛju gɔbe yaa bain nɛ ihiyemɔdo. Iyaa birɛ nimɛ ɛlu goolu gɔbe yaa jaa baŋi biyɛidenɛ.
Jaŋu unrunw gunɔ nɛ toin gɔbe, be baŋabei ɛjii babaun jaain wɔɔ ga be lugomɔ. Inɛ turu kanran Ama boi mɔɲu ma, deeru emɛ sɔɔ mɔɲu ma sɔɔnɔu dɛi, kɔɔ gin’ be kanranmɔ.

Gunɔw be baŋa gɔbe jaŋu unrunwin wɔin gɔbe, be baŋabe jaŋu unrunw be ba unrunwin dɛi bei gailiyɛmɔu jaanla. Kaa be, be dɛi, sigɛ le ɛjii birɛ birɛun jaain wɔɔ, sabu inɛw birɛ bemɛ niwɛn kayaɲu gɔbe jaŋu unrunw ibɛɛ be wɔi. Kijɛ kɔɔbe bei deere, wogɔbe nɛ bei mainiyɛnmɔ.
Inɛ, deeru waja, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito naran sɔɔ gɔ lee, Ama giriliyɛ deeru emɛ gɔ lee deeru dɛin wɔɔ inɛ deerejɛ gɔ,

inɛ kɔɔbaŋa kuu ulo le jowaa wɔɔ. Wo kijɛ kanma inɛɛ. Kaa wo jiiru kunu dadaaru jiun lee, sɔɔ kuu nɛ jai jaiyɛ dadaaru lee le wɔɔ. Kijɛ kɔɔbe inɛwin tunmɔ le ele le bojojɛ, tunmɔ le jijiiremɔjɛ, duyɔ duyɔmɔjɛ, ajubu mɔɲu tunmɔ dɛi ahajubamɔjɛ.
Bei inɛw kuu sɛnɛi, naran nanaa inin wɔin, jiiru dumɔ sɛlɛ, tiyɛ sɛlɛ kunɔwin. Ajubu bemɛ nɛ, Ama giriliyɛ gɔ le digɛnu, kɛɛlɛ gaai bɛɛmɔjɛ ga wɔin.
Nɛɛ, inɛ Ama giriliyɛ gɔ dɛi, kijɛ wo sɛɛ gɔ woi baa wɔɔ ga wɔɔ ye, kɔɔbaŋa bɛrɛ Ama giriliyɛ gɔ arusɛgɛ diyɛi.
Sabu emɛ aduna nɛ wɛɛu, kijɛ turu kanran le wɛɛnɛ, iyaa waaru aduna nɛ emɛ gooido, kijɛ turu kanran le yaaidenɛ.
Kaa, emɛ kijɛ kayaɲu lee, kijɛ goriyeɲu lee yasin ye, wogɔ emi baamɔ.
Kaa inɛw arusɛgɛ joo bɛɛ ibɛin gɔbe, bei subɔrɔ nɛ nunumɔjɛ. Be dadaaru tiyɛ sɛlɛ joo nɛ lee, dadaaru mɔɲu joo nɛ lee pɛnrɛn nɛ yoyooɲu. Wogɔbe inɛi ɔgu mamanamɔjɛ, inɛi susuyojɛ.
Sabu mɔɲu dɛin dɛin bɔlɔduu gɔ, kɛɛlɛ dadaaru gɔ woi. Inɛw gamuu, wogɔ dadaaru ɛjii bei wo aa, gagawu oju gɔ pajaatin. Wogɔ digɛu kinɛjiun diyɛ le wɔin.
Kaa u, Ama inɛ gɔ, kijɛ kɔɔbe le wagee biyɛ. U teitai lee, Ama giriliyɛ lee, gagawu lee, ihibɛ lee, muyɔn lee, inɛw le ɛjii bii lee dɛnɛ.
U gɔnrɔn uwɔ wooi le gagawu jobu gɔ jɔbɔ, u kuu uwɔ dɛi ɔnmɔsɔgɔ siyɛ. U gagawu uwɔ aŋa sɛɛrɛ ɛju gɔ, inɛw joo giru nɛ waaru u goi le, ɔnmɔsɔgɔ wogɔ dɛi Ama ui boonaabe.
Ama kijɛ wooi bɛrɛ ɔnmɔ obonɛ gɔ giru nɛ lee, Kirisito Yesu aŋa sɛɛrɛ ɛju Pɔnse Pilate giru nɛ goonɛ gɔ giru nɛ lee, mu uwaa
tɔɔru e bɛrɛ obin gɔ gɛliyɛ ga tɔɔrɔuwɔn. Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito bai kuu unrunmɔ wo tagaraido baa, u wogɔ sɛɛu jarugu wɔlɔ go gɛliyɛ.
Waaru wo kɛjɛido gɔ le, Ama Yesui pilemɛ ye wɛwɛɛmɔdo. Ama, duba baŋa gɔ, kijɛ wooi kuu baŋa gɔ wo turu sai. Woi ɔgɔnw wooi Ɔgɔnɛi, inɛw baŋabe wooi Inɛw Baŋai.
Wo turu sai asuu ɔnmɔi wɔɔ. Wo, wijɛ inɛ turu kanran wogɔ nɛ dɔɔ bɛɛlɛ gɔ nɛ too, inɛ turu kanran woi iyetɛlu, woi iye bɛɛlɛ. Baba lee, gɔnrɔn asuu dogoolɛ gɔ lee womɔi. Amina.

Aduna ɔn kijɛ nɛ inɛw ɔgɔ unrunwin wɔin gɔbe bemaa kuu ulo le biyɛnɔu wa. Bemaa arusɛgɛ kijɛ sɔgɔjɛi laa dɛi, diyɛ bemɛ arusɛgɛ gɔbe kuu nɛ daananɔu wa. Kaa Ama, emaa kinɛ emɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔ ga, emɛ bɛrɛ kijɛ wooi gaai obojɛ gɔ nɛ diyɛ bemɛ daana wa.
Bemaa ɛju kanran wa, birɛ ɛju biru nɛ ɔgɔ unrunwin biyɛ wa. Bemaa inɛw bɛrɛ sin kanrun nɛ lee, inɛw wajunw bɛrɛ kijɛ be sɛɛ gamulu nɛ lee, kinɛ ɔgu le biyɛ wa.
Be kɔɔ gin’, yogo dɛi arusɛgɛ ɛju, bɔlɔtei ɛju nɛ daan gɔi mɔɔnɔuwɔin, iyaa be kɔɔ waaru le ɔnmɔ tɔitɔi gɔ sisiyɛdɛin.
U Timɔte, kijɛ u bɛrɛ sagu duuraaɲu gɔ ɛjii gɛliyɛ. U, jiiru tiyɛ sɛlɛ, gagawu sɔɔ le sɛgɛrɛɛlɛ gɔbe lee, jiiru, inɛw kakalu le jugɔ sɔɔi gɛɛɲu gɔbe lee nɛ aŋa uwɔ kunɔnɔu.
Inɛw gamuu kɔɔ gin’, jugɔ sɔɔ wogɔ yasin ga ajubaa, be gagawu oju gɔ nɛ gɛŋiyaan gowaain. Ama nɛɛma gɔ e le biyɛ.
Mu Pɔlu, Ama diŋɛ le Kirisito Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui biyaa wɔɔ gɔ, inɛw Kirisito Yesu le bɔɔi wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ Ama pui kunu gɔ, maa inɛw bɛrɛ ginɛge ga, Ama mui tii.
Aini ii ma gin’ mu ibɛ gɔ, Timɔte, mu lɛtɛrɛ ɔn u bɛrɛ tiiuwɔn. Ba Ama lee, Kirisito Yesu, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ lee, nɛɛma lee, amasɔgɔjugɔ lee, jamu lee ui obo.
Bana mu tirɛ anranw kanrun gin’, mu kinɛjugɔ jarugu sɛlɛ le, Ama dɛi birɛ birɛu mu wɔɔ gɔi birɛpoo tagauwɔn. Mu aga lee, digɛ lee, waaru Ama mu gɛɛnjɛ wooi, ui ajubauwɔn, Amai birɛpoo tagauwɔn.
Mu giridii uwɔ gɔbe ajubauwɔn, iyaa, maa kinɛ saii ɛɛliyɛmu bɛɛ ga, mu ui pilemɛ ye iye ga gaai daariyaa wɔun.
Mu gagawu tɔitɔi u sɛɛ gɔ naŋalun. U na na Loyise lee, u na Yunise lee, gagawu tɔgu be laa siyaabɛin gɔ, u yaa gagawu wogɔ le wɔu ga mu saii igii wɔun.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi mu u bɛrɛ naŋaranmɔuwɔn, numɔ ma waaru kuu uwɔ nɛ mu yaŋurun le sin obu Ama u bɛrɛ obu gɔ, u wogɔ le birɛ ɛju birɛnɛi biyɛ.
