Sabu Kikinu Ama emɛ bɛrɛ obu gɔ liliyɛ obolu. Kaa, Kikinu gɔ, gɔnrɔn lee, ihibɛ lee, kuu kajubu le bii lee obojɛ.

Inɛw Baŋa emɛ dɛi sɛɛrɛ goo ga dɔgɔ ui aamɔnɔu. Iyaa mu, inɛ wo dɛi kanɛ kaju nɛ too gɔ dɛi kanran dɔgɔ ui aamɔnɔu. Kaa u, bana mu kanranjɛ gin’, Ama, gɔnrɔn u bɛrɛ obojɛ gɔ le kɛukɛu, Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ dɛi ɔɲɛ gamulu uwɔi wɔɔ gɔ jeɲɛ.

Ama emi yabaabe, iyaa wo emaa inɛw womɔi biyɛ ga emi boonaabe. Ama, birɛ emɛ biru gɔ dɛi wogɔ kanranlu. Kaa wo sɔɔ unrunmɔ wo kɛju gɔ lee, nɛɛma unrunmɔ lee dɛi kanraanbe. Aduna maŋamɔ nɛ, Ama, nɛɛma wogɔ, Kirisito Yesu le digɛu emɛ bɛrɛ obaabe.
Kaa, kanɛ Ama, emi Yabanɛ Kirisito Yesu wɛɛgu le digɛu, nɛɛma wogɔ emɛ bɛrɛ tagaraabe. Yesu, yiun kuu nɛ gɔnrɔn biyaabe, iyaa, Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ le digɛu, wo ɔnmɔsɔgɔ emɛ bɛrɛ tagaraabe.
Ama, maa, Kibɛru Ɛju ginɛgenɛ lee, deerenɛ leei biyɛ ga, iyaa Kibɛru Ɛju dɛi Yesu jaŋu ii tiyaaɲui biyɛ ga mui boonaabe.

Iyaa kijɛ dɛi ɔɲɛ nɛ mu too gɔ kɔɔ woi. Kaa dɔgɔ mui aalu, sabu inɛ le gawaa mu wɔɔ gɔ inɛ aai ma mu igii wɔun. Iyaa wo Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ mu bɛrɛ sagu wo duuru gɔ, wo bai dumɔ gɔ baa wogɔ sɛɛu gɛliyɛun gɔnrɔn yasɛ ga mu gawaa wɔun.
Kirisito Yesu nɛ gagawu lee, ihibɛ lee bɛɛmɔjɛ gɔ nɛ bii ye, naran sɔɔ u bɛrɛ mu deeru gɔ giri teeremu gin’ ɛjii ai gɛliyɛ.
Kijɛ ɛju u bɛrɛ sagu duuraaɲu gɔ ɛjii gɛliyɛ. U wogɔ, Kikinu Pilu emɛ nɛ too gɔ gɔnrɔn le ɛjii gɛliyɛ.
Rɔmɛ laamu Asi numɔ nɛ jaŋu unrunw toin gɔbe puu mui pajaatin ga u igii wɔu. Inɛw wogɔbe logoro nɛ Pijɛle lee, Hɛrumɔjɛnɛ lee yatoin.
Ama, Onɛsipore ginrun gonɔ gɔ amasɔgɔ wo aamɔ. Sabu wo waaru joo kinɛ ma kaaliyɛmaabe, iyaa maa kaju nɛ too dɛi, mu dɛi dɔgɔ woi aalu.
Kaa waaru Rɔmɛ ana nɛ wo dɔi le, wo mui ɛjii dɛnaa iyaabe.
Saliyɛ kiru bai gɔ le Ama, amasɔgɔ womɔ woi aamɔ. Epɛse ana nɛ mu dɛi bana kijɛ dɛin dɛin wo kanrun gɔ, u saii igii wɔu.
U kai, ii ma, Kirisito Yesu nɛ nɛɛma bɛɛmɔjɛ gɔ nɛ paŋa uwɔ bariyɛmɔ.
Iyaa, inɛw joo giru nɛ aŋa ma nɛ sɔɔ u ɛgu gɔ, u wogɔ inɛw sɔɔ turu nɛ iŋɛw, inɛw wajabe bɛrɛ pilemɛ ye deeru bɛɛidɛin bɛrɛ sagu duurɔ.
Kirisito Yesu sɔludasu ɛju gin’ ɔɲɛ gamulu uwɔi wɔɔ gɔ jeɲɛ.
Sɔludasu ii kɔmɔ tai dɛi unruin yegeraa wɔɔ gɔ, wo kuu womɔ baŋa kinɛ aamɔ ibɛɛ wɔɔ dɛi, wo aduna sɔɔ wajunw nɛ toii ye, unruin gaaniyɛnmɔɔlɛ.
Inɛ tunmɔ galu jobu jɔbɔnɛ gɔ, wo tɔɔru daanaaɲu gɔ le kɛukɛu jobu gɔ jɔbɔlu ye, wo tujɔ diyɛ gɔ bɛɛidolo.
Woluwalanɛ saii birɛ nɛ mainiyaanbe gɔ, wo laa gamulu womɔ bɛɛun jaain wɔɔ.
Sɔɔ u bɛrɛ mu tagu gɔi ajubu yɛnɛ, sabu Inɛw Baŋa Yesu, kijɛ puu nɛ paamukanrun hakilɛ u bɛrɛ ohobodo.
Yesu Kirisito, Ama yiun nɛ bulomu gɔi, Ɔgɔnɛ Dawide tiruwɛnɛ gɔ, waaru wooi ajuba. Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ mu tagu gɔ kɔɔ woi.
Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ tagauwɔn dɛi mu ɔɲɛ nɛ toun, inɛ sɔɔ mɔɲu kanrannɛ gin’ mui yɔgu le kɔmaa sɛin. Kaa Ama sɔɔ gɔi yɔgu le kɔmɔnɛ.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, inɛw Ama yɛmu gɔbe dɛi, bemaa yayabu Kirisito Yesu le bɛɛmɔjɛ gɔ lee, Ama le dooro sɔgɔ bɛɛ ga lee, mu kijɛ puu tariyɛuwɔn.
Sɔɔ ɔn narain: “Emɛ Yesu Kirisito le yinwaain ye, emɛ iyaa wo le ɔnmɔi bibiyɛdɛin.
Emɛ wo le bariyaa ɔɲɔuwɔin ye, emɛ iyaa wo le asuu laamu kakanrandɛin. Emɛ woi inin gin ye, wo yaa emi inɛɛ gɛgɛɛdo.
Emɛ wo sibɛ go sɔɔ turu nɛ iŋɛlain ye, wo kai sɔɔ turu baŋai. Sabu wo pui wo kunu gɔ nɛ gooidolo.”
Kijɛ inɛw uwɔ gɔbe bɛrɛ u naŋaranmɔu jaan gɔ unwɔ: Sɔɔ kuu nɛ jiiru kunɔnɔu giye, Ama giru nɛ be le daii sɔɔ. Inɛw kekeŋiyɛnw gɔbe suyoi laa ye jiiru wogɔ niwɛn turu kanran sɛlɛ.
U gɔnrɔn uwɔ wooi le biraa ye, Ama giru nɛ birɛbirɛnɛ sɔmu biyaajɛi, iyaa dɔgɔ sɛlɛi biyɛ. Ama sɔɔ gɔ bana jaan gin’ deere.
Jiiru tiyɛ sɛlɛ lee, jiiru gagawu sɔɔ le sɛgɛrɛɛlɛ lee le wagee biyɛ. Jiiru wogɔbe, Ama le inɛwin wawageniyɛnmɔɲu.
Inɛw jiiru kɔɔbe tunmɔ kunɔw deeru gɔbe, mirun mɔɲu gojui kayajɛ gin’ wɔin. Inɛw deeru wogɔbe deerenw logoro nɛ Himɛnɛ lee, Pilɛte lee yatoin:
Be naran oju gɔi pajaatiyaa, jaŋu unrunw gamuu gagawu yamalauwɔin. Be gɛɛuwɔin, emɛ jaŋu unrunw gɔbe kanɛ baa yinwaan bulaain, bulogu sɔɔ lee wɔlɔ.

Kaa Ama bɔlɔtei ɛju daanu gɔ wogɔ sɛɛu bibiyɛdo. Bɔlɔtei wogɔ nɛ sɔɔ ɔnbe tɔŋaaɲu: “Inɛw Baŋa Ama, inɛw womɔi wɔin gɔbe igii wɔɔ.” Iyaa: “Inɛ aai kanran, unruin Inɛw Baŋa Ama mɔi gɛɛjɛ gɔ, kɔɔbaŋa sɔɔ teitai wɔlɔ le kabiyɛ.”
Ginrun diyɛ kɔlɔ nɛ kange gelu ma, sarudu gelu ma turu sai tolo. Kaa baga le gelu yegeraaɲu lee, nage le gelu yegeraaɲu lee yaa yatoin. Gelu gamuu gɔ bai diyɛ dɛi, gamuu bai peere mɔi.
Jaŋu ii deeru mɔɲu kɔɔbe dɛi kuu unrunmɔ sɛɛu gɛliyaajɛ gɔ, woi gelu bai diyɛ dɛi dɛiin bojaaɲui, sabu woi Ama dɛi dɛiin bojaaɲu, wo Baŋa gelui, kai kilu ɛjui, birɛ ɛju wooi dɛi woi yegeraa sɛin.
U sagataranw dadaaru gɔbe le wagee biyɛ. Inɛw kinɛ pilu le Inɛw Baŋa boi boonɔw gɔbe le bari ye, teitai lee, gagawu lee, ihibɛ lee, jamu lee dɛnɛ.
Kaa jiiru bomɔgu lee, jiiru tiyɛ sɛnɛ gɔbe leei paja, sabu wogɔ jai narinyɛnmɔjɛ.
Inɛw Baŋa birɛbirɛnɛ, jai jaiyɛun jaanla. Kaa wo inɛw wooi le kaali bii ye, deeru deerenɛ ɛju, muyɔn baŋai biyɛun jaan.
Inɛw deeru womɔ le jaiyɛnw gɔbei tɛgɛ sɛlɛ le bei deeru wo deereun jaain wɔɔ. Ama be bɛrɛ bana duli obu ye, be naran gɔ jujugɔdɛin bibiyɛ.
Be kɔɔ waaru le hakilɛ bemɛ dɛdɛinyɛndo. Jinrun puu kuu baŋa diŋɛ unrunmɔ kanran ga, bei aa pɛnrɛn unrunmɔ nɛ kunaa wo sɛɛ gɔ nɛ, be ɛli goo bɛbɛɛdɛin.
U sɔɔ ɔn jugi biyɛ: Aduna dogogu le waaru nau wɛwɛɛdo.

Kɔɔ gin’ Adama unrunw kuu unrunbemɛ sai dɛnɛdɛin, kɛɛlɛ saii ibɛɛ biyɛdɛin, saba sabawin biyɛdɛin, kuu ulo ulowin biyɛdɛin. Be Ama boi yamalawin biyɛdɛin, iyaa bei naranw sɔɔ yabaidenɛ, yogosɛlɛ sɛlɛwin biyɛdɛin, be kijɛ ɛjaa wɔɔ dɛi baba turu kanran siyɛidenɛ.
Be inɛw ihibɛ sɛnɛ, amasɔgɔjugɔ sɛnɛ, inɛw wajunw sɔɔ mɔɲu sɔɔnw, kinɛ ɔgu banranmɔw, inɛw kiijiun sɛnɛ, inɛw ɛju le jaŋuwin biyɛdɛin.
Be inɛw jamajamaw, inɛw kolo, kuu ulo le jowaa wɔin biyɛdɛin, be inɛw yɔgɔrɔ sɔɔ Ama dɛi sigɛ ibɛin biyɛdɛin.
Bain go bei yɛnaa ye, emɛ wooi Ama giri liyɛ tunmɔ gɔ sɛin gin’ wɔɔ, kaa be Ama giri liyɛ wogɔ gɔnrɔn gɔ le yabaidenɛ. U inɛw kɔɔbe le yaa wagee biyɛ.
Logoro bemɛ nɛ inɛw gamuu ginrun nɛ koi yooɲu, be yaanw gɔnrɔn sɛnɛ gɔbei, yaanw hakɛ joo kanraan, dadaaru mɔɲu tɔgu dɛin dɛin kanran ga daariyaa be wɔɔ onu nɛ dimiyaan wɔin gɔbei dɔdɔbɔrɔɲu.
Be waaru wooi sɔɔ dei ibɛɛ wɔin, kaa asuu naran gɔ jugu bɛɛidenɛ.
Bana Jannɛsu lee, Janbɛrɛsu lee, Mɔise le be jaiyaabe gin’, inɛw kɔɔbe kanran, naran gɔ le jaiyɛuwɔin. Bei inɛw kuu sɛnɛbei, gagawu bemɛ gɔ tiyɛ turu kanran sɛlɛ.
Kaa be sɔɔ kɔɔ nɛ giru bɛɛ yaaidenɛ. Sabu bana Jannɛsu lee, Janbɛrɛsu lee mɔ bii gin’, inɛw puu weje bemɛ sɔɔ gɔ jugɔtiidɛin.
Kaa u, deeru ma gɔbe nɛ lee, yoiyaara ma nɛ lee, kijɛ kanrando ga mu bee gɔbe nɛ lee, gagawu ma nɛ lee, muyɔn ma nɛ lee, ihibɛ ma nɛ lee, ɛɛn go aŋai mu bee nɛ lee,

tɔɔɲɔ ma gɔbe nɛ lee, ɔɲɛ ma gɔbe nɛ lee, mui ɛjii kajubaabeu. U Antiɔse nɛ lee, Ikɔniumu nɛ lee, Lisutere nɛ lee kijɛ mu bɛrɛ dɔwaabe gɔbe puu igii wɔu. Iyaa, tɔɔɲɔ mu bɛrɛ dɔi gɔbe igii wɔu. Kaa Inɛw Baŋa, tɔɔɲɔ kɔɔbe wooi nɛ mui yabaa goonaabe.
Kaa inɛw Kirisito Yesu nɛ, Ama oju nɛ teitai yai ibɛɛ wɔin gɔbe puu, tɔɔɲɔ be bɛrɛ dɔdɔɔdo.
Kaa inɛw mɔɲu lee, inɛw kakalu le wɔin gɔbe lee, mɔɲu bemɛ bariyɛ bariyɛ yaado, inɛwin lelelemɔdɛin, kuu bemɛ yaa lelelemɔdɛin.
U kai, naran ui deerin gɔbe, naran le saii gawaa u wɔɔ gɔbe ɛjii gɛliyɛ. Sabu u, inɛw ui dedeerenw gɔbe le diyɛ daanu bɛbɛɛdou.
Kɔɔ gin’, dagi uwɔ le baa, u Ama Dɔn ɛjaai gɔbe igii wɔu. Kirisito Yesu le gawu gɔ le digɛnu, Ama Dɔn wogɔ, hakilɛ yayabu kɔɔ obojɛ gɔ ui obu bɛbɛɛdo.
Ama sɔɔ tɔŋɔmu puu, Ama Kikinu gɔnrɔn le tɔŋaaɲu. Naran deere ga niwɛn yasɛ, lelu lee, teitai laa lee goonɔ ga, bana ɛjii biyɛɲu dedeerejɛ.
Kɔɔ le digɛnu Ama inɛ gɔi sɛɛu deeraa ye, birɛ ɛju tɔgu dɛin dɛin sɛɛu birɛ bɛɛ ga yeguru kunaa wɔɔ.

Mu Ama giru nɛ lee, Kirisito Yesu, inɛw ɔnmɔi wɔin lee, inɛw yinwaain gɔbe lee saliyɛ kireido baŋa giru nɛ lee, u bɛrɛ daii sɔɔuwɔn. Yesu, wɛɛgu womɔ le unruin wo tagaraido lee, laamu wo kanraindo gɔ lee dɛi u bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn:

Kibɛru Ɛju waaju gɔ u inɛw bɛrɛ taga, waaru sɛgɛraa ma, sɛgɛrɛlu ma, u wogɔ inɛw bɛrɛ gimɛ gimɛ ye taga. Muyɔn diyɛ le inɛwin deeraa ye, inɛw sɔɔ u sɔi gɔ le be yabamɔ, inɛwin jaruga, bei anrangaju obo.

Sabu waaru yawɛɛjɛ, inɛw, waaru wogɔ le naran sɔɔ keŋiyɛindenɛ. Kaa be deeru tɔgu dɛin keŋi ibɛɛ biyɛdɛin. Kɔɔ gin’ be dedeerenw dɛin dɛin, sɔɔ keŋi be ibɛ, be bɛrɛ sɔɔnw gɔbe, bei gɔŋɔ ye gɛgɛliyɛmɔdɛin.
Be Ama sɔɔ naran gɔ keŋiyɛn ga yabaidenɛ, kaa be elumɛbe nɛ hakilɛ bemɛ puu bobojodɛin.
Kaa u kai, waaru wooi hakilɛ uwɔ gɔ daana, ɔɲɛ tariyɛ, u Kibɛru Ɛju taganɛ birɛ birɛ, birɛ uwɔ wooi nɛ Ama birɛbirɛnɛ kibaai biyɛ.
Nɛɛ, kuu ma sɔɔ sibɛ go, kinrun ma sadaga gin’ Ama bɛrɛ oboɲu waaru gɔ dɔwaai, aduna nɛ mu gooun waaru dɔwaai.
Mu jobu diyɛ gɔ jɔbaabɔn, tunmɔ galu jobu ma gɔ kilaai, mu gagawu gɔ gɛliyaabɔn.

Kanɛ baa, teitai ɔgɔdomɔ ma gɔ Ama numɔ nɛ yato, jobu jɔbu nɛ inɛ gɔnrɔn biyaajɛ tujɔ gɔ, Ama, inɛw teitai wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ tujɔ wo oboido gɔ woi. Saliyɛ kiru bai gɔ, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu saliyɛkirenɛ teitai wɔɔ gɔ, wo tujɔ ma mui ohobodo. Saliyɛ kiru bai wogɔ le, wo mu bɛrɛ sai tujɔ gɔ oboidolo, kaa inɛw dadaaru diyɛ le Inɛw Baŋa wɛi ye unruin wo tagaraido bai gɔ dɔmi gɔbe puu bɛrɛ ohobodo.
U mainiyaanjɛu ye ɔgu wɛɛ mui tɛmɛ.
Sabu Demasu, aduna kijɛ ihibɛ dɛi, mui pajaatiyaa, Tesalonike ana nɛ yaai. Kɛrɛsɛn, Galasi gana nɛ yaai, Tite, Dalumasi gana nɛ yaai.
Luka turu sai mu le wɔɔ. Marukai dimɛraanjɛu ye kole wɛɛ, sabu wo birɛ ma nɛ mui baru bɛbɛɛdo.
Mu Tisikei, Epɛse ana nɛ tiyaatun.
Waaru u wɛɛjɛ le, u Toroasu nɛ, Karupusu mɔ nɛ kaali arugoi naa mu paju gɔ, mu bɛrɛ kole wɛɛ. U dɔn ma gɔbe yaa kole wɛɛ, sigɛ le dɔn bɛlu guju le yegeraaɲu gɔbe naŋanɔu.
Alɛsandere, irunɛ gɔ, wo amasɔgɔjugɔla birɛ mu bɛrɛ biraabe. Inɛw Baŋa, birɛ mɔɲu womɔ le kɛukɛu woi tutujɔdo.
U kanran, wo dɛi kuu uwɔ kajuba, sabu wo Ama sɔɔ emɛ tagajɛ gɔ le saii jaiyɛuwɔ.
Kubɔ pɔlɔ, paŋagunw giru nɛ, kuu ma goonu sɔɔ dɛi mui booni le, inɛ turu kanran mui wogɔ dɛi baralu. Be puu mui pajaatiyaa yain. Ama, wogɔ mɔɲu le bei tujɔnɔu.
Kaa Inɛw Baŋa Yesu wo mui baraa, wo mui paŋa obaabe. Kɔɔ gin’ mu Ama sɔɔ gɔ sɛɛu tagaa, inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe ɛgaabɛin. Ama, yiun aŋa nɛ mui yabaabe.
Inɛw Baŋa Yesu mɔɲu wooi nɛ mui yayabado, iyaa wo sɛɛu, jamu le alagala diinɛ womɔ nɛ mui yoyoomɔdo. Boi sɔmu gɔ, asuu nasuu womɔi biyɛmɔ. Amina.
Mu Pirisilu lee, Akilasu leei poonɔuwɔn, iyaa Onɛsipore ginrun gonɔ bɛɛnw kanran poonɔuwɔn.
Erasute, Kɔrɛnte ana nɛ biyaai, iyaa mu Toropimɛ jijinwɛnjɛ dɛi, woi Mile nɛ pajaabɔn.
U kaali waaru dɔɔmɔ nɛ, maini ye wɛɛ. Ebulusu lee, Pudɛnsu lee, Linusu lee, Kulɔdia lee, gagawu nɛ ba unrunw emɛ bɔɔnw gɔbe lee, be puu ui poonɔuwɔin.
Inɛw Baŋa u le biyɛ. Ama nɛɛma gɔ e le biyɛ.
Mu Pɔlu, Ama birɛbirɛnɛ gɔ, Yesu Kirisito jaŋu ii tiyaaɲu gɔ, lɛtɛrɛ ɔn, mu tiiuwɔ. Inɛw Ama yɛmaabe gɔbe, maa bei gagawu nɛ dimɛrɛn jɛɛlɛ ga, gagawu emɛ sɔɔ gɔ le kɛukɛu, bei naran gɔi jugɔmɔ ga,
kɔɔ le digɛnu bemaa ɔnmɔsɔgɔ bɛi diyɛdɔn le biyɛ ga, sagu wogɔ mu bɛrɛ duuraaɲu. Ama kakalu maŋaalɛ gɔ, aduna maŋamɔ nɛ, wo ɔnmɔsɔgɔ wogɔ emɛ bɛrɛ ohobodo ga pui kunaabe.
Waaru jaan gɔ wo dɔwaa, waaju mu bɛrɛ wo gawaraabe gɔ le digɛu, Ama, ɔnmɔsɔgɔ wogɔ, sɔɔ womɔ le jugɔmaabe. Ama emi Yabanɛ gɔ mu bɛrɛ tɔɔraabe dɛi, mu ɔnmɔsɔgɔ diyɛdɔn wogɔ tagauwɔn.
Tite, u, gagawu emɛ lɛi turu wɔɔ nɛ ii maa tɔitɔi gɔ, mu lɛtɛrɛ ɔn u bɛrɛ tiiuwɔn. Ba Ama lee, Kirisito Yesu emi Yabanɛ gɔ lee, nɛɛma lee, jamu lee ui obo.
Uwaa sɔɔ yegeraa kilɛlu gɔbei kilɛmɔ ga, iyaa uwaa ana tuturu nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu nɛ inɛw naw yɛmɛ daana ga, mu wogɔ dɛi Kɛrɛte gana nɛ ui pajaabɔn. Sɔɔ u bɛrɛ mu sɔi gɔbe naŋanɔu.

Inɛ na, inɛ nɛ jarugu turu kanran tɛmɛmɔidoloi biyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Woi yaanran turu igɛi biyɛun jaan. Unrunw womɔ Yesu jaŋu unrunwin biyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Unrunw gɔbe ajubu sɛlɛ bemɛ dɛi lee, sɔɔ yabala bemɛ dɛi lee, boi mɔɲu bemɛ gowaa wɔɔ inɛwin biyɛun jaanla.

Ama inɛw mɔɔnu kajubanɛ gɔ, Ama birɛ gɔ wo sagi dɛi, wo le jarugu turu kanran tɛmɛmɔu jaanla. Woi, inɛ diŋɛ unrunmɔ kanrannɛi ma, kinɛ ɔgu ingelemɔnɛi ma, kɔɲɔnɔɔnɛi ma, inɛ koloi ma, inɛ nabara le kijɛ dɛnɛnɛi ma, wo biyɛun jaanla.
Kaa inɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu kajubanɛ gɔ, ginrun sugo obonɛi biyɛ, ɛju dɛnɛnɛi biyɛ, inɛ kuu kajubu le wɔɔi, woi inɛ teitai, inɛ kuu unrunmɔ Ama nɛ sɛɛu obaa wɔɔ, inɛ dimɛ le wɔɔi biyɛun jaain wɔɔ.

Deeru nanaa gɔ le ba unrunw gagawu nɛ wo bɔɔnw gɔbei mainiyɛnmɔ bɛɛ ga, iyaa inɛw sɔɔ nanaa gɔ le jiiru kunɔw gɔbe aŋa pinɛ bɛɛ ga, wo sɔɔ nanaa gɔ, bana deerin le kɛukɛu, ɛjii ai wo gɛliyɛun jaain wɔɔ.
Inɛw kɔkɔlɔmaagunw gɔbe lee, inɛw sɔɔ koolo koolo joo sɔɔnw gɔbe lee, iyaa inɛw lelemɔw gɔbe, sigɛ le Yahutunw tubu kanraanɲu gɔbe logoro nɛ jooi wɔin.
U deeru teitai laa deereu be wɔɔ gɔ nɛ bei tɛŋɛ. Sabu be nabara le kɛɛlɛ bɛɛɲu giye deeru deereun jaanla be deerejɛ gɔ dɛi, be inɛw ginrun duu gamuu nɛ toin gɔbe puu lelemɔuwɔin.
Be bainɛ turu, inɛ titiyainɛ bemɛ turu, ɔn gin’ sɔi: “Kɛrɛte bɛɛnw, jaa kakalumaŋawin, be olunawan mɔɲube gin’ wɔin. Bei walagunw kɔrujagunwin.”
Ainɛ kɔɔ sɔɔ gi gɔ narain. Kɔɔ dɛi u inɛw deeru teitai laa deerenw gɔbei, bemaa gagawu tɔitɔi gɔ bɛɛ ga, ɛjii ganwan,
bemaa Yahutunw elumɛ gɔbe lee, inɛw naran gɔ pajaatiyaa wɔin tɔɔru gɔbe lee keŋiyɛnnɔu ga, bei ganwan.

Inɛw kikinu sibɛ go ɛjaa wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ, kijɛ lɔgɔjiyaa wɔɔ turu kanran wɔlɔ. Kaa inɛw hakɛ le lɔgɔjiyaa, naran gɔ le gawanɛ gɔbe bɛrɛ, kijɛ ɛjaa wɔɔ turu kanran wɔlɔ. Sabu hakilɛ bemɛ lee, kinɛjugɔ bemɛ lee hakɛ le lɔgɔjiyaa yanwaan wɔɔ.
Be Amai igii wɔin gɛɛɲu, kaa birɛ bemɛ gɔ le be Amai naran go inin ga tagarauwɔin. Bei inɛw jɛbi. Be Ama sɔɔ yabaanɛ, sɔɔ ɛju turu kanran kanrun bɛɛnɛ.
U kai, deeru nanaa gɔ bana le kɛukɛu inɛwin deere.

Anranw pɛi gɔbe bɛrɛ taga, bemaa inɛw hakilɛ dɛinyaan wɔin biyɛun jaain wɔɔ wa. Bei inɛw jige ɛju sɛbei biyɛun jaan. Be kuu kajubu le biyɛun jaan. Bei inɛw gagawu nɛ lee, ihibɛ nɛ lee, muyɔn nɛ lee, ɛɛn go iŋi biyɛun jaan.

Kɔɔ gin’ yaanw pɛi gɔbei yaa taga, yaanw Ama le gawaa wɔin gɔbe aŋai biyɛun jaan gin’, bemaa kunrin biyɛ wa. Bei inɛw wajunw sɔɔ mɔɲu sɔɔwin biyɛun jaanla. Bei inɛw kɔɲɔnɔɔwin biyɛun jaanla. Be inɛw wajunw bɛrɛ kijɛ ɛjii wɔɔ gɔi deerewin biyɛun jaan.
Kunrin be yaanw dagunw gɔbe bemaa, be igɛbe lee, unrunw bemɛ lee ibɛɛ biyɛ ga,

kuu bemɛ ɛjii gɛliyɛ ga, ɛjaai biyɛ ga, ginrun bemɛ ɛjii kajuba ga, inɛw ɛjubei biyɛ ga, iyaa bemaa be igɛbe le tubi ye biyɛ ga, bei be deereun jaain wɔɔ. Kɔɔ gin’ inɛ turu kanran Ama sɔɔ dɛi sɔɔ mɔɲu sɔɔnɔu ga, yaanw dagunw gɔbe kijɛ kɔɔbe puu kanraun jaain wɔɔ.
Iyaa kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’, u sagatara unrunw gɔbe bemaa kuu kajubu le biyɛ ga bei tinwɛnrɛn.
Nɛɛ u kuu uwɔ le, kijɛ u kanranjɛ puu nɛ giretagurui biyɛ. Deeru uwɔ nɛ, u kinɛpilu le sɔɔ, u diyɛ daanu le biyɛ.
Iyaa kijɛ narain wɔɔ gɔ, inɛ turu kanran wogɔ jiiru bɛɛidolo gɔ, wogɔ sɔɔ. Inɛw u le jiiru kunɔw gɔbe, emɛ dɛi sɔɔ mɔɲu bɛɛnɛ kanraain ye, dɔgɔ bei aamɔ ga, u kijɛ kɔɔbe kanran.
Nɛɛ, gunɔw gɔbei tinwɛnrɛn, kijɛ wooi nɛ be baŋabe sɔɔ be yabaun jaain wɔɔ. Be baŋabe kinɛ kijɛ aajɛ be kanraun jaain wɔɔ. Iyaa be baŋabe sɔɔ be jiireun jaanla.

Be, be baŋabe kijɛ gunyɔun jaanla. Kaa be baŋabe be le gawu bɛbɛɛdɛin ga be tagaraun jaain wɔɔ. Kɔɔ le digɛnu inɛw bemaa kijɛ wooi nɛ Ama emi Yabanɛ gɔ deeru gɔ sɛɛrɛ ɛjii biyɛ ga be kunrin kanraun jaain wɔɔ.
Ama nɛɛma womɔ, nɛɛma le digɛnu inɛw wooi yayabu bɛɛido gɔ tagaraajɛ.
Emaa kijɛ Ama diŋɛ le sɛgɛrɛɛlɛ gɔ lee, aduna dadaaru gɔbe lee pajaatiyaa ye, aduna ɔn nɛ, kuu emɛ kajubanu, teitai bii ye, Ama diŋɛ le kɛukɛu biyɛ ga, nɛɛma wogɔ emi deerejɛ.
Diyɛdɔn ɛju emɛ bai gɔ lee, Ama diyɛnɛ emɛ emi Yabanɛ gɔ, Yesu Kirisito, dooro womɔ wo tagaraido bai gɔ lee dɔmiyaan wɔnu, kɔɔ gin’ biyɛun jaan.
Emaa mɔɲu wooi nɛ goo ga, hakɛ emɛ nɛ emi ɛjɛmɔ ga, emi tɔgu wo turu sai mɔi wɔɔi bojo ga, kijɛ ɛju kanrun nɛ emaa gaai mainiyɛn ga, Yesu Kirisito, kuu unrunmɔ emɛ dɛi obaabe.
Kunrin kijɛ kɔɔbe, kijɛ deereun u jaan gɔbe bei. Gɔnrɔn wooi le inɛwin mainiyɛnmɔ, iyaa bei ɛjii ɛjii sɔɔ. Inɛ turu kanran bɛrɛ ui gailiyɛmɔnɔu.
Inɛw bɛrɛ naŋaranmɔ, bemaa kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe lee, paŋagunw gɔbe lee le tubiye wa. Bemaa sɔɔ bemɛ yaba wa, kijɛ ɛju kanrun wooi dɛi yeguru le biyɛ wa.
Inɛ turu kanran dɛi sɔɔ mɔɲu be sɔɔun jaanla. Bei inɛw jai jaiyɛwin biyɛun jaanla. Inɛw kaalubei be biyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Iyaa inɛw puu le tɛgɛ sɛlɛ be biyɛun jaain wɔɔ.

Sabu emɛ yaa laa inɛw hakilɛ sɛnɛbei bɛin, sɔɔ yabau benɛ, emi lelaayaabe, dadaaru mɔɲu tɔgu dɛin dɛin lee, kijɛ kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔjɛ tɔgu dɛin dɛin lee gunɔwin bɛin. Emɛ mɔmɔɲu nɛ lee, ele nɛ lee tobɛin. Inɛw emi ibiliyaa bɛin, emɛ yaa tunmɔi ibiliyaa bɛin.
Kaa Ama, emi Yabanɛ gɔ, inɛw bɛrɛ, ɛhɛju womɔ lee, ihibɛ womɔ lee, waaru wo taguru le,

wo emi yabaabe. Kijɛ ɛju emɛ kanranjɛ turu kanran dɛi wo emi yabalu. Kaa wo amasɔgɔjugɔ womɔ dɛi emi yabaabe. Wo hakɛ emɛ nɛ emi mɔŋaa ɛjɛmaa, emi pilemaa wo naranmu gɔ lee, iyaa ɔnmɔ kana Kikinu Pilu obojɛ gɔ lee le emi yabaabe.

Emaa kɔɔ gin’ Ama nɛɛma gɔ le digɛnu, giru womɔ nɛ inɛw teitai wɔin bii ye, iyaa ɔnmɔsɔgɔ kuu nɛ diyɛ daanaa emɛ wɔɔ gɔ kɛn balanwin biyɛ ga, Ama, Yesu Kirisito emi Yabanɛ gɔ le digɛu, Kikinu Pilu gɔ kuu emɛ nɛ gaai togaa kɔɔraabe.
Sɔɔ mu sɔi kɔɔ narain. Kɔɔ dɛi inɛw Ama le gawaa wɔin gɔbe, bemaa maini ye birɛ ɛju nɛ kuu bemɛ kunɔ ga, u kijɛ kɔɔbe gimɛ ye gimɛ ye taga. Sabu deeru kɔɔbe, deeru ɛjui, iyaa inɛwin babarado.
Kaa, jiiru bomɔgube ma, tirɛ anranw joo joo boi boonu ma, jai ma, Yahutunw tɔɔru tiyɛ dɛi jai ma, wogɔbe le wageniyɛn. Sabu wogɔ inɛwin baraalɛ, iyaa tiyɛ sɛlɛ.

Kɔɔ gin’ iyaa, inɛ turu inɛw gawaa wɔin gɔbe logoro nɛ kabu kunɔjɛ ye, womaa wogɔ kanrannɔu ga, woi tinwɛnrɛn. Wo nimɛ kanran yabalu biyaa ye, kubɔ lɛiye gɔ woi tinwɛnrɛn. Kɔɔ wooi logoro nɛ wo yabalu ye, nɛɛ u inɛ wogɔ baŋa le dɔrɔ goo.
Inɛ kɔɔ tunmɔ, oju teitai gɔi pajaati ga, u igii wɔu. Iyaa hakɛ womɔ gɔbe, woi lelu nɛ too ga tatagaraɲu.
Mu, u bɛrɛ Arutemasu ma, Tisike ma titiidɔn. Kɔɔ waaru le, u maini ye Nikopolise ana gɔ nɛ wɛɛ mui tɛmɛ. Sabu kaali waaru galaido baa kɔɔ nɛ bibiyɛdɔn ga, mu ajubaa wɔun.
Iyaa tɔɔru jugɔnɛ Senasu lee, Apɔlɔsu lee waaru Kɛrɛte be gooido le, bemaa oji bemɛ dɛi kijɛ kai be sɛɛ puu siyɛ ga, u bei ɛjii niinɛ.
Iyaa jaŋu unrunw emɛ bɔɔnw gɔbe kanran, inɛw kai maa le wɔin gɔbei bara ga, bemaa inɛw wajunw bɛrɛ niwɛn siyɛ ga, birɛ ɛju nɛ giru go yai be deemɔ.
Nɛɛ, kɔɔ gin’ jaŋu unrunw mu le wɔin gɔbe puu ui poonɔuwɔin. Emɛ kanran jaŋu unrunw kɔɔ nɛ u le wɔin gɔbe, inɛw emi ibɛɛ wɔin gɔbei poonɔuwɔin. Ama nɛɛma gɔ e wooi le biyɛ.
Mu Pɔlu, inɛ Kirisito Yesu dɛi kajuginɛi wɔɔ gɔ lee, iyaa emɛ bainɛ Timɔte lee, emɛ lɛtɛrɛ ɔn, bainɛ ibɛ emɛ, birɛbirɛnɛ emɛ bɔɔnɛ Pilemɔ lee,
Ama inɛw mɔɔnu, ginrun uwɔ nɛ mɔrinyɛun wɔɔ lee, emɛ sainɛ Apia lee, iyaa birɛ dɛi inɛ mainiyaan kuu womɔ obaa wɔɔ gɔ emɛ bɔɔnɛ Arusipe lee bɛrɛ tiiuwɔin.
Ama emɛ Ba lee, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito lee, e bɛrɛ nɛɛma lee, jamu lee obo.
Waaru Ama mu gɛɛnjɛ puu, mu ui ajubauwɔn, iyaa, Ama mai birɛpoo tagauwɔn,
sabu mu, Ama inɛw gɔbe puu sibɛ go ihibɛ u sɛɛ gɔ lee, iyaa Inɛw Baŋa Yesu nɛ gagawu uwɔ bana wɔɔ lee sɔɔ be sɔɔu ɛgɛuwɔn.
Gagawu nɛ, emɛ lee, u lee bɔɔ kunaa emɛ sɛɛ gɔ, Kirisito nɛ kijɛ ɛju emɛ sɛɛ gɔbe puu nɛ jugɔ kibaai gɔ u bɛrɛ obu bɛɛ ga, mu Ama bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn.
Mu bainɛ, ihibɛ le u wɔɔ gɔ dɛi, mu kinɛ ɛɛlu diyɛ lee, anrangaju diyɛ lee biyaabɔn, sabu u Ama inɛw gɔbe kinɛ kaaliyɛmaabeu.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, halu mu Kirisito nɛ u bɛrɛ tɔɔru tɔɔrɔ ga, kara yasɔn kanran,
ihibɛ boi le u bɛrɛ gɛɛn gɛɛn mu bɛrɛ ire. Kɔɔ gin’, mu Pɔlu ainɛ na pɛi gɔ, iyaa sigiyaa Kirisito Yesu dɛi kaju nɛ kunaa sɛin gɔ,
mu Onɛsimɛ dɛi u bɛrɛ gɛɛn gɛɛunwɔn. Wo, waaru kaju nɛ mu too gɔ le, Kirisito nɛ ii mai biyaai.
Pɔɔlɔ wo u bɛrɛ inɛ niwɛn toloi bee, kaa kanɛ, u lee, mu lee bɛrɛ niwɛn yasɛ.
Wo, inɛ mu bɛrɛ saii maai wɔɔ gɔ, mu woi u bɛrɛ pilemaa tiiuwɔn.
Waaru Kibɛru Ɛju tagu gɔ dɛi kaju nɛ mu too gɔ le, dilɛ uwɔ nɛ womaa mui bara ga, woi mu le bojo ga mu bɛrɛ gaai ɛjii bibiyɛbe.
Kaa, kinɛ uwɔ aalu wo wɔnu, mu kijɛ turu kanran kanran ga ibɛlaun. Mu uwaa mu bɛrɛ ɛju kanrun kaara ga wɔlɔn. Diŋɛ uwɔ le u kanranjɛ mu bɛrɛ ire.
Uwaa Onɛsimɛi asuu pilemu siyɛ ga, waaru gaila le u le kabi bibiyɛ.
Sabu, kanɛ woi gunɔnɛ peerei laa, kaa wo gunɔnɛ dɛi ire: Woi bainɛ ibɛ mai. Woi mu bɛrɛ saii maai wɔɔ. Kaa gunɔnɛ gin’ lee, Inɛw Baŋa nɛ bainɛ gin’ lee, woi sigɛ le u bɛrɛ gaara maai biyɛun jaan.
Nɛɛ, u mui birɛbirɛnɛ u bɔɔnɛ gin’ lugaa sɛu ye, bana mui u sɛgɛrɛido gin’, woi kunrin tee sɛgɛrɛ.
Wo u bɛrɛ sɔɔ jaanla kanraanbe ye, maa, u bɛrɛ kijɛ wo tujɔun jaan yɔɔ ye, wogɔ kuu ma nɛ duurɔ.
Mu numɔ ma le sɔɔ ɔn u bɛrɛ tɔŋɔuwɔn: Mu Pɔlu, yoru uwɔ gɔ puu u bɛrɛ tutujɔdɔn. Nɛɛ, u kinrun uwɔ mu dɛi u oboun jaain wɔɔ sɔɔ gɔ kai sɔɔnu doori.
Aiwa, mu bainɛ, mu u bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn, Inɛw Baŋa dɛi u sin ɔn mu bɛrɛ kanran: Kirisito nɛ bainɛ too gin’, u kinɛ ma kaaliyɛmɔ.
Lɛtɛrɛ ɔn waaru u bɛrɛ mu tɔŋɔjɛ le, kijɛ u bɛrɛ mu gɛɛnjɛ gɔ, u wogɔ kakanrandou ga mu gawaa wɔun. U wogɔ kuu nɛ baraa ye kanrandou ga mu igii wɔun.
Iyaa kɔɔ gin’, u mu dɛi ginrun diinyɛnɲu kanran yegere. Sabu Ama, gɛɛn ebe saa ye, mui kaju nɛ goonu ye e bɛrɛ pilemɛ ye titiido diyɛdɔn le wɔun.
Epaparase, Kirisito Yesu dɛi mu le kaju nɛ too gɔ, wo ui poonɔuwɔ.
Iyaa, Maruka lee, Arisutaruke lee, Demasu lee, Luka lee, birɛbirɛnw mu bɔɔnw gɔbe ui poonɔuwɔin.
Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito nɛɛma gɔ e le biyɛ.
Pɔɔlɔ, kubɔ lugo joo le, bana dɛin dɛin le, inɛw Ama titiyaanw le digɛu, Ama, emɛ babe bɛrɛ sɔɔ sɔi.
Kaa bai dumɔrɔn ɔnbe nɛ, Ama, Aini unrunmɔ le digɛu emɛ bɛrɛ sɔwaabe. Wo woi kijɛ puu kɛn balanɛi bojaabe. Iyaa wo le digɛu adunai maŋu.

Aini wogɔ, Ama dooro wo le dooriyejɛ, Ama bana wɔɔ gin’ tee wɔɔ, kijɛ puu sɔɔ unrunmɔ gɔnrɔn le dɔnwaan gɛlɛ. Hakɛ ɛjɛmɔɲu birɛ gɔ kibemaatiyaa, wo alagala go Ama, baba diyɛ baŋa numɔ iin sibɛ nɛ dɛinyin.
Kunrin, Aini gɔ, Ama wo bɛrɛ boi obu gɔ, mɛlɛnkɛbe boi dɛi gaa bana wɔɔ gin’, wo kanran be dɛi sigɛ biyaai.
Mɛlɛnkɛ aa bɛrɛ Ama ɔn gin’ sɔwaatɛli: “Ui Aini mai, iye mu ui narun.” Maa, “Mu wo bai biyɛdɔn, wo Aini mai biyɛdo.”
Sigiyaa, Ama, Aini pɔlɔ womɔ waaru aduna nɛ wo tii le, wo sɔwaa gi: “Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔbe puu woi be demɛniyɛnmɔmu!”
Mɛlɛnkɛbe dɛi sɔɔ wo gi unwɔ: “Wo mɛlɛnkɛ womɔbei ooɲɔi bojojɛ, birɛbirɛnw womɔbei yaun bijei bojojɛ.”
Kaa Aini gɔ dɛi kijɛ wo gi: “Ama, ɔgɔdɔin uwɔ asuu nasuu yɔɔ. Diinɛ uwɔ nɛ teitai gɔ, ɔgɔbaga gɔ woi biyɛdo.
U teitai ibiyaa, teitai laa ibiliyaabeu. Kɔɔ dɛi, Ama, Ama uwɔ gɔ, ui yɛmaa, ɔgɔnw kuu nɛ nii togo kɔɔrɔɲu gin’ kinɛ ɛɛli le ui joonaabe. Wo kunrin ui u bɔɔnw gɔbe dɛi sigɛ bojaabe.”
Ama iyaa sɔwaa gi: “U Inɛw Baŋa, tɔlɔgu gɔ le, u aduna bɔlɔtei daanaabeu. Iyaa alagala gɔbe numɔ uwɔ birɛi.
Kɔɔbe puu susuiyodɛin, kaa u yɔɔu. Be puu pɛyaa ye sɔi gin’ sɛsɛmiliyɛdɛin.
U arugoi diyɛ gin’ bei mumunɔdou. Sɔi dilɛɲu gin’ bei didilɛdɛin. Kaa u kai, u jaa tunmai. Iyaa anranguju uwɔbe dumɔ sɛnɛ.”
Mɛlɛnkɛ aa bɛrɛ Ama ɔn gin’ sɔwaatɛli: “Jaŋuw uwɔ gɔbe gɔnrɔn ye kubɔ uwɔ doɲu nɛ yai mu kunɔido baa, uwɔ numɔ iin ma sibɛ nɛ wɛɛ dɛinyɛn.”
Kɔɔ biyaai ye, titiyaanw gɔbe puu, kikinu Ama dɛi birɛbirɛnwin. Yayabu gɔ inɛw bɛɛidɛin gɔbei bara ga bei tiyaaɲu.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, emaa sɔɔ naran emɛ ɛgu gɔ nɛ emi goi ye wageniyɛnnɔu ga, sɔɔ gɔ ɛjii ai gɛli ye, emɛ kajubaun jaain wɔɔ.
Sabu mɛlɛnkɛbe sɔɔ sɔi gɔ narain ga iyemaabe tilai wo wɔnu, nɛ yɛnɛ iyaa sɔɔ kɔɔ inɛ digiyɛlu, kole yabalu gɔ, tujɔ wo le jaan gɔ biyaabe tilai wo wɔnu,
emɛ yayabu diyɛ ɔn lugolu kanraanɲu ye, yani ɛli bɛɛdɛin? Inɛw Baŋa kuu womɔ le wo laa yayabu kɔɔ sɔɔ wo tagaa inɛw ɛgin gɔbe, sɔɔ gɔ narain ga emɛ bɛrɛ yinjugɔmi.

Ama yaa sɛɛrɛ taanrinyɛn lee, yarabirɛ lee, taanrinyɛn tɔgu dɛin dɛin lee, be le digɛu kanranmaabe. Wo iyaa Kikinu Pilu sin obu gɔbe diŋɛ womɔ le kɛukɛu gamalaabe. Kunrin, wo sɛɛrɛ wo goobe nɛ paŋa oboube.
Aduna wɛɛido sɔɔ emɛ sɔɔjɛ gɔ, Ama, aduna wogɔ kuu nɛ mɛlɛnkɛbei daanalu.
Kaa inɛ turu Ama Dɔn yalu turu nɛ sɛɛrɛ ɔn gowaa gi: “Inɛ, kijɛ ingei bai, Ama, u woi ajubadou? Adama ii kijɛ ingei bai, woi kajubadou?
U gaila woi mɛlɛnkɛbe doɲu nɛ bojaabeu. U dooro lee, baba lee ɔgɔdomɔ gin’ kuu womɔ nɛ kunaabeu.
U kijɛ puu kubɔsɔrɔ womɔ nɛ wo le tubiyemaabeu.” Ama kijɛ puu inɛ le tubiyemaabe ye, tiyɛ gɔ kijɛ wo le tubiyelu turu kanran bojolu. Yinkanran, kanɛ kijɛ puu wo le tubiyaain ga emɛ iyeuwɔnɛ.

Kaa emɛ sɔɔ ɔn igii wɔin: Yesu, Ama nɛɛma dɛi, inɛw wooi dɛi yinwɛn ga, gaila woi mɛlɛnkɛbe doɲu nɛ bojaabɛin. Yiun wo muyɔn gɔ dɛi, dooro lee, baba lee ɔgɔdomɔ gin’ kuu womɔ nɛ kunaa, emɛ kanɛ woi iyeuwɔin.

Naran go Ama kijɛ puu mɔiyɛnmɔnɛ baŋa gɔ, iyaa kijɛ puu wo dɛi wɔɔ baŋa gɔ, inɛw jooi dooro unrunmɔ nɛ kunɔ ga, ɔɲɛ gɔ le digɛu Yesui kibaai wo boju gɔ, wogɔ jaain bee. Sabu yayabu bemɛ nɛ bei teeremɔnɛ gɔ Yesu woi.
Yesu, hakɛ nɛ inɛ ɛjɛmɔnɛ baŋa gɔ lee, inɛw hakɛ nɛ wo ɛjɛmu gɔbe lee, be puu ba turu. Kɔɔ digɛu, bei unrun ba unrunw boonɔ ga dɔgɔ woi sɛlɛ.
Ama le sɔwaa kijɛ wo gi: “Mu mu ba unrunw bɛrɛ boi uwɔ tatagadɔn. Mu mɔɔnu gɔ logoro nɛ u dɛi boi sɔmu nii niniidɔn.”
Wo iyaa sɔwaa gi: “Mu diyɛ ma Ama nɛ dadaanadɔn.” Gimaa iyaa gi: “Mu, Ama mu bɛrɛ unrunw obu gɔ le unwɔun.”
Unrunw gɔbe goju nɛ ilii jɔbɔjɛ dɛi, Yesu, wo kanran goju wogɔ tunmɔ jeɲaabe. Wo yiun womɔ le digɛu, jinrun puu kuu baŋa, yiun paŋa, numɔ womɔ nɛ too baŋa gɔnrɔn donugo ga kɔɔ gin’ kanrun.
Iyaa inɛw kinruntaun bemɛ wooi nɛ, yiun liliyɛ bemɛ dɛi gunɔ toin gɔbei gunɔ gɔ nɛ goonɔ ga kɔɔ gin’ kanrun.
Sabu wo mɛlɛnkɛbe jobu digilui saai wɛɛlu, kaa, Abarahamu tirɛ unrunw jobudigilu saai wɛi ga daii wɔɔ.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, wo Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋai, Ama birɛ nɛ amasɔgɔjugɔnɛi, sɔɔ turu baŋai bii ye, inɛw hakɛ mɛɛnɛ ga, waajibi kijɛ puu nɛ wo ba unrunw bana jeɲɛu jaain bee.
Woi waaru suburin le, wo kuu womɔ le ɔɲaabe dɛi, inɛw subɔrɔ nɛ toin gɔbei bara bɛbɛɛjɛ.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, ba unrunw Ama inɛwin wɔin gɔbe, e kanran inɛw Ama boonaajɛi wɔin gɔbe, Yesui ajubu yɛnɛi: Ama woi tiyaa, gagawu sɔɔ emɛ sɔɔjɛ nɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋai boju.
Mɔise, Ama ginrun gɔ puu nɛ birɛbirɛnɛ sɔɔ turu baŋai bii gin’, Yesu, Ama woi daananɛ gɔ le sɔɔ turu baŋai biyaabe.
Ginrun ujɔnɛ, ginrun gɔ dɛi sigɛ baba wo bɛɛjɛ gin’, Mɔise dɛi sigɛ Yesu le baba jaan ga yinlugaaɲu.
Ginrun tuturu puu inɛ uju. Kaa kijɛ puu ujɔnɛ gɔ Amai.
Mɔise kai, Ama sɔɔ gɛɛido dɛi sɛɛrɛ goo ga, birɛbirɛnɛi go, Ama ginrun gɔ puu nɛ sɔɔ turu baŋai bii.
Kaa Kirisito, Ainii go Ama ginrun kuu nɛ dɛinyaan, sɔɔ turu baŋai wɔɔ. Emɛ kijɛ bɛbɛɛdɛin ga kuu emɛ unaa emɛ sɛɛ gɔ nɛ, liyɛ sɛlɛ gɔ lee, diyɛdɔn gɔ lee gɛliyaa kole wɔin ye, Ama ginrun gɔ emi.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, nɛɛ, Kikinu Pilu bana sɔi gin’: “Iye e Ama mii ɛgaajɛi ye,
murutu waaru le olusolo nɛ Amai bai suburin gɔbe le bana bii gin’, e kɔkɔlɔmaa le biyɛnɔugi.
Ama gi: ‘E babe, anranguju pɛnai birɛ ma iyaabɛin kanran, olusolo gɔ nɛ mui subɔraa yɛnaabɛin.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, mu waaru wogɔ inɛw le kinɛ banraan, kijɛ mu gi: Be waaru puu ajubu bemɛ nɛ mana mana yaauwɔin. Be oju mabe sɔɔ paamu kanrun yabanɛ.
Kodigɛu, mu kinɛbanrun ma le wɔu, mui jɛbiyaa, bemaa deeliye be dɛi mu boju gɔ nɛ asuu yooidenɛ gun.’’
Mu ba unrunw, logoro ebe nɛ inɛ turu kanran kinɛ mɔɲu kunɔ ye, gagawu sɛlɛ le bii ye, Ama ɔnmɔi wɔɔ gɔi pajanɔu ga kuu ebe kajubai.
Kaa logoro ebe nɛ hakɛ inɛ turui manamɔ ye, kɔkɔlɔmaa kunɔmɔnɔu ga, iye, waaru ɛju emɛ sɛɛ gɔ le, e bai puu tunmɔ tinwɛnrɛin.
Sabu diyɛdɔn le emɛ tɔlu gɔ, dumɔ gɔ baa ɛɛn go yagɛlɛin biyaai ye, emi Kirisito le bɔɔi.
Ama Dɔn sɔwaa, “Iye e Ama mii ɛgaajɛi ye, murutu waaru le bana bii gin’, kɔkɔlɔmaa le biyɛnɔugi” gi.
Inɛw Ama mii ɛgaabɛin, kaa murutu kanrin gɔbe aabei? Inɛw Mɔise bei teeremaa, Ejipute gana nɛ goin gɔbe puu bei laa ma?
Anranguju pɛnai, Ama, inɛw aabe le kinɛbanrun le bee? Inɛw hakɛ kanraan olusolo nɛ numaa yayinwin gɔbei laa ma?
Iyaa Ama jɛbiyaa, inɛw aabe deeliye be dɛi unrun boju gɔ nɛ asuu yooidenɛ gi? Inɛw sɔɔ womɔ yabalu kanranw gɔbei laa ma?
Inɛw kɔɔbe gagawu sɛlɛ bemɛ sabu dɛi deeliye wogɔ nɛ yoonɛ kanrin ga emɛ iyeuwɔin.
Deeliye wogɔ nɛ yoo ga, Ama pui gɔ emɛ le yɔɔ digɛu, logoro ebe nɛ inɛ turu bɛɛ yoolu kakanrando ma liyɛmɔi.
Inɛw olusolo nɛ bɛin gɔbe bɛrɛ tagin gin’, Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ emɛ bɛrɛ kanran yintagin. Kaa sɔɔ be ɛgu gɔ, be gagawu le yabanɛ digɛu, sɔɔ gɔ be bɛrɛ niwɛn siyɛlu.

Deeliye dɛi Ama sɔwaa: “Mu kinɛbanrun ma le wɔu mui jɛbiyaa, bemaa deeliye be dɛi mu boju gɔ nɛ asuu yooidenɛ gun” wo gi gɔ, emɛ inɛw gawaaɲu gɔbe, deeliye wogɔ nɛ emɛ yoojɛ. Ama, aduna maŋu le baa birɛ womɔ kilaa yaabe kanran, wo sɔɔ kɔɔ sɔwaabe.
Sabu Ama Dɔn yalu turu nɛ, bai sɔiye gɔ dɛi sɔwaa, “Bai sɔiye gɔ, Ama birɛ wo birɛbe puu dɛɛnrinyaanbe” gin.
Yalu waja nɛ wo iyaa sɔwaa, “Be deeliye be dɛi mu boju gɔ nɛ asuu yooidenɛ” gin.
Kɔɔi ye inɛw be laa deeliye nɛ yoi Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ ɛgin gɔbe, gagawu sɛlɛ bemɛ dɛi deeliye gɔ nɛ yoonɛ digɛu, inɛw gamuu nimɛ bɛɛ yoyoomɔ.
Kodigɛu, Ama pilemaa bai kɛjaajɛ. Wo iye gi. Waaru diyɛ galaa wo yaa, wo Dawide le digɛu, Ama Dɔn yalu giru nɛ gin gɔ nɛ wogɔ sɔi, gi: “Iye e Ama mii ɛgaajɛi ye, kɔkɔlɔmaa le biyɛnɔugi.”
Josue, inɛw gɔbei deeliye nɛ yoomaabe ye, Ama kɔɔ onu nɛ bai waja sɔɔ sɔɔbele.
Kɔɔi biyaa ye, Ama, bai sɔiye gɔ le wo dɛɛnrin gin’, Ama inɛw dɛi deeliye kɔɔ tunmɔ yɔɔ.
Sabu Ama deeliye boju gɔ nɛ inɛ yowaajɛ, Ama, birɛ unrunmɔ nɛ wo dɛɛnrinyaanbe gin’, kɔɔbaŋa kanran birɛ unrunmɔ nɛ dɛdɛɛnrinyɛndo.
Kɔɔ digɛu maini ye deeliye wogɔ nɛ yoomɔi. Logoro emɛ nɛ inɛ turu kanran, sɔɔ yabala wogɔ tunmɔ le bii ye, deeliye gɔ nɛ bɛɛ yoolu kanrannɔu ga mainiyɛnmɔi.

Ama sɔɔ gɔ, sɔɔ ɔnmɔi, gɔnrɔn yasɛ, polukaaba aŋa lɛi wooi dɛi sigɛ sii wɔɔ. Wo kikinu lee, kinrun lee yalu kabiyɛjɛ go baa yayoojɛ. Digu gɔbe lee, bɔnu lee yalu kabiyɛjɛ go baa yayoojɛ. Wo kinɛ dadaaru gɔbe lee, kinɛ ajubu lee saliyɛ kirenɛi.
Kijɛ maŋaaɲu, Ama giru nɛ baŋiyaan wɔɔ turu kanran wɔlɔ. Ama, sɔɔ emɛ puu wo bɛrɛ sɔɔi emɛ do baŋa gɔ, kijɛ puu giru womɔ nɛ dɛbulu ye ije go biyɛjɛ.
Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa diyɛ, alagala nɛ Ama giru nɛ baa dɔwaa wɔɔ gɔ emɛ yasin. Wogɔ Ama Aini Yesui. Kodigɛu, gagawu emɛ sɔɔ emɛ sɔɔjɛ gɔ ɛjii gɛliyɛmɔi.
Sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa, yɛbɛlɛ emɛ nɛ emɛ le ɔɲɔ bɛɛlɛi emɛ sɛnɛ. Kaa kijɛ puu nɛ emɛ gin’ woi subɔraabɛin. Kaa wo hakɛ kanranlu.
Kɔɔi biyaa ye, Ama womaa amasɔgɔ emɛ jugɔ ga, emaa nɛɛma bɛi ye, waaru jaan gɔ le jobudigilu emɛ saa ga, emɛ liyɛ sɛlɛ go Ama ɔgɔdɔin giru nɛ dɔɔmɔi.
Sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa tuturu wooi, inɛw logoro nɛ Ama woi yɛmɛjɛ. Inɛw dɛi Ama birɛ birɛ ga woi daanaaɲu. Sin obu lee, hakɛ yaabu kanrun sadaga lee Ama bɛrɛ dɔɔnɔnɛi.
Wo kuu womɔ le, yɛbɛlɛ wo bɛrɛ dɔɔ bɛbɛɛjɛ digɛu, inɛw sɔɔ inin, lelu nɛ toin gɔbe amasɔgɔ jugɔ bɛbɛɛjɛ.
Wo kuu womɔ le yɛbɛlɛginɛi sabu dɛi, tɔgu womɔ inɛw hakɛ dɛi Ama bɛrɛ sadaga wo dɔɔnɔjɛ gin’, kuu womɔ hakɛ dɛi kanran, Ama bɛrɛ sadaga wo dɔɔnɔu jaain wɔɔ.
Inɛ turu kanran sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋai bii baba gɔ kuu unrunmɔ bɛrɛ obu bɛɛlɛ. Kaa Aarɔn mɔ bana bii gin’, Amai wogɔ nɛ inɛi boonɔjɛ.

Kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’, Kirisito gɔ, sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋai bii baba gɔ, kuu unrunmɔ bɛrɛ wo obolu. Kaa wo le sɔwaa, “Ui Aini mai, iye mu ui narun”, iyaa, “U Mɛlukisedɛku mɔ gin’ asuu Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛi wɔu”, Ama gɛɛnɛ gɔ, baba kɔɔ wo bɛrɛ wo obu.

Yesu aduna nɛ waaru wo bee le, wo amagɛɛn lee, kai womɔ Ama bɛrɛ tagu lee, kɔun diyɛ le giridii le, Ama, yiun nɛ woi yabu bɛɛbe baŋa bɛrɛ sɔmiyaanbe. Ama yaa, Yesu, baba le wo le tubiyaa wo wɔɔ gɔ dɛi, gɛɛn womɔ gɔ saabe.
Kaa halu wo Ama Ainii kanran, wo ɔɲɛ wo iye gɔ le digɛu sɔɔ yabu deyaabe.
Woi kibaai waaru bojin le, inɛw sɔɔ womɔ yabanw wooi bɛrɛ wo yayabu asuu wɔɔ obonɛi biyaai.
Ama yaa woi Mɛlukisedɛku mɔ gin’, sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋai bojaabe.
Sɔɔ kanɛ emɛ sɔi kɔɔbe kuu nɛ emɛ sɔɔ joo sɔɔun yasin. Kaa e sɔɔ paamu kanrun nɛ ɔgulai digɛu, tiyɛ bemɛ e bɛrɛ taga ga nawin wɔɔ.
Waaru ɔn le jaŋudeerewin e biyɛun jaan bee. Kaa Ama sɔɔ sibɛ go sɔɔ pɔlɔ jugɔun jaan gɔbe e bɛrɛ deere ga e nimɛ kai yasɛi. Jaa gunu kaya dɛi, e nimɛ kanran iru kai yasɛi.
Inɛ iru sai nɔɔjɛ, nimɛ ii digɛu, teitai sɔɔ kabu kunu bɛɛlɛ.
Kaa jaa gunu inɛw naw mɔi. Be wɛɛjiyɛu, wɛɛjiyɛu, ɛju lee, mɔɲu lee kabu kunu deyaain.

Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Kirisito deeru sɔɔ pɔlɔ gɔbe sai nɛ biyɛlu kanraan ye, giru go inɛw naw le deeru jaan gɔ nɛ yaamɔi. Emɛ sɔɔ pɔlɔ gɔbe nɛ pilemu pilemu wɛɛ kanranmɔnɔugin. Tiyɛ gɔ birɛ niwɛn sɛlɛ gɔbe le onu duloti lee, Ama le diyɛ daana lee,
batise dɛin dɛin deeru lee, inɛ kuu nɛ numɔ yaŋurun deeru lee, yiun bulogu deeru lee, Ama saliyɛ kiru tujɔ asuu nasuu biyɛido deeru lee.
Giru go yai gɔ, Ama yabaajɛ ye kijɛ emɛ kanraindo gɔ woi.

Inɛw Ama wijɛ gɔ kubɔ turu biyaa, alagala sin obu gɔ nɛwaan, Kikinu Pilu biyaa, Ama sɔɔ ɛjii wɔɔ ga jugaa, aduna wɛɛido gɔnrɔn gɔ nɛwaan, pilemaa numaa oju nɛ gowaain gɔbe, be pilemaa Ama Aini gɔi baga jai nɛ pɛgɛu, inɛw wooi giru nɛ dɔgɔ wo bɛrɛ tagarauwɔin. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi bei pilemɛ ye waja ajubuduli nɛ jɛɛlu bɛɛmɔɔlɛ.
Minɛ bɛru bɛru anrandii bɛɛjɛ, dii gɔ nɔwaan, inɛw dɛi woi walin dɛi kijɛ niwɛn sɛɛ gogoomɔjɛ ye, minɛ gɔ Ama bɛrɛ duba biyaajɛ.
Kaa minɛ gɔ jijii lee, dɔgɔ mɔɲu lee goomɔjɛ ye, woi niwɛn sɛlɛ. Ama jebu wo le bɛrii wɔɔ, woi tɛguru le dogojɛ.
Ba unrunw ibɛ emɛbe, halu emɛ kɔɔ gin’ sɔɔ sɔɔuwɔin kanran, e bana ɛju yayabu nɛ yaajɛ gɔ nɛ toin ga, emɛ e sibɛ go diyɛdɔn le wɔin.
Ama, teitai laa go wɔlɔ. Wo kijɛ e kanrun gɔbe naŋaidolo. Iyaa Ama inɛw dɛi birɛ biraa e galu lee, nimɛ e birɛjɛ gɔ lee le digɛu wo bɛrɛ ihibɛ e taguru gɔ, wo naŋaidolo.
E tuturu puu dumɔ gɔ baa maini tunmɔ kɔɔ le bii ye, kijɛ e dɔmɔ gɔ sɛɛu bɛɛ ga emɛ wogɔi dɛnɛɲu.
Ebaa walagunwin taŋa ga emɛ ibɛlain. Kaa ebaa inɛw gagawu nɛ biyaa, muyaan wɔnu, kɛn pui kunaaɲu gɔ bɛɛɲu gɔbei dee ga emɛ ibɛɛ wɔin.
Ama, Abarahamu le pui kunɔu, kijɛ wo dɛi gaa kole jɛbiyɛɲu waja wɔlɔ gɔ digɛu, wo kuu unrunmɔ le jɛbiyaa,
gi: “Mu naran go ui duba kakanrandɔn, iyaa tɔgu uwɔ ɛjii nanarinyɛnmɔdɔn.”
Kunrin muyɔn le dɔmiyaan wɔu, Abarahamu kijɛ wo bɛrɛ pui kuni gɔ yinbɛi.
Inɛw, waaru jebu be jɛbiyɛjɛ le, kijɛ be dɛi gaa le jɛbiyɛɲu. Jebu gɔ, sɔɔ gɔ bɛrɛ paŋa obaa ye jiiru puu wo donugojɛ.
Kunrin Ama, pui wo kunu kɛn inɛw balanw gɔbe bɛrɛ diŋɛ unrunmɔ sɔɔ asuu kɔɔliyɛɛlɛ ga daii jugɔmɔ ibɛɛ bee. Kɔɔ dɛi, wo pui gɔ kuu nɛ jebu gɔ yinbaru.

Kunrin kijɛ kɔɔliyɛɛlɛ kolɛi wɔɔ. Iyaa wogɔ nɛ Ama, kakalu maŋu bɛɛlɛ. Kodigɛu, emɛ inɛw yalu babaŋi emɛ wo nɛ biyaaɲu gɔbe, diyɛdɔn bɛbɛɛdɛin ga emɛ bɛrɛ pui kunaaɲu gɔ ɛjii gɛliyɛ ga anrangaju diyɛ le wɔin.
Inrun kirɛgu diikoroi ɛjii ɛɛin yalu womɔ nɛ bojojɛ gin’, diyɛdɔn wogɔ kinrun emɛi gain gain bojojɛ. Iyaa diyɛdɔn wogɔ, alagala Ama ginrun, kɛju sɔi gɔ kɛjaa galaa ye, kɔlɔ go baa yadɔɔjɛ.
Yesu wo laa giru emɛ nɛ, emɛ dɛi konɛ yowaabe. Wo Mɛlukisedɛku mɔ gin’ asuu Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋai biyaabe.
Mɛlukisedɛku wogɔ Salɛmu ana ɔgɔnɛi bee, iyaa Ama daa naa daa go wɔɔ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛi bee. Abarahamu, kɔmɔ nɛ ɔgɔnw gɔnraan pilemaa wɛɛu wo wɔu, Mɛlukisedɛku yaa woi sɛgɛraa, woi duba kanraanbe.
Abarahamu, ɔgɔnw gɔbe bɛrɛ kijɛ wo ɛlu puu jaka wo bɛrɛ obu. Mɛlukisedɛku boi tiyɛ pɔlɔ gɔ teitai ɔgɔnɛi. Iyaa wo Salɛmu ɔgɔnɛi bee, tiyɛ gɔ jamu ɔgɔnɛ.
Mɛlukisedɛku mɔ ba sɔɔ sɔɔnɛ, na sɔɔ sɔɔnɛ, tirɛ anranw sɔɔ sɔɔnɛ, bai womɔ ɔn nɛ tɔlɔjɛ wɔlɔ, ɔn nɛ dogojɛ wɔlɔ. Wo Ama Aini gin’ asuu sadagadɔɔnɔnɛi wɔɔ.
Mɛlukisedɛku bana gaai wo wɔɔ gɔ yɛnɛi. Abarahamu emɛ tirɛ ainɛ diyɛ gɔ, kɔmɔ nɛ kijɛ wo bɛi jaka gɔ wo bɛrɛ obu.
Lewi tɔgu inɛw sadaga dɔɔnu birɛ nɛ yooɲu gɔbe, Tɔɔru gɔ le kɛukɛu, be Isɛrɛlu unrunw bɛrɛ jaka yaba bɛbɛɛɲu. Tiyɛ gɔ, be inɛw bemɛ be gin’ Abarahamu tɔgu nɛ goin bɛrɛ yabaɲu.
Kaa Mɛlukisedɛku, wo Lewi tɔgu inɛi laa bee kanran, Abarahamu bɛrɛ jaka yabaabe. Wo iyaa, Ama pui womɔbe inɛ bɛrɛ wo kunu gɔ, inɛ wogɔi duba kanraanbe.
Bana wɔɔ le kɛukɛu, duba kanranjɛ baŋa gɔ, duba bɛɛnɛ gɔ dɛi gaa, jiiru wɔlɔ.
Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw sɔɔ sibɛ nɛ jaka yabanw gɔbe, waajibi inɛw yinwɛindɛinbei. Kaa Mɛlukisedɛku mɔ sibɛ nɛ Ama Dɔn inɛ dɛi sɛɛrɛ gowaa, ɔnmɔi wɔɔ wo gi gɔ, jaka gɔ wo yabu.
Iyaa Abarahamu jaka waaru wo goonu le, Lewi, jaka yabanw tɔgu tirɛ ainɛ gɔ, wo kanran jaka goonaati gɛɛ bɛbɛɛmɔjɛ.
Sabu Mɛlukisedɛku, Abarahamui waaru wo sɛguru le, Lewii naranla bee kanran, wo unrun tirɛ ainɛ ili nɛ yatobe.

Isɛrɛlu unrunw bɛrɛ Tɔɔru obin gɔ, duu womɔ Lewi tɔgu inɛw sadaga dɔɔnu birɛ sɔɔ kuu nɛ daan. Sadaga dɔɔnu birɛ sɔɔ wogɔ, kijɛ kibaai bee ye, Aarɔn mɔ gin’ pajati ye, Mɛlukisedɛku mɔ gin’ Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ waja daana ga inge dɛi waajibi bii?
Sabu, sadaga dɔɔnu birɛ sɔɔ gɔ dulomaaɲu ye, waajibi tɔɔru gɔ yaa duliyeun jaain wɔɔ.
Kunrin, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ, inɛ dɛi sɔɔ kɔɔ sɔin gɔ, wo tɔgu waja nɛ goi. Tɔgu womɔ inɛ turu kanran, sadagadumu nɛ birɛ birɛɲu sɔɔ nɛ tolo.
Sabu wo Juda tɔgu nɛ goi ga igimɛi wɔɔ. Mɔise, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw sɔɔ sɔɔu, tɔgu kɔɔ inɛw dɛi sɔɔ kanma gɛɛlu.
Sɔɔ emɛ gi gɔ daii wɔɔ ga sɔɔ waja sigɛ le jugɔmɔjɛ unwɔ: Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ Mɛlukisedɛku gin’ wɔɔ waja gowaa wɔɔ.
Sadagadɔɔnɔnɛi wo bii gɔ, inɛ nɛ wo goibe sɔɔ le digɛla. Kaa ɔnmɔ dogoolɛ gɔnrɔn le digɛ.
Sabu Ama Dɔn sɛɛrɛ gowaa gi: “U Mɛlukisedɛku mɔ gin’ asuu Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛi wɔu.”
Kunrin, sɔɔ tɔɔraaɲu pɛi gɔ, yɛbɛlɛ womɔ lee, niwɛn tolo womɔ lee dɛi woi pajaatin.
Sabu Tɔɔru, kijɛ turu kanran kibaai bojaa bɛɛlu. Kaa iyaa, diyɛdɔn sigɛ wiyaai. Emɛ wogɔ le Ama giru nɛ dɔɔɲu.
Wogɔ nɛ sigiyaa, Ama kuu unrunmɔ wo jɛbi sɔɔ gɔ yɔɔ. Inɛw wajunw sadaga dɔɔnɔwin be bii gɔ, kuu jɛbi kɔɔ tunmɔ le biyɛnɛ.
Kaa Yesu, sadagadɔɔnɔnɛi wo bii gɔ, Ama kuu unrunmɔ jɛbiyaa woi daanu. Ama sɔwaa gi: “Inɛw Baŋa Ama kuu unrunmɔ jɛbiyaajɛ, wo sɔɔ unrunmɔ kɔɔlɔmɔidolo. U asuu Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛi wɔu.”
Ama kuu jɛbi gɔ sabu dɛi, Yesu, aaru dɛi sɛɛrɛi biyaa wo wɔɔ gɔ, aaru pɔlɔ gɔ dɛi sigɛ.
Sɔɔ waja yaa unwɔ: Lewi tɔgu, sadagadɔɔnɔw gɔbe yinwɛn yinwɛn yaabɛin digɛu, birɛ gɔ nɛ asuu toii bɛɛbenɛ dɛi jooi bɛin.
Kaa Yesu, wo kai asuu ɔnmɔi wɔɔ digɛu, sadaga dɔɔnu birɛ womɔ gɔ nɛ dilɛ wɔlɔ.
Kosabu dɛi inɛw wo le digɛnu Ama giru nɛ dɔɔɲu gɔbei sɛɛu yabu bɛɛjɛ. Sabu be dɛi Ama bɛrɛ gɛɛn ga wo asuu ɔnmɔi yɔɔ.

Kɔɔi biyaa ye, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa emɛ le dagaa gɔ, Yesu woi. Wo ɛjaa wɔɔ, jarugu wo le wɔlɔ, lɔgɔ turu kanran wo nɛ tarala, hakɛgunw le woi kabugaa, alagalabe dɛi sigɛ Ama woi daa go unaajɛ.

Sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu bɛɛnw wajunw, bai puu kuu unrunbemɛ hakɛ dɛi sadaga tɛgɛraa ye, kɔɔ onu nɛ Isɛrɛlu tɔgu puu hakɛ dɛi be tɛgɛrɛjɛ gin’, wo wogɔ kai sɛlɛ. Waaru kuu unrunmɔ sadaga wo obu le, wo kubɔ turu sai wogɔ kanraan kilaai.
Mɔise tɔɔru le kɛukɛu, sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu bɛɛnw daanaaɲu gɔbe, inɛw yɛbɛlɛgunwin. Kaa Ama kuu jɛbi sɔɔ, Tɔɔru onu nɛ wɛi gɔ, Aini gɔi sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋai daanu. Ama woi asuu kibaai boju.
Sɔɔ emɛ sɔɔjɛ gɔ nɛ, sɔɔ ii gɔ unwɔ: Emɛ Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa kɔɔ tunmɔi sɛin. Wo alagala nɛ Ama baba diyɛ baŋa ɔgɔdɔin numɔ iin sibɛ nɛ dɛinyaan wɔɔ.
Konɛ, Ama Ginrun kɔlɔ gɔ nɛ, tiyɛ gɔ guju kuru Ama Ginrun nanaa inɛ kurolu, Inɛw Baŋa Ama kuraabe gɔ nɛ, wo sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋai biyaa wɔɔ.
Sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa tuturu puui, sin obu lee, sadaga lee, Ama bɛrɛ dɔɔnɔ dɛi daanaɲu. Kodigɛu, sadaga dɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa emɛ gɔ, wo kanran, Ama bɛrɛ kijɛ dɔɔnɔɲu wo siyɛun jaain wɔɔ.
Wo aduna nɛ bee ye, woi sadagadɔɔnɔnɛi kanran biyɛbele, sabu inɛw wajunw, Tɔɔru le kɛukɛu sadaga dɔɔnɔɲu yɔɔin.

Wogɔ bɛɛnw sadaga dɔɔnu birɛ be birɛjɛ gɔ, alagala nɛ nanaa kanranɲu gɔ yarai. Mɔise mɔ kanran, guju kuru Ama Ginrun gɔ waaru kurodo ga wo bee le kunrin bee. Ama wo le sɔwaa gi: “Ɛjii kajuba, kokoo nɛ u bɛrɛ tagurin gɔ bana wɔɔ gin’, kijɛ gɔ puu wogɔ gin’ kanran.”
Kaa kanɛ Yesu, sadaga dɔɔnu birɛ wo bɛi gɔ, bemɛ gɔ kuu nɛ wɔɔ. Sabu aaru dɛi sɔɔ yegerenɛi wo wɔɔ gɔ, aaru pɔlɔ gɔ dɛi sigɛ. Iyaa pui sigɛbe kuu nɛ daan.
Aaru pɔlɔ gɔ nɛ sɔɔ tolo, sɛɛu bee ye, aaru lɛiye dɛnɛnu doori bee.
Kaa Ama, inɛw womɔbe nɛ jarugu tɛmaabe. Wo saa gi: “Inɛw Baŋa Ama gi: ‘Bai yawɛɛjɛ, mu Isɛrɛlu inɛw lee, Juda tɔgu lee le aaru kana ahaaradɔn.
Aaru wogɔ, be babe numɔ aa, Ejipute gana nɛ bai bei mu goonɔbe le, be le aaru mu aaru gɔ gin’ biyɛidolo. Sabu be aaru ma gɔ yamalaatin digɛu, mu kanran be le onu dulaatun.’
Nɛɛ Inɛw Baŋa Ama gi: ‘Bai kɔɔbe galaai ye, Isɛrɛlu inɛw le aaru mu aaraido gɔ unwɔ: Mu tɔɔru mabe hakilɛ bemɛ nɛ kukunɔdɔn. Kinɛ bemɛ nɛ yaa tɔtɔŋɔdɔn. Mu Ama bemɛi biyɛdɔn, be inɛw mai biyɛdɛin.
Inɛ turu kanran, waja tɔgu womɔ inɛ ma, wo bainɛ ma deere ye, «U Inɛw Baŋa Amai jugɔ» gɛɛnu doori. Dagunɛ nɛ goi ye, diyɛnɛ nɛ yai dɔɔ, be puu mui jujugɔdɛin.
Sabu mu teitai laa bemɛ be bɛrɛ yaabu kakanrandɔn. Mu waja asuu hakɛ bemɛ ajubu ma nɛ wɛɛmɔidolɔn.’’
Ama, aaru kɔɔ aaru kanai wo gi gɔ le digɛu, aaru pɔlɔ gɔ pɛii bojaati. Kijɛ pɛi anranguju joo bɛɛu gɛlɛ gɔ, manu womɔ bɛrii wɔɔ.
Aaru pɔlɔ gɔ, Ama demɛniyɛnmu sibɛ go tɔɔru womɔbe yasɛbe, Ama ginrun numɔ le yegeraaɲu kanran yasɛbe.
Sabu guju kuru Ama Ginrun kuraa yabe. Kuru kɔlɔ kɛju pɔlɔ gɔ, yalu ɛjaai gɔ woi. Wogɔ nɛ pilɛlɔn diyɛ gɔ lee, tabalu gɔ lee, Ama burui ga buru duunaaɲu gɔ lee yatobɛin.
Yalu kɔɔ galaai ye kɛju kunu lɛiye sɔi gɔ onu nɛ yalu ɛjaa naa ɛjaa gɛɛɲu gɔ yabe.

Wogɔ nɛ uguru tɛguru yalu kange le yegeraaɲu gɔ lee, aaru koro gɔ, sɛɛu kange le kuyaa wɔɔ gɔ lee yatobɛin. Koro gɔ kɔlɔ nɛ, kange gelu, buru manɛ gɛɛɲu gɔ too gɔ lee, Aarɔn baga titimu, liyɛ bujaa wɔɔ gɔ lee, aaru tibu kɛbiriyɛun, tɔɔru sɔɔ konɛ tɔŋaaɲu gɔ lee yatobɛin.

Ama, dooro baŋa yalu gɔ nɛ yɔɔ sɛɛrɛi ga, koro gɔ kuu nɛ, Mɛlɛnkɛ Serubɛn gɛɛɲu gɔbe yegeraa yabɛin. Be, hakɛ mɛɛnɛɲu yalu gɔ gamuju bemɛ le dɛbaa gɛliyaa bɛin. Kaa sɔɔ gɔbe digu le digu le sɔɔɲu waaru gɔ kanɛ laa.
Kijɛ kɔɔbe puu kɔɔ gin’ wo wɔnu, Ama bɛrɛ sadaga dɔɔnɔw gɔbe bai tuturu puu kuru kɛju pɔlɔ yalu gɔ nɛ yowaa ye, sadaga dɔɔnu bemɛ birɛ birɛɲu.

Kaa kuru kɛju lɛiye gɔ nɛ, Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa gɔ sai, anranguju nɛ kubɔ turu sai yoojɛ. Wo kuu womɔ dɛi, iyaa tɔgu gɔ puu lelu dɛi, waajibi arusɛgɛ ili, sadagai Ama bɛrɛ dɔɔnɔ ga kole yoojɛ.
Guju kuru Ama Ginrun pɔlɔ kɔɔ waaru bee puu nɛ, yalu ɛjaa naa ɛjaa gɔ nɛ yoo ga oju pinɛlɛla bee ga, Kikinu Pilu sɔɔ kɔɔbe le emɛ bɛrɛ jugɔmɔube.
Kɔɔbe puu kanɛ bana sɔɔ wɔɔ jugɔmɔjɛ. Sin obu lee, sadaga lee, Ama bɛrɛ jɛɛlɛubɛin gɔbe, Ama demɛniyɛnmɔnɛ gɔ kinɛjugɔ nɛ jarugu donugu bɛɛbele ga tagarajɛ.

Sabu sɔɔ gɔ kayɛrɛ ma, kijɛ nɔɔɲu ma, dii le ui bana ɛjɛmɔɲu tɔgu dɛin dɛin ma sɔɔ le digɛ. Kɔɔbe kinɛjugɔ sɔɔ le digɛla, kaa goju sai le tɔɔru digɛi. Ama, kijɛ puu pilemɛ ye kanai wo bojoido waaru yai dɔɔ nɛ birɛ birɛ ga daanaabɛin.
Kaa Kirisito, kijɛ ɛju kanɛ baa wɔin sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋai wɛi. Kuru nɛ wo galu gɔ, wo gaa, sɛɛu kibaa wɔɔ. Wogɔ inɛ numɔ le yegerenɛ. Tiyɛ gɔ aduna maŋaaɲu ɔn kijɛi laa.
Wo kubɔ turu sai yalu ɛjaa naa ɛjaa gɔ nɛ yowaa kilaai. Wo ɛnrɛn ili le ma, naa unrunw ili le ma yoolu. Kaa kuu bana womɔ ili le yoi. Wo kɔɔ gin’ kanraan, asuu kuu emɛ gowaai boju.
Ɛnrɛn ili lee, naa jaŋu ili lee, naa unrunw tɛgɛrɛɲu unɔ gɔ lee, inɛw ligijiyaain gɔbe nɛ miɲaa ye, ligiji bemɛ sɔɔ donugaa ye, bei ɛhɛjɛmɔjɛ.

Kɔɔ kunrin wɔɔ ye, Kirisito ili gɔ kɔɔ dɛi sigɛ gɔnrɔn sɛɛ. Wo Ama Kikinu asuu wɔɔ gɔ le digɛu kuu unrunmɔ Ama bɛrɛ sadaga lɔgɔ taralai obu. Ili womɔ kinɛjugɔ emɛ nɛ birɛ niwɛn sɛlɛ gɔbe ɛjɛmɔ ye, emaa Ama ɔnmɔi wɔɔ gɔ dɛi birɛ birɛ ga kakanrando.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, inɛw Ama bei boonu gɔbe, asuu kɛn pui gɔ bɛɛ ga, Kirisito aaru kana sɔɔ yegerenɛi. Yiun womɔ aaru pɔlɔ waaru le hakɛ kanrin gɔbe dɔrugaati digɛu, be wogɔ bɛbɛɛdɛin.
Kɛn balu dɔn nɛ sɔɔ too gɔ, dɔn tɔŋɔnɛ gɔ yinwaain ye kijɛ kanranɲui. Kinrun le wo wɔnu sɔɔ kanranɲui laa. Kodigɛu, kɛn balu dɔn yɔɔ ye, dɔn tɔŋɔnɛ gɔ yinwaain ga igimɛi biyɛun jaain wɔɔ.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, aaru pɔlɔ gɔ kanran ili wɔlɔ go aaranɛ.

Mɔise, inɛw gɔ puu bɛrɛ tɔɔru sɔɔ tuturu puu Tɔɔru tɔŋaaɲu gɔ nɛ bana too gin’ tagaatiyaa, naa unrunw ili dii le biraa, peju kukuli banrun lee, isɔpe tiun bagi lee, konɛ sowaa Tɔɔru dɔn gɔ nɛ miɲaa, iyaa inɛw gɔ puu bɛrɛ miɲaabe.
Kɔɔ gin’ kanraun wɔu kijɛ wo gɛɛbe: “Ɔn Ama ebaa aaru nɛ biyɛ ga wo tɔɔru gɔ ili gɔi.”
Mɔise kɔɔ gin’ iyaa kuru gɔ lee, sadaga birɛ gelu gɔ puu lee nɛ ili miɲaabe.
Tɔɔru le kɛukɛu, kijɛ tuturu laa ye, puu ili le ɛjɛmɔɲu. Iyaa ili togiyelu go, hakɛ yaabu kanrun wɔlɔ.
Kɔɔbe alagala nɛ kijɛ nanaa wɔɔ yarai. Bei kɔɔ gin’ ɛjɛmɔ ga waajibi bee. Kaa alagala kijɛ nanaa gɔbe, be kuu bemɛ le sadaga kɔɔbe dɛi sigɛbe kaii sɛin.
Sabu Kirisito, yalu ɛjaa nɛ wo yoi gɔ, nanaa gɔ yara gin’ numɔ le yegeraaɲu gɔi laa. Kaa wo alagala naa gɔ nɛ yowaa, kanɛ emɛ dɛi Ama giru nɛ wɔɔ.
Sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa anranguju wɛɛjɛ puu arusɛgɛ ili le yalu ɛjaa naa ɛjaa gɔ nɛ yoyoojɛ. Kaa Kirisito kɔɔ gin’, kubɔ joo kuu unrunmɔ sadaga obodo ga yoolu.

Sabu wogɔ gin’ bee ye, Kirisito aduna maŋi nɛ kubɔ joo wo ɔɲɔu jaain bee. Kaa kanɛ, waaru gɔbe dumɔrɔn bemɛ nɛ dɔɔuwɔ gɔ le, wo kuu unrunmɔ sadaga obu le digɛnu hakɛ donugo ga, kubɔ turu sai wiyaa kilaai.
Inɛ tuturu puu kubɔ turu yinwɛn ga waajibi, kɔɔ onu nɛ Ama, saliyɛ womɔ kikiredo.
Kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’, Kirisito, inɛw joo hakɛbe duiyɔ ga, kubɔ turu sai kuu unrunmɔ sadaga obu. Wo kubɔ lɛiye gɔ wɛwɛɛdo, kaa hakɛ goonɔ dɛi biyɛidolo. Inɛw woi dɔmɔi gɔbei yaba ga wɛɛdo.

Yahutunw tɔɔru gɔ, kijɛ nanaa gɔbe bana sɛɛu tagaraalɛ. Kaa kijɛ ɛju wɛɛido gɔ kikinɛi sai. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, sadaga tutunmɔ deeliye sɛlɛ go pipilemu anranguju puu goonɔɲu gɔbe le digɛnu, tɔɔru kɔɔ Ama giru nɛ inɛw dɔɔnw gɔbei asuu kibemu bɛɛlɛ.
Bei kibemu bɛbɛɛbe ye, inɛw Ama demɛniyɛnmɔw gɔbe kubɔ turu sai hakɛ nɛ bei ɛhɛjɛmɔbɛin digɛu, iyaa hakɛ jarugu, kinɛjugɔ bemɛ nɛ kanɛ toiyobele digɛu, sadaga dɔɔnu gɔ papajabɛin.
Kaa sadaga kɔɔbe le inɛw bɛrɛ anranguju wɛɛjɛ puu hakɛ bemɛ naŋaranmɔɲu.
Sabu naa jaŋu ili lee, ɛnrɛn ili lee, asuu hakɛ goonu bɛɛlɛ.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi Kirisito, aduna nɛ wɛɛu, Ama le sɔwaa gi: “U sadaga wee, sin obu wee dɛnɛlu. Kaa u gojui mu bɛrɛ obu.
Arusɛgɛ sɛɛu tɛguru sadaga wee, hakɛ yaabu kanrun sadaga wee, wogɔbe kinɛ uwɔ aalɛ.
Nɛɛ mu sɔwaa gun: ‘Ama, mu unwɔun. Dɔn gɔ nɛ mu dɛi bana tɔŋaaɲu le kɛukɛu, mu diŋɛ uwɔ kanrain wiyaa wɔun.”
Kirisito laa gɔ sɔwaa gi: “U sadaga wee, sin obu wee, arusɛgɛ sɛɛu tɛguru sadaga wee, hakɛ yaabu kanrun sadaga wee dɛnɛlu, kinɛ uwɔ aalɛ.” Kokanran sadaga kɔɔbe Tɔɔru gɔ le kɛukɛu dɔɔnɔɲu.
Kɔɔ onu nɛ wo gimaa, “Mu unwɔun, diŋɛ uwɔ kanrain wiyaa wɔun” gi. Kunrin wo sadaga pɔlɔ sɔɔ gɔ goonaatiyaa, lɛiye gɔ daanaati.
Yesu Kirisito, Ama diŋɛ kibemaati. Wogɔ digɛu, goju womɔ kubɔ turu sai sadaga obaa wo kilu gɔ le digɛu, emi hakɛ emɛ nɛ ɛjaai.
Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ puu birɛ unrunmɔ birɛ ga bai tuturu puu ihiŋiyɛnjɛ. Wo sadaga tɔgu tunmɔ gɔbe, halu wogɔbe hakɛbe goonu bɛɛnɛ kanran, kubɔ joo dɔdɔɔnɔjɛ.
Kaa Kirisito asuu nasuu dɛi hakɛ yaabu kanrun sadaga turu deŋɛ deŋɛ dɔɔnaatiyaa, Ama numɔ iin sibɛ nɛ dɛinyaain.
Kanɛ kɔɔ nɛ, wo Ama, jaŋuw womɔ gɔbei gɔnrɔn ye kubɔ womɔ doɲu nɛ wo kunɔido dɔmiyaan wɔɔ.
Kunrin, sadaga turu deŋɛ deŋɛ le digɛu, wo inɛw hakɛ nɛ ɛjɛɲu gɔbei asuu dɛi kibemaati.
Kikinu Pilu yaa sɛɛrɛ wogɔi emɛ bɛrɛ goojɛ. Kikinu Pilu laa gɔ sɔwaa:
“Inɛw Baŋa Ama gi: ‘Bai kɔɔbe galaai ye, aaru be le mu aaraido gɔ unwɔ: Mu tɔɔru mabe kinɛ bemɛ nɛ kukunɔdɔn. Hakilɛ bemɛ nɛ yaa tɔtɔŋɔdɔn.’”
Kɔɔ onu nɛ wo gi: “Mu waja hakɛ bemɛ lee, mɔɲu bemɛ lee asuu ajubu ma nɛ wɛɛmɔidolɔn.”
Nɛɛ, hakɛ kɔɔbe yaabu kanraantin digɛnu, waja hakɛ yaabu kanrun sadaga jɛɛlɛnu doori.
Nɛɛ kai ba unrunw, Yesu ili digɛnu, emɛ yalu ɛjaa naa ɛjaa gɔ nɛ yoo ga liyɛ sɛnɛ.
Wogɔ nɛ yoo ga, Yesu emɛ dɛi oju kana, ɔnmɔi wɔɔ, kɛju sɔi le galajɛ pinɛlaati. Tiyɛ gɔ goju womɔ le galajɛ.
Iyaa sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ diyɛ, Ama ginrun kuu nɛ daan, emɛ yasin.
Kɔɔbe wooi digɛu, kinɛpilu le, gagawu kibaai le, kinɛ emɛ ɛjɛmɔ ye kinɛjugɔ nɛ jarugu sɔɔ goonɔti ye, dii ɛju le goju gɔ mɔŋi go, emɛ Ama giru nɛ dɔɔmɔi.
Emɛ le pui kunu baŋa gɔ sɔɔ turu baŋai digɛu, diyɛdɔn sɔɔ emɛ sɔɔjɛ gɔ ɛjii gɛliyɛmɔi.
Tunmɔ kajubu ye, ihibɛ nɛ lee, birɛ ɛju biru nɛ lee tunmɔi mainiyɛnmɔmɔi.
Bana inɛw gamuu wɛɛjui biyaa wɔɔ gin’, emɛ tunmɔ le mɔrin gɔ pajamɔnɔugin. Kaa tunmɔ tinwɛnrɛnmɔi. Sigɛ le Inɛw Baŋa bai wɛɛido gɔ bɛrii wɔɔ ga e iyeuwɔi dɛi tunmɔ tinwɛnrɛnmɔi.
Naran gɔ emɛ bɛrɛ jugɔmaaɲu onu nɛ, bɛrɛ mɔɲu dɛi emɛ hakɛ kanrannu yaaɲu ye, hakɛ yaabu kanrun sadaga waja wɔlɔ.
Liliyɛ diyɛ le, Ama saliyɛ kiru gɔ lee, yaun diyɛ, Ama le inɛw yabanɛ gɔbei tɛnwɛn ga wɔɔ gɔ lee, emɛ dɔmɔ gɔ woi.
Inɛ Mɔise tɔɔru yamalaajɛ puu, inɛw lɛi ma taanu ma aŋa sɛɛrɛ ɛgaa ye, amasɔgɔjugɔ wɔlɔ go woi daaɲu.

Nɛɛ, Ama Aini gɔi kubɔ le inɛ namanu galaido gɔ, aaru ili, kole woi hakɛ nɛ ɛjɛmaabɛin gɔ kijɛ yamalai inɛ bojoido gɔ, iyaa Ama Kikinu, nɛɛma wo bɛrɛ obu gɔi inɛ duyɔido gɔ mɔ yani biyɛdo? Tujɔ wo le jaan gɔ, yagɔ baŋa mɔ dɛi sigɛ le mɔɲu biyɛun jaan ga e ajubaalɛi ma?
Sabu “duguru gɔ mu goodo, pilemɛ ye mu tujɔdo” gɛɛnɛ baŋa gɔ, iyaa, “Inɛw Baŋa Ama, tɔgu womɔ inɛw saliyɛ kikiredo” gɛɛnɛ baŋa gɔ, emɛ igii wɔin.
Aa, Ama ɔnmɔi wɔɔ numɔ nɛ yoi gɔ, wogɔ liliyɛ diyɛ naa diyɛ sɔɔi de!
Kaa Ama wijɛ gɔ e bɛi onu nɛ, bai pɔlɔ wɛin gɔbe sɔɔ ajubu yɛnɛi. Bai wogɔbe le, e kɔmɔ diyɛ taa ɔɲɛ diyɛ muyaanbei.
Doguru gamuu, inɛw puu giru nɛ ei duyɔ lee, ɔɲɔmɔ lee kanranɲu. Doguru gamuu iyaa inɛw kɔɔ gin’ wɔin gɔbe boru bariyaabei.
E kajugunw amasɔgɔ jugaabei. Iyaa kijɛ e sɛɛ e bɛrɛ ɛlɛ ga kinɛ ɛɛli le yabaabei, sabu e kɔɔ dɛi sigɛ, kijɛ asuu biyɛido yasɛi ga igii wɔi.
Kodigɛu, diyɛdɔn ebe pajanɔugi. Tujɔ diyɛ kole yadigɛ.
Ama diŋɛ kibemɔ ye, e bɛrɛ kijɛ pui kuni gɔ bɛɛ ga, e muyɔn kai yasɛi.
Sabu Ama Dɔn gɛɛjɛ gin’: “Gaila kanraan ye, gaila sai nɛ, inɛ wɛɛun dagaa gɔ wɛwɛɛdo. Wo tanwaindolo.
Kaa inɛ gagawu le digɛu giru ma nɛ teitai wɔɔ gɔ, woi ɔnmɔi bibiyɛdo. Kaa wo onu pilemɔjɛ ye, wo le kinɛ ma aaidolo.”
Emɛ kai, emɛ inɛw onu pilemɛ ye suiyoɲu gɔbe bɔɔi laain. Kaa inɛw gawa ye kinrun bemɛ yabaɲu gɔbe bɔɔi.
Kijɛ emɛ dɔmɔ bɛbɛɛdɛin ga diyɛ daanu ye bii gɔ, gagawu gɔ woi. Gagawu, kijɛ iyemɔɔlɛ gɔbe yɔɔin ga diyɛ daanu ye bii.
Gagawu dɛi pɔɔlɔ inɛw Ama kinɛ aamaabɛin.
Alagala lee, minɛ lee Ama sɔɔ le mɔii ga, emɛ gagawu le wogɔ paamaɲu. Wogɔ digɛu, kijɛ emɛ iyejɛ gɔbe, kijɛ iyemɔɔlɛ nɛ goi.

Gagawu dɛi Abɛlu, sadaga Kayɛn mɔ dɛi sigɛ Ama bɛrɛ obu. Gagawu womɔ dɛi, Ama woi inɛ teitai lugu, sabu Ama, sin obu womɔbe le yabaabe. Halu wo yinwaain kanran, gagawu gɔ le digɛu, wo nimɛ sɔɔ sɔɔuwɔ.
Gagawu dɛi, Henɔku yinwɛnlu go, Ama nɛ woi jeɲaa uni. Waja woi iyemɔlu, sabu Ama woi jeɲaajiyaabe. Ama woi jeɲɛmɔ nɛ, Henɔku kinɛ womɔ aamaabe ga wo dɛi sɛɛrɛ gowaabɛin.
Gagawu wɔlɔ go inɛ turu kanran Ama kinɛ aamu bɛɛlɛ. Sabu inɛ Ama giru nɛ dɔɔjɛ, Ama yɔɔ, iyaa wo inɛw woi dɛnɛw gɔbei tutujɔjɛ ga wo gawaun jaain wɔɔ.

Gagawu dɛi Nɔwe, sɔɔ wɛɛlu, nimɛ iyemɔbele dɛi Ama woi wo tinwɛnraan, Ama giri liyɛ le sɔɔ yabaa, ginrun womɔ inɛwin yaba ga diikoro diyɛ yegeraabe. Wo kunrin aduna kuu nɛ jarugu duuraatiyaa, teitai gagawu le bɛɛmɔjɛ kɛn balanɛi biyaabe.
Gagawu dɛi Abarahamu, Ama woi boonaa gana kɛn womɔi wo bojoido sibɛ go yaa wo giyaa, wo sɔɔ yabaa yaabe. Wo yalu wo yaaido inɛɛ wɔu gowaa yai.

Gagawu dɛi wo gana Ama wo bɛrɛ pui kunu gɔ nɛ wiyaa, yerunɛ gana yeru nɛ daan gin’ dɛinyaanbe. Wo konɛ guju kurube nɛ toiyaa bee. Isaka lee, Jakɔbu lee, wo le pui tutunmɔ gɔ kɛn balanw gɔbe, be yaa guju kuru nɛ kunrin tobɛin.
Sabu Abarahamu, ana bɔlɔtei ɛɛnbe kuu nɛ daan, Ama ajubaa ujaabe gɔi dɔmɔbe.
Gagawu dɛi, Abarahamu, halu woi ɛjii pɛyaa galaayaabe kanran, iyaa Sara ii naranbele kanran, ii bɛɛɲu gɔnrɔn biyaabe. Sabu wo le pui kunu baŋa gɔ sɔɔ turu baŋai ga wo diyɛdaanu le bee.
Kunrin, ainɛ turu kɔɔ nɛ, ainɛ yinwaanyaabe bɔɔi kɔɔ nɛ, tɔgu joo narinyaanbe. Jojoo bemɛ alagala tolo gin’ bee, nɛudii diŋirun sɔsɔun gin’, lugo bɛɛmɔɔlɛ.
Inɛw kɔɔbe puu kijɛ be bɛrɛ pui kuni gɔ bɛɛnɛ go gagawu gɔ le biyaa wɔu yinyinwin. Kaa be kijɛ gɔbe wagee iyaa kinɛ bemɛ aabe. Be unrunbe aduna nɛ yerunwin, oju galanwin ga, daii sɔwaabɛin.
Inɛw kɔɔ gɛɛnw, baginruin dɛnɛuwɔin ga tagaraɲu.
Be gana nɛ be goi dadaaru bei yasɛbe ye, konɛ pilemɛ ye wɛɛɲu bana bɛbɛɛbɛin.
Kaa be baginrun sigɛi daariyaa wɔin, tiyɛ gɔ alagala baginrun. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Ama be dɛi ana yegeraajɛ digɛu, unruin Ama bemɛ be boonɔjɛ gɔ dɛi dɔgɔ woi aalɛ.

Gagawu dɛi, Abarahamu, Ama, waaru woi maraan yɛnu le, Isakai sadaga tɛgɛrɛdo ga yabaabe. Abarahamu, Ama, pui unrunmɔbe wo bɛrɛ kunu baŋa gɔ, halu Ama wo le sɔwaa: “U Isaka sai le tirɛ unrunw u bɛrɛ obodɔn ga pui mu kunu gɔbe bɛbɛɛdou” giyaabe kanran, wo aini koturu womɔ sadaga tɛgɛrɛdo ga bee.
Ama gɔnrɔn yasɛ, halu yiun bulogu bɛbɛɛjɛ ga, Abarahamu manugaube. Ii womɔ pilemaa wo bɛrɛ obin gɔ, yiun nɛ bulogaa obin gɛɛ bɛbɛɛmɔjɛ.
Gagawu dɛi Isaka, Jakɔbu lee, Esau lee, sɔɔ be bɛrɛ wɛɛido dɛi, Ama boi bowaabe.
Gagawu dɛi Jakɔbu, yinwɛin wo do ɛjii bɛruniyaan wɔɔ waaru le, Josɛpu anranw unrunw lɛi tuturu dɛi Ama boi bowaa, baga unrunmɔ kuu nɛ tijaa gɛliyaa Amai demɛniyɛnmaabe.
Gagawu dɛi Josɛpu, bai womɔ bɛruniyaan wo wɔu, Isɛrɛlu unrunw Ejipute gana nɛ be gooido sɔɔ sɔwaa, sɛgɛ unrunmɔ dɛi tɔɔru obu.
Gagawu dɛi Mɔise ba lee, wo na lee woi naraan, ii gɔ anran ɛju yasɛ ga iyaa, be ɔgɔnɛ tɔɔru ginɛmu gɔ liyɛnɛ go, iyepilu taanu woi baŋurin.
Gagawu dɛi Mɔise, waaru wo gabi le, unruin ɔgɔnɛ iyaa ii boonɔmɔ ga yabalu.
Hakɛ nɛ toi ye waaru gaila kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔ dɛi, wo Ama inɛw le ɔɲɛ iye ire ga wogɔ yɛmaabe.
Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔ dɛi dɔgɔ iyi gɔ, Ejipute arusɛgɛ gɔbe dɛi sigɛ kijɛ irei ga wo yinlugu. Sabu wo wagee, giru go tujɔ wo bɛɛido gɔ nɛ giri dɛɛraa sɛbe.
Gagawu dɛi Mɔise, Ejipute nɛ ɔgɔnɛ kinɛbanrun gɔ liyɛlu go goi. Ama iyemɔɔlɛ gɔi iyeuwɔ gin’ biyaa, wo ɛɛn go biyaabe.
Gagawu dɛi wo Taŋagalu janwan gɔ daanaa, Ama titiyainɛ dadaanɛ gɔ, Isɛrɛlu anranw unrunw, bɛrɛ pɔlɔ gɔbei tabanɔu ga, taan bemɛ nɛ ili miɲɛ kɔɔrɔ ga tɔɔru.
Gagawu dɛi Isɛrɛlu unrunw, nɛudii banrun gɔ minɛ maa gin’ kɛjaa taŋi. Kaa Ejipute bɛɛnw wogɔ gin’ kanraan be yɛnaa, dii bei kimaati.
Isɛrɛlu unrunw, gagawu bemɛ dɛi, Jeriko ana jege gɔ, bai sɔi gɔŋaa be galaa wolu.
Gagawu dɛi yaanran dimu le kayanɛ, Rahabu, Jeriko nɛ inɛw Ama sɔɔ yabaanɛ gɔbe le bariyaa suiyolu. Sabu wo Isɛrɛlu inɛw tebutebenw gɔbei ɛju le sɛguru.
Mu nɛɛ inge sɔi baradɔn? Sabu Jedeyɔn ma, Baraku ma, Samusɔn ma, Jɛpute ma, Dawide ma, Samuɛlu ma, inɛw Ama titiyaanw gɔbe ma sɔɔ sɔɔdɔn gun ye, wogɔ waaru bɛɛidolɔn.
Gagawu le be diinɛbe kuu nɛ gɔnrɔn biyaa, teitai kanraan, Ama kijɛ pui kunu gɔ biyaabɛin. Be yarabe aŋa pagaabɛin,
yaun paŋa donugaabɛin, polukaaba aŋa nɛ ɛliyaa gowaabɛin. Yɛbɛlɛgunwin wɔu, pilemaa gɔnrɔn biyaabɛin, kɔmɔ nɛ be anranwin bɛin, iyaa gana waja kɔmɔ numɔ gɔbei nanaabɛin.
Yiunbe bulaa, yaanw gamuu bɛrɛ inɛw bemɛ pilemaa obaaɲu. Inɛw gamuui ɛjii ɔɲɔmaa, yiun baa dɔɔni. Be bulogu sigɛ gɔ bɛɛdɛin ga, ɔɲɛ gɔ nɛ bei ɛli goomɔ ga yabanɛ.
Inɛw gamuu iyaa yamurinyɛnmu lee, bɔɔniyɛn logi lee biyaabɛin. Gamuui yɔgu le kɔmaa, kaju nɛ kunaabɛin.

Gamuui tibu le kamaa daabɛin, bimu le dɛŋaabɛin, polukaaba le daabɛin. Gamuu peju guju lee, ɛnrɛn guju lee sɔi bemɛi goriyaa, kijɛ kanma sɛbenɛ wɔu, tɔɔɲɔ bɛɛu, ɔɲɔmu diyɛ bɛɛu, ungo yaa, ungo yaa kanraunbɛin.
Inɛw kɔɔbe puui aduna le jaanla bee. Be ginaa, olusolo nɛ lee, kokoo kuu nɛ lee, kɔmɔ nɛ lee, bonɔ nɛ lee yalabɛin.
Inɛw kɔɔbe puu, gagawu bemɛ dɛi sɔɔ bemɛ Ama kinɛ aabe. Kokanran be kijɛ be bɛrɛ pui kuni gɔ bɛɛnɛ.
Sabu Ama, kijɛ sigɛ, emɛ dɛi ajubaa yasɛbe. Emɛ tolo go bei sɛɛu kibaai biyɛ ga wo ibɛla bee.

Emɛ kanran inɛw sɛɛrɛ bemɛ gowaaɲu joo naa joo kɔɔbe anrankulumɔ gin’ emi gɔŋaa gɛlin. Kɔɔ digɛu, kijɛ emi gaanajɛ wooi lee, hakɛ naraan emɛ nɛ tariyɛjɛ gɔ lee emɛ nɛ goonɔti ye, tunmɔ galu jobu giru emɛ nɛ bojaaɲu gɔ muyɔn le jɔbɔmɔi.

Giri emɛ Yesu bɛrɛ dɛɛrɛ ye bojomɔi. Gagawu emɛ wo nɛ goojɛ, sɛɛu wo kibemɔjɛ. Wo kinɛ ɛɛli wo dɛi bojaaɲu gɔ nɛ giri dɛɛraa sɛbe dɛi, baga jai ɔɲɛ muyɔn ga yabaabe, dɔgɔ wogɔ nɛ too gɔ kijɛi ga lugolu. Kanɛ wo Ama ɔgɔdɔin numɔ iin sibɛ nɛ dɛinyaan wɔɔ.
Hakɛ kanranw wo dɛi be ingilu gɔ aŋai Yesu wo muyɔn gɔ ajubai. Kunrin e ɔɲɔ ye kinɛ yanwan le biyɛidenɛ.
Sabu hakɛ le kɔmɔ e taajɛ gɔ nɛ, e nimɛ kanran yiun nɛ dɔɔ baa tariyɛli.
Ama, unrunw unrunmɔ gin’ ei lugaa, tinwinrun ei wo tinwinrun ɔn e naŋaai ma? Wo gi: “Aini ma, Inɛw Baŋa Ama kɔi logi gɔ, sɔɔ gailai gin’ yɛnɛnɔu. Wo ui sɔwaajɛ ye, kinɛ uwɔ yanwanmɔnɔu.
Sabu Inɛw Baŋa Ama, inɛ wo ibɛ gɔi kɔɔjɛ. Aini womɔi ga inɛ wo lugojɛ puui lagajɛ.”
Ɔɲɛ gɔ kɔi logi gin’ muyɔin, sabu Ama, unrunw womɔi gin’ ei aa gɛlɛ. Ii wo ba kɔi logi bɛɛlɛ yɔɔ ma?
Unrunw puu kɔi logi bɛɛɲu gɔ e bɛɛlɛi ye, ei silɛ unrunwin, bama unrunw tɔitɔii laai.
Emɛ aduna ɔn nɛ banw yasin, be emi kɔwaabɛin dɛi emɛ bei babaabɛin. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, emaa ɔnmɔi biyɛ ga, kɔɔ dɛi sigɛ emɛ Ba alagala nɛ wɔɔ gɔ le emɛ tubiyeun jaan.
Emɛ babe aduna nɛ wɔin gɔbe, bana ɛjii wɔɔ ga be ajubaajɛ le kɛukɛu, waaru gaila emi kɔwaabɛin. Kaa Ama emaa bana ɛjaa wo wɔɔ gin’ ɛjaain biyɛ ga, ɛju emɛ dɛi emi kɔɔjɛ.
Logi waaru inɛi lagaɲu le, baŋa bɛrɛ kinɛ ɛɛlii biyɛɛlɛ, kinɛ jinwin biyɛjɛ. Kaa kɔɔ onu nɛ inɛw kole deeru bɛin gɔbe tinɛ womɔ ihiyeɲu. Wogɔ jamu lee, teitai bii leei.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, numɔ baariyaa wɔɔ ebe gɔbe ɛɛnnɛi. Gɔru baariyaa wɔɔ ebe gɔbe nɛ paŋa kunɔi.
Kubɔ ebe oju demu demu wɔɔ gɔbe nɛ toiyomɔi. Kɔɔ gin’ tegutegenɛ kubɔ lɛɛriyɛidolo, kaa babajado.
Inɛw wooi le jamu le biyɛ ga, iyaa ɛjaai biyɛ ga mainiyɛin. Sabu ɛjaai wɔlɔ go inɛ turu kanran Inɛw Baŋai iyeidolo.
Inɛ turu kanran Ama nɛɛma gɔ le onu dulonɔu ga kuu ebe kajubai. Inɛ turu kanran, tiun gaaru gin’ pujo ye, inɛw joo bɛrɛ mɔɲu kanran ye, nurun womɔ gɔ tanuganɔu ga kuu ebe kajubai.
Inɛ turu kanran salaginɛi ma, Esau gin’ Amai babaalɛ biyɛnɔu ga kuu ebe kajubai. Esau, kubɔ turu pana dɛi diyɛ unrunmɔ dɔnrun.
Dogo, unrun ba duba gɔ bɛɛdo wo giyaa, wo le yabanɛ ga e igii wɔi. Halu wo giridii le duba gɔ dɛnɛube kanran, sɔɔ womɔ bana kɔɔlɔmɔɲu bɛɛlu.

Isɛrɛlu unrunw dɔɔin gin’ e Sinayi kokoo tabu bɛɛmɔjɛ genɛ nɛ dɔɔli. Yaun bije womɔ le, ɔlɔ womɔ le, kurugu womɔ le, ooɲɔ simɛ womɔ le, kaan soguru womɔ le, mii paan womɔ le bee gɔ, e wogɔ genɛ nɛ dɔɔli. Isɛrɛlu unrunw mii wogɔ ɛgaa, waja sɔɔ turu kanran unrunbe bɛrɛ ɛgɛmɔnɔu ga amagɛɛn kunaabɛin.
Sabu “Halu bɛlu kokoo gɔ nɛ tɛmiyaanjɛ ye, tibu le kama daadɛin” ga tɔɔru obin gɔ, be wogɔ gɔnrɔnbenɛ.
Sɔɔ konɛ bee gɔ bana inɛ liirɛmɔjɛ gɔ gabaai digɛu, Mɔise sɔwaa gi: «Mu ɛjii liyaa, kinwɛunbɔn.»
Kaa e kokoo genɛ nɛ dɔwaa e wɔɔ gɔ, Siɔn kokoo gɔi. Ama ɔnmɔi wɔɔ gɔ ana, alagala Jerusalɛmu, mɛlɛnkɛ muɲu joo naa joo womɔ le, e wogɔ genɛ nɛ dɔwaa wɔi.

E unrunw pɔlɔ Ama Kikinu sibɛ go naraanɲu, alagala nɛ boi bemɛ tɔŋi wɔɔ, kinɛ ɛɛli mɔɔnu nɛ dɔwaa wɔi. E Ama, inɛw puu saliyɛkirenɛ gɔ lee, inɛw teitai sɛɛu kibaai bojin kikinube lee genɛ nɛ dɔwaa wɔi.
Iyaa e Yesu, aaru kana sɔɔ yegerenɛ gɔ lee, ili womɔ miɲi gɔ Abɛlu ili dɛi sigɛ sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ gɔ lee genɛ nɛ dɔwaa wɔi.

Wogɔ digɛu, kuu ebe kajubai. E le sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ baŋa sɔɔ gɔ pogonɔugi. Sabu aduna nɛ, Ama tinwinrun be bɛrɛ oboube sɔɔ inɛw yabanɛ gɔbe, jarugu duiyi nɛ ɛliyɛnɛ. Nɛɛ, alagala nɛ wɔu, emɛ bɛrɛ tinwinrun obojɛ baŋa gɔ, emɛ wo le onu dulaatin ye, emɛ yani ɛliyɛdɛin?
Waaru kɔɔ le mii womɔ adunai jigemaabe, kaa kanɛ wo emɛ le pui kunaa, “Mu kubɔ turu sai iyaa, adunai sai laa, kaa alagalabei yaa jijigemɔdɔn” gi.
“Kubɔ turu sai iyaa” wo gi gɔ, tiyɛ gɔ kijɛ maŋaaɲu gɔbe jijigedɛin, mana yaadɛin ga tagarajɛ. Kunrin kijɛ jigeelɛ gɔbe yabiyɛdɛin.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, emɛ diinɛ jigeelɛi bɛɛɲu digɛu, yogosɛlɛ le biyɛmɔnɔugin. Emɛ birɛpoo tagu le bii ye, Ama kinɛ bana aajɛ gin’ baba le, giri liyɛ le, woi demɛniyɛnmɔmɔi.
Sabu Ama emɛ gɔ, naran go yaun kijɛ sɛɛu tɛgɛ yamalajɛi.
Tunmɔi ba unrunw gin’ ibɛɛ bii nɛ giru go yaamɔi.
Yerunw sɛguru gɔ naŋanɔugi. Gamuu kunrin kanraun, jugɔlu go mɛlɛnkɛbe sɛgɛraabɛin.
Inɛw kaju toin gɔbe, e be le kaju toi gin’ bei ajubai. Inɛw ɔɲɔmu bɛɛɲu gɔbe, e kanran be gin’ ɔɲɛ nɛ toi gin’ bei ajubai.
Inɛw wooi, purupagu babai. Iyaa, purupagu teenu lɔgɔjiyaa biyɛmɔnɔu. Sabu Ama salagunw lee, dimudimiyɛnw lee saliyɛ kikiredo.
Yoiyaara ebe gɔ buudu dadaaru le digɛ biyɛmɔnɔugi, kaa kijɛ e sɛɛ gɔ ei baamɔi. Sabu Ama sɔwaa gi: “Mu u le asuu wageniyɛindolɔn, asuu ui pajaidolɔn.”
Kodigɛu, emɛ anrangaju le “Inɛw Baŋa Ama mui baranɛi, mu liyɛidolɔn. Inɛ mu bɛrɛ inge kanrun bɛɛdo ma?” gɛɛ bɛbɛɛɲu.
Ei teeremɔw, Ama sɔɔ e bɛrɛ tagin gɔbei ajubai. Yoiyaara be yai lee, dumɔ bemɛ lee ajubaa ye, gagawu bemɛ deei.
Yesu Kirisito, yaa lee, iye lee, asuu tunmai.
Deeru yeru tɔgu dɛin dɛin le ei manamɔnɔugi. Sabu kinɛ emɛ gɔ kayɛrɛ sibɛ go tɔɔru lei laa, kaa Ama nɛɛma le paŋa bɛɛjɛ ye ɛju. Inɛw tɔɔru wogɔbe gɛlin gɔbe, wogɔ nɛ niwɛn turu kanran bɛɛnɛ.
Sadagadumu emɛ sɛɛ gɔ nɛ guju kuru Ama Ginrun birɛbirɛnw gɔbe, dumu wogɔ sadaga nɛ kuru sɛnɛ.
Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔnɛ kuu baŋa gɔ, hakɛ yaabu kanrun sadaga obodo giye, arusɛgɛbe ili yalu ɛjaa naa ɛjaa gɔ nɛ jɛjɛɛlɛjɛ. Kaa nawan gɔbe, ana laara nɛ goonaa ye tɛgɛrɛɲu.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Yesu kanran, kuu bana womɔ ili le inɛw gɔbe ɛjɛmɔ ga, ana laara nɛ gowaa yinwun.
Kɔɔi biyaa ye, emɛ ana laara gɔ nɛ, dɔgɔ tunmɔ wo bɛi gɔ duiyaa ye, wo bɛrɛ yaamɔi.
Sabu ɔn nɛ ana nɛ jaa biyɛɲu emɛ sɛnɛ. Kaa emɛ ana wɛɛido gɔi dɛnɛuwɔin.
Kodigɛu, Yesu le digɛnu waaru wooi emɛ Ama bɛrɛ woi sɔmu sadaga emɛ obomɔi. Tiyɛ gɔ woi Inɛw Baŋa emɛi ga aŋa le daii sɔɔmɔi.
Ɛju kanrun lee, kijɛ e sɛɛ tunmɔ le gamulu lee naŋanɔugi. Sabu sadaga wogɔ tunmɔ Ama kinɛ ahaajɛ.

Ei teeremɔw gɔbe sɔɔ yabai, iyaa be le tubiyei. Ama, kinrun ebe dɛi bei seselumɛdo digɛu, be jaa ei kajubau gɛlin. Birɛ bemɛ kinɛ ɛɛli le birɛ bɛɛ ga sɔɔ bemɛ yabai. Kinɛ jiun le birɛɲu biyɛmɔnɔugi, sabu wogɔ e bɛrɛ niwɛn turu kanran siyɛidolo.
Emɛ dɛi Ama gɛɛin. Emɛ kinɛjugɔ jarugu sɛlɛ le wɔin ga gawaa wɔin. Iyaa kijɛ puu nɛ emɛ yoiyaara ɛju yai ibɛɛ wɔin.
Mu ɛjii ɛɛnnaa, e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔ bɛrii Ama mui pilemɛ ye e bɛrɛ tii ga Ama gɛɛin.

Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu, pejugirɛnɛ diyɛ gɔ, ili womɔ le aaru sɔgɔjɛ biyɛmaabe dɛi, Ama woi yiun logoro nɛ bulomaabe. Ama, jamu obonɛ gɔ, ebaa diŋɛ womɔ kanran bɛɛ ga, birɛ ɛju wooi birɛ bɛɛ gɔnrɔn e bɛrɛ obo. Yesu Kirisito le digɛnu, kijɛ wo bɛrɛ ɛju emɛ nɛ wo kanranmɔ. Boi sɔmu gɔ asuu nasuu Yesu mɔi biyɛmɔ. Amina.
Mu ba unrunw, mu e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔ tinwinrun sɔɔ ɔn muyɔn le keŋiyɛin, sabu lɛtɛrɛ mu tɔŋu gɔ dumii wɔɔ.
Emɛ bainɛ Timɔtei kaju nɛ pajaatin ga igii biyɛi. Wo bɛrii wiyaai ye, mu wo le ei yɛnɛi wɛɛdɔn.
Ei teeremɔw gɔbe puu lee, Ama inɛw gɔbe lee, bemaa popoo wa. Itali gana jaŋu unrunw gɔbe, ei poonɔuwɔin.
Ama nɛɛma gɔ e wooi le biyɛ.
Mu Jake, Ama lee, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu Kirisito lee birɛbirɛnɛ gɔ mui. Ama unrunw aduna yalu wooi nɛ ginaa wɔin gɔbe puu, mu lɛtɛrɛ ɔn e bɛrɛ tiiuwɔn. Mu ei poonɔuwɔn.
Ba unrunw mabe, ei subɔrɔ dɛi waaru nau e bɛrɛ dɔwaa ye, wogɔ kinɛ ɛɛlu sɔɔ gin’ lugoi.
Kunrin, kijɛ kɔɔbe le gagawu ebe subɔraa yɛnaaɲu ye, wogɔ muyɔn ebe bariyɛmɔjɛ ga e igii wɔi.
Kaa dumɔ gɔ baa, ɛɛn go iŋiyɛin. Kunrin ebaa Yesu jaŋu unrunw kibaain, kijɛ turu kanran e nɛ lugo dɔɔlu biyɛnɔu ga ɛɛn go iŋiyɛin.
Inɛ turu, logoro ebe nɛ hakilɛ sɛlɛ ye, wo wogɔ Ama bɛrɛ gɛɛn, wo wo bɛrɛ ohobodo. Ama, inɛw wooi bɛrɛ dɔnrun wɔlɔ go, gaai, ihibɛ le ohobojɛ.
Inɛ hakilɛ sɛlɛ gɔ, kɔɔbaŋa kinɛ lɛilɛi turu kanran sɛlɛ go, gagawu le Ama bɛrɛ gɛɛn. Sabu inɛ kinɛ lɛilɛi le wɔɔ gɔ, kɔɔbaŋa nɛudii, ooɲɔ taŋa taŋa bala bala ye yaajɛ gin’ wɔɔ.
Kɔɔ gin’, inɛ kɔɔbaŋa, kinɛ lɛilɛi baŋa gɔ, inɛ kijɛ wo kanranjɛ puu nɛ diyɛ womɔ daanla gɔ, wo Inɛw Baŋa bɛrɛ kijɛ gɛɛn ye bɛbɛɛdo ma giye ajubanɔu.
Bainɛ dɛguginɛ gɔ, Ama, kuu womɔ unaajɛ dɛi kinɛ womɔ ɛɛliyɛmɔ.
Yesu jaŋu ii ɔgɔinɛ gɔ yaa, Ama, kuu womɔ sunugaajɛ dɛi kinɛ womɔ ɛɛliyɛmɔ. Ɔgɔinɛ belu puyo gin’ ɔgu gagalajɛ.
Sabu nai gowaa, ɔgiyaai ye, belu gɔi mamaaŋiyɛnmɔjɛ, puyo womɔ babagamɔjɛ. Iyaa ɛhɛju womɔ manayaado. Kɔɔ gin’ ɔgɔinɛ yaa, birɛ womɔ nɛ wo tonu, woi oroli ye gagalado.
Inɛ subɔrɔ tariyaajɛ gɔ, Ama wo yabu. Kɔɔ gin’ pinɛ womɔ yɛnaaɲu onu nɛ, wo, inɛw Ama ibɛɛ wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ Ama ɔnmɔsɔgɔ oboido gɔ, wogɔ bɛbɛɛdo.
Inɛ aai kanran, subɔrɔ nɛ woi yowaai ye, Ama woi suburu ga ajubanɔu. Sabu Ama lee mɔɲu lee jaŋala, iyaa wo inɛ turu kanran suburu ye teitai laa kanranmɔɔlɛ.
Inɛ tuturu puu, dadaaru mɔɲu womɔ woi biɲaa ye pɛnrɛn nɛ kunaa ye, subɔrɔ nɛ yoojɛ.
Kɔɔ gin’ dadaaru mɔɲu gɔ bɛrɛ bɛraa ye, hakɛ naranjɛ. Hakɛ gɔ gabiyaa, na taŋa ye, yiun naranjɛ.
Ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, e kuu ebe lelemɔnɔugi.

Sin obu ɛju naa ɛju wooi lee, sin obu kibaai wooi lee, alagala goo ye wɛɛjɛ. Ama bɛrɛ goo ye wɛɛjɛ. Nai lee, iyepilu lee, tolobe lee maŋanɛ gɔ bɛrɛ goo ye wɛɛjɛ. Ama asuu duliyeelɛ, wo onu dulo ye ɔlɔ nɛ asuu emi pajaidolo.
Kijɛ wo maŋaabe wooi logoro nɛ emaa dɛnrɛn ii pɔlɔ gin’ biyɛ ga, Ama, diŋɛ womɔ tɔitɔi le, emi naran sɔɔ gɔ le naraanbe.
Ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, e sɔɔ ɔn jugi biyɛi: Inɛ tuturu puu sɔɔ keŋi nɛ ɔgi biyɛ, kaa sɔɔ sɔi nɛ lee, kinɛbanrun nɛ lee ɔgiriyɛnɔugi.
Sabu, inɛ kinɛbanrun le wɔɔ gɔ, Ama giru nɛ kijɛ teitai wɔɔ gɔ kanraanlɛ.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, kijɛ inɛ lɔgɔjiyɛmɔjɛ wooi lee, kanran mɔɲu wooi lee pajutii. E kuu sunugu le Ama, kinɛ ebe nɛ sɔɔ yibaajɛ gɔ le yabai. Sabu wogɔ ei yabu bɛbɛɛdo.
E, Ama sɔɔ keŋi sai turu nɛ bii ye, kuu ebe lelemɔnɔugi. E naran go wogɔ birɛ birɛi.
Inɛ Ama sɔɔ ɛgaa, wogɔ birɛ birɛɛlɛ gɔ, kɔɔbaŋa inɛ kikinu yɛnu nɛ girupala womɔ bana wɔɔ gɔ tɔitɔi yɛnɛjɛ gin’ wɔɔ.
Kaa wo unruin yɛnaa kilaai onu nɛ, wo yayaajɛ. Kɔɔ onu nɛ wo bana wo bee gɔ ɔgu kɛu naŋayaajɛ.

Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ Ama tɔɔru kibaai gɔ woi, wogɔ inɛi hɔɔlɔi bobojojɛ. Inɛ Kibɛru Ɛju deeru gɔbe ɛjii dimɛ gɔ, inɛ wogɔ baŋa Kibɛru Ɛju deeru gɔbe naŋaalɛ ye, wo deeru wogɔbe le kɛukɛu birɛ birɛjɛ ye, kɔɔ waaru le inɛ kɔɔbaŋa kijɛ wo kanraindo wooi nɛ duba bɛbɛɛdo.
Inɛ unrun wa, Ama oju dimɛ ga wɔɔ, kaa ninɛ womɔ karumu kunɔ bɛɛlɛ gɔ, kɔɔbaŋa kuu unrunmɔ lelemɔuwɔ. Ama dimi womɔ gɔ niwɛn sɛlɛ.
Ama emɛ Ba gɔ, Ama dimi ɛju tɔitɔi ga wo lugojɛ gɔ unwɔ: Laawagunw ɔɲaa wɔin lee, yapanuw ɔɲaa wɔin gɔbe lee kajubu gɔ lee, aduna kijɛ lɔgɔgu pajaatiyaa ye, kuu uwɔ ɛjii gɛli leei.
Ba unrunw mabe, e, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito, dooro ɔgɔnɛ gɔ le gawaa wɔi. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi inɛw kabu e kunɔu jaanla.
Kɔɔ gin’, mɔɔnu ebe nɛ inɛ turu, kange numɔsagai numɔ unrunmɔ nɛ kunaa, arugoi ɛju goriyaa wiyaa yowaai ye, iyaa dɔgɔpaganɛ turu, arugoi sɛmɛlɛ goriyaa wiyaa yowaai ye,
e kɔɔ waaru le, ainɛ ɔgɔinɛ gɔi ɛjii sɛgɛraa ye, turu baŋa wo le gɛgɛɛdo: «Wɛɛ, u yalu ɛju ɔn nɛ dɛinyɛn.» Kɔɔ onu nɛ, ainɛ dɛguginɛ gɔ le gɛgɛɛdo: «U kɔɔ nɛ iŋiyɛn, maa wɛɛ kubɔsɔrɔ ma nɛ dɛinyɛn.»
E kijɛ e kanranjɛ gɔi iyeuwɔi ma? E logoro ebe nɛ tunmɔi kabu kunɔuwɔi, e inɛw bana e lugojɛ gɔ ajubu mɔɲu le digɛ.

Ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, e sɔɔ ɔn ɛjii keŋiyɛin: Ama, aduna ɔn nɛ, dɔgɔpaganw gɔbei yɛmaa, bemaa gagawu nɛ ɔgɔ unrunwin biyɛ gi. Iyaa Ama bemaa, inɛw woi ibɛɛ wɔin gɔbe dɛi pui kunaa, diinɛ ohobodo wo gi gɔ, wogɔ kɛn balanwin biyɛ gi.
Kaa, e kai, dɔgɔpaganw gɔbei gailiyɛmɔuwɔi. Inɛw ei ɔɲɔmɔw gɔbe, inɛw ei saliyɛ kiru yalu nɛ paŋa le jɛyaanw gɔbe, ɔgɔ unrunw gɔbe bei laa ma?
Inɛw Baŋa ebe boi ɛju e bɛrɛ kunu gɔ yamalanw gɔbe bei.
“Aŋai kuu uwɔ u ibɛ gin’ u bɔɔnɛi yaa kɔɔ gin’ ibɛi biyɛ.” Ama diinɛ tɔɔru gɔ woi. E Ama Dɔn bana gɛɛjɛ gin’ Tɔɔru wogɔ kanrun ye kikibemɔjɛi ye, e sɔɔ ɛjui kanranjɛi.
Kaa e inɛw kabu kunɔuwɔi ye, e hakɛ kanraunwɔi. Iyaa, ei Tɔɔru yamalawin dɛi, Tɔɔru gɔ yaa jarugu kuu ebe nɛ sunugouwɔ.
Sabu inɛ Tɔɔru gɔ puu kanraan, koturu yamalajɛ baŋa gɔ, tɔɔru wajunw gɔbe wooi dɛi jarugu le wɔɔ.
Kɔɔ gin’ Ama tɔɔraa gi: “Dimu dimiyɛnnɔu.” Ama iyaa tɔɔraa gi: “Inɛi daanɔu.” Nɛɛ, u dimu dimiyɛɛnlɛu, kaa inɛi dadaajɛu ye, u Tɔɔru gɔ puu yamalanɛi biyaau.
Tɔɔru inɛi hɔɔlɔi bojojɛ gɔ, Ama, tɔɔru wogɔ le kuu ebe nɛ saliyɛ kikirɛdo ga ajubu le bii ye, sɔɔ ebe kunrin sɔɔi, birɛ ebe kunrin birɛi.
Inɛ, inɛw wajunw amasɔgɔ jugɔlu gɔ, inɛ wogɔ, saliyɛ womɔ Ama bai kireido gɔ, amasɔgɔjugɔ biyɛidolo. Kaa amasɔgɔ jugɔ, saliyɛ kuu nɛ gɔnrɔn yasɛ.
Ba unrunw mabe, inɛ turu unrun gagawu yasɛ gɛɛjɛ, kaa birɛ womɔ le wogɔ tagaraalɛ ye, wogɔ niwɛn ingei sɛɛ? Gagawu womɔ kɔɔ gin’ woi yabu bɛbɛɛdo ma?
Aiwa, bainɛ turu ma, yasanɛ turu ma, duŋu le ma, giyɛ le wɔɔ biyaai ye,
kɔɔ gin’ logoro ebe nɛ turu baŋa bemaa, «Jamu le biyɛi, Ama kaali ebe goo, Ama pana ebe tɔɔ» aŋa le sai giyaajɛ ye, e inɛw kɔɔbe bɛrɛ kijɛ kai bemɛ kilɛido oboolɛi ye, wogɔ be bɛrɛ inge niwɛin sɛɛ?
Kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’, gagawu kanran, kuu womɔ le, birɛ gɔbe wɔlɔ ye, woi kijɛ yinwin.
Kaa, inɛ turu ɔn gin’ sɔwaajɛ ye: «U gagawu yasɛu, mu kai birɛ gɔbe yasɔn. Birɛ wɔlɔ go gagawu uwɔ yani bii bɛɛjɛ ma mu bɛrɛ tagara, kɔɔ waaru le mu gagawu ma, birɛ le u bɛrɛ tatagaradɔn.
U Ama koturu sai wɔɔ ga, wogɔ le gawaa wɔu. Aiwa, ɛjii wɔɔ. Wogɔ sɔɔ ɛjui. Jinrunbe kanran wogɔ le gawaa wɔin, iyaa be liyaai ye kikinwɛnɲu.
U inɛ bomɔginɛ gɔ, birɛ gɔbe wɔlɔ ye, gagawu kijɛ tiyɛ sɛlɛi ga jugɔ ibɛɛ wɔu ma?
Emɛ tirɛ ainɛ Abarahamu, waaru aini womɔ Isakai sadagadumu gɔ nɛ Ama bɛrɛ sadaga gin’ wo obu le, birɛ womɔ sabu dɛi, Ama woi inɛ teitai wɔɔi ga lugaabe.
Nɛɛ u iyeuwɔu, Abarahamu, gagawu womɔ lee, birɛ womɔ lee, kubɔ tunmɔ yaabɛin. Kɔɔ gin’ Abarahamu gagawu gɔ, birɛ womɔ le digɛu, gagawu kibaai biyaabe.
Kɔɔ gin’ Ama Dɔn nɛ sɔɔ tɔŋaaɲu gɔi kibaai: “Abarahamu, Ama le gawaabe. Gagawu womɔ digɛu, Ama woi teitai wɔɔ ga lugaabe.” Iyaa Ama woi unrun anrungei gi.»
Aiwa, e nɛɛ iyeuwɔi, Ama, inɛ teitai wɔɔ ga wo lugojɛ gɔ, gagawu womɔ sai dɛi laa, kaa birɛ wo birɛjɛ gɔbe dɛi.
Rahabu, yaanran dimu le kayaube mɔ gɔ yaa kunrin bii. Waaru tebutebenw Josue tii gɔbei ɛjii sɛgɛraa, bei baraa, oju waja le ana gɔ nɛ bei wo goomu le, birɛ womɔ dɛi woi yaanran teitai ga Ama lugaabe.
Sabu bana goju, kikinu tolo ye yinwaain wɔɔ gin’, gagawu yaa, birɛ gɔbe wɔlɔ ye yinwaain.
Ba unrunw mabe, logoro ebe nɛ inɛw joo Ama sɔɔ deerewin biyɛ ga dɛnɛnɔugi. Sabu emɛ jaŋudeerenw gɔbe, Ama saliyɛ kireido gɔ sigɛ le emɛ le nau biyɛdo ga e igii wɔi.
Emɛ puu kijɛ joo nɛ emi lelelejɛ. Inɛ sɔɔ wo sɔɔjɛ nɛ leleelɛ gɔ, kɔɔbaŋa inɛ kibaai, sabu wo goju womɔ puu yaa sɛɛu gɛli bɛbɛɛdo.
Emɛ sɔun womaa sɔɔ emɛ yaba ga wɔin ye, emɛ aŋa womɔ nɛ karumu kukunɔɲu: Kɔɔ gin’ emɛ woi yalu emɛ ibɛ puu nɛ jɛyai bɛbɛɛdɛin.
Iyaa diikoro yɛnɛi: Halu ɛjii gaai wɔɔ kanran, ooɲɔ diyɛ diyɛbe woi damaa yaajɛ kanran, kɔɔ wooi logoro nɛ kijɛ kigelemɔɲu dagi le, diikoro jɔbɔmɔnɛ gɔ, yalu wo ibɛ nɛ woi jɛyaajɛ.
Kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’, ninɛ kanran, goju nɛ yalu dagii, kaa saba diyɛ diyɛ sabajɛ. Yaun dagi bana unu diyɛ tɛgɛjɛ gɔi ajubu yɛnɛi.

Ninɛ, yaun gin’ wɔɔ. Wo nɛ mɔɲu tɔgu dɛin dɛin jowaa wɔɔ. Goju emɛ nɛ yalu turui. Wo goju emɛ puu lɔlɔgɔjiyɛmɔjɛ. Yaun banrun asuu yinwɛɛnlɛ gɔ le woi tɛŋunaa, ninɛ, aduna nɛ bii emɛ puu nɛ, yaun kunɔjɛ.
Olunawan tɔgu dɛin dɛinbe lee, sasaabe lee, kijɛ minɛ nɛ bumɔɲu lee, nɛudii iijube lee, Adama unrunw wogɔbe tubiyemu bɛbɛɛɲu, iyaa tubiyemaabɛin.
Kaa ninɛ kai, inɛ turu kanran woi tubiyemu bɛɛlɛ: Ninɛ kijɛ mɔɲui, tiŋɛ bɛɛmɔɔlɛ, wo dugo inɛ dai le jowaa wɔɔ.
Emɛ ninɛ le Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Bai sɔsɔmɔɲu, iyaa ninɛ le Ama, unrun le murin inɛw wo maŋaajɛ gɔbei jɛjɛbɛɲu.
Aŋa tutunmɔ gɔ nɛ duba lee, jebu lee gogoojɛ. Ba unrunw mabe, wogɔ kanraun jaanla.
Diipujo tutunmɔ nɛ dii ɛɛlu lee, dii gaaru lee goo bɛbɛɛjɛ ma?
Ba unrunw mabe, gaa na, oliwe ii narun bɛbɛɛdo ma? Iyaa resɛn tiun, gaa ii narun bɛbɛɛdo ma? Kɔɔ gin’, diipujo nɛɛmi wɔɔ nɛ dii ɛɛlu goolɛ.

Logoro ebe nɛ inɛ hakilɛ lee, jugɔ lee sɛɛ yato ma? Aiwa, inɛ wogɔ baŋa wo hakilɛ lee, sasai lee yasɛ ga bana ɛju womɔ le jugɔmɔ. Iyaa, kijɛ wo kanranjɛ puu kuu sunugu lee hakilɛ lee le kanranjɛ ga jugɔmɔ.
Kaa kinɛ ebe nɛ ele mɔɲu lee, kuu ma too sɔɔ lee gɛliyaa wɔi ye, e kuu ebe unɔnɔugi. Iyaa, naran gɔ kakalu le tilɛnɔugi.
Kɔɔ, hakilɛ Ama bɛrɛ daa go goojɛ gɔ woi laa. Kaa aduna hakilɛi, gojunawan hakilɛi, jinrun puu kuu baŋa bɛrɛ goi.
Sabu yalu ele lee, kuu ma too lee wɔɔ gɔ, yalu wogɔ nɛ giru giru sɔɔ lee, sɔɔ mɔɲu tɔgu dɛin dɛin lee tɛtɛmɛmɔjɛ.

Kaa, hakilɛ daa go goo ye wɛɛjɛ gɔ, wogɔ laa gɔ ɛjaa wɔɔ. Kɔɔ onu nɛ woi jamu hakilɛi, kaali wɔɔ, inɛ le ɛjii wɔɔ, amasɔgɔjugɔ le jowaa wɔɔ, sɔɔ ɛju tɔgu dɛin dɛin kanrannɛi, inɛi kabu kunɔɔlɛ, aŋa lɛilɛi sɛlɛ.
Inɛw jai aŋaranw gɔbe, be jamui toi gin’ tɔɔuwɔin. Kɔɔ gin’ ii be gɛlɛido gɔ, wogɔ ɔnmɔ teitai gɔi.
Logoro ebe nɛ kɔmɔ lee, jai lee, inge ingelemɔjɛ ma? Dadaaru mɔɲu waaru puu goju ebe nɛ jaiyɛuwɔ gɔbe birɛi laa ma?

E kijɛ turu daariyaa wɔi, kaa kijɛ wogɔ aŋai kanrun ye bɛɛɲu sɛlɛi. Kɔɔ waaru le e inɛi dadaajɛi. E kijɛ turu dadaaru le wɔi, kaa bana wogɔ bɛɛɲu sɛlɛi. Kɔɔ waaru le jiiru lee, jai lee ihingeledo. Kijɛ e ibɛ gɔ e bɛɛlɛi. Sabu e wogɔ Ama bɛrɛ gɛɛnlɛi.
E gɛɛn gɛgɛɛnjɛi, kaa e kijɛ e gɛɛnjɛ bɛɛlɛi. Sabu bana le e gɛɛnjɛ gɔ mɔɲi wɔɔ: E kijɛ e gɛɛnjɛ gɔ dadaaru mɔɲu ebe kai kilɛ dɛi gɛɛnjɛi.
E, dimudimiyɛnw gin’, inɛw sɔɔ turu nɛ iŋiyɛɛnnɛ gɔbe, aduna ibɛi bii gɔ Ama jaŋunɛi bii ga, e inɛi ma? Inɛ aduna anrungei bii ibɛɛ wɔɔ gɔ, kɔɔbaŋa Ama jaŋunɛi biyɛdo.
E ajubu ebe nɛ Ama Dɔn gɔ bamai sɔɔjɛ ga wɔi ma? “Ama, kikinu emɛ nɛ wo kunaabe gɔ, kikinu wogɔ ele le wɔɔ.”
Kaa kɔɔ wooi nɛ, Ama, nɛɛma gɔ kɔɔ dɛi sigɛ gaai wɔɔ. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi Ama Dɔn kijɛ gi: “Ama, inɛw kuu unrunbemɛ unɔw gɔbe le jajaiyɛjɛ. Kaa inɛw kuu sunugu le wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ nɛɛma ohobojɛ.”
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, e Ama le tubiyei. E, jinrun puu kuu baŋa dɛi ɛɛn go iŋiyɛin, wo jɔbɔ ye e le wagee bibiyɛdo.
E, Ama le bɛrii biyɛi, wo e le bɛrii bibiyɛdo. E inɛw hakɛ kanranw gɔbe, bana mɔɲu ebe dulomɔi. E inɛw kinɛ lɛilɛi le wɔin gɔbe, kinɛ ebe ɛjɛmɔi.
Ei inɛw amasɔgɔgunwin ga igii biyɛi. Kinɛjiun le biyɛi, sɔmiyɛin. Mɔmu ebe gɔ pii tanugai. Kinɛ ɛɛlu ebe gɔ kinɛjiun tanugai.
Inɛw Baŋa giru nɛ kuu ebe sunugoi. Wo kuu ebe uhunɔdo.

E tunmɔ sɔɔ mɔɲu sɔɔnɔugi, ba unrunw mabe. Inɛ wo bainɛ sɔɔ mɔɲu sɔɔjɛ gɔ, maa inɛ wo bainɛ saliyɛ kirɛjɛ gɔ, kɔɔbaŋa Tɔɔru dɛi mɔɲu sɔɔuwɔ, Tɔɔru saliyɛi kirɛuwɔ. U Tɔɔru saliyɛ kireuwɔu ye, u waja Tɔɔru sɔɔ yabanɛi laau, kaa saliyɛkirenɛ womɔi biyaau.
Tɔɔru daananɛ gɔ lee, saliyɛkirenɛ gɔ lee, Ama turu sai. Yabanɛ gɔ lee, susuiyomɔnɛ gɔ lee, Ama turu sai. Nɛɛ u, inɛ waja saliyɛ kirenɛ gɔ, ui aai?
Nɛɛ, e mui ɛjii keŋiyɛin, e inɛw sɔɔ ɔn gin’ sɔɔnw gɔbe: «Iye ma, yogo ma, emɛ ana diyɛ ɔn nɛ yayaadɛin, emɛ wogɔ nɛ anranguju turu bibiyɛdɛin, emɛ ibɛsoɲu sasaɲadɛin, emɛ kɛɛlɛ bɛbɛɛdɛin.»
E, yogo kijɛ biyɛido inɛw inin gɔbe! Sabu kinruntaun ebe yagɔ baa wɔɔ ma? Kukumɔ, waaru gaila le iyemaajɛ ye, kɔɔ onu nɛ ɔgu giru emɛ nɛ manayaajɛ gɔ, ei wogɔ le murin wɔɔ.
Bana e gɛɛun jaan gɔ unwɔ: «Inɛw Baŋa yabaajɛ ye, emi ɔnmɔi biyɛdo, emɛ kijɛ ɔn ma kijɛ kɔɔ ma kakanrandɛin.»
Kaa kanɛ e kuu ulo le biyaa, e saba sabauwɔi. Kuu ulo kɔɔ tunmɔ ɛjula.
Inɛ kijɛ ɛju kanraun wo jaan gɔ igii wɔnu kanraanlɛ baŋa, wo hakɛ kanraunwɔ.
Nɛɛ, ɔgɔ unrunw gɔbe, mui ɛjii keŋiyɛin. Mɔɲu e bɛrɛ dɔɔido gɔbe dɛi, mii diyɛ le sɔmiyɛin.
Arusɛgɛ e sɛɛ gɔbe dodogodo. Sɔi ebe gɔbe peru kakayado.

Kange e sɛɛ gɔ lee, sarudu e sɛɛ gɔ lee, kɔjɔ uhulodo. Kɔɔ gin’, saliyɛ kiru bai gɔ le kɔjɔ wogɔ e dɛi sɛɛrɛi bibiyɛdo. Kɔjɔ wogɔ yaun gin’ ei tɛgu ye yayamalado. E, waaru dumɔ ɔn le arusɛgɛ balaa mɔɔnaa wɔi.
Inɛw birɛbirɛnw, minɛ ebe gɛlɛnw gɔbe tujɔ gɔ, e be bɛrɛ oboli. E amasɔgɔ pii bemɛ gɔ keŋiyɛin. Mii bemɛ, Ama kijɛ wooi kuu nɛ daan gɔ suguru nɛ baa yowaai.
E, aduna ɔn nɛ kijɛ kinɛ ebe aajɛ dadaaru dɛi kɛɛlɛ ebe yamalaabei. Arusɛgɛ, bai woi sɛnwɛindɛin dɛi aŋai ɛjii kayamaaɲu gin’, e, saliyɛ kiru bai gɔ dɛi kuu ebe le ei ɛjii kayamaa, pooniyaan wɔi.
E, inɛw teitai wɔin gɔbe kuu nɛ jarugu duuraa, bei daabei, be sɔɔ turu kanran saanɛ.

Ba unrunw mabe, e, Inɛw Baŋa wɛɛido baa, muyɔn le biyɛi. Bana woluwalanɛ, minɛ unrunmɔ nɛ gɛlu ɛju bɛɛ dɛi muyɔn le wo biyɛjɛ gɔi yɛnɛi: Anrandii pɔlɔ gɔ sugu gowaa, anrandii dumɔ gɔ sugoido baa, wo muyɔn le bii ye dɔdɔmiyɛnjɛ.
E kanran muyɔn le biyɛi. Anrangaju le biyɛi. Sabu Inɛw Baŋa wɛɛgu gɔ bɛrii wɔɔ.
Ba unrunw mabe, Ama womaa saliyɛ ebe kirɛnɔu ga, e tunmɔ dɛi guguun guunnɔugi. Yɛnɛi, saliyɛkirenɛ gɔ wagela. Wo murɔn aŋa gɔ nɛ kohiŋɛn.
Ba unrunw, e inɛw Ama titiyaanw Ama dɛi sɔɔ sɔwaabɛin gɔbei ajubu yɛnɛi. Ɔɲɛ bemɛ gɔ lee, muyɔn bemɛ gɔ lee deei.

Emɛ, inɛw muyɔn muyɔnw gɔbe Ama be yabu gɛɛuwɔin. E Jɔbu muyɔn muyaanbe gɔ sɔɔ gɔ ɛgaabei. Inɛw Baŋa Ama, dumɔ gɔ bana Jɔbui duba wo kanraanbe gɔ igii wɔi. Sabu Inɛw Baŋa amasɔgɔjugɔ lee, ɛhɛju lee le jowaa wɔɔ.

Sigɛ le, ba unrunw, e kuu ebe jɛbiyɛnɔugi. E alagala le ma, minɛ le ma, bana waja turu le kanran kuu ebe jɛbiyɛnɔugi. Kaa Ama, jarugu, kuu ebe nɛ sunugonɔu ga, «ee» ebe ee biyɛmɔi, «ai» ebe ai biyɛmɔi.
Inɛ turu logoro ebe nɛ ɔɲɛ le wɔɔ ye, wo Ama bɛrɛ gɛɛn. Inɛ turu kinɛ ɛɛlu le wɔɔ ye, birɛpoo tagu nii wo niiu jaain wɔɔ.
Logoro ebe nɛ inɛ turu jijinwɛnjɛ biyaai ye, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu inɛw naw gɔbe boonaa ye, kuu womɔ nɛ nii paraaɲu onu nɛ, wo dɛi Inɛw Baŋa boi le Ama be gɛɛnmɔ.

Ama inɛw mɔɔnu inɛw naw gɔbe, Inɛw Baŋa Ama, gɛɛn bemɛ sasaado ga, wogɔ le gawaa wɔin ye, inɛ jiunginɛ gɔi babajado. Inɛw Baŋa Ama, inɛ kɔɔ bɛrɛ jamu ohobodo. Wo hakɛ kanraanbe ye, Ama woi yaabu kakanrando.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, e tunmɔ bɛrɛ hakɛ ebe tagai. Ei baja dɛi, e tunmɔ dɛi Ama bɛrɛ gɛɛin. Inɛ teitai wɔɔ amagɛɛn gɔ, gɔnrɔn diyɛ yasɛ.
Eli inɛ emɛ gin’ beei: Wo anran miinɔu ga, amagɛɛn nɛ ɛjii mainiyaanbe. Kɔɔ gin’, anranguju taanu lee pɛjɛrɛ lee, minɛ nɛ anrandii sugolu.
Kɔɔ onu nɛ wo iyaa lee Ama gɛnyaanbe. Anran miyaanbe. Dɛnrɛn ilaabe.
Ba unrunw mabe, logoro ebe nɛ inɛ turu lelaa, naran oju gɔ pajaa wo tiyaa, bainɛ waja inɛ wogɔi naran oju gɔ nɛ pilemaa jɛɛlaajɛ ye,
e igii biyɛi, inɛ, inɛ hakɛ kanrannɛ turu oju mɔɲu wo tobe gɔ nɛ goonɔjɛ gɔ, kɔɔbaŋa inɛ hakɛ kanrannɛ gɔ kikinu gɔi yaun asuu yinwɛɛnlɛ gɔ nɛ yabauwɔ. Iyaa, hakɛ joo naa joo yaabu kakanrandɛin.

Mu Piɛru, Yesu Kirisito jaŋu ii tiyaaɲu gɔ, mu lɛtɛrɛ ɔn, e, Ama inɛw yɛmu, aduna ɔn nɛ yerunwin wɔin gɔbe, inɛw Rɔmɛ laamu, Pɔn lee, Galasi lee, Kapadɔse lee, Asi lee, Bitini lee numɔ nɛ ginaa wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ tɔŋaa tiiuwɔn.

Ebaa Yesu Kirisito sɔɔ yaba ga, ili womɔ le ei ɛjɛmɔ ga, Ba Ama pɔɔlɔ baa sɔɔ bibiyɛdo ga wo kɛju gɔ le kɛukɛu ei yɛmi. Iyaa Kikinu womɔ gɔnrɔn le ei Ama tɔgu dɛiin bojaaɲui digɛu ei yɛmi. Ama, nɛɛma lee, jamu lee ei gaai obo.
Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito Ama gɔ, iyaa wo Ba gɔi sɔmɔmɔi. Amasɔgɔjugɔ diyɛ womɔ sabu dɛi, Yesu Kirisitoi yiun nɛ bulogu gɔ le digɛu Ama emi pilemaa narun. Emɛ kunrin diyɛdɔn ɔnmɔ gɔ yasin.
Iyaa Ama, inɛw womɔ dɛi kɛn maŋaa sɛɛ gɔ, wogɔ bɛɛ ga emɛ kinɛ ɔgu le wɔin. Wo wogɔ e dɛi alagala nɛ gɛliyaa wɔɔ. Wogɔbe, arusɛgɛ asuu yanwaannɛbei, lɔgɔjiyɛɛnɛbei, kumujiyeenɛbei.
Yayabu, waaru dumɔ gɔ le jugɔmɔidɛin ga kanɛ baa yegeraaɲu gɔ, yayabu wogɔ bai e bɛɛido baa, e inɛw gagawu ebe dɛi Ama, gɔnrɔn unrunmɔ le gɛlɛ gɔbe, e dɛi Ama kijɛ ɛju wogɔbe alagala nɛ bojaa sɛɛ.
Halu kanɛ waaru gaila le, subɔrɔ tɔgu dɛin dɛin dɛi kinɛ ebe jijinwɛndo bibiyɛ kanran, e kijɛ ɛju wogɔ dɛi kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔuwɔi.

Subɔrɔ kɔɔbe, gagawu ebe pinɛ yɛnɛdɛin ga e bɛrɛ dɔɔuwɔ. Kange, halu pinɛ womɔ yaun nɛ yɛyɛnɛɲu kanran, woi kijɛ sɔgɔɔlɛi. Kunrin, gagawu ebe gaai kange dɛi ire wɔɔ gɔ yaa, yagɔ baa ɛɛn ma jugɔ ga, pinɛ womɔ yɛyɛnɛɲu. Kɔɔ gin’ e boi sɔmu lee, dooro lee, baba lee, Yesu Kirisito waaru unruin wo tagaraido gɔ le bɛbɛɛdei.
Halu e woi iyetɛnɛ kanran woi ibɛɛ wɔi. Halu e kanɛ woi iyeuwɔnɛ kanran, e wo le gawaa wɔi. E kɔɔ sabu dɛi kinɛ ɛɛlu diyɛ naa diyɛ le wɔi. Kinɛ ɛɛlu gɔ bana gaa gɔ aŋa le sɔi bɛɛmɔɔlɛ.
Sabu e kijɛ dɛi gawaa e wɔɔ gɔi bɛɛuwɔi: Wogɔ kikinu ebe yayabu gɔ woi.
Yayabu kɔɔ sɔɔ dɛi, inɛw Ama titiyaanw denu dɛnaabɛin, selumu selumaabɛin. Iyaa, be Ama e bɛrɛ nɛɛma oboido gɔ dɛi sɔɔ wɛɛido sɔwaabɛin.

Inɛw Ama titiyaanw gɔbe nɛ Kirisito Kikinu tobe gɔ, Kirisito ɔɲɛ iyeido sɔɔ lee, kɔɔ onu nɛ dooro wo bɛɛido sɔɔ lee, giru nɛ baa sɔwaatiyaabɛin. Waaru yagɔ le ma, bana inge le ma biyɛdo ma ga, be mainiyaan jugɔ ibɛɛ bɛin.

Inɛw Ama titiyaanw gɔbe bɛrɛ sɔɔ taga ga sagu duurin gɔ, wogɔ kuu bemɛ dɛi laa, kaa e dɛi ga Ama be bɛrɛ jugɔmaabe. Sɔɔ wogɔ, kanɛ inɛw Kibɛru Ɛju waaju taganw gɔ le digɛu e bɛrɛ tagaaɲu. Be Kikinu Pilu alagala gowaa tiin gɔ gɔnrɔn le sɔɔ gɔ tagaabɛin. Halu mɛlɛnkɛbe kanran wogɔ paamu kanran ga daariyaabɛin.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi yeguru le biyɛi, hakilɛ kunɔi. Kuu ebe ɛjii gɛliyɛi. Yesu Kirisito waaru unruin wo tagaraido gɔ le nɛɛma e bɛrɛ oboidɛin gɔ, diyɛ ebe sɛɛu wogɔ nɛ daanai.
E, Ama sɔɔ le yabawin biyɛi. Pɔlɔ pɔlɔ, Amai jugɔlu ebe waaru le dadaaru e sɛbe gɔbe le biyɛnɔugi.
Ama ei boonɔnɛ gɔ bana ɛjaa wɔɔ gin’, kijɛ e kanranjɛ wooi nɛ e yaa ɛjaai biyɛi.
Sabu Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaa gi: “E ɛjaai biyɛi, sabu mu ɛjaa wɔun.”
Inɛwin kabu kunɔlu go, inɛ tuturu, birɛ womɔ le kɛukɛu saliyɛ womɔ Ama kirenɛ gɔ, woi e Bai ga wo bɛrɛ gɛɛnjɛi ye, iyɛru nɛ waaru e wɔɔ le e Ama giri liyɛ le biyɛi.
Nɛɛ, e tirɛ anranw oju niwɛn sɛlɛ ei be deeraabe gɔ nɛ inge le ei dɔrugaabɛin ma e igii wɔi. Kijɛ yanwanjɛ, sarudu ma, kange ma gin’ le kai ei dɔrugɔnɛ.
Kaa Kirisito ili dɔnrun diyɛ gɔ le ei dɔrugaabɛin. Kirisito, wo peju ii jiun sɛlɛ ma, lɔgɔ ma tolo gin’ biyaabe.
Ama, Kirisito gɔi aduna maŋamɔ nɛ yɛmaabe. Iyaa kanɛ waaru dumɔ ɔn le, Ama, ɛju ebe dɛi woi daii tagaraabe.
Ama, Kirisitoi yiun nɛ bulugaa, dooro wo bɛrɛ obonɛ gɔ, e Kirisito wogɔ le digɛu wo le gawaa wɔi. Kunrin gagawu ebe gɔ lee, diyɛdɔn ebe gɔ lee, Ama nɛ bojaa sɛi.
Gagawu nɛ e ba unrunw gɔbei kinɛpilu le ibɛɛ biyɛ ga, e naran gɔ le yabu le digɛu kinɛ ebe ɛjɛmaabei. Kodigɛu e tunmɔi kinɛ ebe wooi le, ɛjii ibɛɛ biyɛi.
Ama sɔɔ ɔnmɔi wɔɔ gɔ asuu wɔɔ gɔ le digɛu ei pilemaa naraanɲu. Ei narannɛ gɔ inɛ yinwɛnjɛi laa, wo asuu yɔɔ.
Sabu Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaa gi: “Adama unrunw puu belu gin’ wɔin, daula bemɛ olu belu puyo gin’ wɔɔ. Belu mamaaŋiyɛnjɛ, puyo womɔ babagajɛ.
Kaa, Inɛw Baŋa Ama sɔɔ gɔ asuu sɔsɔgɔjɛ.” Sɔɔ wogɔ Kibɛru Ɛju, sɔɔ e bɛrɛ tagu gɔ woi.
