Kɔɔ dɛi, e, mɔmɔɲu wooi lee, nabara wooi lee, iyaa aŋa lɛilɛi lee, ele lee, inɛw mɔɲu sɔɔ sɔi puu lee pajai.
Ibanrin kanɛ naraanɲu bana wo na iru daariyɛjɛ gin’, iru koro kikinugu lɔgɔ tolo dadaaru gɔ ei aamɔi. E wogɔ nɔwaan ye, kole digɛnu ei gagabiyɛdo, ei yayabadɛin.
Ama Dɔn sɔwaa gi: “E Inɛw Baŋa Ama yagɔ baa ɛjii wɔɔ ma maraan yɛnaabei.”
Inɛw Baŋa genɛ nɛ dɔɔi. Woi tibu ɔnmɔ inɛw kamaa pajin gɔi, kaa Ama tibu maai wɔɔi ga yɛmaabe gɔi.

E yaa tibu ɔnmɔi wɔin gin’ bii ye, Inɛw Baŋa womaa ei jeɲɛ ye ginrun kikinugu e le ujɔ ga genɛ womɔ nɛ dɔɔi. E ginrun wogɔ kɔlɔ nɛ inɛw Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw dɛiin bojaaɲui bibiyɛdei. Kɔɔ gin’ Yesu Kirisito le digɛnu sadaga Ama Kikinu le digɛ Ama bɛrɛ dɔdɔɔnɔdei, wogɔ Ama yayabajɛ.
Sabu Ama Dɔn nɛ ɔn gin’ tɔŋi: “Yɛnɛ, ginrun sibɛ tibu maai wɔɔ gɔ yɛmaa mu Siɔn nɛ duunaajɔn. Kaa, inɛ wo le gawaajɛ gɔ, wo asuu dɔgɔ iyeidolo.”
E inɛw Kirisito le gawaa wɔin gɔbe, e bɛrɛ tibu gɔ gaai maai wɔɔ. Kaa inɛw wo le gawanɛ gɔbe dɛi Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaa gin: “Ginrun ujɔnw tibu kamaa pajin gɔ, tibu wogɔ, ginrun sibɛ tibu gɔ woi bii.”
Iyaa Ama Dɔn yalu waja nɛ tɔŋaa gi: “Wogɔ tibu inɛw kubɔ tomɔmɔjɛ gɔ woi, dumɔ bei numɔmɔjɛ gɔi.” Be Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ gɔ le yabanɛ dɛi kubɔ bemɛ tomi. Ama pɔɔlɔ baa kunrin biyɛdo ga sɔwaa galaai.

Kaa ei tɔgu yɛmaaɲui. Ei Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw, Ama ɔgɔnɛi wɔɔ gɔ birɛbirɛnwin. Ei tɔgu Ama unrun dɛi dɛiin bojaa sɛɛi. Iyaa ei tɔgu Ama mɔi wɔɔi. Ama ɔlɔ nɛ ei goonaa, wijɛ womɔ kijɛ puu dɛi sigɛ doorojɛ gɔ nɛ ei jɛɛlɛnɛ gɔ birɛ ɛju naa ɛju gɔbe ebaa inɛw wooi bɛrɛ taga ga, wogɔ dɛi ei yɛmi.
Pɔɔlɔ e Ama tɔgui laai bei, kaa kanɛ ei Ama tɔgui. Pɔɔlɔ, Ama, amasɔgɔ ebe jugɔlu bee, kaa kanɛ amasɔgɔ ebe jugaaɲu.
Ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, ei aduna ɔn nɛ yerunwin, ei oju galanwin. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi mu e bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn, e dadaaru mɔɲu kinɛ ebe nɛ goojɛ, kikinu ebe le jaiyɛjɛ gɔ dɛi kuu ebe gɛliyɛi.

Inɛw Ama inin gɔbe giru nɛ bana ebe ɛjii biyɛmɔi. Kunrin, halu be ei jaaraa, ebaa mɔɲu kanranwin giyaaɲu kanran, be waajibi kanran ɛju ebe gɔ ihiyedɛin. Iyaa bai Ama saliyɛ kirei wɛɛido gɔ le, be Ama boi sɔsɔmɔdɛin.
Inɛw Baŋa dɛi, e aduna paŋagunw wooi le tubiyei: Ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ, kijɛ puu kuui wɔɔ gɔ lee,
sɛmɛgunw lee, inɛw mɔɲu kanranw gɔbei mɔɲii tujɔ ga, ɛju kanranw gɔbei sɔmɔ ga, ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ gɔ bei tii.
Ama diŋɛ gɔ unwɔ: Kanran ɛju ebe gɔbe le, bomɔgunw jugɔ sɛlɛ le sɔɔ sɔɔnw gɔbe bɛrɛ sɔɔ sɔɔɲu bɛɛmɔnɔugi.
E hɔɔlɔnw gin’ biyɛi. Kaa hɔɔlɔi bii ebe gɔ kijɛ mɔɲu dɛbu gɛlii biyɛmɔnɔugi, Ama birɛbirɛnw gin’ biyɛi.
E inɛw puui babai: Gagawu nɛ e ba unrunw gɔbei ibɛɛ biyɛi, Ama giri liyɛi, ɔgɔnɛ diyɛ gɔi babai.
Gunɔw gɔbe, e baba wooi le e baŋabe le tubiyei. Baŋa ɛju gɔbe, kinɛ ɛju le wɔin gɔbe sai laa, halu baŋa nau gɔbe le kanran tubiyei.
Halu ɔɲɛ gɔ wo le jaanla bee kanran, Ama kinɛ aamɔ dɛi, inɛ ɔɲɛ muyaanjɛ ye, wogɔ Ama giru nɛ sɔɔ ɛjui.
Mɔɲu e kanrun dɛi ei lagaaɲu ye, e wogɔ muyaanjɛi giye wogɔ dɛi ei sɔmɔ ga wɔi ma? Kaa ɛju e kanrun dɛi ei ɔɲɔmaaɲu ye, e wogɔ muyaanjɛi ye, Ama giru nɛ wogɔ sɔɔ ɛjui.
Kijɛ dɛi Ama ei boonu gɔ yaa kɔɔ woi. Sabu Kirisito, kuu womɔ le e dɛi ɔɲaabe. Ebaa kubɔnami unrunmɔ dimiyɛn ga, wo giru tagurui biyaabe.
Wo hakɛ turu kanran kanrantɛlu. Iyaa, aŋa womɔ nɛ nabara sɔɔ wo goou inɛ turu kanran ɛgɛtɛlu.
Waaru woi be duyɔ le, wo duyaa tujɔlu. Inɛw waaru woi ɔɲɔmi le, wo bei ɔɲɔmu tujɔdo gɛɛlu. Kaa teitai le Ama saliyɛkirenɛ gɔ numɔ nɛ sɔɔ unrunmɔ pajaabe.
Emaa hakɛ sibɛ go inɛw yinwin bii ye, emaa teitai gɔ dɛi ɔnmɔi biyɛ ga, Kirisito goju womɔ le ɔɲɔu, kuu womɔ le baga jai nɛ hakɛ emɛ duiyaabe. Woi be lagu gɔ dɛi ei bajaai.
E peju manaayaabɛin gin’ bei. Kaa kanɛ, kikinu ebe girɛnɛ lee, kikinu ebe gɛliyɛnɛ gɔ lee bɛrɛ ei pilemaa jɛɛlaaɲu.
E kanran, yaanw gɔbe, e igɛbe le e tubiyeun jaain wɔɔ. Kɔɔ gin’ bana ɛju ebe le digɛnu igɛnw gamuu Ama sɔɔ le gawanɛ ye, inɛw gawaa wɔin bibiyɛdɛin. Kunrin e sɔɔ sɔi kai siyɛidelei.
Sabu bana ebe gɔ aŋai ɛjii wɔɔ lee, aŋai baba sɛɛ gɔ lee, be ihiyeɲu.
Saŋa saŋi ebe bain saŋa saŋi biyɛmɔnɔugi: Kuu ɛru sigɛ le ma, kange dugɔi ma, sɔi dɔnrun diyɛ e goriyeido ma nɛ hakilɛ ebe bojonɔugi.
Kaa saŋa saŋi ebe gɔ kinɛ ebe kɔlɔ nɛ saŋa saŋiyaan wɔi biyɛmɔi. Saŋa saŋi wogɔ asuu bibiyɛdo, wogɔ kinɛ kuu sunugu sɛɛ, kaali wɔɔ nɛ goi. Wogɔ Ama giru nɛ kijɛ puu dɛi sigɛ ɛjii wɔɔ.
Pɔɔlɔ yaanw Ama giri liyɛnw, Ama nɛ diyɛ bemɛ daanaa bɛin gɔbe, be kɔɔ gin’ unrunbei saŋaraunbɛin.
Sara kunrin bee. Wo Abarahamu sɔɔ yabaa, woi unrun baŋai ga boonɔube. E ɛju kanranjɛi ye, iyaa kijɛ turu nɛ kanran kinɛ ebe yanwaanlɛ ye, ei Sara unrunw yaanwin.

E igɛnw gɔbe, e kanran bana ɛju le yaanw ebe le biyɛi. Be e gin’ gɔnrɔn sɛnɛ ga paamai. Kunrin be sibɛ go baba le biyɛi. Sabu Ama, nɛɛma womɔ dɛi ɔnmɔ wo obojɛ gɔ, e wooi bɛrɛ tunmɔ go obojɛ. Kijɛ turu kanran amagɛɛn ebe tɛŋɛnɔu ga, e kɔɔ gin’ kanrain.
Kɔɔ wooi onu nɛ, e wooi sɔɔ turu gɔ le biyɛi. E tunmɔ amasɔgɔ jugɔi. Ba unrunw gin’ tunmɔi ibɛɛ biyɛi. Tunmɔ le kinɛ ɛju le biyɛi. Tunmɔ le kuu sunugu le biyɛi.
Inɛ mɔɲu kanrannɛ gɔi mɔɲu le tujɔnɔugi, maa inɛ duyɔ duyɔnɛ gɔi duyɔ le tujɔnɔugi. Kaa be dɛi Ama boi booi. Sabu waaru Ama ei boonu le wo ei duba kanrando ga boonu.
Sabu Ama Dɔn kijɛ gi: “Inɛ, aduna kayi ibɛɛ wɔɔ ye, inɛ, bai ɛju iye ibɛɛ wɔɔ ye, mɔɲu dɛi ninɛ womɔ ai gɛliyɛ, nabara sɔɔ dɛi aŋa womɔ ai gɛliyɛ.
Wo mɔɲu kanrun le onu kigelemaatiyaa ye, ɛju kanran. Wo jamu dɛnɛ, wogɔ onu nɛ digiyɛ.
Sabu Inɛw Baŋa Ama, giri unrunmɔ inɛw teitai wɔin bɛrɛ dɛɛraa wɔɔ, wo gɛɛn bemɛ keŋiyɛunwɔ. Kaa Inɛw Baŋa Ama, mɔɲu kanranw gɔbe le jajaiyɛjɛ.”
Ɛju kanrun dɛi e saii mainiyɛunwɔi ye, inɛ aa e bɛrɛ mɔɲu kakanrando ma?
Kaa halu teitai dɛi ei ɔɲɔmɔdɛin kanran, Ama e yabu. E, inɛw giri liyɛnɔugi. Iyaa kikinu manu le biyɛnɔugi.
Kaa, Kirisitoi kinɛ ebe nɛ babai, woi Inɛw Baŋa ebei ga jugɔi. Diyɛdɔn le e wɔɔ tiyɛ gɔ inɛ aai kanran e bɛrɛ selumaajɛ ye, e waaru wooi inɛ wogɔ aŋa saa ga yeguru le biyɛi.

Kaa e wogɔ tɛgɛ sɛlɛ le, iyaa baba le kanrain. Waaru ei mɔɲu kanranwin giyaa ei jaaraaɲu, ei Kirisito mɔi digɛu bana ɛju le e wɔɔ gɔ dɛi, inɛw sɔɔ mɔɲu sɔɔnw gɔbe bemaa sɔɔ bemɛ dɛi dɔgɔ le biyɛ ga, e kinɛjugɔ jarugu sɛlɛ le biyɛi.
Ama diŋɛi ye, kanran mɔɲu dɛi ɔɲɛ bɛɛ dɛi, kanran ɛju dɛi ɔɲɛ bɛɛ ire.

Sabu Kirisito, kuu unrunmɔ le hakɛ ebe dɛi kubɔ turu sai yinwaan kilaai bii. Ei Ama genɛ nɛ jɛyaa ga, wo inɛ teitai bee gɔ, inɛw teitai laain dɛi yinwun. Inɛw, Kirisito goju gɔi daabɛin, kaa Ama, Kikinu unrunmɔ le digɛu yiun nɛ woi bulomaabe.

Wo Kikinu wogɔ le, kikinu pɔɔlɔ Ama sɔɔ yabanɛ kanrin, kaju nɛ toin gɔbe bɛrɛ waaju tagai yaabe. Wogɔ Nɔwe waaru le, Ama waaru muyaan bee gɔ le, diikoro diyɛ gɔ waaru yegereubɛin gɔ le bii. Diikoro wogɔ nɛ inɛw lugo gaila, tiyɛ gɔ inɛw gagara sai dii nɛ yabaabɛin.
Dii wogɔ, batise kanɛ ei yabajɛ gɔ sɛɛrɛi bee. Batise wogɔ goju lɔgɔ goonɔ dɛi laa, kaa Ama giru nɛ kinɛjugɔ jarugu sɛlɛ pui kunu sɔɔi. Batise wogɔ, Yesu Kirisito, yiun nɛ wo bulu gɔ dɛi ei yabajɛ.
Yesu Kirisito alagala ulaa, Ama numɔ iin sibɛ nɛ daan. Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔbe lee, alagala paŋagunw gɔbe lee, alagala sɛmɛgunw gɔbe lee, wo le tubiyaa wɔin.
Kunrin Kirisito, ɔɲɛ iyaabe dɛi, e kanran, wo gin’ ɔɲɛ bɛɛ ga yeguru le biyɛi. Sabu inɛ goju ɔɲɛ iyaajɛ gɔ, woi hakɛ le kabiyaa kilaai.
Nɛɛ, e kanɛ baa, aduna nɛ bai e bɛrɛ wajaai gɔ wooi, inɛw dadaaru mɔɲu gin’ laa, kaa Ama diŋɛ le kɛukɛu biyɛi.

E pɔɔlɔ, inɛw Ama inin gɔbe kijɛ kanrun ibiin gɔbe kanraun tanwaanbei. Nɛɛ kɔɔ baa wɔɔ. E kuu sɛlɛ lee, dadaaru mɔɲu lee, kɔɲɔ le bimili lee, yɔgɔrɔ mɔɲu lee, mɔrin ye kijɛ nɔi gabu lee, ɔmɔlɔ bulu tuutaaɲu gɔ lee, wogɔbei kanraunbei.
Nɛɛ kanɛ, inɛw Ama inin gɔbe, e be le mɔrinyaan ye yanwan mɔɲu naa mɔɲu kɔɔbe kanraanlɛ e wɔɔ gɔ dɛi, be bɛrɛ maunɛ wɔɔ, iyaa ei duduyɔɲu.
Inɛw ɔnmɔi wɔin gɔbe lee, inɛw yinwaain gɔbe lee saliyɛ kiredo ga, Ama unruin yegeraa wɔɔ gɔ, kijɛ be kanrun gɔbe bei seselumɛdo.

Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ, inɛw yiunbe bɛrɛ kanran tagaabɛin. Inɛw puu saliyɛ bana kireɲu gin’, waaru ɔnmɔi be bee le inɛw saliyɛ bemɛ kirin gɔbe, Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ be bɛrɛ tagin. Kunrin, bemaa Ama bana kikinui wɔɔ gin’ kikinu sibɛ go ɔnmɔi biyɛ ga Kibɛru Ɛju gɔ be bɛrɛ tagin.
Kijɛ puu dogogu gɔ bɛruniyaain. Kɔɔ digɛu Ama gɛɛn bɛɛ ga, e hakilɛ ebe daanaa ye, kuu ebe ɛjii gɛliyɛi.
Kijɛ wooi dɛi sigɛ tunmɔi ɛjii ibɛɛ bii gɔ kinɛ ebe nɛ kunɔi. Sabu ihibɛ, hakɛ joo naa joo yaabu kakanranjɛ.
E guguun wɔlɔ go, tunmɔ bɛrɛ ginrun sugo oboi.
Logoro ebe nɛ, inɛ tuturu Ama sin obu dɛin wo bɛrɛ obu gɔ kajubanɛi ɛjui wo biyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Iyaa sin obu dɛin wo bɛi gɔ inɛw puu kai kili biyɛmɔ.

Kijɛ wooi nɛ baba gɔ Yesu Kirisito le digɛnu Ama mɔi biyɛmɔ ga, inɛ waaju taganɛ gɔ, Ama sɔɔ gɔ inɛw bɛrɛ saanau jaain wɔɔ. Iyaa inɛ inɛw wajunw baranɛ gɔ, Ama wo bɛrɛ paŋa obojɛ gɔ le wo birɛun jaain wɔɔ. Boi sɔmu lee, gɔnrɔn lee, asuu nasuu Yesu Kirisito mɔi. Amina.
Ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, subɔrɔ nau e bɛrɛ dɔɔjɛ gɔ, kijɛ yeru gin’ bojo ye, maunɛ biyɛnɔugi.
Kaa, waaru Kirisito dooro tagaraidɛin gɔ le ebaa kanran kinɛ ɛɛlu le joo ye biyɛ ga, e wo gin’ ɔɲɛ iyaabei dɛi, kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔi.
Ei Kirisito jaŋu unrunwin dɛi ei duyaaɲu ye, Ama e yabu, sabu dooro Kikinu, Ama Kikinu gɔ, e le wɔɔ.
Logoro ebe nɛ, inɛ turu kanran, inɛ daanɛi ma, gugunyɔnnɛi ma, mɔɲu kanrannɛi ma, inɛ waja sɔɔ nɛ aŋa womɔ kunɔnɛi ma gin’ bii ye ɔɲɛ woi bɛɛmɔnɔu.
Kaa inɛ tuturu wooi, Kirisito inɛi dɛi ɔɲɛ iyeuwɔ ye, wo kɔɔ dɛi dɔgɔ le biyɛnɔu. Kaa, Kirisito inɛi wo wɔɔ gɔ dɛi wo Ama boi sɔmɔ.

Sabu saliyɛ kiru tɔlɔgu gɔ dɔwaai. Ama ginrun gonɔ maranw gɔbe saliyɛ laa kiredɛin. Nɛɛ, saliyɛ kiru gɔ kuu emɛ nɛ laa tɔlɔdo ye, inɛw Ama bɛrɛ Kibɛru Ɛju goi gɔ le yabanɛ gɔbe le bana yagɔ le dogodo?
Ama Dɔn bana sɔɔjɛ gin’: “Inɛw teitai gɔbe yaba ga nawin wɔɔ ye, inɛw Amai babanɛ, hakɛ kanranw gɔbe mɔ yani biyɛdo?”
Kɔɔ gin’, inɛw Ama diŋɛ le kɛukɛu ɔɲɔuwɔin gɔbe, birɛ ɛju kanrun gɔ be digiyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Be iyaa Maŋanɛ, sɔɔ turu baŋa gɔ nɛ sagu bemɛ sɛɛu be duurɔun jaain wɔɔ.

Mu Ama inɛw mɔɔnu inɛ na gɔ, nɛɛ mu, e inɛw Ama inɛw mɔɔnu logoro nɛ inɛw nawin wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔn. Mui Kirisito ɔɲɛ sɛɛrɛi. Mu iyaa dooro jugɔmɔidɛin gɔ nɛ gamulu ma bɛbɛɛdɔn. Inɛw naw gɔbe bɛrɛ kijɛ mu gɛɛjɛ unwɔ:
E pejugirɛnw gin’, Ama peju kulɔ e bɛrɛ sagu duuru gɔi ɛjii kajubai. Kinɛ aalu lei laa, kaa Ama diŋɛ le kɛukɛu, kinɛ ɛju le woi kajubai. Kɛɛlɛ bɛɛ sai dɛi kanrannɔugi, kaa kuu ebe obaa ye kanrain.
Inɛw e bɛrɛ gawaraaɲu gɔbei paŋa tagaranɔugi, kaa peju kulɔ gɔ giru nɛ, giru taguru ɛjubei biyɛi.
Kɔɔ gin’, waaru pejugirɛnw Kuu Baŋa unruin tagaraido, e dooro ɔgɔdomɔ kɔɔlɔɔlɛ gɔ bɛbɛɛdei.

Kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’, e sagatara unrunw gɔbe, inɛw e dɛi gaain gɔbe le tubiyei. E wooi puu kuu sunugu le bii ye tunmɔ kai kilɛi. Sabu Ama Dɔn sɔwaa gi: “Ama, inɛw kuu unrunbemɛ unɔw gɔbe le jajaiyɛjɛ, kaa inɛw kuu sunugu le wɔin gɔbe bɛrɛ nɛɛma ohobojɛ.”
Ama waaru kɛjɛido gɔ le womaa kuu ebe unɔ ga, e kɔɔ dɛi Ama numɔ gɔnrɔn sɛɛ gɔ doɲu nɛ kuu ebe sunugoi.
Diyɛdai ebe wooi kuu womɔ nɛ duurɔi, sabu wo mai ebe yasɛ.
E kuu ebe ɛjii gɛliyɛi, giri yemɛi. Jaŋunɛ ebe, jinrun puu kuu baŋa gɔ, yara durojɛ gin’, inɛ wo tɛnwɛindo bɛɛ ga gɔŋɔlɔuwɔ.
Gagawu nɛ ɛɛn go bii ye wo le jaiyɛi. Sabu gagawu nɛ e ba unrunw aduna yalu wooi nɛ wɔin gɔbe ɔɲɛ kɔɔ tunmɔ bɛɛuwɔin ga e igii wɔi.

Kaa waaru gaila ei ɔɲaai onu nɛ, nɛɛma wooi obonɛ Ama gɔ, Kirisito le ebaa dooro sɔgɔ womɔ nɛ yoo ga ei boonaajɛ baŋa gɔ, wo tunmi ei titibemɔdo, ei ɛɛn go ihiŋiyɛnmɔdo, paŋa ei ohobodo, bɔlɔtei ɛju nɛ ei dadaanado.
Gɔnrɔn gɔ asuu nasuu womɔi biyɛmɔ. Amina.

Lɛtɛrɛ dumi ɔn e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔ tii ga Silasu mui baraabe. Mu, woi bainɛ sɔɔ turu baŋai ga lugaa wɔun. Mu ei anrangaju obu ibɛɛ wɔun. Iyaa e bɛrɛ daii tagauwɔn, Ama nɛɛma tɔitɔi gɔ kunrin wɔɔ. E wogɔ nɛ ɛɛn go iŋiyɛin.
Babilɔnɛ ana nɛ, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu e gin’ Ama yɛmu gɔ ei poonɔuwɔ. Maruka, ii ma kanran ei poonɔuwɔ.
E Ama inɛw gin’ tunmɔi ihibɛ le poonɔi. E inɛw Kirisito mɔi wɔin gɔbe puu, jamu e le biyɛ.

Mu Piɛru, Yesu Kirisito birɛbirɛnɛ, jaŋu ii tiyaaɲu womɔ gɔ, e inɛw Yesu Kirisito, Ama emɛi wɔɔ gɔ, emi Yabanɛ gɔ teitai gɔ dɛi, emɛ gin’ gagawu tɔitɔi gɔ biyaaɲu gɔbe, mu lɛtɛrɛ ɔn e bɛrɛ tɔŋaa tiiuwɔn.
Ama lee, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Kirisito lee jugɔ ebe gɔ dɛi, Ama, nɛɛma lee, jamu lee ei gaai obo.
Ama, dooro womɔ lee, ɛhɛju womɔ lee wo le gamala ga emi boonaabe. Emɛ woi jugaaɲu digɛu, iyaa gɔnrɔn womɔ le digɛu Ama emaa giri unrunmɔ liyɛwin biyɛ ga, kijɛ kai emɛ sɛɛ puu emi obaabe.

Dooro womɔ lee, ɛhɛju womɔ lee digɛu, Ama, pui diyɛ saii maai wɔin gɔbe emɛ bɛrɛ obaabe. Ebaa dadaaru mɔɲu yanwan tɛbɛjɛ, aduna nɛ wɔɔ gɔ aŋa nɛ ɛli goo ye, inɛw Ama jige sɛin biyɛ ga, pui wogɔbe emɛ bɛrɛ obaabe.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, e maini ye, gagawu ebe kuu nɛ ɛhɛju barai. Iyaa ɛhɛju ebe nɛ jugɔ barai.
Iyaa e maini ye, jugɔ ebe kuu nɛ kuu ebe ai gɛli barai. Kuu ai gɛli nɛ muyɔn barai, muyɔn kuu nɛ Ama giri liyɛ barai.
Nɛɛ iyaa maini ye, Ama giri liyɛ kuu nɛ gagawu nɛ ba unrunw ibɛɛ bii barai, ba unrunw ibɛɛ bii kuu nɛ inɛw puu ibɛɛ bii barai.
Bana ɛju e siyɛun jaan gɔbe kɔɔ woi. E bana ɛju kɔɔbe e nɛ narinyɛn narinyɛn yaauwɔ ye, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito jugu gɔ nɛ be e bɛrɛ birɛ bibirɛmɔdɛin, iyaa giru go ei yayaamɔdɛin.
Kaa inɛ bana ɛju kɔɔbe le wɔlɔ gɔ, wo kijɛ wagee wɔɔ iyeelɛ, woi giruminɛ gin’ wɔɔ. Wo pɔɔlɔ hakɛ pɛi wo sɛbe gɔbe ɛjɛmaatin ga naŋaai.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi ba unrunw mabe, Ama ei wo boonu gɔ lee, ei wo yɛmu gɔ lee narain biyɛ ga ɛjii mainiyɛin. Sabu e kunrin kanranjɛi biyaai ye, asuu gagawu ebe gɔ pajaidelei.
Kɔɔ gin’, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ gɔ, emi Yabanɛ Yesu Kirisito diinɛ sɔgɔ gɔ nɛ jiiru wɔlɔ go ei yoyoomɔdɛin.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, halu e kanɛ baa kijɛ kɔɔbe igii wɔi kanran, iyaa naran ei tagin gɔ nɛ ɛɛn go iŋiyaan wɔi kanran, mu waaru wooi ei kijɛ kɔɔbe nanaŋaranmɔdɔn.
Ebaa yeguru le biyɛ ga, waaru aduna ɔn nɛ ɔnmɔi mu wɔɔ gɔ le, ajubu ma nɛ ei sɔɔ kɔɔbe pilemu pilemu mu naŋaranmɔu dagaa.
Sabu Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito bana mu bɛrɛ jugɔmu le kɛukɛu, yiun ma bɛruniyaain ga mu igii wɔun.
Mui yinwaain onu nɛ ebaa kijɛ wogɔbe waaru wooi naŋurun bɛɛ ga, mu mamainiyɛndɔn.
Kunrin, waaru Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito gɔnrɔn sɔɔ gɔ lee, wɛɛgu womɔ sɔɔ gɔ lee e bɛrɛ emɛ tagaabe le, emɛ sasai elumɛ sɔɔ gɔbe dimiyɛnnɛ. Kaa emɛ ɔgɔ dalee womɔ giri emɛ le iyaaɲu.
Baba lee, dooro lee, Ba Ama bɛrɛ gowaa waaru wo bɛɛ le, emɛ yalu gɔ nɛ yabɛin. Ama dooro diyɛ baŋa, mii unrunmɔ goomaa kijɛ gi: “Ɔn Aini ibɛ ma gɔ woi. Wo le kinɛ ma ɛjii aa wɔɔ.”
Waaru yalu diyɛ kokoo ɛjaai gɔ nɛ wo le emɛ bee le, emɛ kuu emɛ le mii alagala goobe kɔɔi ɛgaabɛin.
Kunrin, inɛw Ama titiyaanw sɔɔ sɔin gɔ, sigɛ le narain ga emɛ jugaaɲu. Sɔɔ wogɔ e kajubu ire. Sabu sɔɔ wogɔ, baa yaaido baa, yaju tolo kinɛ ebe wijɛmɔido baa, lanpa ɔlɔ nɛ doorojɛ gin’ wɔɔ.
Laa gɔ sɔɔ ɔn jugi biyɛi: Inɛw Ama titiyaanw sɔɔ Ama Dɔn nɛ tɔŋaa too gɔ, inɛ turu kanran tiyɛ gɔ kuu womɔ le tagu bɛɛidolo.
Sabu inɛw Ama titiyaanw turu kanran, inɛ diŋɛ le kɛukɛu sɔɔ womɔ sɔɔlu. Kaa, Kikinu Pilu bei teeremɔube dɛi, inɛw kɔɔbe Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi sɔwaabɛin.

Waaru galaai gɔ le bana Isɛrɛlu tɔgu logoro nɛ inɛw titiyaanw kakalugunw biyaabe gin’, iyaa lee logoro ebe nɛ jaŋudeerenw kakalugunw bibiyɛdo. Be deeru kakalugu, yanwan jɛɛlɛɲu gɔbe le logoro ebe nɛ wɛwɛɛdɛin. Kuu Baŋa bei dɔrugaabe gɔ le yabaidenɛ. Be kunrin ɔgu yanwan kuu bana bemɛ nɛ jɛjɛɛlɛdɛin.
Inɛw joo, kuu sɛlɛ sɔɔ bemɛ gɔ nɛ bei didimiyɛndɛin. Kijɛ be kanranjɛ gɔ le digɛu, naran oju gɔ boi gɔ dɛi, inɛw gawanɛ gɔbe sɔɔ mɔɲu sɔsɔɔdɛin.

Girikakala bemɛ dɛi, jaŋudeerenw kakalugunw kɔɔbe, sɔɔ kuu bemɛ le kɛgɛraa be kunu gɔbe e bɛrɛ jɛɛlu ye, ei kakayadɛin. Kaa Ama, pɔɔlɔ baa jarugu kuu bemɛ nɛ duuraa kilaai: Bei suiyoido waaru gɔ tanwaindolo!
Mɛlɛnkɛ hakɛ kanrin gɔbe, Ama, amasɔgɔ bemɛ aalu, kaa yaun asuu yinwɛɛnlɛ nɛ bei kamaa kunaa, saliyɛ kiru bai gɔ dɔɔido baa kɔmaa, ɔlɔ nɛ gɛlɛ.
Iyaa Ama, aduna pɛi gɔ amasɔgɔ aalu. Kaa wo, aduna wogɔ inɛw Ama giri liyɛɛnɛ gɔbe kuu nɛ dii diyɛ wɛɛmaabe. Wo Nɔwe, teitai waaju kanrannɛ gɔ lee, inɛw sɔi waja lee laa ye, inɛ wo yabu wɔlɔ.
Inɛw Ama giri liyɛɛnɛ gɔbe bɛrɛ sɔɔ be bɛrɛ dɔɔido sɛɛrɛi biyɛ ga, Ama Sodomɛ lee, Gomɔre lee ana gɔbe kuu nɛ jarugu duuraa, yaun le bei tɛgɛraa unɔi bojaabe.
Iyaa Ama, Lote, inɛ teitai gɔi yabaabe. Lote, wo inɛw mɔɲu kanranw gɔbe kuu sɛlɛ sɔɔ gɔ dɛi saii kinɛ jiun le bee.
Sabu ainɛ teitai kɔɔ, logoro bemɛ nɛ dɛinyaan wɔu, kanran mɔɲu bemɛ gɔ iyaa, ɛgaa, wo bai wooi saii kinɛ jiun le bimiliyaa bee.
Kɔɔ biyaai ye, Inɛw Baŋa Ama, inɛw giri womɔ liyɛnw gɔbe bana subɔrɔ nɛ goonɔɲu igii wɔɔ. Iyaa Ama, aduna saliyɛ bai wo kirɛido le, inɛw teitai laain gɔbei laga ga, wo bei aŋai gɛliyɛun igii wɔɔ.

Wo sigɛ le inɛw dadaaru mɔɲu lɔgɔgu kinɛ bemɛ nɛ gooɲu gɔbe le wɔin gɔbe, inɛw kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe gailamɔw gɔbei lalagado. Jaŋu deerenw kakalugunw wogɔbe, inɛw kolobei, diŋɛ unrunbemɛ kanranwin. Kɔɔ dɛi be alagala nɛ kijɛ ɔnmɔ dooro le wɔin gɔbei liyɛɛnɛ. Kaa bei koi duyɔɲu.
Halu mɛlɛnkɛbe, jaŋudeerenw kɔɔbe dɛi sigɛ paŋa lee, gɔnrɔn lee sɛin gɔbe, kijɛ ɔnmɔ dooro le wɔin kɔɔbei Inɛw Baŋa giru nɛ, bei jaruganu duyɔidenɛ.
Kaa inɛw kɔɔbe, kijɛ paamaanɛ be wɔɔ gɔbe dɛi sɔɔ mɔɲu koi sɔɔɲu. Be olunawan aa ye daa dɛi naraanɲu gin’, kuu bemɛ le sɔɔ be biyaajɛi kanranɲu. Bei olunawanbe aŋai daaɲu gin’ susuyodɛin.

Iyaa, inɛw bɛrɛ ɔɲɛ be kanrun tujɔ, ɔɲɛi biyɛdo. Aga, sala sala ga kinɛ bemɛ ɛhɛɛliyɛmɔɲu. Be, ba unrunw jaa ebe nɛ e le waaru be mɔrinyaanjɛ, be sala sɔɔ bemɛ le kinɛ bemɛ ɛhɛɛliyɛmɔɲu. Kaa wogɔ nɛ bana bemɛ e bɛrɛ dɔgɔi, yawara sɔɔi.
Be yaanran yɛnu ye daariyɛlu go bii bɛɛnɛ, be hakɛ kanrun gɔ pajaanɛ. Inɛw yɛbɛlɛgunw gɔbei dɔdɔbɔrɔɲu. Kinɛ bemɛ kijɛ baala dadaaru le wɛɛjiyaa wɔɔ. Ama jebu gɔ kuu bemɛ nɛ yɔɔ!
Be oju teitai gɔ pajaatiyaa, manaai. Be Bosoru aini, Balaamu oju gɔ dimiyaanbɛin. Balaamu, mɔɲu kanrannu kɛɛlɛ wo bɛɛido gɔi ibɛɛ biyaabe.
Kaa hakɛ womɔ dɛi Ama woi ganwaanbe. Kɔɔ gin’, jandulu sɔɔ sɔɔ bɛɛlɛ turu, inɛ mii jeɲaa sɔɔ sɔi tɔlaa, inɛ Ama titiyainɛ weje sɔɔ gɔi tɛŋaabe.
Inɛw kɔɔbe diipujo dii sɛnɛbe gin’ wɔin. Kulumɔ ooɲɔ diyɛ balajɛ gin’ wɔin. Ɔlɔ diyɛ naa diyɛ gɔ nɛ Ama be dɛi yalu yegeraa yasɛ.
Be kuu ulo sɔɔ bomɔgu koi sɔɔɲu. Be kuu sɛlɛ dadaaru mɔɲu kinɛ bemɛ nɛ goojɛ gɔbe le, inɛw lelu nɛ toin gɔbe logoro nɛ, kanɛ goonw gɔbei dɔdɔbɔrɔɲu.
Be inɛw kɔɔbei hɔɔlɔwin bojodɛin gɛɛɲu. Kaa kuu bemɛ le bei wɛɛju yanwan tɛbɛɲu gunɔwin. Sabu inɛ tuturu puu kijɛ woi gɔnrɔnjɛ gunɔnɛi.

Inɛw kɔɔbe, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ gɔ, emi Yabanɛ Yesu Kirisito be jugu gɔ le digɛu aduna dadaaru lɔgɔgu gɔ nɛ bei gooni. Kaa iyaa lee oju pɛi bemɛ nɛ pilemaa yowaa, kijɛ lɔgɔgu kɔɔbe pilemaa kuu bemɛ nɛ gɔnrɔn biyaaɲu ye, bana bemɛ gɔ Yesu waaru jugɔlu be bee dɛi sigɛ mɔɲii biyaai.
Inɛw kɔɔbe oju teitai gɔ jugɔnɛ bɛin ye be bɛrɛ irebe. Kaa tɔɔru ɛjaai waaju be bɛrɛ tagin gɔ le onu dulaatin ye, bana be wɔɔ gɔ laa mɔ dɛi sigɛ mɔɲii wɔɔ.
Kijɛ be bɛrɛ dɔi gɔ taanrinyɛn ɔnbe narain ga tagaraajɛ: “Iju kijɛ wo guraabe gɔi pilemaa mirɛin wiyaai.” Iyaa “Tolu kanɛ mɔŋi gɔ, iyaa pilemaa pɔnu nɛ binɛrɛin yaai.”
Ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, ɔn lɛtɛrɛ lɛiyei e bɛrɛ tiiuwɔn. Lɛtɛrɛ lɛi gɔbe kɛu nɛ, deeru e bɛrɛ mu naŋaranmɔjɛ gɔbe le digɛnu ebaa kinɛ ebe nɛ ajubu ɛju toiyomɔ ga, kijɛ mu dɛnu gɔ woi.
Giru nɛ baa inɛw Ama titiyaanw ɛjaa wɔin gɔbe sɔɔ sɔin gɔbe lee, iyaa Inɛw Baŋa emɛ, emi Yabanɛ bɛrɛ tɔɔru goi, Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu ebe gɔbe ei deerin lee, ebaa naŋaran ga ibɛɛ wɔun.
E laa gɔ jugi biyɛi, waaru dumɔ gɔ le, inɛw ei mɔmɔw wɛwɛɛdɛin, inɛw, kuu bemɛ dadaaru le kɛukɛu yoi yayaadɛin. Be ei jairɛ kakanrandɛin,
kijɛ be gɛɛido: “Wo wɛwɛɛdo ga pui kunaabe woi laa ma? Aiwa! Wo yago wɔɔ? Emɛ babe yinwaan galaain, kaa aduna maŋi nɛ iye wɛɛ dɔɔ, kijɛ wooi bana be bee gin’ wɔin.”
Kaa, be igii wɔnu kijɛ ɔn nanaŋaɲu: Pɔɔlɔ baa, Ama tɔɔraa, alagalabe lee, minɛ lee, biyɛ wo giyaa biin. Minɛ dii nɛ goonaa, dii le maŋu.
Iyaa dii le, tiyɛ gɔ dii diyɛ le aduna pɛi kɔɔi suyaabɛin.
Ama tɔɔru turu gɔ le, iye alagala gɔbe lee, iye minɛ gɔ lee, yaun le suyo dɛi bojaaɲu. Bei bai inɛw Ama giri liyɛɛnɛ gɔbe saliyɛ kiraa ye suyoidɛin gɔ dɛi bojaaɲu.
Kaa ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, kijɛ naŋau jaanla turu yɔɔ: Inɛw Baŋa bɛrɛ bai turu anranguju muɲu gin’ wɔɔ, anranguju muɲu, bai turu gin’ wɔɔ.
Inɛw gamuu bana ajubajɛ gin’ laa, Inɛw Baŋa pui womɔ kibemɔ ga tanwaanlɛ. Kaa wo e dɛi muyɔn le wɔɔ. Sabu wo inɛ aai kanran suiyo ga ibɛla. Kaa inɛw puu wa ajubuduli bɛɛ ga ibɛɛ wɔɔ.

Kaa Inɛw Baŋa bai wɛɛido gɔ, gugunyɔnnɛ bana wɛɛjɛ gin’ bibiyɛdo. Bai wogɔ le alagalabe siɲɛ diyɛ le gagaladɛin. Kijɛ wooi yaun tɛgɛ ye tɔtɔɔnrinyɛnmɔdo. Minɛ lee, kijɛ kɔlɔ womɔ nɛ toin gɔbe lee, tɛgɛ ye unɔi bibiyɛdɛin.

Kijɛ puu kɔɔ gin’ tɔtɔɔnrinyɛndo digɛu, e kuu ebe le inɛw inge tunmɔi biyɛun jaan? Ama bai aduna saliyɛ kirɛido waaru e dɔmɔ gɔ le, iyaa bai wogɔ ɔgu dɔɔ dɛi waaru e mainiyɛnjɛ, ei Ama dɛi waaru wooi inɛw dɛiin bojaaɲui biyɛun jaain wɔɔ, waaru wooi Ama giri liyɛwin e biyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Bai wogɔ dɔwaai ye, alagalabe yaun tɛgɛ ye dodogodo. Kijɛ puu yaun bije uju gɔ dɛi tɔtɔɔnrinyɛndo.
Kaa, Ama alagala kanabe lee, minɛ kana lee, teitai gɔ yalu jaa biyɛido pui kunaabe. Kijɛ emɛ dɔmɔ gɔ kɔɔ woi.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, Ama giru nɛ ei ɛjɛmɔ ye, jarugusɛlɛ le biyɛ ga, wo le jamu le biyɛ ga, bai wogɔ waaru e dɔmɔ le, e mainiyɛin.
Inɛw Baŋa emɛ muyɔn gɔ, ei yabu ojui bojaaɲu gin’ lugoi. Bainɛ ibɛ emɛ Pɔlu, Ama wo bɛrɛ hakilɛ obu gɔ le digɛu bana tɔŋu gɔ kɔɔ woi.

Lɛtɛrɛ womɔbe wooi nɛ sɔɔ kɔɔbe dɛi yalu wo sɔɔjɛ nɛ, kijɛ wo tɔŋu gɔbe kɔɔ woi. Lɛtɛrɛ womɔbe nɛ sɔɔ gamuu paamu kanrun nau yɔɔ. Bana Ama Dɔn yalu waja gamuu le be kanranjɛ gin’, inɛw jugɔ sɛnɛ, inɛw yɛbɛlɛgunw, sɔɔ womɔ tiyɛ koi gɔnɔmɔɲu. Be kɔɔ gin’ kuu bemɛ suyouwɔin.
E kai ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, kanɛ ei tinwɛnraanɲu. Kodigɛu inɛw mɔɲu kanranw lelu le ei manamɔnɔu ga, ɛɛn go iŋi ebe gɔ nɛ goonɔu ga, kuu ebe kajubai.
Kaa, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ gɔ, emi Yabanɛ Yesu Kirisito nɛɛma gɔ lee, jugɔ womɔ gɔ nɛ lee bii ye giru go yaai. Kanɛ gowaa, boi sɔmu gɔ asuu womɔi biyɛmɔ. Amina.
Inɛ boi womɔ Ɔnmɔ sɔɔ gɛɛɲu gɔ, emɛ wo dɛi e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔuwɔin. Kijɛ puu tɔlɔmɔ nɛ wo yabe. Emɛ woi ɛgaabɛin. Giri emɛ le woi iyaabɛin. Emɛ woi ɛjii yɛnaabɛin. Numɔ emɛ le woi tabaabɛin.
Ɔnmɔ gɔ, waaru aduna nɛ wiyaa, unruin wo taguru le, emɛ woi iyaabɛin. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, emɛ sɛɛrɛ womɔ goouwɔin. Ɔnmɔ kɔɔ, asuu ɔnmɔi. Ba Ama le bee. Kaa, kanɛ woi emɛ bɛrɛ jugɔmaaɲu.
Emɛ, Ba Ama le bɔɔi wɔin. Iyaa Aini womɔ, Yesu Kirisito le bɔɔi wɔin. Nɛɛ, ebaa yaa emɛ le bɔɔi biyɛ ga, emɛ kijɛ emɛ iyi gɔ, emɛ ɛgu gɔ, wogɔ e bɛrɛ tagauwɔin.
Kinɛ ɛɛlu emɛ kibaai biyɛ ga, emɛ sɔɔ kɔɔbe tɔŋɔuwɔin.
Yesu Kirisito le kibɛru ɛgaa, e bɛrɛ emɛ tagajɛ gɔ unwɔ: Ama wijɛi. Ɔlɔ turu kanran wo nɛ tolo.
Nɛɛ, emɛ wo le bɔɔi wɔin gɛɛnu, nimɛ kanran ɔlɔ nɛ yaaɲu ye, emɛ kakalu maŋawin. Naran le yoi yaauwɔnɛ.
Kaa, Ama, bana wijɛ nɛ too gin’ emɛ wijɛ nɛ yoi yaaɲu ye, emɛ tunmɔ le bɔɔi wɔin. Iyaa, Aini womɔ Yesui ili gɔ, hakɛ wooi nɛ emi ɛhɛjɛmɔjɛ.
Yɛnɛi, emɛ hakɛ sɛnɛ gɛɛuwɔin ye, kuu emɛ lelemɔuwɔin. Naran emɛ le wɔlɔ.
Kaa emɛ, hakɛ emɛ gɔbe Ama bɛrɛ tagaa ye, kuu gɔ nɛ iŋiyɛunwɔin ye, Ama kai, wo sɔɔ turu baŋai, teitai wɔɔ, hakɛ emɛ puu emɛ bɛrɛ yaabu kanrun ye, mɔɲu wooi nɛ emi ɛhɛjɛmɔjɛ.
Nɛɛ, emɛ hakɛ sɛnɛ gɛɛuwɔin ye, emɛ Amai kakalu maŋanɛi bojouwɔin. Sɔɔ womɔ emɛ gɛlɛlain.
Unrunw dagunw mabe, ebaa hakɛ kanrannɔu ga, mu sɔɔ kɔɔbe tɔŋɔuwɔn. Kaa inɛ turu, hakɛ turu kanranjɛ biyaa ye, Ba Ama giru nɛ emɛ sɔɔ yegerenɛ yasin. Wogɔ inɛ teitai wɔɔ, Yesu Kirisito gɔ woi.
Emaa hakɛ yaabu kanrun bɛɛ ga, wo, kuu womɔ le woi sadaga obaabe. Wo hakɛ emɛ gɔbe turu sai dɛi kuu womɔ obolu. Kaa aduna inɛw puu hakɛ dɛi kuu womɔ obu.
Emɛ Ama tɔɔru gɔbe gɛgɛliyɛɲu ye, naran go emɛ woi igii wɔin.
Inɛ turu woi igii wɔɔ gɛɛnu, tɔɔru womɔbe gɛliyɛɛlɛ ye, inɛ kɔɔbaŋa kakalu maŋanɛi. Naran turu kanran wo le wɔlɔ.
Kaa, inɛ sɔɔ womɔ gɛliyɛjɛ gɔ, naran go Amai ibɛi bii womɔ kibaa wɔɔ. Kunrin, emɛ Ama le toin ga igii wɔin.
Inɛ Ama le too gɛɛjɛ gɔ, waajibi Yesu bana bii gin’ biyɛjɛ. Wo Yesu kubɔnamaran dimiyɛnjɛ.
Ba unrunw, mu tɔɔru kanai e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔuwɔlɔn. Kaa, tɔɔru pɛii. Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ e yabu le baa, tɔɔru e sɛɛ gɔ woi. Tɔɔru pɛi kɔɔ, laa baa, sɔɔ e ɛgu gɔ woi.

Kaa iyaa, tɔɔru e bɛrɛ mu tɔŋɔjɛ gɔ, tɔɔru kanai. Yɛnɛi, ɔlɔ gɔ galauwɔ. Wijɛ tɔitɔi gɔ, kanɛ baa doorouwɔ. Wogɔ digɛu, tɔɔru gɔ, tɔɔru kanai narain. Yesu Kirisito bana nɛ lee, bana ebe nɛ lee, tɔɔru gɔ narain ga iyemɔuwɔ.
Inɛ turu, wijɛ nɛ too gɛɛnu, wo bainɛi ibiliyaa wɔɔ ye, inɛ kɔɔbaŋa nimɛ kanran ɔlɔ nɛ too.
Inɛ wo bainɛ ibɛ gɔ, wijɛ nɛ biyɛjɛ. Kijɛ inɛ tomɔmu turu kanran wo nɛ tolo.
Kaa, inɛ wo bainɛi ibiliyaa wɔɔ gɔ, ɔlɔ nɛ too. Wo ɔlɔ nɛ yoi yaauwɔ. Ɔlɔ gɔ giri womɔ dɛbaa gɛlɛ gɔ digɛu, wo yalu wo yaajɛ inɛɛ.
Unrunw mabe, mu sɔɔ ɔn e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔuwɔn. Yesu Kirisito boi dɛi hakɛ ebe gɔbe, Ama, e bɛrɛ yaabu kanraanti.
Banw gɔbe, mu sɔɔ ɔn e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔuwɔn. Kijɛ puu tɔlɔmɔ nɛ baa inɛ wɔɔ gɔ, e woi igii wɔi. Sagataranw, mu sɔɔ ɔn e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔuwɔn. E Mɔɲu kuu baŋa kuu nɛ gɔnrɔn biyaabei.

Unrunw mabe, mu e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔuwɔn. E, Ba Amai igii wɔi. Banw gɔbe, mu e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔuwɔn. Kijɛ puu tɔlɔmɔ nɛ baa inɛ wɔɔ gɔ, e woi igii wɔi. Sagataranw, mu e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔuwɔn. E gɔnrɔn yasɛi. Ama sɔɔ, kinɛ ebe nɛ yato. Iyaa Mɔɲu kuu baŋa kuu nɛ gɔnrɔn biyaabei.
Aduna ibɛi biyɛnɔugi. Aduna le kijɛ digɛ ibɛi biyɛnɔugi. Inɛ, aduna ibɛi wɔɔ ye, Ba Amai ibɛla.
Aduna kijɛ gɔbe puu, dadaaru mɔɲu kinɛ nɛ goojɛ gɔbe lee, girikakala lee, arusɛgɛ dɛi kuu unaa ye bii lee, kijɛ kɔɔbe, Ba Ama bɛrɛ goolɛ. Kaa aduna le digɛ.
Aduna galauwɔ. Kunrin, aduna nɛ dadaaru wɔin puu galauwɔin. Kaa, inɛ Ama diŋɛ kanranjɛ gɔ, asuu bibiyɛdo.
Unrunw mabe, aduna dumɔ gɔ bɛruniyaain. Kirisito jaŋunɛ gɔ wɛwɛɛdo be giyaa, e ɛgaabei. Aiwa, kanɛ baa Kirisito jaŋuw joo yɔɔin. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, aduna dumɔ gɔ bɛruniyaain ga, emɛ igii wɔin.

Inɛw kɔɔbe, logoro emɛ nɛ goin. Kaa, be emɛ maranwin laain. Be emɛ maranwin bɛin ye, emɛ le bibiyɛbɛin. Kaa, inɛw gamuu emɛ le wɔin kanran, logoro bemɛ nɛ turu kanran emɛ maranwin laa emaa jugɔ ga, sɔɔ kɔɔ bii.
Kaa e kai, Kirisito, e bɛrɛ Ama Kikinu gɔ obaa, Ama dɛi ei dɛiin bojaajɛ. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, e puu jugɔ yasɛi.
Kɔɔi biyaa ye, ebaa, naran gɔ inin dɛi mu sɔɔ kɔɔbe e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔuwɔlɔn. Kaa, e naran gɔ kabu kunu bɛbɛɛjɛi. Iyaa naran nɛ kakalu turu kanran tolo ga, e igii wɔi.
Nɛɛ, kakalu maŋanɛ gɔ aai? Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔ Yesui laa, inɛ gɛɛnɛ gɔi laa ma? Inɛ kɔɔbaŋa Kirisito jaŋunɛ gɔ woi. Wo, Ba Ama le yabalu. Aini womɔ Yesu le yaa yabalu.
Aini gɔ le inɛ yabalu gɔ, Ba Ama le yaa tolo. Kaa Aini gɔ le inɛ yabaajɛ gɔ, Ba Ama le bɔɔi.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ e yabu le baa, sɔɔ e ɛgu gɔ wogɔ nɛ biyɛi. E wogɔ yagɛlɛi ye, e Aini gɔ le yatoiyodei. Ba Ama le yaa yatoiyodei. E wooi pagu turu.
Be le yatoin ye, Kirisito emɛ bɛrɛ kijɛ ohobodo ga, pui wo kunu gɔ unwɔ: Ɔnmɔsɔgɔ.
Inɛw ei lelemɔdɛin ga wɔin gɔbe dɛi mu sɔɔ kɔɔ tɔŋɔjɔn.

Nɛɛ, e kai, Kirisito e bɛrɛ Kikinu obu gɔ, e nɛ yato. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, e inɛ waja deeru kai sɛlɛi. Kikinu gɔ, kijɛ puu nɛ ei dedeerejɛ. Deeru womɔ puu narain. Kakalu, wogɔ nɛ tolo. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, bana ei wo deeru gin’, deeru womɔ le kɛukɛu Yesu Kirisito le yatoiyoi.
Unrunw dagunw, Yesu Kirisito le yatoiyoi. Waaru wo wiyaa, emaa diyɛdɔn le biyɛ ga, wo le yatoiyoi. Iyaa, wo wiyaai ye, emaa giru womɔ nɛ dɔgɔ le biyɛnɔu ga, wo le yatoiyoi.
Nɛɛ, Yesu teitai wɔɔ ga, e igii wɔi. Wogɔ digɛu, inɛ teitai kanranjɛ puu, Ama ii ga jugɔi.
Ba Ama emi bana wo ibɛ gɔ yɛnɛi. Ihibɛ womɔ gɔ dɛi, boi emɛ Ama unrunw gɛɛɲu. Iyaa naran go, emɛ Ama unrunwin. Aduna bɛɛnw, emɛ Ba Ama inin gɔ digɛu, emi yaa inin.

Ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, kanɛ emɛ Ama unrunwin. Kaa, bana emɛ biyɛido tɔitɔi nimɛ kanran tagarala. Kaa, emɛ sɔɔ ɔn igii wɔin: Kirisito waaru wiyaa, emɛ bana wo wɔɔ gin’ tee woi iyedɛin. Emɛ yaa, wo le murin biyɛdɛin.
Inɛ aai kanran, sɔɔ kɔɔ le Yesu Kirisito nɛ diyɛ womɔ daanaa wɔɔ ye, bana wo ɛjaa wɔɔ gin’, inɛ wogɔ baŋa, kuu unrunmɔ ɛhɛjɛmɔjɛ.
Iyaa, hakɛ gin ye, tɔɔru yamuli. Inɛ hakɛ kanranjɛ, tɔɔru yamalauwɔ.
Nɛɛ, Yesu Kirisito, hakɛ emɛ gɔbe goonɔdo ga, aduna nɛ wɛi ga, e igii wɔi. Iyaa, hakɛ turu kanran wo le wɔlɔ.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, inɛ wo le too, hakɛ papajajɛ. Inɛ hakɛ nɛ toi ye biyɛjɛ, woi iyelu, woi inɛɛ.
Unrunw dagunw, inɛ turu kanran bɛrɛ ei lelemɔnɔugi. Inɛ birɛ teitai birɛjɛ, Yesu Kirisito bana teitai wɔɔ gin’, inɛ kɔɔbaŋa yaa teitai wɔɔ.
Kaa, inɛ hakɛ pajaalɛ, inɛ wogɔ jinrun puu kuu baŋa inɛi. Tɔlɔ gɔ le baa, jinrun puu kuu baŋa hakɛ kanraunwɔ. Nɛɛ, Ama Aini gɔ, birɛ womɔ yamala ga wɛi.
Inɛ aai kanran, Ama ii ye, Ama bana gɔ wo nɛ yato gɔ dɛi, wo hakɛ nɛ bii bɛɛlɛ. Ama wo Bai gɔ dɛi, wo hakɛ nɛ bii bɛɛlɛ.
Ama unrunw lee, jinrun puu kuu baŋa unrunw lee, bana jugɔmɔjɛ gɔ ɔn woi: Inɛ teitai kanraanlɛ ma, wo bainɛ ibɛla ma biyaai ye, inɛ wogɔ, Ama ii laa.
Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ e yabu le baa, sɔɔ e ɛgu gɔ nɛ, emaa tunmɔ ibɛi biyɛ gin.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, emɛ Kayɛn gin’ biyɛmɔnɔugin. Wo Mɔɲu kuu baŋa inɛi bee, iyaa, wo suŋɔrɔin daabe. Birɛ womɔ ɛjula bee dɛi, wo, wo suŋɔrɔn dai. Kaa, wo suŋɔrɔn birɛ gɔ teitai bee.
Ba unrunw mabe, aduna inɛw ei ibiliyaa wɔin ye, e bɛrɛ maunɛ bojonɔugi.
Emɛ, emɛ ba unrunw ibɛɛ wɔin gɔ digɛu, emɛ yiun nɛ gowaa, ɔnmɔ nɛ taŋaai ga igii wɔin. Inɛ, wo bainɛ ibiliyaa wɔɔ gɔ, inɛ wogɔ baŋa yinwaain.
Inɛ aai kanran, wo bainɛ ibiliyaa wɔɔ ye, inɛ kɔɔbaŋa inɛ daanɛi. Iyaa, inɛ daanɛ turu kanran, ɔnmɔsɔgɔ gɔ, wo nɛ tolo ga, e igii wɔi.
Nɛɛ, ihibɛ bana jugɔmɔjɛ gɔ unwɔ: Yesu Kirisito, emɛ sabu dɛi kinrun womɔ pajaabe. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, emɛ yaa, emɛ ba unrunw dɛi kinrun emɛ pajaun jaain wɔɔ.
Inɛ ɔgɔinɛ turu, wo bainɛ, kai turu le wɔɔ ga iyaa, kinɛ unrunmɔ ɛɛnnaa, amasɔgɔ womɔ jugɔlu ye, inɛ kɔɔbaŋa, Ama ihibɛ wo nɛ yato ma?
Aiwa, unrunw dagunw, kɔɔi biyaa ye, aŋa le, ninɛ ɛɛlu le sai, inɛ ibɛɛ wɔɔ gɛɛmɔnɔugin. Kaa birɛ le, naran go inɛ ibɛi biyɛmɔi.
Kunrin, emɛ naran gɔ le toin ga jujugɔdɛin. Iyaa, kinɛ emɛ nɛ jarugu tolo go, Ama giru nɛ diyɛdɔn le biyɛdɛin.
Kinɛ emɛ emi jarugaajɛ kanran, Ama, kinɛ emɛ dɛi gaa, wo kijɛ wooi igii wɔɔ.
Ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, kinɛ emɛ, emi jarugaalɛ ye, emɛ diyɛdɔn le Ama le sɔɔ sɔi bɛbɛɛɲu.
Iyaa, emɛ tɔɔru womɔbe yagɛlɛin gɔ digɛu, kijɛ wo bɛrɛ ɛju kanraunwɔin gɔ digɛu, emɛ kijɛ emɛ gɛɛnjɛ puu, wo nɛ bɛbɛɛdɛin.
Nɛɛ, kijɛ emɛ bɛrɛ wo tɔɔrɔjɛ gɔ unwɔ: Emaa, Aini womɔ Yesu Kirisito le gawa. Iyaa, Yesu Kirisito, emɛ bɛrɛ bana tɔɔru gin’ tunmɔ ibɛi biyɛ.
Inɛ Ama tɔɔru gɔbe le yabajɛ gɔ, Ama le yato. Ama yaa wo le yatoiyojɛ. Ama, Kikinu womɔ emɛ bɛrɛ wo obu gɔ dɛi, Ama, emɛ le yato ga, emɛ igii wɔin.
Ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, inɛw titiyaanw kakalugunw joo aduna nɛ gowaa yɔɔin. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Ama Kikinu, unrunbe le yɔɔ inɛw gɛɛɲu puu le gawanɔugi. Kaa, kikinu be le wɔɔ gɔ, Ama Kikinui ma suburu yɛnɛi.
E sɔɔ ɔn le, Ama Kikinu jujugɔdei: Inɛ aai kanran, Yesu Kirisito aduna nɛ emɛ gin’ inɛi biyaa, wɛi gɛɛjɛ ye, inɛ kɔɔ Ama Kikinu wo le yɔɔ.
Kaa, inɛ aai kanran, Yesu sibɛ nɛ, sɔɔ kɔɔ le yabalu ye, Ama Kikinu wo le wɔlɔ. Kikinu wo le wɔɔ gɔ, Kirisito jaŋunɛ yawɛɛjɛ be giyaa e ɛgu gɔ kikinui. Kikinu wogɔ kanɛ baa aduna nɛ yɔɔ.
Kaa e kai, unrunw mabe, ei Ama mɔi. Kikinu e le wɔɔ gɔ, aduna nɛ kikinu wɔɔ gɔ dɛi gaa. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, e inɛw titiyaanw kakalugunw gɔbei gɔnraanjɛi.
Be, aduna inɛwin gɔ digɛu, aduna sɔɔi sɔɔɲu. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, aduna inɛw yaa bei kekeŋiyɛnɲu.
Kaa, emi Ama mɔi. Inɛ Ama igii wɔɔ, emi kekeŋiyɛnjɛ. Inɛ Ama mɔi laa, emi keŋiyɛɛnlɛ. Kunrin, emɛ naran Kikinu lee, kakalu kikinu lee, kabu kunu bɛbɛɛdɛin.
Ba unrunw, ihibɛ gɔ Ama bɛrɛ goojɛ. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, tunmɔ ibɛi biyɛmɔi. Inɛ ihibɛ sɛɛ gɔ, Ama ii, iyaa, Amai igii wɔɔ.
Ama ihibɛi. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, inɛ ihibɛ sɛlɛ gɔ, Ama inɛɛ.
Ama, emɛ sibɛ go ihibɛ womɔ bana wo taguru unwɔ: Aini turu womɔ le digɛnu emaa ɔnmɔi biyɛ ga, wo, woi aduna nɛ tiyaabe.

Nɛɛ, ihibɛ tɔitɔi gɔ emɛ yani jugɔɲu? Emɛ Amai ibɛi biyaabɛin dɛi, ihibɛ tɔitɔi gɔ jugɔdɛin ma? Ai, Amai, emi ibɛi biyaa, Aini womɔ tiyaa, hakɛ emɛ yaabu kanran ga, woi sadagai boju. Ihibɛ tɔitɔi gɔ emɛ kɔɔ gin’ jugin.
Ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, nɛɛ, Ama kɔɔ gin’ emi ibɛi bii ye, emɛ yaa tunmɔ ibɛi emɛ biyɛun jaain wɔɔ.
Inɛ turu kanran Amai iyetɛlu. Kaa, emɛ tunmɔi ibɛɛ wɔin ye, Ama, emɛ le yato. Iyaa, ihibɛ womɔ kinɛ emɛ nɛ emɛ sɛɛ gɔ, kibaa wɔɔ.
Emɛ Ama le yatoin, Ama emɛ le yato. Wo, Kikinu womɔ emɛ bɛrɛ obaabe dɛi, emɛ wogɔ igii wɔin.
Iyaa, Ba Ama, Aini womɔ, aduna Yabanɛi biyɛ ga tiyaabe. Emɛ wogɔ iyaa, sɛɛrɛ goouwɔin.
Yesu Ama Ainii ga inɛ gɛɛjɛ gɔ, Ama, inɛ wogɔ le yato. Inɛ wogɔ yaa, Ama le yato.
Nɛɛ, Ama, emi bana wo ibɛ gɔ, emɛ wogɔ jugaa, wogɔ le gawaabɛin. Ama ihibɛi. Iyaa, inɛ ihibɛ sɛɛ gɔ, Ama le yato. Ama yaa wo le yato.
Logoro emɛ nɛ ihibɛ kibaai ye, saliyɛ kirɛidɛin bai gɔ, emɛ diyɛdɔn le biyɛdɛin. Sabu aduna nɛ bana emɛ gɔ, Yesu Kirisito bana gin’ wɔɔ.
Ihibɛ, liliyɛ sɛlɛ. Kinɛ nɛ ihibɛ kibaai ye, liliyɛ donugutiijɛ. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, inɛ liliyɛ le wɔɔ, kinɛ womɔ nɛ ihibɛ gɔ kibelu. Inɛ liyɛ liyɛjɛ, kanɛ baa kuu unrunmɔ nɛ jarugu duuraati.
Kaa emɛ kai, Ama laa emi ibɛi bii gɔ digɛu, emɛ ihibɛ yasin.
Inɛ turu, unrun Amai ibɛɛ wɔɔ gɛɛnu, wo bainɛi ibiliyaa wɔɔ ye, inɛ kɔɔ kakalu maŋanɛi. Wo bainɛ, giri womɔ le wo iyejɛ gɔi ibɛla ye, inɛ kɔɔbaŋa, Ama iyeelɛ wo wɔɔ gɔ, ibɛi bii bɛɛlɛ.
Iyaa, Yesu Kirisito, emɛ bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ tɔɔru: Inɛ Amai ibɛ gɔ, wo bainɛ yaa ibɛi wo biyɛun jaain wɔɔ.
Inɛ aai kanran, Yesui Ama Yabanɛ Diyɛ tii gɔi ga, gawaa wɔɔ ye, inɛ kɔɔ Ama ii. Nɛɛ, inɛ aai kanran, banɛ ibɛɛ wɔɔ ye, unrunw womɔ gɔbei yaa ibɛɛ wɔɔ.
Kɔɔ bana wɔɔ gin’, emɛ Ama unrunwin ibɛɛ wɔin ga, Ba Ama bana emɛ ibɛ lee, tɔɔru womɔbe bana emɛ gɛlɛ lee nɛ jugɔmɔdo.

Yɛnɛi, Amai ibɛi bii gɔ, wogɔ, tɔɔru womɔbe yabu gɔ woi. Inɛ aai kanran, Ama ii ye, wo aduna kuu nɛ gɔnrɔn bɛbɛɛjɛ. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, Ama tɔɔru gɔbe gɛliyɛ ga, emɛ bɛrɛ naula. Nɛɛ, aduna kuu nɛ kijɛ gɔnrɔn bɛɛjɛ gɔ, wogɔ, gagawu emɛ gɔ woi.
Naran go, Yesu Ama Aini ga, inɛ gawaa wɔɔ gɔi laa ye, aduna ɔn kuu nɛ inɛ gɔnrɔn bɛɛjɛ wɔlɔ.

Yesu Kirisito, aduna nɛ wo wɛi. Waaru wo wɛi le, wo batise womɔ dii lee, ili womɔ lee nɛ wɛi. Dii nɛ sai wɛɛlu. Kaa dii lee, ili lee nɛ wɛi. Ama Kikinu yaa, Yesu dɛi sɛɛrɛ gogoojɛ. Ama Kikinu, narain.
Aiwa, sɛɛrɛ taanu wɔin:
Ama Kikinu sɛɛrɛ lee, dii sɛɛrɛ lee, ili sɛɛrɛ lee. Sɛɛrɛ taanu kɔɔ puu tunmɔ le sɛgɛraa wɔin.
Emɛ, inɛw sɛɛrɛ le gagawaɲu. Nɛɛ, Ama sɛɛrɛ gɔ inɛ mɔ dɛi gaa. Aiwa, Ama, Aini womɔ dɛi sɛɛrɛ wo goi gɔ kɔɔ woi.
Kunrin, inɛ Ama Aini le gawaajɛ, kinɛ womɔ nɛ sɛɛrɛ gɔ yasɛ. Kaa inɛ Ama le gawalu gɔ, Ama, Aini womɔ dɛi sɛɛrɛ wo goi gɔ le gawalu gɔ digɛu, inɛ kɔɔ, Amai kakalu maŋanɛi bojouwɔ.
Nɛɛ, sɛɛrɛ gɔ unwɔ: Ama, emɛ bɛrɛ ɔnmɔsɔgɔ obaajɛ. Ɔnmɔ kɔɔ, Aini womɔ le bɛɛmɔjɛ.
Inɛ aai kanran, Aini gɔ le yato ye, inɛ kɔɔbaŋa ɔnmɔ gɔ yasɛ. Ama Aini gɔ le inɛ tolo, ɔnmɔ gɔ sɛlɛ.
Nɛɛ, e, inɛw Ama Aini le gawaa wɔin gɔbe, ebaa ɔnmɔsɔgɔ yasɛi jugɔ ga, mu sɔɔ kɔɔbe e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔuwɔn.
Iyaa, kijɛ emɛ gɛɛnjɛ puu, Ama diŋɛ le sɛgɛraa ye, wo gɛɛn emɛ kekeŋiyɛnjɛ ga, emɛ wogɔ diyɛdɔn yasin.
Iyaa, wo gɛɛn emɛ kekeŋiyɛnjɛ ga, emɛ igii wɔin dɛi, kijɛ ingei kanran wo bɛrɛ emɛ gɛɛindo puu, emɛ kijɛ wogɔ yaa biyaaɲu ga igii wɔin.

Inɛ turu wo bainɛ hakɛ kanraun wo wɔu iyaajɛ ye, yiun nɛ inɛi hakɛ jɛyaajɛi laa ye, baŋa wo bainɛ gɔ dɛi Ama gɛɛn. Yiun nɛ, hakɛ inɛi jɛyaajɛi laa ye, Ama, bainɛ gɔ bɛrɛ ɔnmɔ obu ye, woi yayabado. Kaa, yiun nɛ hakɛ inɛi jɛyaajɛ yɔɔ. Hakɛ wogɔ dɛi gɛɛn gɛɛlun.
Narain, kanran teitai laa puu hakɛi. Kaa, yiun nɛ hakɛ inɛi jɛyaalɛ yɔɔ.
Inɛ aai kanran, Ama ii ye, hakɛ kanrannu biyɛɛlɛ ga, emɛ igii wɔin. Ama Aini woi gɛlɛ. Iyaa, Mɔɲu kuu baŋa, kuu womɔ nɛ gɔnrɔn sɛlɛ.
Nɛɛ, emɛ kai, emi Ama mɔi ga igii wɔin. Kaa aduna bɛɛnw puu Mɔɲu kuu baŋa numɔ nɛ toin.
Ama Aini gɔ wiyaa, hakilɛ emɛ bɛrɛ obaa, emɛ Ama tɔitɔi gɔi jugaaɲu ga igii wɔin. Yesu Kirisito le digɛu, emɛ Ama wogɔ le toin. Ama tɔitɔi gɔ, ɔnmɔsɔgɔ gɔ, Yesu gɔ yaa woi.
Unrunw mabe, ɔmɔlɔ dɛi kuu ebe kajubai.

Mu, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu inɛ na gɔ, yaanran Ama yɛmaajɛ gɔ lee, unrunw womɔ lee, lɛtɛrɛ ɔn e, inɛw naran le mu ibɛ gɔbe bɛrɛ tɔŋɔuwɔn. Naran gɔ emɛ yasin. Iyaa, naran gɔ emɛ asuu sisiyɛdɛin. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, inɛ ei ibɛ gɔ mu turu sai laa. Inɛw naran gɔ jugaa wɔin gɔbe wooi ei ibɛɛ wɔin.
Ama emɛ Ba lee, Aini womɔ Yesu Kirisito lee, emɛ bɛrɛ nɛɛma lee, amasɔgɔjugɔ lee, jamu lee ohobodɛin. Sin obu kɔɔbe, naran le, iyaa ihibɛ le, emɛ le bibiyɛdɛin.
Unrunw uwɔbe logoro nɛ, Ba Ama, emɛ bɛrɛ bana tɔɔru le kɛukɛu, gamuu naran le yoi yaauwɔin ga tɛmaa, kinɛ ma gaai ɛɛliyaabe.
Nɛɛ, yaanran ɛju, mu u bɛrɛ gɛɛunwɔ emɛ tunmɔ ibɛi biyɛmɔi. Kɔɔ tɔɔru kanai u bɛrɛ tɔŋaa tiiu wɔlɔn. Kaa Kibɛru Ɛju sɔɔ emɛ yabu le baa, tɔɔru emɛ bɛi gɔ woi.
Ihibɛ gɔ, Ama tɔɔru gɔbe le kɛukɛu yoi yai gɔ woi. Tɔlɔ gɔ le baa, bana e ɛgu gin’, tɔɔru digiyɛ gin gɔ, ihibɛ le bii gɔ woi.
Yɛnɛi, aduna nɛ inɛw lelemɔw joo ginaa yɔɔin. Yesu Kirisito, emɛ gin’ inɛi biyaa aduna nɛ wɛi ga, be sɔɔ wogɔ le gawaanɛ. Inɛ kɔɔ gin’ wɔɔ gɔ, inɛ lelemɔnɛ gɔ woi. Kirisito jaŋunɛ gɔ woi.
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, ebaa birɛ emɛ tinɛ manamɔnɔu, kaa tujɔ ebe sɛɛu bɛɛ ga, kuu kajubu le biyɛi.
Yɛnɛi, inɛ aai kanran, Kirisito deeru obu gɔ nɛ taŋaa ye, inɛ kɔɔbaŋa, Ama wo le wɔlɔ. Kaa, deeru gɔ nɛ inɛ biyɛjɛ gɔ, inɛ wogɔ baŋa, Ba Ama wo le yɔɔ. Aini gɔ yaa wo le yɔɔ.
Inɛ turu e bɛrɛ wɛɛu, Kirisito deeru obu gɔ le wɛɛlu ye, ginrun ebe nɛ woi sɛgɛrɛnɔugi. Poo womɔ saa ga yabanɔugi.
Inɛ poo womɔ saajɛ, birɛ mɔɲu womɔ nɛ wo le bariyɛuwɔ.
Mu sɔɔ waja joo e bɛrɛ tɔŋɔ tiiun jaan yasɔn. Kaa, mu wogɔbe lɛtɛrɛ le tɔŋɔ ibɛlaun. Kaa, kuu ma le e bɛrɛ wɛi ye, emɛ wooi aŋa le, aŋa le, sɔɔ sɔɔ ga ibɛɛ wɔun. Kinɛ ɛɛlu emɛ kunrin kibedo.
U saa Ama yɛmu gɔ, unrunw womɔbe ui poonɔuwɔin.
Mu, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu inɛ na gɔ, mu anrunge, naran le ɛjii mu ibɛ, Gayisu, u bɛrɛ lɛtɛrɛ ɔn tɔŋɔ tiiuwɔn.
Mu anrunge, kijɛ wooi nɛ uwaa giru go yaa ga, mu ibɛɛ wɔun. Kikinu sibɛ go bana giru u yaajɛ gin’, Ama, goju jamu ui obo.
Pɔɔlɔ baa bana naran le u yaajɛ gin’, iye bai dɔɔ naran le bana u iŋɛ sɛɛrɛ gɔ, ba unrunw wiyaa ye, mu bɛrɛ goouwɔin. Wogɔ kinɛ ma gaai ɛɛliyɛmaabe.
Unrunw mabe naran gɔ nɛ biyaa yaauwɔin dɛi sigɛ, kibɛru kinɛ ma ɛɛliyɛmɔjɛ wɔlɔ.
Mu anrunge, ba unrunw dɛi birɛ u birɛjɛ gɔ, bana jaan gin’ u ɛjii naran le birɛjɛu. Halu yerunwin kanran, u ɛjii birɛjɛu.
Be ihibɛ uwɔ sɔɔ, mɔɔnu emɛ nɛ sɔwaabɛin. Nimɛ kanran, Ama bana dɛnɛjɛ gin’ oju bemɛ dɛi bei bara ga pajanɔu.
Be Kirisito birɛ birɛdɛin ga, oju gowaabɛin. Inɛw Ama inin numɔ nɛ kijɛ yaba ga yabanɛ.
Kɔɔ biyaai ye, emɛ, inɛw kɔɔbe tunmɔ emɛ sɛgɛrɛun jaain wɔɔ. Kunrin emɛ, be le bari ye, naran gɔ dɛi birɛbirɛnwin biyɛdɛin.
Mu, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔ bɛrɛ lɛtɛrɛ dumi tiyaabɔn. Kaa Diotɛrɛpe, sɔɔ emɛ yabaalɛ. Inɛw gawaa wɔin gɔbe logoro nɛ, wo unrun sigɛ bii ibɛɛ wɔɔ.

Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, mu wɛwɛiun ye, birɛ mɔɲu wo birɛjɛ gɔbe lee, emɛ dɛi sɔɔ mɔɲu wo sɔɔjɛ gɔbe lee, e bɛrɛ tatagadɔn. Sɔɔ kɔɔbe woi baalu ga, wo kuu womɔ le ba unrunw Kibɛru Ɛju taganw gɔbei sɛgɛrɛɛlɛ. Iyaa inɛw bei sɛguru ibɛɛ wɔin gɔbei tɛtɛŋɛjɛ. Wo inɛw wogɔbei inɛw gawaa wɔin mɔɔnu nɛ nanu nanu goonɔjɛ giye kanranjɛ.
Mu anrunge, mɔɲu dimiyɛnnɔu. Kaa ɛju dimiyɛn. Inɛ ɛju kanrannɛ, Ama inɛi. Kaa mɔɲu kanrannɛ, Amai jugɔlu.
Inɛw puu Demɛtiriusu dɛi sɔɔ ɛju sɔɔuwɔin. Naran gɔ yaa wo dɛi sɛɛrɛ ɛju goouwɔ. Emɛ yaa sɔɔ ɛju womɔ sɔɔuwɔin. Sɛɛrɛ emɛ gɔ narain ga, u igii wɔu.
Mu u bɛrɛ sɔɔ joo tɔŋɔ tii bɛbɛɛbɔn. Kaa mu wogɔbe lɛtɛrɛ le kanran ibɛlaun.
Mu bɛrii ui iye ibɛɛ wɔun. Kunrin, emɛ aŋa le, aŋa le, tunmɔ le sɔɔ sɔɔ bɛbɛɛdɛin.
Ama jamu u le biyɛ. U anrunge gɔbe uwaa popoo gin. Emɛ anrunge gɔbe, tuturu puu bemaa popoo wa.
Mu, Jude, Yesu Kirisito birɛbirɛnɛ gɔ, Jake suŋɔrɔn gɔ, lɛtɛrɛ ɔn e bɛrɛ tɔŋaa mu tiiuwɔn. Ba Ama inɛw boonaajɛ gɔbe, inɛw wo ibɛ gɔbe, Yesu Kirisito dɛi inɛw wo gɛlɛ gɔbe, mu e bɛrɛ tɔŋaa tiiuwɔn.
Ama, amasɔgɔjugɔ lee, jamu lee, ihibɛ lee ei gaai obo.

Ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, Ama, yayabu tunmɔ, emɛ puu mɔi wɔɔ gɔ kuu nɛ maini ye lɛtɛrɛ tɔŋɔ ga saii daariyaabɔn. Kaa, kɔɔ waaru le, gagawu, inɛw womɔbe bɛrɛ kubɔ turu sai obaa kilaa, sagu wo duuru gɔ dɛi jaiyɛ ga, lɛtɛrɛ ɔn e bɛrɛ tii ye, ei mainiyɛnmɔ ga, mu bɛrɛ waajibi biyaai, mu jugaabɔn.

Inɛw gamuu baŋiyaan logoro ebe nɛ yowaa yatoin. Ama Dɔn nɛ pɔɔlɔ baa tɔŋi wɔɔ, inɛw kɔɔ tunmɔbe, jarugu kuu bemɛ nɛ susugodo gin. Inɛw Ama inin kɔɔbe, kuu sɛlɛ sɔɔ bemɛ gɔ bɛrɛ naran obo ga, Ama emɛ nɛɛma sɔɔ gɔ dulomɔuwɔin. Be iyaa, Kuu Baŋa turu gɔ, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito le yabanɛ.
Kijɛ gamuu e igu gɔbe ei naŋaranmu ibɛɛ wɔun. Waaru galaai gɔ le, Inɛw Baŋa Ama, Ejipute gana nɛ Isɛrɛlu unrunwin waaru gunɔ nɛ yabaa wo goonu le, inɛw wo le gawanɛ gɔbei kɔɔ onu nɛ suyaabe.
Iyaa, mɛlɛnkɛ gɔnrɔn laa Ama bei obu gɔ le biyɛ ga yabanɛ, kaa yalu be bee gɔbe pajin gɔbe, Bai Diyɛ saliyɛ kiru gɔ dɛi, Ama bei asuu, inrun jɔrɔgɔ le kɔmaa, ɔlɔ nɛ kunaa yasɛ.

Kunrin mɛlɛnkɛ kɔɔbe gin’ Sodomɛ bɛɛnw lee, Gomɔre bɛɛnw lee, ana be le bɛrii daanbɛin bɛɛnw lee, sala nɛ kuu bemɛ obaa bɛin gɔbe, iyaa Adama ii kijɛ mɔɲu kanraun jaanla gɔbe, be kanrun gɔ ajubai. Be yaun asuu yinwɛɛnlɛ gɔ nɛ ɔɲaa yatoin. Sɔɔ kɔɔbe, inɛw bemaa kunrin kanrannɔu ga, bei titinwɛnrɛnɲu.
Inɛw mɔɲu, logoro ebe nɛ sasai le yoonw kɔɔbe, be yaa kunrin kanranɲu: Yaŋawelu bemɛ digiyaa, goju bemɛ koi lɔgɔjiyɛmɔɲu. Be Ama gɔnrɔn gɔ yau kanranɲu. Be mɛlɛnkɛ dooro le wɔin gɔbei koi duyɔɲu.
Kaa halu, mɛlɛnkɛbe puu kuu baŋa gɔ, Misɛlu kanran, waaru Mɔise yiun gɔ dɛi jinrun puu kuu baŋa le wo jiireube le, wo woi duyɔ ga daariyɛlu. Kaa, kijɛ wo gi: «Ama ui laga.»
Kaa, inɛw kɔɔbe, kijɛ paamaanɛ be wɔɔ gɔ dɛi sɔɔ mɔɲu sɔɔɲu. Be olunawanbe gin’ kuu bemɛ le sɔɔ be biyaajɛ gɔi kanranɲu. Be kunrin kuu bemɛ suyoɲu.
Bɔnrɔn be le yɔɔ, sabu be Kayɛn bana kanrun gin’ kanrin. Iyaa, Balaamu bana kanrun gin’, be buudu bɛɛ dɛi mɔɲu kakanranɲu. Bei suiyaai, sabu be Kore gin’ Ama le murutu kanraanbɛin.

Ba unrunw tunmɔ le mɔrinyaan yalu jaa e kayajɛ nɛ, ei dɔgɔ aamɔw gɔ bei. Be kayɛrɛ ɛjii kayaa ye, bɛrɛ bemɛ dɔgɔ sɛlɛ le joonɔɲu. Be anrankulumɔ dii sɛnɛ ooɲɔ balaa yaajɛ gin’ wɔin. Be tiun nabe ii bemɛ waaru dɔwaai kanran, ii naraannɛ gin’ wɔin. Be tiun nabe duu bemɛ mɔmaa goonaaɲu gin’ wɔin. Bei yinwaan dogaai.

Bei nɛudii gunu waaŋiyaan wɔin gin’ birɛ lɔgɔgu bemɛ yugɔrɔ gin’ goonɔu wɔin gin’ wɔɔ. Bei tolo yalu wooi nɛ gɔŋɔrɔnɲu gin’ wɔɔ. Ama be dɛi ɔlɔ diyɛ naa diyɛ gɔ nɛ yalu yegeraa sɛɛ. Be wogɔ nɛ asuu bibiyɛdɛin.

Henɔku, Adama tirɛ unrunw logoro nɛ tirɛ ii sɔiye gɔ, waaru wage nɛ baa inɛw kɔɔbe dɛi sɔɔ sɔwaa, kijɛ wo gi: «Yɛnɛi! Inɛw wooi saliyɛ kire ga Inɛw Baŋa titiyaanw ɛjaa kulɔ joo lugu bɛɛmɔɔlɛ womɔbe le wɛwɛɛdo. Wo, inɛw Ama giri liyɛɛnɛ gɔbe, kijɛ mɔɲu be kanrun gɔbe puu dɛi lee, iyaa inɛw hakɛ kanranw, Ama giri liyɛɛnɛ sɔɔ mɔɲu wo dɛi be sɔi gɔbe puu dɛi lee, jarugu kuu bemɛ nɛ duurɔ ga, wo wɛwɛɛdo.»
Wogɔbe inɛw guguun guunwin, bana be wɔɔ gɔ le inɛw kinɛ bemɛ aa wɔnɛ. Be dadaaru bemɛ le kɛukɛu yoi yaauwɔin. Aŋa bemɛ nɛ sɔɔ goojɛ, sɔɔ kuu ulogui. Be inɛwin, kijɛ bemɛ bɛɛ dɛi sɔmɔɲu.
Kaa e kai, ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, e Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe, sɔɔ giru nɛ be tagu gɔbe pilemu ajubai.
Be e bɛrɛ sɔwaa gin: «Waaru dumɔ gɔ le inɛw ei mɔmɔw wɛwɛɛdɛin, inɛw Ama giri liyɛla dadaaru bemɛ le kɛukɛu yoi yayaadɛin.»
Ama unrunw logoro nɛ mii kabu kunɔw gɔ bei. Inɛw arusɛgɛ gin’ wɔin gɔbe bei. Ama Kikinu be nɛ tolo.

Kaa e kai, ba unrunw ibɛ mabe, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ Yesu Kirisito, e bɛrɛ, ɔnmɔsɔgɔ, ɛhɛju womɔ dɛi oboido waaru gɔ dɔmiyaan wɔnu, e gagawu gaai ɛjaai ebe nɛ giru go yaai. Kikinu Pilu gɔnrɔn le Ama gɛɛin. Ama ihibɛ gɔ nɛ biyɛi.
Inɛw kinɛ lɛilɛi le wɔin gɔbe amasɔgɔ jugu ye, bei barai.
Inɛw gamuu gɔbe, yaun nɛ bei ɛlɛ ye goonu ye yabai. Gamuu gɔbe, e amasɔgɔ bemɛ e jugɔun jaain wɔɔ. Kaa e kuu ebe kajubai. Halu sɔi hakɛ bemɛ dɛi lɔgɔjiyaa wɔɔ gɔ, wogɔbe ibiliyɛi.
Ei numɔnɔu giye, ei gɛliyɛnɛ gɔ, jarugusɛlɛ le, kinɛ ɛɛlu diyɛ le dooro womɔ giru nɛ ei jɛɛlu ye iŋɛrɛindo baŋa gɔ,

Ama turu emi Yabanɛ gɔ woi. Boi sɔmu gɔ lee, baba diyɛ gɔ lee, paŋa gɔ lee, gɔnrɔn gɔ lee, Yesu Kirisito, Inɛw Baŋa emɛ nɛ womɔi biyɛmɔ. Tɔlɔgu gɔ le baa, iye wɛɛ dɔɔ kunrin wɔɔ. Asuu nasuu kunrin biyɛdo. Amina.
Yesu Kirisito sɔɔ jugɔmu gɔ unwɔ. Ama wo bɛrɛ jugɔmaa, sɔɔ bɛrii biyɛido, birɛbirɛnw unrunmɔ bɛrɛ tagara wo gi gɔ woi. Kirisito, mɛlɛnkɛ unrunmɔ tiyaa, birɛbirɛnɛ unrunmɔ Jan bɛrɛ jugɔmaabe.
Wo, Ama sɔɔ lee, Yesu Kirisito wo bɛrɛ sɔɔ jugɔmu lee dɛi dɔn ɔn nɛ sɛɛrɛ goouwɔ. Wo sɔɔ wo iyi puu tagaabe.
Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi ɔn mii ɛɛn le inɛ jaŋajɛ gɔ Ama wo yabu. Inɛw sɔɔ gɔ ɛgɛ ye, dɔn gɔ nɛ sɔɔ tɔŋaa too gɔ gɛliyɛɲu gɔbe, be kanran Ama be yabu. Sabu sɔɔ kɔɔbe waaru gɔ bɛruniyaain.
Asi numɔ nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu sɔi wɔin gɔbe, mu Jan, lɛtɛrɛ ɔn e bɛrɛ tiiuwɔn: Ama yɔɔ gɔ, yabe gɔ, wɛɛido gɔ, wo lee, kikinu kosɔi ɔgɔdɔin womɔ giru nɛ wɔin gɔbe lee,

iyaa Yesu Kirisito, sɛɛrɛ goonɛ sɔɔ turu baŋa gɔ, yiun logoro nɛ wo Aini pɔlɔi bulu gɔ, aduna ɔgɔnw puu kuu baŋa gɔ lee, be e bɛrɛ nɛɛma lee, jamu lee obo. Kirisito, emi ibɛɛ wɔɔ baŋa gɔ, yinwaan, ili womɔ le hakɛ emɛ nɛ emi Yabanɛ gɔ,
iyaa wo Ba Ama bɛrɛ sadagadɔɔnɔw ɔgɔwin emi bojonɛ gɔ, dooro gɔ lee, paŋa gɔ lee, asuu nasuu womɔi biyɛmɔ. Amina.
Yɛnɛi, wo anrankulumɔ nɛ kowɛɛjɛ. Inɛw puu woi ihiyedɛin. Halu inɛw woi sɔbin gɔbe woi ihiyedɛin. Aduna tɔgu puu wo dɛi tɔɔnrɔn tɔtɔɔnrɔndɛin. Ee, Amina.
Inɛw Baŋa Ama, kanɛ yɔɔ gɔ, yabe gɔ, wɛɛido gɔ, gɔnrɔn wooi sɛɛ baŋa gɔ, sɔwaa, Alupa gɔ lee, Omɛga gɔ lee unruin gi.
Mu Jan, e bainɛ gɔ, ɔɲɛ nɛ lee, Ama diinɛ nɛ lee, sɔɔ tari nɛ lee, Yesu nɛ e bɔɔnɛi. Ama sɔɔ tagu lee, Yesu dɛi sɛɛrɛ goi lee dɛi, mu yalu dii gɔŋaa gɛlɛ Patumɔsu gɛɛɲu gɔ nɛ bɔun.
Inɛw Baŋa bai gɔ, Ama Kikinu, kuu ma nɛ sugaa, mu onu ma nɛ mii diyɛ, kaan sɔgɔrɔjɛ gin’ ɛgaabɔn.

Mii gɔ sɔɔ gɛɛbe: «Kijɛ u iyejɛ gɔ dɔn turu nɛ tɔŋaa ye ana sɔi ɔnbe Ama inɛw mɔɔnu nɛ tii: Epɛse nɛ lee, Simirunɛ nɛ lee, Pɛrugamu nɛ lee, Tiatire nɛ lee, Sarude nɛ lee, Piladɛlupi nɛ lee, Laodise nɛ lee.»
Mu aa mu le sɔɔ sɔɔuwɔ ma ga kigelemaa yɛnaabɔn. Mui waaru mu kigelumu le, mu kange pilɛlɔn kosɔi iyaabɔn.
Pilɛlɔn sɔi gɔbe logoro nɛ, kijɛ ɔnmɔ turu Adama ii murin wo wɔu mu iyaabɔn. Wo arugoi pala kunaa, kange tɛmu gegeɲɛ unrunmɔ nɛ pagaa sɛbe.
Kuu womɔ kukuli, peju kukuli pilu gin’, pilu pala pala bee. Giri womɔbe yaun bije gin’ bee.
Kubɔ womɔbe, gaanran yaun nɛ mɛnu ilaa too gin’ dooriyeube. Mii womɔ, dii diyɛ soguru gin’ bee.
Numɔ iin womɔ le wo tolo kosɔi yasɛbe. Aŋa womɔ nɛ polukaaba aŋa lɛi womɔ sii wɔɔ gooube. Girupala womɔ gɔ nai, paŋa womɔ wooi le dooriyejɛ gin’ bee.
Woi iyaa, mu kubɔ womɔ doɲu nɛ numaa sugaa yiun gin’ biyaabɔn. Wo numɔ iin womɔ mu nɛ yaŋaraan, gi: «Liliyɛ le biyɛnɔu. Pɔlɔ gɔ lee, dumɔrɔn gɔ lee mui.
Ɔnmɔi wɔɔ baŋa gɔ mui. Mu yinwaanbɔn, kaa kanɛ mu asuu nasuu ɔnmɔi wɔun. Yiun lee, yinwunrun lee taan ii gɔ mu sɛɛ.
Nɛɛ, kijɛ kanɛ biyɛu wɔin gɔbe lee, kɔɔ onu nɛ biyɛidɛin lee, u iye gɔbe tɔŋɔ.
Tolo kosɔi numɔ iin ma nɛ u iye gɔ lee, kange pilɛlɔn sɔi gɔbe lee, tiyɛ babaŋa bemɛ gɔ unwɔ: Tolo kosɔi gɔbe, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu sɔi mɛlɛnkɛ gɔbei. Pilɛlɔn sɔi gɔbe, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu sɔi gɔbei.»
«Epɛse nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu wɔɔ mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ tɔŋɔ tii: ‘Numɔ iin womɔ nɛ tolo sɔi gɛlɛ baŋa gɔ, kange pilɛlɔn kosɔi logoro nɛ yoi yaauwɔ baŋa gɔ, sɔɔ womɔ unwɔ:

Mu birɛ u biru gɔ lee, bana u biru gɔ lee, muyɔn uwɔ lee igii wɔun. U inɛw mɔɲu gɔbei tariyɛɛlɛu ga mu igii wɔun. Inɛw unrunbei Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲui gɛɛɲu, kaa jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲui laain gɔbe, u bei subɔraa yɛnaabeu. Be kakalumaŋawin ga u iyaabeu.
U sɔɔ tatariyɛjɛu, boi ma dɛi ɔɲɛ tariyaabeu, anrangaju uwɔ dogomɔlu.
Kaa u le sɔɔ mu sɛɛ gɔ unwɔ: U ihibɛ pɔlɔ u sɛbe gɔ pajaatu.
Yalu nɛ gowaa u numu gɔ ajuba. Iyaa bana uwɔ dulomaa ye, birɛ pɔlɔ u birɛbe gɔ birɛ. Kaa bana uwɔ dulomɔlu ye, mu u bɛrɛ wɛwɛɛdɔn, mu pilɛlɔn uwɔ gɔ yalu womɔ nɛ gogoonɔdɔn.
Kaa sɔɔ ɔn kai u nɛ tɛtɛmɛmɔjɛ: U Nikolayitebe birɛ gɔ ibiliyaa wɔu. Mu kanran birɛ bemɛ ibiliyaa wɔun.
‘Inɛ suguru too baŋa, Ama Kikinu, Ama inɛw mɔɔnube bɛrɛ sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ gɔ wo keŋiyɛn. ‘Inɛ gɔnrɔn biyaajɛ baŋa, mu, tiun ɔnmɔ obojɛ, Ama alujɛnɛ nɛ daan gɔ ii, wo bɛrɛ kakayamɔdɔn.’ »
«Simirunɛ nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu wɔɔ mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ tɔŋɔ tii: ‘Pɔlɔ gɔ lee, dumɔrɔn gɔ lee woi wɔɔ baŋa gɔ, yinwaanbe kaa pilemaa ɔnmɔi biyaai baŋa gɔ, sɔɔ womɔ unwɔ:
Mu ɔɲɛ uwɔ lee, dɛgu uwɔ lee igii wɔun. Kaa ui ɔgɔinɛi. Inɛw unrunbei Yahutunwin gɛɛu, Yahutunwin laain, kaa Setanu babanw mɔɔnu inɛwin wɔin gɔbe, mu sɔɔ mɔɲu u dɛi be sɔɔjɛ gɔ igii wɔun.

Ɔɲɛ u ɔɲɔido gɔ liyɛnɔu. Ei marun yɛnɛ giye jinrun puu kuu baŋa gɔ logoro ebe nɛ gamuui kaju nɛ kamu kukunɔdo. E bai pɛlu ɔɲɔmu bɛbɛɛdei. Yiun gɔ baa sɔɔ turu baŋai biyɛ. Kɔɔ biyaai ye, mu ɔnmɔ domɔ gɔ u bɛrɛ ohobodɔn.
‘Inɛ suguru too baŋa, Ama Kikinu, Ama inɛw mɔɔnube bɛrɛ sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ gɔ wo keŋiyɛn. ‘Inɛ gɔnrɔn biyaajɛ baŋa, yiun lɛiye gɔ wo bɛrɛ dɔɔidolo.’ »
«Pɛrugamu nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu wɔɔ mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ tɔŋɔ tii: ‘Polukaaba aŋa lɛi womɔ sii wɔɔ gɛlɛ baŋa gɔ, sɔɔ womɔ unwɔ:

Mu yalu nɛ u daan gɔ igii wɔun. Setanu ɔgɔdɔin yalu wɔɔ gɔ woi. U boi ma yagɛlɛu. Halu sɛɛrɛ ma goonɛ sɔɔ turu baŋa Antipasui, ana ebe Setanu yalui wɔɔ gɔ nɛ bai dain gɔbe le, u gagawu uwɔ mu sibɛ nɛ kɔɔlɔmɔlu.

Kaa u le sɔɔ gamuu mu sɛɛ yɔɔ: Uwɔ nɛ inɛw Balaamu deeru gɛlin yɔɔin. Balaamu, Isɛrɛlu unrunw bɛrɛ ɔmɔlɔ nawan tɛnwɛnmaa ye, sala nɛ bei yoomaa ye, kɔɔ gin’ bei hakɛ nɛ numɔ yoomɔ ga, Balaku bɛrɛ deereube.
Kunrin, u kanran, uwɔ nɛ Nikolayitebe deeru inɛw gɛlin yɔɔin.
Kodigɛu, bana uwɔ dulomɔ. Kɔɔi laa ye, mu bɛrii u bɛrɛ wɛwɛɛdɔn. Aŋa ma nɛ polukaaba goojɛ gɔ le mu be le kɔmɔ tataadɔn.

‘Inɛ suguru too baŋa, Ama Kikinu, Ama inɛw mɔɔnube bɛrɛ sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ gɔ wo keŋiyɛn. ‘Inɛ gɔnrɔn biyaajɛ baŋa, buru manɛ gɛɛɲu babaŋa gɔ lee, tibi pili lee woi ohobodɔn. Tibi wogɔ nɛ boi kana yatɔŋɔ. Inɛ tibi gɔ bɛɛjɛ gɔi laa ye, inɛ waja turu kanran boi gɔ inɛɛ.’ »
«Tiatire nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu wɔɔ mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ tɔŋɔ tii: ‘Ama Aini, giri womɔbe yaun bije gin’ wɔɔ gɔ, kubɔ womɔbe mɛnu bubaaɲu gin’ dooriyeube gɔ, sɔɔ womɔ unwɔ:
Mu birɛ uwɔ gɔbe igii wɔun. Ihibɛ uwɔ lee, gagawu uwɔ lee, birɛ inɛw dɛi u biru gɔ lee, sɔɔ tari uwɔ lee igii wɔun. Birɛ dumɔrɔn uwɔ gɔbe, pɔlɔ mɔ gɔbe dɛi joo ga igii wɔun.
Kaa u le sɔɔ mu sɛɛ gɔ unwɔ: U yaanran unruin inɛ Ama titiyainɛ gɛɛjɛ Jesabɛlui pajaa, birɛbirɛnw mabei lelemɔmaabeu. Sabu wo sala sala lee, ɔmɔlɔ pana kaya lee deeru be bɛrɛ obaabe.
Mu womaa bana womɔ dulomɔ ga waaru wo bɛrɛ obaabɔn. Kaa wo sala oju womɔ nɛ goi ibɛla.
Kodigɛu, mu woi ɔɲɛ teenu nɛ duduunɔdɔn. Kunrin, inɛw wo le dimudimiyɛnw gɔbe, wo le birɛ be biru gɔ dɛi be bana bemɛ duliyemɔnɛ ye, mu be bɛrɛ ɔɲɛ diyɛ dɔdɔɔnɔdɔn.

Mu unrunw womɔ gɔbei dadaadɔn. Kunrin, kinɛ ajubu lee, kinɛ kɔlɔ nɛ sɔɔ boŋurun too lee lubo ye marun yɛnɛnɛ gɔ mui ga, Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔbe puu papaamadɛin. Mu kunrin e tuturu puui, inɛ kanma birɛ womɔ le kɛukɛu tutujɔdɔn.
‘Kaa e Tiatire inɛw wajunw gɔbe, e deeru kɔɔ le yabanɛ. Iyaa inɛw kɔɔbe gɛɛjɛ gin’ Setanu sɔɔ boŋurun too too gɔbe e deenɛ. Mu dɔɔ waja e bɛrɛ duurɔidolɔn ga sɔɔuwɔn.
Kaa kijɛ e sɛɛ gɔ, mu wɛɛido baa ɛjii ai gɛliyɛi.
Inɛ gɔnrɔn biyaajɛ baŋa, dumɔ gɔ yai dɔɔ baa inɛ diŋɛ ma kanraanjɛ gɔ, mu tɔgu gɔbe kuu nɛ paŋa wo bɛrɛ ohobodɔn.
Mu ba bɛrɛ paŋa mu bɛi gɔ, mu wo bɛrɛ ohobodɔn. Wo inrun sɔsɔru le bei girɛdo. Toroi gin’ bei jɔgɔdo.
Mu iyaa yajutolo wo bɛrɛ ohobodɔn.
‘Inɛ suguru too baŋa, Ama Kikinu, Ama inɛw mɔɔnube bɛrɛ sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ gɔ wo keŋiyɛn.’ »

«Sarude nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu wɔɔ mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ tɔŋɔ tii: ‘Ama kikinu sɔi gɔ lee, tolo kosɔi lee sɛɛ baŋa gɔ, sɔɔ womɔ unwɔ: Mu birɛ uwɔ gɔbe igii wɔun. Uwaa ɔnmɔi wɔɔ ga boi uwɔ gowaa wɔɔ. Kaa u yinwaaun.
Kajuba, kijɛ u le waju, yinwɛndo ga wɔɔ gɔ, paŋa womɔ bara. Sabu Ama ma giru nɛ mu birɛ uwɔ gɔbe kibaai tɛmɛlun.

Kodigɛu, deeru u bɛi gɔ lee, aŋai u ɛgu gɔ lee ajuba. Deeru wogɔ yabaajɛu ye, bana uwɔ dulomɔ. U mainiyaan kajubu le biyɛlu ye, mu gugunyɔnnɛ gin’ wɛɛdɔn. Kuu uwɔ nɛ wɛi ye waaru mu gooido u jugɔidolou.
Kaa nimɛ kanran Sarude nɛ u inɛw sɔi bemɛ lɔgɔjiyɛmɔnɛ gamuu yasɛu. Be sɔi pilu kunɔ ye, mu le yoi yayaadɛin, sabu wogɔ be le dagaa wɔɔ.
Inɛ gɔnrɔn biyaajɛ baŋa, wo kunrin sɔi pilu gogoriyedo. Mu ɔnmɔ dɔn gɔ nɛ boi womɔ kɔjɔ ye goonɔidolɔn. Iyaa, mu Ba lee, mɛlɛnkɛ womɔbe lee giru nɛ, mu woi igii wɔun ga sɛɛrɛ gogoodɔn.
‘Inɛ suguru too baŋa, Ama Kikinu, Ama inɛw mɔɔnube bɛrɛ sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ gɔ wo keŋiyɛn.’ »

«Piladɛlupi nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu wɔɔ mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ tɔŋɔ tii: ‘Ɛjaa wɔɔ baŋa gɔ, naran baŋa gɔ, Dawide taan ii gɛlɛ baŋa gɔ, pinɛlaa wo jɛ ye inɛ turu kanran pinu bɛɛlɛ baŋa gɔ, pinaa wo jɛ ye inɛ turu kanran pinulu bɛɛlɛ baŋa gɔ, sɔɔ womɔ unwɔ:
Mu birɛ uwɔ gɔbe igii wɔun. Yɛnɛ, u gɔnrɔn gaai sɛlɛu kanran, u sɔɔ ma gɛliyaabeu, boi ma gɛliyaa aŋa uwɔ tilɛlu. Kodigɛu, mu giru uwɔ nɛ taan pinɛlaa bojaatun. Inɛ turu kanran wogɔ pinɛ bɛɛlɛ.
Yɛnɛ, Setanu babanw mɔɔnu inɛw, unrunbei Yahutunwin gɛɛɲu, kaa Yahutunwin laain, kakalui maŋauwɔin gɔbe, mu bei wɛɛmɔ ye kubɔsɔrɔ uwɔ nɛ ui demɛniyɛnmɔ ye, mu ui ibiyaaun ga be bɛrɛ jujugɔmɔdɔn.
Ɔɲɛ tariyɛ ga mu tɔɔru gɔ, u sɔɔ wogɔ gɛliyaabeu digɛu, mu kanran, minɛ nɛ inɛw wɔin puu suburu yɛnɛ ga ɔɲɛ aduna puu kuu nɛ wɛɛido gɔ waaru nɛ ui gɛgɛliyɛdɔn.
Mu bɛrii yawɛɛjɔn. Inɛ turu kanran ɔgɔdomɔ uwɔ ɛlɛnɔu ga, kijɛ u sɛɛ gɔ ɛjii ai gɛliyɛ.

Inɛ gɔnrɔn biyaajɛ baŋa, Ama ma Ginrun Diyɛ nɛ mu woi jɛin turui bobojodɔn. Wo konɛ asuu goolɛ. Ama ma boi lee, Ama ma ana Jerusalɛmu kana, Ama ma bɛrɛ alagala goi ye sugojɛ gɔ boi lee, boi kana ma lee wo nɛ tɔtɔŋɔdɔn.
‘Inɛ suguru too baŋa, Ama Kikinu, Ama inɛw mɔɔnube bɛrɛ sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ gɔ wo keŋiyɛn.’ »
«Laodise nɛ Ama inɛw mɔɔnu wɔɔ mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ bɛrɛ ɔn gin’ tɔŋɔ tii: ‘Amina baŋa gɔ, sɛɛrɛ goonɛ sɔɔ turu baŋai, naran baŋai wɔɔ gɔ, kijɛ Ama maŋaajɛ puu wo nɛ tɔlu baŋa gɔ, sɔɔ womɔ unwɔ:
Mu birɛ uwɔbe igii wɔun. U Ama sibɛ go kaalulau, nuulau. U kaali beu ma, nuui beu ye koi bee.
Kaa u tugoi tugoi biyaa, kaalulau, nuulau dɛi, mu aŋa ma nɛ ui turɔ gogoonɔdɔn.
U unruin ɔgɔinɛi, arusɛgɛ baŋai, kijɛ turu kanran kai le wɔlɔu gɛɛjɛu. Kaa u amasɔgɔ le wɔu, yeeriyeginɛi, dɛguginɛi, giruminɛi, duŋu le wɔu ga inɛɛu.

Kɔɔ sabu dɛi mu ui tinwɛnrɛunwɔ ɔgɔinɛi taŋa ga ma nɛ wɛi ye kange yaun nɛ kunaa ɛjɛmaaɲu gɔ ɛbɛ. Uwaa sɔi kunu ye, duŋu uwɔ dɔgɔ gɔ baŋaran ga, sɔi pilu wɛɛ ɛbɛ. Uwaa giri iye ga giri loo wɛɛ ɛbɛ ye giri uwɔ nɛ para.
Mu kai, inɛw mu ibɛ gɔbei sɔsɔɔjɔn, bei kɔi logi lalagajɔn. Kodigɛu, maini diyɛ le biyaajɛu ye bana uwɔ dulomɔ.
Yɛnɛ, mu murɔn aŋa gɔ nɛ taan tɔgɔu yahiŋɔ. Inɛ mii ma ɛgaa taan pinɛlaajɛ ye, mu womɔ nɛ yoyoodɔn, wo le pana kakayadɔn, wo yaa mu le pana kakayado.
Inɛ gɔnrɔn biyaajɛ baŋa, mu bana gɔnrɔn biyaa, mu Ba le ɔgɔdɔin womɔ nɛ mu dɛinyin gin’, mu woi kanran ɔgɔdɔin ma nɛ mu le dɛdɛinyɛnmɔdɔn.
‘Inɛ suguru too baŋa, Ama Kikinu, Ama inɛw mɔɔnube bɛrɛ sɔɔ sɔɔjɛ gɔ wo keŋiyɛn.’ »
Kɔɔ onu nɛ mu yɛnaa, alagala nɛ murɔn aŋa turu pinɛlaa wo wɔu iyaabɔn. Mii laa kaan gin’ mu ɛgu gɔ mu le sɔwaa gi: «Ɔn nɛ ulo. Kijɛ kɔɔbe onu nɛ wɛɛidɛin gɔbe mu u bɛrɛ tatagaradɔn.»
Ginsɛsai Ama Kikinu, kuu ma nɛ sugaabe. Alagala nɛ ɔgɔdɔin yabe. Inɛ turu ɔgɔdɔin gɔ nɛ yadaanbe.
Konɛ daanbe baŋa gɔ, bana womɔ tibu dɔnrun diyɛ jasupe lee, saruduanɛ lee gin’ dooroube. Nɔmɔsije, bana womɔ tibu dɔnrun diyɛ emɛrɔde gin’ dooriyeu, ɔgɔdɔin gɔ sɛɛu gɔŋaa gɛlɛbe.
Ɔgɔdɔin pɛɛlɛi naisigɛ ɔgɔdɔin kɔɔi gɔŋaa yasɛbɛin. Ɔgɔdɔin pɛɛlɛi naisigɛ gɔbe nɛ, inɛw naw pɛɛlɛi naisigɛ, sɔi pilu kunaa, kange ɔgɔdomɔ kuu bemɛ nɛ kunaa, yadaanbɛin.
Anrangiriyenube lee, siɲɛbe lee, anrandagulube lee, ɔgɔdɔin gɔ nɛ gooubɛin. Ɔgɔdɔin gɔ giru nɛ, tɛlutin yaun kosɔi, yaun taŋau, yabɛin. Wogɔbe, Ama kikinu kosɔi gɔbe bei.

Ɔgɔdɔin giru gɔ nɛ yɛnaa ye, wɛɛrɛ nɛudii gin’ bee. Tibu dɔnrun diyɛ kirisitalu gin’ sɛɛ bee. Kijɛ ɔnmɔ konai, logoro gɔ nɛ biyaa, ɔgɔdɔin gɔi gɔŋaa yagɛlɛbɛin. Be giru go lee, onu go lee, giri le jowaa bɛin.
Kijɛ ɔnmɔ pɔlɔ gɔ yara murin wɔɔ, lɛiye gɔ naa jaŋu murin wɔɔ, taaniye gɔ inɛ girupala gin’ yasɛbe, naiye gɔ anrankɔ kiliyaa yaauwɔ le murin wɔɔ.

Kijɛ ɔnmɔ nai gɔbe tuturu puu gamuju kuloi kuloi sɛbɛin. Goju gɔ puu, bain go lee, gamuju doɲu gɔbe puu nɛ lee giri jowaa wɔɔ. Aga lee digɛ lee deeliye sɛlɛ go, kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Inɛw Baŋa Ama kɔmɔnumɔbe kuu baŋa gɔ, yabe gɔ, yɔɔ gɔ, wɛɛido gɔ, wo ɛjaa wɔɔ, ɛjaa wɔɔ, ɛjaa wɔɔ.»
Kijɛ ɔnmɔ gɔbe ɔgɔdɔin nɛ daan baŋa, asuu nasuu ɔnmɔi wɔɔ baŋa gɔi dooromaa, babaa, birɛpoo waaru be tagaajɛ puu,
inɛw naw pɛɛlɛi naisigɛ gɔbe, ɔgɔdɔin nɛ daan baŋa gɔ giru nɛ tutuŋiyɛnɲu. Be asuu nasuu ɔnmɔi wɔɔ baŋa gɔi dedemɛniyɛnmɔɲu. Ɔgɔdomɔ bemɛ goonaa, ɔgɔdɔin gɔ giru nɛ kamaa tiyaa ye ɔn gin’ gɛɛɲu:
«U Inɛw Baŋa emɛ gɔ, Ama emɛ gɔ, dooro gɔ lee, baba gɔ lee, gɔnrɔn gɔ lee, u le dagaa wɔɔ. Sabu u kijɛ puu maŋaabeu. Iyaa be puu diŋɛ uwɔ le wɔin, diŋɛ uwɔ le biin.»
Kɔɔ onu nɛ ɔgɔdɔin nɛ daan baŋa numɔ iin nɛ dɔnmunɔ wo tou mu iyaabɔn. Dɔnmunɔ gɔ kɔlɔ gɔ nɛ lee, bain gɔ nɛ lee puu tɔŋu tɔŋi. Sɛɛrɛ kosɔi wo nɛ kunaa daŋaa bojaaɲu.
Mu mɛlɛnkɛ gɔnrɔn sɛɛ turu, mii ɛɛn le ɔn gin’ sɔɔu wo wɔu iyaabɔn: «Sɛɛrɛ gɔbe taruluti ye, dɔn gɔ pinɛlɛ ga aa le dagaa?»
Alagala nɛ ma, minɛ nɛ ma, minɛ doɲu nɛ ma, inɛ turu kanran dɔn gɔ pinɛlɛ ye kɔlɔ gɔ yɛnɛ bɛɛbele.
Dɔn gɔ pinɛlɛ ye kɔlɔ gɔ yɛnɛ ga inɛ le dagaa bɛɛmɔlu sabu dɛi mu ɛjii sɔmiyaanbɔn.
Inɛw naw gɔbe logoro nɛ koturu mu le sɔwaa gi: «Sɔmiyɛnnɔu, yɛnɛ, Juda tɔgu nɛ yara goi gɔ, Dawide tiruwɛnɛ gɔ, wo gɔnrɔn biyaajɛ. Kodigɛu, wo sɛɛrɛ sɔi gɔbe goonu ye dɔn gɔ pinulu bɛbɛɛjɛ.»

Kɔɔ gin’, ɔgɔdɔin gɔ lee, kijɛ ɔnmɔ nai gɔbe lee, inɛw naw gɔbe lee logoro nɛ Peju Ii woi sɛnwaanɲu gin’ wo iŋɛu mu iyaabɔn. Peju Ii gɔ kɛlɛ kosɔi sɛbe, giri kosɔi sɛbe. Wogɔbe Ama kikinu kosɔi, minɛ yalu wooi nɛ tiyaaɲu gɔbe bei.
Wo wiyaa, ɔgɔdɔin nɛ daan baŋa numɔ iin nɛ dɔn gɔ yabaabe.

Waaru dɔn gɔ wo bɛi le, kijɛ ɔnmɔ konai gɔbe lee, inɛw naw pɛli naisigɛ gɔbe lee, Peju Ii gɔ giru nɛ tuŋiyaanbɛin. Be tuturu puu giŋiru lee, iyaa kange diikɔrɔi uguru jiɲu ɛju le joonaa yagɛlɛbɛin. Uguru gɔ wogɔ Ama inɛw amagɛɛn gɔ woi.

Be nii kana ɔn gin’ niiubɛin: «Dɔn gɔ yabaa ye sɛɛrɛ gɔbe pinɛlɛ ga u le dagaa wɔɔ. Sabu ui daaɲu, u ginrun wooi nɛ lee, sɔɔ wooi nɛ lee, tɔgu wooi nɛ lee, gana wooi nɛ lee, inɛw bemaa Ama mɔi biyɛ ga, yinwaan, ili uwɔ le bei ɛbaabeu.
U Ama emɛ dɛi bei ɔgɔwin, sadagadɔɔnɔwin bojaabeu. Be aduna laamu kakanrandɛin.»
Iyaa mu yɛnɛubɔn, mu mɛlɛnkɛ joo mii ɛgaabɔn. Be ɔgɔdɔin gɔ lee, kijɛ ɔnmɔ gɔbe lee, inɛw naw gɔbe lee gɔŋaa gɛlɛbɛin. Be muɲu muɲu muɲu, muɲu kɛnwɛn bɛin.
Mii ɛɛn le kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Peju Ii sɛnwaanɲu gɔ, gɔnrɔn gɔ lee, arusɛgɛ gɔ lee, hakilɛ gɔ lee, paŋa gɔ lee, baba gɔ lee, dooro gɔ lee, boi sɔmu gɔ lee, wo le dagaa wɔɔ.»

Kijɛ maŋaaɲu puu, alagala nɛ wɔin lee, minɛ nɛ wɔin lee, minɛ doɲu nɛ toin lee, nɛudii nɛ lee, kɔlɔ bemɛ nɛ kijɛ toin wooi lee, be ɔn gin’ gɛɛu be wɔu mu ɛgaabɔn: «Boi sɔmu gɔ lee, baba gɔ lee, dooro gɔ lee, paŋa gɔ lee, asuu nasuu ɔgɔdɔin nɛ daan baŋa gɔ lee, Peju Ii gɔ lee mɔi biyɛmɔ.»
Kijɛ ɔnmɔ nai gɔbe «Amina» gɛɛubɛin. Inɛw naw gɔbe tuŋiyaan demɛniyɛnmu demɛniyɛnmaabɛin.
Waaru Peju Ii gɔ, sɛɛrɛ kosɔi gɔbe logoro nɛ turu taralaa wo pinulu le, mu yɛnɛubɔn. Kijɛ ɔnmɔ konai gɔbe logoro nɛ koturu anrandagulu mii gin’ ɔn gin’ wo gɛɛu mu ɛgaabɔn: «Wɛɛ.»
Mu yɛnaa, sɔun pilu kowɔɔ. Sɔun gɔ kuu nɛ yaŋa baŋa gɔ, too kɛun tai yagɛlɛbe. Ɔgɔdomɔ wo bɛrɛ obaabɛin. Wo gɔnrɔn biyaajɛ baŋai wɔu, gowaa, gɔnrɔn bɛɛi yai.
Peju Ii gɔ waaru sɛɛrɛ lɛiye gɔ taralaa wo pinulu le, kijɛ ɔnmɔ lɛiye gɔ ɔn gin’ wo gɛɛu mu ɛgaabɔn: «Wɛɛ.»
Sɔun waja yaun banrun gin’ biyaa gowaabe. Kuu womɔ nɛ yaŋa baŋa gɔ, minɛ nɛ jamu donugu ye inɛw bemaa tunmɔi sɛnwɛn ga, gɔnrɔn wogɔ wo bɛrɛ obaaɲu. Polukaaba diyɛ kanran wo bɛrɛ obaaɲu.
Peju Ii gɔ waaru sɛɛrɛ taaniye gɔ taralaa wo pinulu le, kijɛ ɔnmɔ taaniye gɔ ɔn gin’ wo gɛɛu mu ɛgaabɔn: «Wɛɛ.» Mu yɛnaa, sɔun gɛun kowɔɔ. Kuu womɔ nɛ yaŋa baŋa gɔ, tankodo numɔ le yagɛlɛ.

Kijɛ ɔnmɔ nai gɔbe logoro nɛ mii goojɛ gin’ mu ɛgaabɔn. Kijɛ gi: «Bai turu birɛ buudu, alukama kilo koturu dɔnruin. Ɔruje kilo taanu bai turu birɛ buudu le kɛu wɔɔ. Kaa nii lee, resɛndii ilɛ lee kai yamalanɔu.»
Peju Ii gɔ sɛɛrɛ naiye gɔ taralaa waaru wo pinulu le, kijɛ ɔnmɔ naiye gɔ ɔn gin’ wo gɛɛu mu ɛgaabɔn: «Wɛɛ.»

Mu yɛnaa, sɔun purugu kowɔɔ. Kuu womɔ nɛ yaŋa baŋa boi Yiun gɛɛbɛin. Yinwunrun onu womɔ nɛ yadimɛbe. Bemaa polukaaba le, giyɛ le, jaabu le, olunawan le, minɛ inɛw gamulu naiye turu gɔbe daiti ga, gɔnrɔn be bɛrɛ obaaɲu.
Sɛɛrɛ numɔrɔnye gɔ taralaa waaru wo pinulu le, inɛw Ama sɔɔ dɛi dain gɔbe lee, sɛɛrɛ goi bemɛ dɛi dain gɔbe lee, mu kikinu bemɛ mɔi jiɲu ɛju gɔ yalu tɛgɛrɛɲu doɲu gɔ nɛ iyaabɔn.
Be mii diyɛ le ɔn gin’ gin: «Inɛw Baŋa ɛjaa wɔɔ baŋa gɔ, naran baŋa gɔ, u waaru yagɔ baa dɔmi ye, saliyɛ kiru ye, minɛ nɛ inɛw wɔin kuu nɛ emi dain duguru goodou?»
Be tuturu bɛrɛ arugoi pilu obaa, bemaa nimɛ kanran waaru gaila deeliyaa wɔnu, birɛbirɛnw be gin’ daaidɛin be bɔɔnw, be ba unrunw gɔbe, lugo bemɛ kibeido dɔmiyɛn gin.
Kɔɔ onu nɛ, Peju Ii gɔ sɛɛrɛ kuloiye gɔ taralaa pinɛlɛu wo wɔu mu iyaabɔn. Minɛ ɛjii jigaabe. Nai saii gɛunniyaan bee. Iyepilu gɔ sɛɛu ili gin’ banrin bee.
Tolo gɔbe ooɲɔ diyɛ wiyaa ye gaa na jigemaa ye ii koro gɔbe bagajɛ gin’ alagala goi ye minɛ nɛ bagaubɛin.
Alagala gɔ, dɔn munɔɲu gin’ manaai. Kokoobe lee, minɛ dii gɔŋaa gɛlɛ gɔbe lee, puu yalu bemɛ nɛ goonaatin.

Aduna ɔgɔnw gɔbe lee, inɛw diyɛnw gɔbe lee, kɔmɔ numɔ kuu bɛɛnw gɔbe lee, ɔgɔ unrunw gɔbe lee, paŋagunw gɔbe lee, inɛw wajunw puu, gunɔw gɔbe lee, gunɔ tonɛ gɔbe lee, kɔmɔ nɛ lee, kokoobe dumɔ logoro nɛ lee baŋiyaanbɛin.
Be kokoo gɔbe lee, dumɔ gɔbe lee bɛrɛ sɔɔu, kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Kuu emɛ nɛ sugo ye ɔgɔdɔin nɛ daan baŋa giru nɛ lee, Peju Ii gɔ kinɛbanrun nɛ lee emi baŋarain.
Sabu kinɛbanrun bemɛ bai diyɛ gɔ wiyaai. Inɛ aa wogɔ tari bɛɛjɛ?»
Kɔɔ onu nɛ mɛlɛnkɛ nai, minɛ sibɛ nai nɛ be iŋɛu mu iyaabɔn. Minɛ nɛ lee, nɛudii nɛ lee, tiun na turu kanran nɛ lee, ooɲɔ suyonɔu ga, be minɛ ooɲɔ nai gɔbei tɛŋaa gɛlɛbɛin.
Mɛlɛnkɛ waja duu sibɛ go gowaa wo wɛɛu mu iyaabɔn. Ama ɔnmɔ sɛɛrɛ kuni gɔ wo yagɛlɛbe. Minɛ lee nɛudii lee yamala ga mɛlɛnkɛ nai bɛrɛ gɔnrɔn obaaɲu gɔbe le wo mii diyɛ le sɔwaa gi:
«Ama emɛ birɛbirɛnw didimɛ nɛ sɛɛrɛ emɛ kunɔido baa, minɛ ma, nɛudii ma, tiun ma tabanɔugi.»
Kɔɔ onu nɛ inɛw nɛ sɛɛrɛ gɔ kuni lugo gɔ mu ɛgaabɔn. Inɛw muɲu suŋu lee muɲu pɛnai naisigɛ, Isɛrɛlu tɔgu puu nɛ goin.
Juda tɔgu nɛ inɛw muɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ nɛ sɛɛrɛ gɔ kuni. Rubɛn tɔgu nɛ muɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ, Gadu tɔgu nɛ muɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ,
Asɛru tɔgu nɛ muɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ, Nɛputali tɔgu nɛ muɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ, Manase tɔgu nɛ muɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ,
Simɛyɔn tɔgu nɛ muɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ, Lewi tɔgu nɛ muɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ, Isakaru tɔgu nɛ muɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ,
Sabulɔn tɔgu nɛ muɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ, Josɛpu tɔgu nɛ muɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ, Bɛnjamɛ tɔgu nɛ muɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ nɛ sɛɛrɛ gɔ kuni.

Kɔɔ onu nɛ mu yɛnaa, mɔɔnu diyɛ kowɔɔ. Inɛ turu kanran lugo bemɛ jugɔ bɛɛlɛ. Be gana puu nɛ, ginrun puu nɛ, tɔgu wooi nɛ, sɔɔ wooi nɛ goin. Be ɔgɔdɔin gɔ lee, Peju Ii gɔ lee giru nɛ iŋɛbɛin. Be arugoi pilu yatobɛin. Tamaro tiun liyɛbe yagɛlɛbɛin.
Be mii diyɛ le ɔn gin’ gɛɛbɛin: «Yayabu gɔ Ama emɛ ɔgɔdɔin nɛ daan gɔ lee, Peju Ii gɔ lee bɛrɛ goojɛ.»
Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔbe puu ɔgɔdɔin gɔ lee, inɛw naw gɔbe lee, kijɛ ɔnmɔ nai gɔbe lee gɔŋaa sɛbɛin. Be ɔgɔdɔin gɔ giru nɛ tuŋiyaan, girupala minɛ nɛ dujaa, Amai demɛniyɛnmaabɛin.
Kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Amina, boi sɔmu gɔ lee, dooro gɔ lee, hakilɛ gɔ lee, birɛpoo tagu gɔ lee, baba gɔ lee, gɔnrɔn gɔ lee, paŋa gɔ lee, asuu nasuu Ama emɛ mɔi. Amina.»
Inɛw naw gɔbe logoro nɛ turu baŋa mu le sɔwaa gi: «Arugoi pilu kunaa kowɔin gɔbe aabei? Be yago gowaa wɛin?»
Mu aŋa womɔ saa: «Mu baŋa, u igu.» Kɔɔ waaru le wo saa gi: «Kɔɔbe tɔɔɲɔ diyɛ gɔ nɛ inɛw gowaa wɛɛnw gɔbei. Be Peju Ii ili gɔ nɛ arugoi bemɛ mɔŋaa pili bojaaɲu.
Be kɔɔ dɛi Ama ɔgɔdɔin giru gɔ nɛ biyaa, aga lee digɛ lee Ginrun Diyɛ womɔ nɛ wo dɛi birɛ birɛuwɔin. Ɔgɔdɔin nɛ daan baŋa gɔ, kuu bemɛ nɛ sɔi kuru womɔ ihiŋɛrɛndo.
Giyɛ asuu bei aaidolo, diinɔɔrin asuu bei aaidolo, nai kanran asuu waja bei tɛgɛidolo, ujɔ kanran asuu bei aaidolo.
Sabu ɔgɔdɔin logoro nɛ Peju Ii wɔɔ gɔ bei gigirɛdo. Wo ɔnmɔ dii yalu pujojɛbe nɛ bei jɛyaado. Ama, giri bemɛ nɛ giridii puu yayaaɲado.»
Peju Ii gɔ sɛɛrɛ sɔiye gɔ taralaa waaru wo pinulu le, alagala nɛ lɛɛrɛ pɛjɛrɛ koturu gin’ kelemu biyaabe.
Kɔɔ onu nɛ, mu mɛlɛnkɛ kosɔi ɔgɔdɔin giru nɛ iŋɛi gɔbei iyaabɔn. Kaan kosɔi be bɛrɛ obaaɲu.

Mɛlɛnkɛ waja wiyaa, sadagadumu giru gɔ nɛ iŋiyaanbe. Wo kange gelu uguru tɛguru turu yasɛbe. Uguru jiɲu ɛju gaai, Ama inɛw puu amagɛɛn gɔ le baraa ye, sadagadumu, kange le yegeraaɲu ɔgɔdɔin giru nɛ wɔɔ gɔ nɛ tɛgɛrɛ ga wo bɛrɛ obaaɲu.
Uguru jiɲu ɛju kukumɔ gɔ, mɛlɛnkɛ numɔ gɔ nɛ gowaa, Ama inɛw amagɛɛn gɔbe le bariyaa, daa go Ama bɛrɛ ulaabe.
Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ uguru tɛguru gelu gɔ jeɲaa, sadagadumu gɔ nɛ yaun goonaa konɛ joonaa, minɛ nɛ kamaa tiyaabe. Anrandagulube lee, siɲɛbe lee, anrangiriyenube lee, minɛjigu lee biyaabe.
Mɛlɛnkɛ kosɔi kaan sɔi gɛlin gɔbe, kaan bemɛ sujɔ ga unrunbei yegeraabɛin.
Mɛlɛnkɛ pɔlɔ gɔ, kaan sujaabe. Anransaŋaran lee, yaun lee, ili le bariyaa, minɛ nɛ kamaa tiyaabɛin. Aduna gamulu taaniye turu tɛgaajɛ. Tiun gamulu taaniye turu tɛgaajɛ. Iyaa belu wɛru puu tɛgaajɛ.
Mɛlɛnkɛ lɛiye gɔ, kaan sujaabe. Kokoo diyɛ yaun aa wɔɔ gin’ nɛudii nɛ kamaa kunaaɲu. Nɛudii gamulu taaniye turu ili taŋaai.
Nɛudii nɛ kijɛ maŋaaɲu kinrun le toin puu, gamulu taaniye turu yinwaain. Diikoro gamulu taaniye turu suiyaain.
Mɛlɛnkɛ taaniye gɔ, kaan sujaabe. Tolo diyɛ tɛlutin yaun gin’ tɛgɛu, alagala gowaa bagaa sugaabe. Tolo gɔ dibe dii gamulu taaniye turu gɔ nɛ lee, diipujobe nɛ lee sugaabe.
Tolo kɔɔ boi Gaaru gɛɛɲu. Dii gamulu taaniye turu gɔ gaari biyaai. Dii gaaru kɔɔbe dɛi inɛw joo yinwaain.

Mɛlɛnkɛ naiye gɔ, kaan sujaabe. Nai gamulu taaniye turu lee, iyepilu gamulu taaniye turu lee, tolobe gamulu taaniye turu lee lagaabɛin. Kijɛ kɔɔbe gamulu taaniye koturu gɔ ɔlɔi taŋaai. Dɛnrun gamulu taaniye turu ɔlɔi biyaai. Digɛ mɔ yaa kunrin biyaai.

Mu yɛnaa, sasaa anrankɔ alagala go ɛjii ulaa kiliyeu, mii diyɛ le ɔn gin’ gɛɛu wo wɔu ɛgaabɔn: «Mɛlɛnkɛ taanu wajunw gɔbe kaan mii be goonɔido gɔ dɛi, minɛ nɛ inɛw wɔin bɛrɛ bɔnrɔn yɔɔ, bɔnrɔn yɔɔ, bɔnrɔn yɔɔ.»
Mɛlɛnkɛ numɔrɔnye gɔ, kaan sujaabe. Tolo turu alagala gowaa minɛ nɛ bagaa sugaa wo wɔu mu iyaabɔn. Bonɔ diyɛ dumɔ sɛlɛ aŋa taan ii gɔ wo bɛrɛ obaaɲu.
Tolo gɔ bonɔ too dumɔ sɛlɛ gɔ pinɛlaabe. Kukumɔ, gaanran diyɛ yaun kukumɔ gin’, bonɔ gɔ nɛ gowaa ulaabe. Bonɔ gɔ nɛ kukumɔ goojɛ gɔ dɛi, nai lee, wɛwɛi lee kurugiyaain.
Kukumɔ gɔ nɛ kakaabe gowaa, minɛ nɛ sugaabɛin. Mɔmiyɛn paŋai be bɛrɛ obaaɲu.
Be le sɔwaaɲu, bemaa minɛ nɛ belu wɔɔ tabanɔu, wɛru turu kanran ma, tiun turu kanran ma yamalanɔu gin. Kaa inɛw Ama sɛɛrɛ didimɛ bemɛ nɛ wɔlɔ gɔbe sai ɔɲɔmɔ gin.
Inɛwin daa ga be bɛrɛ tɔɔrɔnɛ. Kaa iyepilu numɔrɔn inɛwin ɔɲɔmɔ gin. Ɔɲɔmu bemɛ gɔ mɔmiyɛn tamu inɛi ɔɲɔmɔjɛ gin’ wɔɔ.
Bai kɔɔbe le, inɛw yiun dɛdɛnɛdɛin, kaa bɛɛidenɛ. Be yinwɛn ibɛɛ biyɛdɛin, kaa yiun be le jɔbɔ wawageniyɛndo.
Kakaa kɔɔbe, sɔun kɔmɔ dɛi yegeraa wɔin le murin bɛin. Kuu bemɛ nɛ kange ɔgɔdomɔ gin’ yabe. Girupala bemɛ inɛ girupala gin’ bee.
Kukuli bemɛ yaanw kukuli gin’ bee. Tɔnrɔn bemɛ yarabe tɔnrɔn gin’ bee.
Gegeɲɛ bemɛ nɛ inrun arugoi gin’ yabe. Gamuju be lagajɛ soguru gɔ sɔun wogotoro joo kɔmɔ nɛ jɔbaa yaajɛ siɲɛ gin’ bee.
Be mɔmiyɛn dulɔ gin’, kijɛ tatamu yasɛbɛin. Iyepilu numɔrɔn inɛwin ɔɲɔmɔ ga gɔnrɔn be sɛbe gɔ dulɔ bemɛ nɛ tobe.
Ɔgɔnɛ kuu bemɛ nɛ laamu kanranjɛ gɔ bonɔ too dumɔ sɛlɛ titiyainɛ gɔ woi. Heburu sɔɔ le boi womɔ Abadɔn gɛɛɲu. Gɛrɛku sɔɔ le wogɔ Apɔliɔn gɛɛɲu, tiyɛ gɔ yayamalanɛ.
Bɔnrɔn pɔlɔ gɔ galaai. Bɔnrɔn kolɛi kɔɔ onu nɛ yawɛɛɲu.
Mɛlɛnkɛ kuloiye gɔ, kaan sujaabe. Ama giru nɛ kange sadagadumu wɔɔ gɔ kinrun nai gɔbe nɛ gowaa mu mii ɛgaabɔn.
Mɛlɛnkɛ kuloiye kaan gɛlɛbe gɔ bɛrɛ sɔwaa gi: «Eparate dibe diyɛ gɔ nɛ mɛlɛnkɛ nai pagaa sɛin gɔbei pagala.»
Kunrin mɛlɛnkɛ nai gɔbe, anranguju kɔɔ lee, iyepilu kɔɔ lee, bai kɔɔ lee, lɛɛrɛ kɔɔ lee dɛi unrunbei yegeraabɛin gɔbe, inɛw gamulu taaniye turu gɔi daa ga bei kɔmɔlaa bɛin.
Sɔunbe le kɔmɔtaanw lugo gɔ mu bɛrɛ tagaabɛin. Inɛw muɲu kɛmɛ kɛmɛ suŋu lɛi bɛin.

Mu kunrin kuu iye gɔ nɛ sɔun gɔbe lee, inɛw kuu bemɛ nɛ yaŋabɛin gɔbe lee iyaabɔn. Be inrun arugoi yaun banrun gin’ biyaa, bulɔbulɔ gin’ biyaa, sidu gin’ yulɔpurun gin’ biyaa, yasɛbɛin. Sɔun gɔbe kuu yara kuu gin’ bee. Aŋa bemɛ nɛ yaun lee, kukumɔ lee, sidu lee gooube.
Inɛw gamulu taaniye turu gɔi mɔɲu taanu kɔɔbe le daabɛin: Yaun lee, kukumɔ lee, sidu lee, sɔun gɔbe aŋa nɛ goobe gɔ le daabɛin.
Sabu sɔun gɔbe paŋa, aŋa bemɛ nɛ lee, dulɔ bemɛ nɛ lee too. Dulɔ bemɛ yuguru murin bee. Dulɔ gɔbe kuu yasin, kole inɛw bɛrɛ mɔɲu kanraunbɛin.

Inɛw wajunw, mɔɲu kɔɔbe le digɛu yinwɛnnɛ gɔbe, numɔ bemɛ le kijɛ be yeguru sibɛ go bana bemɛ duliyemɔnɛ. Be jinrunbe lee, degebe kange le ma, sarudu le ma, mɛnu le ma, tibu le ma, baga le ma yegeraaɲu, giri iyeenɛ, suguru ɛgɛɛnɛ, yoi yai bɛɛnɛ gɔbe lee, demɛniyɛnmu pajanɛ.
Inɛw gɔbe, inɛ dai bemɛ dɛi ma, dugu bemɛ dɛi ma, sala bemɛ dɛi ma, gunyɔn bemɛ dɛi ma, bana bemɛ duliyemɔnɛ.
Mu mɛlɛnkɛ gɔnrɔn sɛɛ waja, anrankulumɔ sɔi gin’ kunaa alagala gowaa sugou wo wɔu iyaabɔn. Kuu womɔ nɛ nɔmɔsijei bee. Girupala womɔ nai gin’ bee, kubɔ womɔbe yaun jɛin gin’ bee.
Wo numɔ womɔ le dɔn dagi yagɛlɛbe. Dɔn gɔ pinɛlaa bee. Wo kubɔ iin gɔ nɛudii nɛ bojaa, kubɔ nana gɔ minɛ nɛ bojaa sɛbe.
Yara durojɛ gin’ wo mii diyɛ le kɔnwaanbe. Wo kɔnwaan, anrandagulu kosɔi gɔbe mii bemɛ goonaabɛin.
Anrandagulu kosɔi gɔbe waaru sɔɔ be sɔi le, mu tɔtɔŋɔdɔn ga bɔun. Kaa alagala gowaa mu mii ɛgaabɔn, sɔwaa gi: «Anrandagulu kosɔi gɔbe sɔɔ gin gɔ baŋurun bojo. Wogɔ tɔŋɔnɔu.»
Mɛlɛnkɛ nɛudii kuu nɛ lee, minɛ kuu nɛ lee iŋɛu wo wɔu mu iyi gɔ numɔ iin womɔ alagala go jeɲaa,

asuu nasuu ɔnmɔi wɔɔ baŋa gɔ alagala lee, kɔlɔ womɔ nɛ kijɛ toin lee, minɛ lee, kijɛ wo nɛ too lee, nɛudii lee, kɔlɔ womɔ nɛ kijɛ toin lee maŋanɛ gɔ le unruin jɛbiyaabe. Wo jɛbiyaa, dɔmiyɛnɲu waaru waja wɔlɔ gi.
Kaa mɛlɛnkɛ sɔiye gɔ, waaru kaan sujɔi wo tɔlaajɛ, Ama sɔɔ boŋurun gɔ kikibedo. Inɛw Ama titiyaanw birɛ womɔ birɛnw bɛrɛ Ama bana wo tagu le kɛukɛu kibedo.
Kɔɔ onu nɛ alagala gowaa mii mu ɛgu gɔ mu le pilemaa sɔwaa gi: «Yaa, mɛlɛnkɛ nɛudii kuu nɛ lee, minɛ kuu nɛ lee iŋɛ numɔ nɛ dɔn dagi pinɛlaa wɔɔ gɔ yaba.»
Mu mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ womaa dɔn gɔ mu bɛrɛ obo gɛɛu, wo bɛrɛ yaabɔn. Wo mu le sɔwaa gi: «Yaba kaya. Bɛrɛ uwɔ kɔlɔ nɛ gagaaru gɔ biyɛdo, kaa aŋa uwɔ nɛ yɛin gin’ ɛɛli biyɛdo.»
Mu mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ numɔ nɛ dɔn gɔ yabaa kayaabɔn. Aŋa ma nɛ dɔn gɔ yɛin gin’ ɛɛli bee. Kaa waaru kayaa mu kilu le, bɛrɛ ma nɛ gagaaru gɔ bee.
Kɔɔ onu nɛ mu le kijɛ gin: «Nimɛ kanran tɔgu joo lee, gana joo lee, sɔɔ joo lee, ɔgɔnw joo lee dɛi, Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi u sɔɔun jaain wɔɔ.»
Kɔɔ onu nɛ saguba, baga kijɛ tunwin gin’ biyaa, mu bɛrɛ obaa kijɛ gin: «Ingele, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ lee, sadagadumu gɔ lee tunwɔn. Iyaa inɛw Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ Ama demɛniyɛnmɔuwɔin gɔbe lugo.
Kaa Ama Ginrun Diyɛ, bain gonɔ gɔ yapaja, tunwɔnnɔu. Sabu wogɔ inɛw Yahutunw tɔgui laain gɔbe bɛrɛ obaatin. Be iyepilu pɛnai lɛisigɛ, ana diyɛ Ama dɛi dɛiin wɔɔ gɔ kubɔ le nanamadɛin.
Waaru kɔɔbe nɛ, mu sɛɛrɛ goonw lɛi mabei sɔi sɛmɛlɛ goriyemu ye, bai muɲu lee suŋu lɛi pɛlukuloi kɔɔbe nɛ sɔɔ Ama bɛrɛ goi sɔɔ ga, gɔnrɔn bei ohobodɔn.»
Sɛɛrɛ goonw lɛi gɔbe, minɛ kuu baŋa giru nɛ oliwe tiun lɛi lee, pilɛlɔn lɛi lee wɔin gɔ bei.
Inɛ turu be bɛrɛ mɔɲu kanrun ibɛɛ wɔɔ ye, aŋa bemɛ nɛ yaun gowaa ye jaŋuw bemɛ gɔi suyotiijɛ. Inɛ be bɛrɛ mɔɲu kanranjɛ ga wɔɔ baŋa gɔi kunrin daaun jaan.
Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi waaru be sɔɔjɛ gɔ le, anran miinɔu giye be alagala pinɛɲu gɔnrɔn yasin. Dii gɔbe ili tanugaɲu gɔnrɔn yasin. Waaru be dɛnɛjɛ puu le mɔɲu tɔgu dɛin dɛin minɛ nɛ tiiɲu gɔnrɔn yasin.
Waaru sɛɛrɛ bemɛ gowaa be kibemaajɛ, bonɔ too dumɔ sɛlɛ gɔ nɛ olunawan goojɛ gɔ be le kɔmɔ tai ye, kuu bemɛ nɛ gɔnrɔn bɛi ye, bei dadaado.
Yiun bemɛ ana diyɛ pɔŋɔrɔn gɔ nɛ biyɛdo. Inɛw Baŋa bemɛi baga jai nɛ ana pɛgin gɔ tee woi. Sɔɔ babaŋa le ana gɔ Sodomɛ ma, Ejipute ma gɛɛɲu.
Tɔgu puu lee, ginrun puu lee, sɔɔ puu lee, gana puu lee inɛw, bai taanu lee pɛjɛrɛ lee, yiun bemɛ yɛyɛnɛdɛin. Be yiun gɔbei ɔnsain nɛ kunɔmɔ ga yabaidenɛ.
Minɛ nɛ inɛw wɔin gɔbe be sabu dɛi kinɛ ɛɛli le biyɛdɛin. Be kinɛ ɛhɛɛliyɛmɔdɛin. Be tunmɔ bɛrɛ sin obu titiidɛin, sabu inɛw Ama titiyaanw lɛi kɔɔbe minɛ nɛ inɛw wɔin gɔbei ɛjii ɔɲɔmaatiyaabɛin.
Bai taanu lee pɛjɛrɛ gɔ lee galaai ye, ɔnmɔ kikinu Ama bɛrɛ goi wɛi ye be nɛ yoyoodo. Be ingelaa ye kubɔ kuu nɛ ihiŋiyɛndɛin. Liliyɛ diyɛ, inɛw bei iyeidɛin kinɛ nɛ yoyoodo.
Inɛw Ama titiyaanw lɛi gɔbe, mii diyɛ alagala goi ye be le ɔn gin’ sɔɔnu wo wɔnu ɛhɛgɛdɛin: «Ɔn nɛ uloi.» Kunrin, be jaŋuw gɔbe bei yɛnɛnu be wɔnu, be anrankulumɔ nɛ alagala uhulodɛin.
Waaru kɔɔ le tee minɛ ɛjii jijigedo. Ana diyɛ gɔ gamulu pɛluye koturu susugodo. Inɛw muɲu sɔi minɛjigu kɔɔ nɛ yinwɛndɛin. Wajunw gɔbe ɛjii liliyɛdɛin. Be alagala Ama gɔi bababadɛin.
Bɔnrɔn lɛiye gɔ galaai. Kaa taaniye gɔ kowɛɛjɛ.
Mɛlɛnkɛ sɔiye gɔ, kaan sujaabe. Alagala nɛ mii diyɛ diyɛ gowaa gi: «Aduna laamu gɔ Inɛw Baŋa Ama emɛ lee, Yabanɛ Diyɛ wo tii lee bɛrɛ taŋaai. Wo asuu nasuu laamu kakanrando.»
Inɛw naw pɛɛlɛi naisigɛ Ama giru nɛ ɔgɔdɔin bemɛ nɛ daanbɛin gɔbe tuŋiyaan, girupala minɛ nɛ dujaa, Amai demɛniyɛnmaabɛin.
Kijɛ be gɛɛbe: «Inɛw Baŋa Ama kɔmɔnumɔbe kuu baŋa, u yabeu, yɔɔ baŋa gɔ, gɔnrɔn diyɛ uwɔ le digɛu, laamu uwɔ u daanu gɔ dɛi, emɛ ui birɛpoo tagauwɔin.

Tɔgu wajunw, kinɛ banraan bɛin. Kaa kinɛbanrun uwɔ gɔ wiyaai. Yiun saliyɛ kireɲu waaru dɔwaai. Inɛw Ama titiyaanw birɛbirɛnw uwɔ gɔbe lee, Ama inɛw, boi uwɔ liyɛnw, diyɛnw lee, dagunw lee, tujɔun waaru dɔwaai. Inɛw minɛi yamalau wɔin gɔbei yamalaun waaru dɔwaai.»

Kɔɔ waaru le, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ alagala nɛ pinɛlaabɛin. Ama aaru koro gɔ Ginrun Diyɛ womɔ nɛ iyemaabe. Anrangiriyenube lee, siɲɛbe lee, anrandagulube lee, minɛjigu lee, anransaŋaran diyɛ lee biyaabe.
Kɔɔ onu nɛ sɛɛrɛ diyɛ alagala nɛ iyemaabe: Yaanran, nai gɔ sɔi gin’ kunaa, iyepilu kubɔ womɔbe doɲu nɛ wɔɔ, tolo pɛli lɛisigɛ ɔgɔdomɔi kuu womɔ nɛ kunaa bee.
Wo, bɛrɛ dɔɔ le bee. Nɔrun dɛinyaan ɔɲɔu, duru duroube.
Sɛɛrɛ waja alagala nɛ iyemaabe: Olunawan demɛrɛn diyɛ, banrin biyaa wɔɔi. Kuu kosɔi sɛɛ, kɛlɛ pɛlu sɛɛ, kuu gɔ tuturu nɛ ɔgɔdomɔ yato.
Wo dulɔ womɔ le alagala tolo gamulu taaniye koturu sɛmaa minɛ nɛ kamaa sunugaabe. Yaanran nɔrun daan gɔ, ii narannu wo digɛnu tɛnwɛndo ga, olunawan demɛrɛn gɔ giru womɔ nɛ iŋiyaan bee.
Yaanran gɔ ii naraanbe, ainii. Ii gɔ inrun sɔsɔru le aduna tɔgu wooi gigirɛdo. Kaa ii kɔɔi jeɲaa, Ama lee, ɔgɔdɔin womɔ lee giru nɛ unin.
Yaanran gɔ, olusolo nɛ, Ama wo dɛi yalu yegeraa yasɛbe. Wo yalu wogɔ nɛ bai muɲu lee suŋu lɛi pɛlukuloi nɛ pana womɔ kunɔmɔ ga jɔbaa yaabe.
Kɔɔ waaru le alagala nɛ kɔmɔ biyaabe. Mɛlɛnkɛbe puu kuu baŋa Misɛlu lee, mɛlɛnkɛ womɔbe lee, olunawan demɛrɛn gɔ le jaiyaabɛin. Olunawan demɛrɛn gɔ yaa, mɛlɛnkɛ womɔbe le, be le jaiyaabe.
Kaa olunawan demɛrɛn gɔ gɔnrɔn bɛɛlu. Be alagala nɛ waja yalu biyɛɲu bɛɛnɛ.

Kunrin olunawan demɛrɛn diyɛ kɔɔ, pɔɔlɔ baa yuguru gɔ, boi womɔ jinrun puu kuu baŋa lee, Setanu lee gɛɛɲu gɔ, aduna inɛw puu lelemɔnɛ gɔ, woi minɛ nɛ kamaa tiyaaɲu. Wo lee, mɛlɛnkɛ womɔbe wo le bariyaa, bei minɛ nɛ kamaa tiyaaɲu.

Kɔɔ onu nɛ alagala nɛ mu mii diyɛ ɛgaabɔn, kijɛ gɛɛbe: «Nɛɛ Ama emɛ yayabu gɔ lee, gɔnrɔn gɔ lee, laamu gɔ lee, iyaa Yabanɛ Diyɛ wo tii paŋa gɔ lee wiyaa dɔwaain. Sabu ba unrunw emɛ jaaranɛ gɔ, aga lee, digɛ lee, Ama emɛ giru nɛ bei jaarau bee baŋa gɔ, woi minɛ nɛ kamaa tiyaaɲu.
Ba unrunw emɛ gɔbe, Peju Ii ili gɔ le woi gɔnraanɲu. Sɛɛrɛ be goi sɔɔ gɔ le woi gɔnraanɲu. Be kinrun bemɛ pajaa yinwɛn ga yabaabɛin.

Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, e alagalabe lee, alagala nɛ wɔin gɔbe lee, kinɛ ebe ɛɛliyɛmɔi. Minɛ lee, nɛudii lee, bɔnrɔn ebei, sabu jinrun puu kuu baŋa e nɛ sugaai. Wo bɛrɛ waaru gaila sai waju wo igii wɔɔ dɛi, kinɛbanrun diyɛ le wɔɔ.»
Olunawan demɛrɛn gɔ, minɛ nɛ woi kamaa tiyaatin ga waaru wo iyi le, wo yaanran aini narannɛ gɔ onu nɛ nanaa digiyaabe.

Kɔɔ waaru le, yaanran gɔ womaa olusolo nɛ yalu womɔ sibɛ nɛ kili ye yaa ga, sasaa anrankɔ diyɛ gamuju lɛi gɔ wo bɛrɛ obaabɛin. Kɔɔ nɛ wo anranguju taanu, iyepilu kuloi, yuguru gɔ le wagee bii ye pana womɔ bɛbɛɛdo.
Yaanran gɔi dibe balujɛ ye yaa ga, yuguru gɔ aŋa unrunmɔ le dibe dii gin’ turaa yaanran gɔ onu nɛ tiyaabe.
Kaa minɛ, yaanran gɔi yabaabe. Aŋa unrunmɔ gɔmaa, dibe dii, olunawan demɛrɛn aŋa womɔ le turaa tii gɔi miraanjɛ.
Olunawan demɛrɛn gɔ, yaanran gɔ le kinɛ ɛjii banraanbe. Wo yaanran gɔ unrunw wajunw, Ama tɔɔru gɔbe gɛlin gɔbe, Yesu dɛi sɛɛrɛ goin gɔbe, be le kɔmɔ taai yaabe.
Wo nɛudii diŋirun nɛ sɔsɔun diin kuu nɛ iŋiyaanbe.
Kɔɔ onu nɛ olunawan turu nɛudii nɛ wo goou mu iyaabɔn. Wo kɛlɛ kopɛlu sɛbe, kuu kosɔi sɛbe. Kɛlɛ womɔbe nɛ ɔgɔdomɔ pɛlu yabe. Kuu womɔbe nɛ Ama boi yamulu boibe yatɔŋɔbe.

Olunawan mu iyi gɔ, yunrun tɔgu turu le murin wɔɔ. Kubɔ womɔbe, olunawan urusu kubɔ gin’ bee. Aŋa womɔ yara aŋa gin’ bee. Olunawan demɛrɛn gɔ, gɔnrɔn unrunmɔ lee, ɔgɔdɔin unrunmɔ lee, paŋa diyɛ lee, wo bɛrɛ obaabe.
Olunawan gɔ kuu turu gɔ barumaa yinwɛndo ga bee. Kaa barumu yiun baa bee kɔɔ bajaai. Aduna gɔ puu wogɔ iyaa, be bɛrɛ maunɛ biyaa, olunawan gɔi dimiyaanbɛin.

Olunawan demɛrɛn gɔ, olunawan gɔ bɛrɛ paŋa wo obu dɛi, be olunawan demɛrɛn gɔi demɛniyɛnmaabɛin. Be iyaa olunawan gɔi demɛniyɛnmaa ɔn gin’ gɛɛubɛin: «Olunawan gɔ le murin wɔɔ baŋa gɔ yago wɔɔ? Aa wo le jaiyi bɛɛjɛ?»
Olunawan gɔ bɛrɛ kuu ulo sɔɔ sɔi lee, Ama boi yamulu sɔɔ sɔi lee aŋa obaaɲu. Iyepilu pɛnai lɛisigɛ birɛ womɔ birɛ ga, wo bɛrɛ paŋa obaaɲu.
Wo aŋa gɔmaa Amai duyɔ, boi womɔ yamala, yalu wo wɔɔ gɔ lee, alagala nɛ inɛw konɛ toin gɔbe lee dɛi sɔɔ mɔɲu sɔɔ, kanraunbe.
Ama inɛw le jai jaiyi ye bei gɔnrɔn ga paŋa wo bɛrɛ obaaɲu. Ginrun wooi lee, tɔgu wooi lee, sɔɔ wooi lee, gana wooi lee kuu nɛ paŋa wo bɛrɛ obaaɲu.
Iyaa minɛ nɛ inɛw wɔin puu, aduna maŋamɔ nɛ baa, inɛw boi bemɛ Peju Ii sɛnwin ɔnmɔ dɔn nɛ tɔŋɔnɛ gɔbe puu, woi dedemɛniyɛnmɔdɛin.
“Inɛ suguru too baŋa wo keŋiyɛn.
Inɛ waajibi kaju yoo ga wɔɔ gɔ, wo kaju yoyoodo. Inɛ waajibi polukaaba le daa ga wɔɔ gɔ, polukaaba le dadaadɛin. Ama inɛw gɔbe, ɛɛn go bii nɛ lee, gagawu nɛ lee, kijɛ dɛi biyɛun be jaan gɔ kɔɔ woi.”
Kɔɔ onu nɛ olunawan waja, minɛ nɛ gowaa wo wɛɛun mu iyaabɔn. Wo kɛlɛ lɛi, peju ii kɛlɛ murin yasɛbe. Olunawan demɛrɛn gɔ gin’ sɔɔ sɔɔube.
Olunawan pɔlɔ gɔ gɔnrɔn sɛɛ puu le, wo giru womɔ nɛ birɛ birɛjɛ. Wo minɛ lee, inɛw minɛ nɛ wɔin gɔ puu leei paŋa le olunawan pɔlɔ, barumaa yinwɛndo ga bee, kaa sɛɛu bajumui gɔi demɛniyɛnmɔmɔube.
Wo sɛɛrɛ diyɛ diyɛ kanraunbe. Halu inɛw be yɛnɛnu, alagala goi ye minɛ nɛ yaun sugomɔube.
Olunawan gɔ giru nɛ sɛɛrɛ kanran ga wo bɛrɛ gɔnrɔn obin gɔ le wo aduna nɛ inɛw toin gɔbei lelemɔjɛ. Be bɛrɛ sɔɔu, bemaa olunawan polukaaba le barumaa, yinwɛnlu gɔ dɛi dege yegere gɛɛube.
Dege gɔ sɔɔ sɔi bɛɛ ga, iyaa, inɛw woi demɛniyɛnmɔɔnɛ gɔbei dai bɛɛ ga, olunawan lɛiye gɔ bɛrɛ dege gɔi ɔnmɔi bojo paŋa obaaɲu.
Olunawan gɔ, inɛw puu bɛrɛ, inɛw diyɛnw sɛlɛ, dagunw sɛlɛ, ɔgɔ unrunw sɛlɛ, dɛgugunw sɛlɛ, gunɔw sɛlɛ, gunɔwin laain sɛlɛ, numɔ iin bemɛ nɛ ma, didimɛ bemɛ nɛ ma, sɛɛrɛ kunɔ kaaramɔube.
Iyaa inɛ turu kanran, olunawan gɔ sɛɛrɛ sɛlɛ go, tiyɛ gɔ, boi womɔ ma, boi womɔ le lugo tenɛjɛ gɔ ma sɛlɛ go, ebu ɛbɛ ma, dɔnrun dɔnrɔn ma, kara sɛbele.
Ɔn nɛ hakilɛ siyɛun jaain wɔɔ. Inɛ jugɔ sɛɛ gɔ, olunawan gɔ le lugo sɛgɛrɛjɛ gɔ iijɛ yɛnɛ. Sabu inɛ lugoi. Lugo womɔ gɔ suŋu kuloi, pɛlukuloi kuloisigɛ.
Kɔɔ onu nɛ mu yɛnaabɔn. Peju Ii gɔ Siɔn kokoo nɛ kohiŋɛ. Inɛw muɲu suŋu lee muɲu pɛnai naisigɛ wo le yabɛin. Boi womɔ lee, wo Ba boi lee didimɛ bemɛ nɛ yatɔŋɔbe.
Alagala gowaa soguru diyɛ, dii diyɛ soguru gin’, anrandagulu diyɛ soguru gin’ mu ɛgaabɔn. Soguru gɔ giŋiru baanw, giŋiru baaɲu gin’ wɔɔ.

Inɛw muɲu joo kɔɔbe ɔgɔdɔin gɔ lee, kijɛ ɔnmɔ nai gɔbe lee, inɛw naw gɔbe lee giru nɛ nii kana niiubɛin. Inɛw muɲu suŋu lee muɲu pɛnai naisigɛ, minɛ nɛ dɔrugin kɔɔbei laa go, inɛ turu kanran nii gɔ dee bɛɛbele.

Inɛw kɔɔbe, yaanw le unrunbei lɔgɔjiyɛmɔnɛ, sabu be yaanran inin. Be Peju Ii gɔ yalu yaajɛ wooi nɛ, woi dimiyɛnɲu. Inɛw logoro nɛ bei dɔrugaa, dɛnrɛn ii pɔlɔ gin’ Ama lee, Peju Ii gɔ lee bɛrɛ bei obin.
Iyaa aŋa bemɛ nɛ kakalu turu kanran tɛmɛmɔlu. Jarugu be le wɔlɔ.
Mu mɛlɛnkɛ waja alagala go ɛjii ulaa kiliyeu wo wɔu iyaabɔn. Wo Kibɛru Ɛju asuu wɔɔ aduna inɛw wooi, gana puu lee, ginrun puu lee, sɔɔ puu lee, tɔgu puu lee bɛrɛ tagaɲu yasɛbe.
Wo mii ɛɛn le sɔɔu gi: «Ama saliyɛ kiru waaru gɔ dɔwaai. Kodigɛu, Ama giri liyɛi, woi babai. Alagala lee, minɛ lee, nɛudii lee, diipujobe lee maŋanɛ gɔi demɛniyɛnmɔi.»
Mɛlɛnkɛ waja, lɛiye gɔ, pɔlɔ gɔi digiyaabe. Kijɛ wo gɛɛbe: «Wo numaai, wo numaai, Babilɔnɛ ana diyɛ, tɔgu gɔbe puu bɛrɛ sala mɔɲu womɔ resɛndii ilɛ ilɛ nɔɔmɔnɛ gɔ, wo numaai.»
Mɛlɛnkɛ waja, taaniye gɔ, bei digiyaa, mii diyɛ le kijɛ wo gɛɛbe: «Inɛ aai kanran, olunawan gɔ lee, dege womɔ leei demɛniyɛnmaa, iyaa, didimɛ womɔ nɛ ma, numɔ womɔ nɛ ma, sɛɛrɛ biyaa wɔɔ baŋa gɔ,
wo kanran, Ama kinɛbanrun resɛndii ilɛ sumɔla go kinɛbanrun gelu womɔ nɛ kunaaɲu gɔ nɔnɔɔdo. Iyaa mɛlɛnkɛ ɛjaain gɔbe giru nɛ lee, Peju Ii gɔ giru nɛ lee, wo yaun lee, sidu lee nɛ ɛjii ɔhɔɲɔdo.
Yaun bei ɔɲɔmɔjɛ kukumɔ gɔ asuu nasuu uhulodo. Iyaa be inɛw olunawan gɔ lee, dege womɔ lee demɛniyɛnmɔw gɔbe, inɛ aai kanran olunawan gɔ boi sɛɛrɛ biyaajɛ gɔ, be aga lee, digɛ lee deeliye sɛnɛ.»
Ama inɛw, Ama tɔɔru gɔbe gɛliyɛɲu gɔbe lee, Yesu nɛ gagawu bemɛ kɔɔlɔmɔnɛ gɔbe lee, kijɛ dɛi ɛɛn go be biyɛun jaan gɔ kɔɔ woi.
