Kɔɔ onu nɛ alagala gowaa mu mii ɛgaabɔn, kijɛ gɛɛbe: «Sɔɔ ɔn tɔŋɔ: ‘Kanɛ baa Inɛw Baŋa nɛ tou inɛw yinwɛnɲu gɔbe, Ama be yabu.’ » Ama Kikinu saa gi: «Narain, be ɔɲɛ bemɛ nɛ dedeeliyedɛin, sabu birɛ ɛju bemɛ onu bemɛ nɛ yadimiyɛndo.»
Iyaa mu yɛnaa, kulumɔ pilu kowɔɔ. Kulumɔ gɔ kuu nɛ, kijɛ ɔnmɔ turu, Adama ii murin yadaanbe. Kuu womɔ nɛ kange ɔgɔdomɔ yatobe, numɔ womɔ nɛ kɔrɔgoi sii yatobe.
Mɛlɛnkɛ waja Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ gowaa, kulumɔ kuu nɛ daan baŋa gɔ le mii diyɛ le kɔnwɔunbe: «Kɔrɔgoi uwɔ tiyaa ye gɛlu gɛlɛ. Sabu minɛ dɛnrɛn gɔ ilaai, gɛlu gɛlɛɲu waaru dɔwaai.»
Kɔɔ waaru le kulumɔ kuu nɛ daan baŋa gɔ kɔrɔgoi unrunmɔ minɛ nɛ gaanaabe. Minɛ gɛlaabɛin.
Mɛlɛnkɛ waja alagala nɛ Ama Ginrun Diyɛ wɔɔ gɔ nɛ gowaabe. Wo kanran kɔrɔgoi sii turu yasɛbe.
Mɛlɛnkɛ waja, mɛlɛnkɛ yaun kuu nɛ paŋa sɛɛ, sadagadumu gɔ nɛ gowaa kɔrɔgoi sii sɛɛ baŋa gɔ le mii diyɛ le sɔwaa gi: «Kɔrɔgoi sii uwɔ tiyaa ye, minɛ resɛn tuɲɔ gɔbe kɛjɛ, sabu resɛn gɔbe ilaain.»
Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ kɔrɔgoi womɔ minɛ nɛ gaanaabe. Wo minɛ resɛn na gɔbe gɛlaa, resɛn gɔ Ama kinɛbanrun resɛn ii yalu namaɲu diyɛ gɔ nɛ kamaa kunaabe.
Resɛn ii gɔ, ana laara go resɛn ii yalu namaɲu gɔ nɛ namaabɛin. Resɛn ii yalu namaɲu gɔ nɛ ili gowaa bumaa kilomɛtɛrɛ suŋu taanu yai. Totoo womɔ minɛ nɛ gowaai ye sɔun karumu nɛ dɔɔube.
Kɔɔ onu nɛ mu alagala nɛ sɛɛrɛ waja, sɛɛrɛ diyɛ, iyaa maunɛ wɔɔ iyaabɔn: Mɛlɛnkɛ kosɔi, jaabu sɔi gɛliyaa bɛin. Mɔɲu dumɔrɔn gɔbe bei, sabu Ama kinɛbanrun gɔ be le digɛnu kibedo.

Mu wɛɛrɛ nɛudii gin’ iyaabɔn. Yaun le bariyaa bee gin’ wɔɔ. Olunawan gɔ lee, dege womɔ lee, boi womɔ le lugo sɛgɛrɛjɛ gɔ lee kuu nɛ gɔnrɔn biyaaɲu bɛɛnw gɔbe, nɛudii gɔ kuu nɛ iŋiyaan bɛin. Ama giŋiru gɔbe numɔ bemɛ nɛ yato.
Be Ama birɛbirɛnɛ Mɔise nii gɔ lee, Peju Ii nii gɔ lee niiubɛin: «Inɛw Baŋa Ama kɔmɔnumɔbe kuu baŋa gɔ, birɛ uwɔ gɔbe gaai wɔin, ɛjunaa gabaain. Ganabe ɔgɔnɛ, oju uwɔbe teitai wɔin, narain.
Inɛw Baŋa, inɛ aa ui liyɛɛlɛ, boi uwɔ sɔmɔɔlɛ wɔɔ? Sabu u turu sai ɛjaa wɔɔ. Gana gɔbe wooi wɛi ye, giru uwɔ nɛ ui dedemɛniyɛnmɔdɛin. Sabu birɛ teitai uwɔ gɔbe iyemaajɛ.»
Kɔɔ onu nɛ mu yɛnaa, alagala nɛ Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ, tiyɛ gɔ aaru guju kuru Ama Ginrun gɔ pinɛlaai.
Mɛlɛnkɛ kosɔi, jaabu sɔi gɛlɛbɛin gɔbe Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ gowaabɛin. Be lɛn sɔi tɔitɔi ɛju doorojɛ kunaa bɛin. Gegeɲɛ bemɛ nɛ kange tɛmu pagaa sɛbɛin.
Kijɛ ɔnmɔ nai gɔbe logoro nɛ turu baŋa, mɛlɛnkɛ sɔi gɔbe bɛrɛ kange dii gelu kosɔi obaabe. Ama asuu nasuu wɔɔ kinɛbanrun konɛ jooi bee.
Kɔɔ wo biyaa, Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ, Ama dooro lee, Ama gɔnrɔn lee digɛu, kukumɔ le jooi biyaabe. Mɛlɛnkɛ kosɔi jaabu sɔi gɔbe kibeido baa, inɛ turu kanran Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ yoi bɛɛbele.
Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ mii diyɛ gowaa, mɛlɛnkɛ gɔbe le ɔn gin’ gɛɛu wo wɔu mu ɛgaabɔn: «Yaai, Ama kinɛbanrun diikɔrɔi kosɔi gɔbe minɛ nɛ togo tii.»
Mɛlɛnkɛ pɔlɔ gɔ yaa, gelu womɔ nɛ kijɛ too gɔ minɛ nɛ togaa tii. Inɛw olunawan gɔ sɛɛrɛ sɛin, dege womɔ demɛniyɛnmi gɔbe goju nɛ mirun mɔɲu tɛugu gowaabe.
Mɛlɛnkɛ lɛiye gɔ, gelu womɔ nɛ kijɛ too gɔ nɛudii nɛ togaa kunu. Nɛudii gɔ inɛ yiun ili gin’ biyaai. Kijɛ ɔnmɔ nɛudii nɛ tobɛin puu yinwaain.
Mɛlɛnkɛ taaniye gɔ, gelu womɔ nɛ kijɛ too gɔ dibebe lee, diipujobe lee nɛ togaa kunu. Wogɔbe ili taŋaai.
Mɛlɛnkɛ dii baŋa gɔ ɔn gin’ wo sɔɔu mu ɛgaabɔn: «U yɔɔ baŋa gɔ, yabe baŋa gɔ, u ɛjaa wɔɔ baŋa gɔ, ɔn gin’ saliyɛ u kiru gɔ digɛu, u teitai wɔu.
Sabu be Ama inɛw ili togaabɛin, inɛw Ama titiyaanw ili togaabɛin. U kanran, bemaa ili nɔɔ ga, be bɛrɛ obaajɛu. Wogɔ be le dagaa wɔɔ.»
Kɔɔ onu nɛ mu sadagadumu mii gɔ ɛgaabɔn, sɔwaa gi: «Inɛw Baŋa Ama kɔmɔnumɔbe kuu baŋa gɔ, naran go saliyɛ uwɔ gɔbe narain, teitai wɔin.»
Mɛlɛnkɛ naiye gɔ, gelu womɔ nɛ kijɛ too gɔ nai nɛ togaa kɔɔru. Nai, yaun womɔ le inɛwin tɛgɛ gɔnrɔn biyaabe.
Kunrin nai uju diyɛ inɛwin tɛgaabe. Be Ama, mɔɲu kɔɔ kuu nɛ paŋa sɛɛ baŋa gɔi duyaabɛin. Be bana bemɛ duliyemɔ ye woi babanɛ.
Mɛlɛnkɛ numɔrɔnye gɔ, gelu womɔ nɛ kijɛ too gɔ olunawan gɔ ɔgɔdɔin nɛ togaa tiyaabe. Olunawan gɔ laamu, yalu puu ɔlɔi biyaai. Inɛw goju jiun dɛi ninɛ bemɛ tɛnwɛunbɛin.
Tɛu bemɛ lee, mirun bemɛ lee dɛi, be alagala Ama gɔi duyaabɛin. Bana bemɛ duliyemɔ ye, kanran mɔɲu bemɛ paja ga yabanɛ.
Mɛlɛnkɛ kuloiye gɔ, gelu womɔ nɛ kijɛ too gɔ Eparate dibe diyɛ gɔ nɛ togaa kunaabe. Duu sibɛ go goi ye ɔgɔnw wɛɛnw gɔbe bɛrɛ oju yegere ga dii gɔ paain.
Olunawan demɛrɛn gɔ aŋa nɛ lee, olunawan gɔ aŋa nɛ lee, iyaa inɛ titiyainɛ kakaluginɛ gɔ aŋa nɛ lee, kikinu mɔɲu taanu, tɔru murin biyaa, goou be wɔu iyaabɔn.
Wogɔbe jinrunbe kikinui. Sɛɛrɛ taanrinyɛn kanranwin. Iyaa be aduna ɔgɔnw puu bɛrɛ yayaaɲu, Ama, gɔnrɔn wooi sɛɛ baŋa bai diyɛ gɔ le kɔmɔ taaidɛin gɔ dɛi bei mɔmɔɔnɔɲu.
Inɛw Baŋa sɔwaa gi: «Yɛnɛ, mu gugunyɔnnɛ gin’ wɛɛjɔn. Inɛ giri yeiyelu go biyaa, unrun sɔi tolo go yaanɔu ga, inɛw giru nɛ dɔgɔ iyenɔu ga, sɔi unrunmɔbe gɛliyaa wɔɔ baŋa gɔ, Ama wo yabu.»
Jinrun kɔɔbe, ɔgɔnw gɔbei yalu turu nɛ mɔɔnaabɛin. Heburu sɔɔ le yalu gɔ boi Harumagedɔn gɛɛɲu.
Mɛlɛnkɛ sɔiye gɔ, gelu womɔ nɛ kijɛ too gɔ wɛwɛi nɛ togu. Ama Ginrun Diyɛ gɔ nɛ, ɔgɔdɔin gɔ nɛ gowaa, mii diyɛ ɛgɛmaa, sɔwaa gi: «Kanraan kilaai.»
Anrangiriyenube lee, siɲɛbe lee, anrandagulube lee, minɛjigu diyɛ lee biyaabe. Aduna nɛ inɛw mɔii nɛ, minɛjigu kɔɔ tɔgu biyɛtɛlu, puu dɛi mɔɲu bee.
Ana diyɛ gɔ gamulu taanu kɛjiyaabe. Ganabe ana gɔbe puu numaai. Ama, Babilɔnɛ ana diyɛ gɔ bɛrɛ kinɛbanrun diyɛ unrunmɔ resɛndii ilɛ gelu gɔ obodo ga woi naŋaraanbe.
Gana dii gɔŋaa gɛlɛ gɔbe puu manaai. Kokoo gɔbe yaa iyemɔlu.
Anransaŋaran diyɛ diyɛ, dedemɛ bemɛ kilo pɛnainai baa, alagala gowaa inɛw kuu nɛ sugaabɛin. Inɛw, anransaŋaran yanwan gɔ dɛi Amai duyaabɛin, sabu yanwan gɔ mɔɲuniyaan gabaai.
Kɔɔ onu nɛ mɛlɛnkɛ dii gelu kosɔi gɛlɛbɛin gɔbe logoro nɛ, turu wiyaa mu le sɔwaa gi: «Wɛɛ, yaanran dimu le kayanɛ diyɛ, dibe joo genɛ nɛ daan gɔ kuu nɛ jarugu duurin gɔ, mu u bɛrɛ tatagaradɔn.
Aduna ɔgɔnw gɔbe wo le sala salaabɛin, iyaa aduna inɛw gɔbe sala womɔ kɔɲɔ nɔwaan bimiliyaabɛin.»

Ama Kikinu kuu ma nɛ wo sugaa, mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ mui jeɲaa olusolo nɛ jɛyaabe. Yaanran turu olunawan banrun kuu nɛ dɛinyaan wo wɔu iyaabɔn. Olunawan gɔ goju puu nɛ Ama boi yamulu boibe tɔŋaa bee. Wo kuu sɔi, kɛlɛ pɛlu sɛbe.

Yaanran gɔ sɔi banrun dɔnrun diyɛ gɔ lee, sɔi banrun waja lee arugoii tobe. Kange lee, tibu dɔnrun diyɛ lee, tibu dɔnrun diyɛ dugɔi lee le unruin saŋaraan bee. Numɔ womɔ le wo kange dii gelu, kijɛ dɔgɔgu lee, sala womɔ lɔgɔ lee joonaa, yasɛbe.
Didimɛ womɔ nɛ boi tiyɛ babaŋa yatɔŋɔbe gi: “Dimu le kayanw lee, aduna sɔɔ dɔgɔgu lee na Babilɔnɛ ana diyɛ gɔ.”
Yaanran kɔɔ, Ama inɛw ili lee, Yesu dɛi iŋiyaan yinwin ili lee le bimiliyaa wo wɔu mu iyaabɔn. Woi iyaa, mu bɛrɛ saii maunɛ kanraanbe.
Kɔɔ gin’ wo biyaa, mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ mu le sɔwaa gi: «Inge dɛi ui maunɛ kanranmɔuwɔu? Mu yaanran gɔ lee, olunawan woi duiyaa, kuu sɔi, kɛlɛ pɛlu sɛɛ gɔ lee, sɔɔ boŋurun bemɛ u bɛrɛ tatagadɔn.

Olunawan u iyi gɔ ɔnmɔi yabe, kaa kanɛ wɔlɔ. Wo bonɔ too dumɔ sɛlɛ gɔ nɛ goi ye suiyiyaado. Aduna inɛw, aduna maŋi le baa, boi bemɛ ɔnmɔ dɔn nɛ tɔŋɔnɛ gɔbe, olunawan gɔ ɔnmɔi bee, kaa wɔlɔ, pilemu ye ihiyemɔdo dɛi, woi iyaa ye be bɛrɛ maunɛ biyɛdo.
«Yalu ɔn nɛ hakilɛ sɔɔ paamu kanrun obojɛ gɔ siyɛun jaain wɔɔ: Kuu sɔi gɔbe, kokoo kosɔii. Yaanran gɔ, kokoo wogɔbe kuu nɛ daan. Wogɔ iyaa ɔgɔnw kosɔii.
Numɔrɔn gɔbe numaa galaain, koturu gɔ kanɛ woi wɔɔ, waja gɔ nimɛ wɛɛlu. Waaru wo wiyaa, wo waaru gaila sai biyɛdo.
Olunawan ɔnmɔi bee, kaa wɔlɔ wɔɔ gɔ, kuu womɔ le wo ɔgɔnɛ gagaraye gɔi. Wo iyaa ɔgɔnw sɔi gɔbe logoro nɛ ɔgɔnɛ turui. Wo suiyi nɛ yaajɛ.
«Kɛlɛ pɛlu u iyi gɔ ɔgɔnw pɛlui. Be nimɛ kanran laamu bɛɛnɛ. Kaa olunawan gɔ le bariyaa ye, lɛɛrɛ turu nɛ ɔgɔwin biyɛ ga, be wogɔ paŋa bɛbɛɛdɛin.
Be wooi puu ajubu turu gɔi sɛin. Iyaa be gɔnrɔn bemɛ lee, paŋa bemɛ lee, olunawan gɔ numɔ nɛ papajadɛin.
Be Peju Ii gɔ le kɔmɔ tataadɛin. Kaa Peju Ii gɔ inɛw baŋabe wooi Inɛw Baŋai, ɔgɔnw wooi Ɔgɔnɛi digɛu, wo, inɛw boonaaɲu, yɛmaaɲu, sɔɔ turu bɛɛnwin womɔbe le kuu bemɛ nɛ gɔnrɔn bɛbɛɛdo.»
Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ iyaa mu le sɔwaa gi: «Dibe joo u iye gɔ, yaanran dimu le kayanɛ yalu daan gɔ, wogɔbe tɔgubei, inɛw joobei, ganabei, iyaa sɔɔbei.
Kɛlɛ pɛlu u iyi gɔ lee, olunawan gɔ lee, be yaanran dimu le kayanɛ gɔi ihibiliyɛdɛin. Be kijɛ womɔ puu pɔnɔrɔn ye goju ije le woi pajadɛin. Nawan womɔ tɛnwɛn ye, yaun le woi tɛgɛrɛdɛin.
Sabu Ama bemaa kijɛ unrun kɛjaajɛ gɔ kanran ga, kinɛ bemɛ nɛ kunaabe. Kunrin, be wooi puu ajubu turu le bii ye, Ama sɔɔ gɔbe kibeido baa, ɔgɔ paŋa bemɛ gɔ olunawan gɔ numɔ nɛ paja ga yabaabɛin.
«Nɛɛ yaanran u iyi gɔ, wogɔ ana diyɛ, aduna ɔgɔnw kuu nɛ laamu kanranjɛ gɔi.»
Kɔɔ onu nɛ mɛlɛnkɛ waja, alagala gowaa wo sugou mu iyaabɔn. Wo paŋa diyɛ yasɛbe. Dooro womɔ minɛi wijɛmaabe.
Wo mii ɛɛn le sɔwaa gi: «Wo numaai, wo numaai, Babilɔnɛ ana diyɛ gɔ numaai. Wo jinrunbe ginruin taŋaai, kikinu mɔɲu puu yalu babaŋi taŋaai, iyaa sasaa mɔɲu, inɛw ibɛlain puu yalu babaŋi taŋaai.
Sabu tɔgu gɔbe puu sala mɔɲu womɔ kɔɲɔ gɔ nɔwaanbɛin. Aduna ɔgɔnw gɔbe wo le sala salaabɛin. Iyaa, aduna tɔŋutɔŋɔw gɔbe, kijɛ sigɛ dɛnu dadaaru womɔ dɛi ɔgɔ ulaabɛin.»
Mu mii waja alagala gowaa ɛgaabɔn, gi: «Tɔgu ma inɛw gɔbe, hakɛ womɔbe nɛ mɔrinyɛnnɔu ga, tujɔ mɔɲu womɔ nɛ gamulu siyɛnɔu ga, e logoro womɔ nɛ gooi.
Sabu hakɛ womɔ gɔbe siŋiyaan alagala go dɔwaai. Teitai laa birɛ womɔbe, Ama naŋaraanjɛ.
Wo tuju gin’ wo bɛrɛ tujɔi, kanran wo kanrun sɔɔrɔ lɛi, wo bɛrɛ kanrun tujɔi. Gelu womɔ nɛ togaa wo kunu sɔɔrɔ lɛi gin’ paŋa sɛɛ togo kunɔi.
Kuu womɔ unaa, ɛɛlu nɛ bana wo toii gin’, ɔɲɛ lee, bɔnrɔn pii lee, kɔɔ gin’ wo bɛrɛ oboi. Sabu kinɛ womɔ nɛ kijɛ wo gɛɛjɛ: ‘Mu ɔgɔyaanrain daaun. Yapanunɛi laaun, bɔnrɔn pii asuu iyeidolɔn.’
Kɔɔ sabu dɛi, ɔɲɛ womɔbe bai turu sai nɛ wɛɛdo: Yiun lee, bɔnrɔn pii lee, giyɛ lee. Iyaa yaun woi tɛgɛ ye dodonugodo. Sabu Inɛw Baŋa Ama, saliyɛ womɔ kirɛnɛ gɔ, wo gɔnrɔn yasɛ.
«Aduna ɔgɔnw wo le sala nɛ yoin gɔbe, wo le ɛju kayin gɔbe puu woi tɛgurin kukumɔ gɔ iyaa ye wo dɛi pii pii ye tɔɔnrɔn tɔtɔɔnrɔndɛin.
Be ɔɲɛ womɔ liliyɛ dɛi wo le wagee iŋi ye kijɛ be gɛɛido: ‘Koi amasɔgɔi, Babilɔnɛ diyɛ gɔ, ana paŋagu gɔ, uwɔ amasɔgɔi. Lɛɛrɛ turu nɛ sai jarugu uwɔ kuu uwɔ nɛ sugaai.’
«Aduna tɔŋutɔŋɔw gɔbe yaa wo dɛi pii pii, tɔɔnrɔn tɔɔnrɔn kakanrandɛin. Sabu inɛ turu kanran tɔŋu bemɛ kijɛ turu kanran ɛbɛidolo.

Kange wee, sarudu wee, tibu dɔnrun diyɛ wee, tibu dɔnrun diyɛ dugɔi wee, sɔi dɔnrun diyɛ diyɛ, lɛn sɔi gɛɛɲu gɔ wee, sɔi banrun gɔ wee, kaja sɔi gɔ wee, sɔi banrun waja wee, iyaa tiun jiɲu ɛju tɔgu dɛin dɛin wee, gelu tɔgu dɛin dɛin, duŋu tɔnrɔn le yegeraaɲu, baga dɔnrun diyɛ le yegeraaɲu, mɛnu le yegeraaɲu, inrun le yegeraaɲu, tibu ɔnrɔnnu le yegeraaɲu wee,

iyaa, kijɛ jiɲu ɛju kanɛlu gɛɛɲu gɔ wee, kijɛ jiɲu ɛju waja wee, uguru jiɲu ɛju wee, kijɛ jiɲu ɛju miire gɛɛɲu gɔ wee, mɔi jiɲu ɛju wee, iyaa resɛndii ilɛ wee, nii wee, alukama wee, alukama punau wee, iyaa naa wee, peju wee, sɔun wee, wogotoro wee, gunɔw wee, tiyɛ gɔ inɛw wee, puu inɛ ɛbɛido biyɛidolo.
Tɔŋutɔŋɔw kɔɔbe ana gɔ le kijɛ be gɛɛido: ‘Kijɛ daariyaa bɛi u ibɛbe gɔ puu u le wageniyaain. Arusɛgɛ uwɔ lee, dooro uwɔ lee manaai, waja asuu bei pilemu ye bɛɛidolou.’
Ana kɔɔ nɛ tɔŋu tɔŋɔu wɔu, inɛw ɔgɔ ulin gɔbe, ɔɲɛ womɔ liliyɛ dɛi wo le wagee ihiŋiyɛndɛin. Be pii pipiidɛin, tɔɔnrɔn tɔtɔɔnrɔndɛin.

Kijɛ be gɛɛido: ‘Koi amasɔgɔi, ana diyɛ lɛn sɔi gɛɛɲu lee, sɔi banrun dɔnrun diyɛ gɔ lee, sɔi banrun waja lee goriyenɛ gɔ, kange lee, tibu dɔnrun diyɛ lee, tibu dɔnrun diyɛ dugɔi gɔ lee le unruin saŋarannɛ gɔ, amasɔgɔi.
Lɛɛrɛ turu nɛ sai bɛɛ diyɛ kɔɔ puu suyaatin.’ «Diikoro jɔbɔmɔw gɔ puu lee, inɛw diikoro gɔ nɛ yoi yaanw puu lee, diikoro birɛbirɛnw gɔ lee, nɛudii kuu nɛ pana bemɛ dɛnɛw puu lee, wagee iŋiyaan wɔnu
woi tɛgurin kukumɔ gɔ iyaa ye, kijɛ be gɛɛido: ‘Ana diyɛ ɔn le ana tunwɔnɲu wɔlɔ.’

Be kuu bemɛ nɛ minɛ balu balu tiinu, pii piinu, tɔɔnrɔn tɔɔnrɔnnu, kɔnwɔnnu gɛgɛɛdɛin: ‘Koi amasɔgɔi, Babilɔnɛ ana diyɛ gɔ, nɛudii kuu nɛ inɛw diikoro sɛbɛin puu bɛɛ womɔ le ɔgɔ uloubɛin gɔ, womɔ amasɔgɔi. Lɛɛrɛ turu nɛ sai woi kooliyaai.’
«U alagala, woi jɔgaatin dɛi kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔ. E kanran Ama inɛw gɔbe, Yesu jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu gɔbe, inɛw Ama titiyaanw gɔbe, kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔi. Sabu mɔɲu e bɛrɛ wo kanrun gɔ dɛi Ama saliyɛ womɔ kiraati.»
Kɔɔ waaru le mɛlɛnkɛ gɔnrɔn sɛɛ turu, tibu turu yuuna diyɛ naa diyɛ gin’ jeɲaa, nɛudii nɛ kamaa kunɔu kijɛ wo gi: «Babilɔnɛ ana diyɛ gɔi ɔn gin’ paŋa le kama tiidɛin. Waja asuu woi iyemɔidolo.
Uwɔ nɛ waja asuu giŋiru baanw mii ma, nii niiw mii ma, keresujɔnw ma, kansujɔnw ma mii ɛgɛmɔidolo. Numɔbiru birɛnw tɔgu turu kanran uwɔ nɛ tɛmɛmɔidolo. Yuuna soguru turu kanran ɛgɛmɔidolo.
Lanpa yaun, asuu uwɔ nɛ dooriyeidolo, akana lee yakana lee mii ɛgɛmɔidolo. Sabu tɔŋutɔŋɔw uwɔbe aduna inɛw diyɛnw gɔ bei bee. Tɔgu gɔbe puu dugu uwɔ le leliyaain.
Iyaa inɛw Ama titiyaanw lee, Ama inɛw lee, aduna nɛ inɛw dain puu lee, ili bemɛ ana kɔɔ nɛ tɛmɛmaabe.»
Kɔɔ onu nɛ mu mɔɔnu diyɛ mii gin’, alagala nɛ ɛgaabɔn, gi: «Aleluya, yayabu gɔ lee, dooro gɔ lee, gɔnrɔn gɔ lee, Ama emɛ mɔi.

Sabu saliyɛ kiru womɔbe narain, teitai wɔin. Yaanran dimu le kayanɛ diyɛ sala womɔ le adunai yamalau bee gɔ kuu nɛ jarugu duuraati. Ama, yaanran gɔ bɛrɛ birɛbirɛnw unrunmɔ ili selumaa, duguru bemɛ gowaati.»
Be iyaa kɔnwaan, gin: «Aleluya, woi tɛgurin kukumɔ gɔ asuu nasuu uhulodo.»
Inɛw naw pɛɛlɛi naisigɛ gɔbe lee, kijɛ ɔnmɔ nai gɔbe lee tuŋiyaan, Ama, ɔgɔdɔin nɛ daan baŋa gɔi demɛniyɛnmaabɛin. Kijɛ be gi: «Amina, Aleluya.»
Mii turu, ɔgɔdɔin gɔ nɛ gowaa, gi: «E, Ama emɛ birɛbirɛnw gɔ puu, giri womɔ liyɛnw, diyɛnw lee, dagunw lee, woi sɔmɔi.»
Kɔɔ onu nɛ, mu mɔɔnu diyɛ mii gin’, dii diyɛ soguru gin’, anrandagulu diyɛ gin’, ɛgaabɔn, gi: «Aleluya, Inɛw Baŋa Ama kɔmɔnumɔbe kuu baŋa gɔ laamu kanraunwɔ.
Peju Ii purupagu gɔ dɔwaai, yakana womɔ unruin yegeraati. Kɔɔ sabu dɛi kinɛ ɛɛliyɛmɔmɔi, kinɛ ɛɛlu diyɛ le biyɛmɔi, Amai babamɔi.
Lɛn sɔi tɔitɔi doorojɛ ɛju gɔ kunɔ ga wo bɛrɛ obaaɲu.» Lɛn sɔi gɔ, wogɔ Ama inɛw gɔbe birɛ teitai gɔbei.
Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ mu le sɔwaa gi: «Sɔɔ ɔn tɔŋɔ: ‘Peju Ii purupagu jaa kaya ga inɛw boonaaɲu gɔbe, Ama be yabu.’ » Wo iyaa gi: «Kɔɔ Ama sɔɔ tɔitɔii.»

Mu mɛlɛnkɛ gɔi demɛniyɛnmɔ ga, kubɔsɔrɔ womɔ nɛ numaa sugaabɔn. Kaa wo mu le sɔwaa gi: «Kɔɔ kanrannɔu, u lee, u ba unrunw, Yesu dɛi sɛɛrɛ goin gɔbe lee, mu birɛbirɛnɛ e bɔɔnɛi. Ama demɛniyɛnmɔ. Yesu sɛɛrɛ goojɛ gɔ, inɛw Ama titiyaanw, gɔnrɔn le sɔɔ be sɔɔjɛ gɔ woi.»
Kɔɔ onu nɛ alagala pinɛlaa wo wɔu mu iyaabɔn. Sɔun pilu turu kowɔɔ. Kuu womɔ nɛ yaŋa baŋa gɔ boi Sɔɔ Turu Baŋa lee, Naran Baŋa lee gɛɛɲu. Wo teitai le saliyɛ kirɛjɛ, kɔmɔ taajɛ.
Giri womɔbe yaun bijei, kuu womɔ nɛ ɔgɔdomɔ joo yato. Wo nɛ boi turu yatɔŋɔbe, woi laa ye inɛ turu kanran boi wogɔ inɛɛ.
Wo arugoi ili nɛ sowaaɲui tobe. Boi womɔ Ama Sɔɔ gɛɛɲu.
Kɔmɔtaanw alagala nɛ wɔin gɔbe sɔun pilube kuu nɛ yaŋiyaan, onu womɔ nɛ yadimɛbɛin. Be lɛn sɔi tɔitɔi pilii wɔɔi tobɛin.
Aŋa womɔ nɛ polukaaba sii gooube. Wo wogɔ le tɔgu gɔbei gɔnrɔndo. Wo inrun sɔsɔru le bei girɛdo. Iyaa Ama kɔmɔnumɔbe kuu baŋa kinɛbanrun diyɛ resɛn ii yalu namaɲu gɔ nɛ yoi ye nanamado.
Arugoi womɔ nɛ lee, paga womɔbe nɛ lee boi yatɔŋɔ, gi: “Ɔgɔnw wooi Ɔgɔnɛ, inɛw baŋabe wooi Inɛw Baŋa.”
Mu mɛlɛnkɛ turu, nai kuu nɛ wo iŋɛu iyaabɔn. Wo sasaa alagala go ɛjii ulaa kiliyeu bɛin gɔbe puu le mii ɛɛn le kɔnwaan gi: «Wɛɛi, Ama pana yegeraajɛ gɔ dɛi wɛɛ mɔrinyɛin.

Ɔgɔnw yiun lee, kɔmɔ tai giru tonw yiun lee, kɔmɔ yai nɛ boi gowaa wɔin yiun lee, sɔun nawan lee, kuu bemɛ nɛ yaŋabɛin yiun lee, inɛw gunɔ tonɛ ma, yatoin ma, diyɛnw ma, dagunw ma, inɛw puu yiun le wɛɛ pana ebe kunɔi.»
Kɔɔ onu nɛ olunawan gɔ lee, aduna ɔgɔnw lee, kɔmɔtaanw bemɛ le mɔrinyaan, sɔun kuu nɛ yaŋa baŋa lee, kɔmɔtaanw womɔ lee le kɔmɔ taadɛin ga be wɔu mu iyaabɔn.

Olunawan gɔi aaɲu. Inɛ titiyainɛ kakaluginɛ, giru womɔ nɛ sɛɛrɛ diyɛ diyɛ kanraun bee gɔi yaa wo le aaɲu. Olunawan gɔ sɛɛrɛ inɛw sɛin gɔbe, dege womɔ inɛw demɛniyɛnmɔw gɔbe, wo sɛɛrɛ diyɛ diyɛ kɔɔbe le bei lelemɔube. Be lɛi kɛu puu, ɔnmɔ go sidu yaun bonɔ wanu diyɛ nɛ kamaa kuni.
Sɔun kuu nɛ yaŋa baŋa aŋa nɛ polukaaba goobe gɔ, wajunw gɔ puui daati. Sasaa gɔbe puu nawan bemɛ le bɛrɛ unrunbemɛ joonaabɛin.
Kɔɔ onu nɛ, alagala gowaa mɛlɛnkɛ turu wo sugou mu iyaabɔn. Wo bonɔ too dumɔ sɛlɛ gɔ taan ii lee, yɔgu diyɛ lee, numɔ womɔ le yagɛlɛbe.
Wo, olunawan demɛrɛn gɔ, pɔɔlɔ baa yuguru kɔɔ, jinrun puu kuu baŋa gɔ, Setanu gɔ aa, anranguju muɲu dɛi kɔmaa boju.

Wo bonɔ too dumɔ sɛlɛ gɔ nɛ woi kamaa kunaabe. Anranguju muɲu gɔ yai kibe baa, waja womaa tɔgu gɔbei lelemɔnɔu ga, mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ, bonɔ too gɔ kuu womɔ nɛ pinaa, sɛɛrɛ kunaa boju. Anranguju muɲu gɔ galaai ye, waaru gaila dɛi woi goomɔu jaain wɔɔ.

Kɔɔ onu nɛ mu ɔgɔdɔinbe iyaabɔn. Ɔgɔdɔin gɔbe nɛ inɛw daanbɛin gɔbe bɛrɛ saliyɛ kiru gɔnrɔn obaaɲu. Yesu dɛi sɛɛrɛ goi lee, Ama sɔɔ lee dɛi inɛw kuu polin gɔbe, inɛw olunawan gɔi demɛniyɛnmɔnɛ, dege womɔi demɛniyɛnmɔnɛ, didimɛ bemɛ nɛ ma, numɔ bemɛ nɛ ma, sɛɛrɛ womɔ sɛnɛ gɔbe, mu kikinu bemɛ iyaabɔn. Inɛw kɔɔbe bulaa gowaa, anranguju muɲu, Kirisito le laamu kanraanbɛin.
Wogɔ yiun bulogu pɔlɔ gɔi. Yiun wajunw gɔbe, anranguju muɲu gɔ wo kibeido baa bulonɛ.

Inɛw yiun bulogu pɔlɔ gɔ nɛ toin gɔbe, Ama be yabu, iyaa Ama inɛwin. Yiun lɛiye gɔ kuu bemɛ nɛ gɔnrɔn sɛlɛ, kaa sadagadɔɔnɔwin Ama lee, Kirisito lee dɛi biyɛdɛin. Iyaa be wo le anranguju muɲu laamu kakanrandɛin.
Anranguju muɲu gɔbe galaain ye, Setanui kaju womɔ yalu nɛ gogoomɔdɛin.
Wo yai ye, aduna sibɛ nai gana gɔbe, Gɔgu lee, Magɔgu lee lelemɔ ye kɔmɔ dɛi mɔmɔɔnɔdo. Be nɛudii diŋirun sɔsɔun gin’ jooi biyɛdɛin.
Be minɛ kale wooi nɛ ginɛ ye yayaadɛin. Be Ama inɛw gɔ yalu biyɛidɛin gɔ lee, ana diyɛ Ama dɛnɛjɛ gɔ lee gɔgɔŋɔdɛin. Kaa yaun alagala goi sugo ye bei tɛnwɛnjɛɛdo.

Jinrun puu kuu baŋa, bei lelemɔu bee gɔi sidu yaun bonɔ wanu diyɛ, olunawan gɔ lee, inɛ titiyainɛ kakaluginɛ gɔ lee toiyoidɛin gɔ nɛ kamaa kunaabɛin. Be kɔɔ nɛ aga lee, digɛ lee asuu nasuu ɔɲɔnu biyɛdɛin.
Kɔɔ onu nɛ mu ɔgɔdɔin diyɛ pilu lee, kuu womɔ nɛ daan baŋa gɔ lee iyaabɔn. Minɛ lee, alagala lee, giru womɔ nɛ jɔbaain. Be dɛi yalu bɛɛmɔlu.

Kɔɔ onu nɛ mu yiunbe, diyɛnw gɔbe lee, dagunw gɔbe lee, ɔgɔdɔin gɔ giru nɛ be iŋɛu iyaabɔn. Dɔnbe pinɛlaabɛin. Dɔn waja koturu pinɛlaabɛin. Ɔnmɔ dɔn gɔ woi. Yiun gɔbe saliyɛ, birɛ bemɛ le kɛukɛu, dɔn gɔbe nɛ tɔŋaa too gin’ kiraabɛin.
Nɛudiibe, yiun be nɛ too gɔbe obaabɛin. Yiun lee, yinwunrun lee, yiun be sɛɛ gɔbe obaabɛin. Be tuturu wooi, birɛ bemɛ le kɛukɛu, saliyɛ bemɛ kiraabɛin.
Yiun lee, yinwunrun leei, yaun bonɔ wanu diyɛ gɔ nɛ kamaa kunaabɛin. Yaun bonɔ wanu diyɛ gɔ, yiun lɛiye gɔ woi.
Inɛ aai kanran, ɔnmɔ dɔn nɛ boi womɔ tɔŋaa wɔɔ tɛmɛmɔlu gɔ, woi yaun bonɔ wanu diyɛ gɔ nɛ kamaa kunaabɛin.
Mu alagala kana lee, minɛ kana lee iyaabɔn. Alagala pɔlɔ gɔ lee, minɛ pɔlɔ gɔ lee manaai. Nɛudii kanran bele.
Mu ana diyɛ Ama dɛi dɛiin wɔɔ gɔ, Jerusalɛmu kana gɔ, yakana unrun igɛ dɛi unruin saŋaraan sɛɛ gin’ yeguru kunaa, Ama bɛrɛ alagala gowaa wo sugou iyaabɔn.

Ɔgɔdɔin gɔ nɛ gowaa mu mii diyɛ ɛgaabɔn, sɔwaa gi: «Yɛnɛi, Ama, ginrun unrunmɔ, inɛw logoro nɛ daanaajɛ. Wo be le kodɛinyɛndo, be tɔgu womɔ inɛwin biyɛdɛin. Ama kuu womɔ le be le bii ye, Ama bemɛi biyɛdo.
Wo giri bemɛ nɛ giridii puu yayaaɲado. Waja yiun asuu biyɛidolo, yiun pii ma, sɔmiyɛn ma, ɔɲɛ ma asuu biyɛidolo. Sabu sɔɔ pɛi gɔbe puu manaai.»
Ɔgɔdɔin nɛ daan baŋa gɔ sɔwaa gi: «Nɛɛ mu kijɛ puu kanai bojouwɔn.» Kɔɔ onu nɛ mu le kijɛ wo gi: «Tɔŋɔ, sabu sɔɔ kɔɔbe le gawaun baa wɔɔ, sɔɔ narain.»
Wo iyaa mu le gi: «Kilaai, Alupa gɔ lee, Omɛga gɔ lee mui, tɔlɔ gɔ lee, dumɔ gɔ lee. Inɛ diinɔɔrin woi sɛɛ baŋa, mu dɔnrun wɔlɔ go diipujo dii ɔnmɔ obojɛ gɔ wo bɛrɛ ohobodɔn.
Inɛ gɔnrɔn biyaajɛ baŋa, kɛn womɔ kɔɔ woi. Iyaa, mu Ama womɔi biyɛdɔn, wo ii mai biyɛdo.

Kaa liliyɛgunw gɔbe, inɛw gagawu sɛnɛ gɔbe, inɛw jɛbaaɲu gɔbe, inɛw daanw gɔbe, sala salanw gɔbe, dudugunw gɔbe, ɔmɔlɔ bulonw gɔbe, iyaa kakalumaŋaw gɔ puu, yaun lee, sidu lee bonɔ wanu diyɛ yaun banrun tɛgɛjɛ gɔ, yalu bemɛ kɔɔ nɛi. Wogɔ yiun lɛiye gɔ woi.»
Kɔɔ onu nɛ mɛlɛnkɛ sɔi, gelu nɛ jaabu dumɔrɔn kosɔi gɔbe joonaa gɛlin gɔbe logoro nɛ, turu wiyaa mu le sɔwaa gi: «Wɛɛ, mu yakana gɔ, Peju Ii yaanran gɔi u bɛrɛ tatagaradɔn.»
Ama Kikinu, kuu ma nɛ sugaa, wo kokoo diyɛ gabu turu kuu nɛ mui jɛyaabe. Wo ana diyɛ Ama dɛi dɛiin wɔɔ, Jerusalɛmu gɔ, Ama bɛrɛ alagala gowaa sugou wo wɔu mu bɛrɛ tagaraabe.
Ana gɔ Ama dooro le bee. Wo tibu dɔnrun diyɛ ɛju gin’ jasupe tibu gin’ dooroube. Tibu dɔnrun diyɛ, kirisitalu gin’, sɛɛ bee.
Ana gɔi jege diyɛ gabu le gɔŋaa sɛbɛin. Murɔn aŋa pɛli lɛisigɛ konɛ yabe. Murɔn aŋa gɔbe nɛ mɛlɛnkɛ pɛli lɛisigɛ yabɛin. Isɛrɛlu tɔgu pɛli lɛisigɛ boibe konɛ yatɔŋɔbe.
Duu sibɛ go murɔn aŋa taanu, donɔ sibɛ go taanu, tɛŋurun sibɛ go taanu, iyaa dudaga sibɛ go murɔn aŋa taanu.
Ana jege gɔ, bɔlɔtei pɛli lɛisigɛ kuu nɛ daanbe. Peju Ii jaŋu unrunw tiyaaɲu pɛli lɛisigɛ gɔbe boi konɛ yatɔŋɔbe.
Mɛlɛnkɛ mu le sɔɔ sɔɔu bee baŋa gɔ, ana gɔ lee, murɔn aŋa womɔbe lee, jege womɔ lee tunwɔn ga, kange bagi tutunwin yasɛbe.

Ana gɔ sibɛ nai womɔ puu kɛkɛu bee. Papala womɔ lee, wawanu womɔ lee kɛkɛu. Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ, bagi womɔ le ana gɔ tunwaanbe. Papala womɔ kilomɛtɛrɛ muɲu lɛi suŋu nai bee. Papala womɔ lee, wawanu womɔ lee, gobi womɔ lee, puu kɛkɛu bee.
Wo jege gɔ yaa tunwaanbe. Inɛw kijɛ tutunwin le kɛkɛu, mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ tunwaan wo kanran, numɔlagu suŋu lee pɛnai naisigɛ bee.
Jege gɔ jasupe tibu dɔnrun diyɛ gɔ le ujaaɲu. Ana kɔɔ kange tɔitɔi le ujaaɲu, wɛɛrɛ gin’ sɛɛ wɔɔ.
Ana jege bɔlɔtei gɔbe, tibu dɔnrun diyɛ tɔgu tuturu puu le saŋaraanɲu. Bɔlɔtei pɔlɔ gɔ jasupe tibui bee, lɛiye gɔ sapiru tibui bee, taaniye gɔ agate tibui bee, naiye gɔ emɛrɔde tibui bee,

numɔrɔnye gɔ onise tibui bee, kuloiye gɔ saruduanɛ tibui bee, sɔiye gɔ kirisolite tibui bee, gagaraye gɔ berile tibui bee, tuwɔye gɔ topaje tibui bee, pɛluye gɔ kirisoparase tibui bee, pɛli turusigɛye gɔ turukuase tibui bee, pɛli lɛisigɛye gɔ amɛtisute tibui bee.
Murɔn aŋa pɛli lɛisigɛ gɔbe, dugɔi dɔnrun diyɛ tibu pɛli lɛisigɛi bɛin. Kotuturu puu, dugɔi dɔnrun diyɛ tibu koturu le yegeraaɲu. Ana kɛri diyɛ gɔ kange tɔitɔii bee. Wɛɛrɛ gin’ sɛɛ wɔɔ.
Ana gɔ nɛ mu Ama Ginrun Diyɛ iyelun, sabu Inɛw Baŋa Ama kɔmɔnumɔbe kuu baŋa gɔ lee, Peju Ii gɔ lee Ama Ginrun Diyɛ womɔ woi.
Ana gɔ, nai ma, iyepilu ma woi wijɛmɔ kai sɛlɛ. Ama dooro gɔ woi wijɛmɔjɛ. Iyaa Peju Ii gɔ lanpa womɔi.
Tɔgu gɔbe wijɛ womɔ le yoi yayaadɛin. Aduna ɔgɔnw gɔbe, ɔgɔ bemɛ kijɛ konɛ jɛjɛɛlɛdɛin.
Dɛnrun gɔ puu nɛ murɔn aŋa womɔbe pinɛlaa wɔɔ. Digɛ wogɔ nɛ biyɛidolo digɛu, murɔn aŋa gɔbe pinɛidenɛ.
Tɔgu gɔbe ɔgɔ bemɛ kijɛ lee, kijɛ sigɛ bemɛ lee, kɔɔ nɛ jɛjɛɛlɛdɛin.
Kijɛ lɔgɔgu turu kanran kɔɔ nɛ yooidolo. Inɛ jɛbaaɲu kanran kanrannɛ ma, kakalu maŋanɛ ma, turu kanran yooidolo. Inɛw boi bemɛ Peju Ii ɔnmɔ dɔn nɛ tɔŋi too gɔbe sai yoodɛin.
Mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ ɔnmɔ dii dibe gɔ kanran mu bɛrɛ tagaraabe. Tibu dɔnrun diyɛ kirisitalu gin’ dooroube. Ama lee, Peju Ii gɔ lee ɔgɔdɔin nɛ gowaa,
bumaa ana diyɛ kɛri diyɛ gɔ nɛ sugoube. Dibe gɔ diŋirun lɛi gɔ nɛ ɔnmɔ tiun gɔ yɔɔ. Anranguju nɛ kubɔ pɛli lɛisigɛ woi kɔɔɲu. Iyepilu puu ii nanaranjɛ. Tiun kurɔ gɔ tɔgu gɔbei kole bajugaɲu.
Kijɛ jɛbaaɲu turu kanran konɛ biyɛidolo. Ama lee, Peju Ii gɔ lee ɔgɔdɔin gɔ, ana gɔ nɛ bibiyɛdo. Ama birɛbirɛnw gɔbe, woi bababadɛin.
Be girupala womɔ ihiyedɛin, boi womɔ didimɛ bemɛ nɛ tɔŋi biyɛdo.
Digɛ asuu biyɛidolo. Be lanpa wijɛ ma, nai wijɛ ma kai siyɛidenɛ, sabu Inɛw Baŋa Ama bei wiwijɛmɔdo. Be asuu nasuu laamu kakanrandɛin.

Kɔɔ onu nɛ mɛlɛnkɛ gɔ mu le sɔwaa gi: «Sɔɔ ɔnbe le gawaun baa, sɔɔ narain. Inɛw Baŋa Ama, Kikinu unrunmɔ inɛw Ama titiyaanw bɛrɛ obonɛ gɔ, sɔɔ bɛrii biyɛido birɛbirɛnw womɔ bɛrɛ tagarado ga, mɛlɛnkɛ womɔ tiyaajɛ.»
Yesu gi: «Yɛnɛ, mu bɛrii yawɛɛjɔn. Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi dɔn ɔn nɛ too gɔ inɛ gɛliyaajɛ gɔ, Ama wo yabu.»
Mu Jan, sɔɔ kɔɔbe mu ɛgu, mu iyi. Waaru ɛgaa mu iyi le, mɛlɛnkɛ mu bɛrɛ wogɔbe tagarabe gɔi demɛniyɛnmɔ ga, mu kubɔsɔrɔ womɔ nɛ numaa sugaabɔn.
Kaa wo mu le sɔwaa gi: «Kɔɔ kanrannɔu. Mu Ama birɛbirɛnɛ u bɔɔnɛi, iyaa u ba unrunw, inɛw Ama titiyaanw gɔbe lee, dɔn ɔn sɔɔ inɛw gɛlin gɔbe lee bɔɔnɛi. Ama demɛniyɛnmɔ.»
Kɔɔ onu nɛ mu le kijɛ wo gi: «Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi dɔn ɔn nɛ too gɔ baŋurun bojonɔu, sabu sɔɔ gɔbe waaru bɛruniyaain.
Inɛ teitai wɔlɔ, teitai laa womɔ digiyɛ, inɛ lɔgɔjiyaa wɔɔ, lɔgɔjiyɛnu yaa, inɛ teitai wɔɔ teitai womɔ digiyɛ, inɛ Ama nɛ kuu unrunmɔ obaa wɔɔ, kuu obu nɛ yadigiyɛ.»
Yesu gi: «Yɛnɛ, mu bɛrii yawɛɛjɔn. Inɛ tuturu bɛrɛ birɛ womɔ bana wɔɔ gin’ tujɔ ga, mu tujɔ ma le wɛɛjɔn.
Alupa gɔ lee, Omɛga gɔ lee mui. Pɔlɔ gɔ lee, dumɔrɔn gɔ lee. Tɔlɔ gɔ lee, dumɔ gɔ lee.
«Inɛw arugoi bemɛ mɔŋaatin digɛu, ɔnmɔ tiun ii gɔ kaya bɛɛɲu gɔbe, iyaa ana diyɛ gɔ nɛ murɔn aŋa gɔ le yoi bɛɛɲu gɔbe, Ama be yabu.
Kaa iju gɔbe, dudugunw gɔbe, sala salanw gɔbe, inɛw daanw gɔbe, ɔmɔlɔ bulonw gɔbe, inɛ aai kanran kakalu ibɛɛ wɔɔ, kakalu mamaŋajɛ gɔ, be bain go biyɛdɛin.
Mu Yesu, mɛlɛnkɛ ma womaa sɔɔ kɔɔbe Ama inɛw mɔɔnu gɔbe nɛ e bɛrɛ yai taga ga woi tiyaabɔn. Mu Dawide tɔgui, tiruwɛnɛ womɔi, yajutolo doorojɛ gɔ mui.»
Ama Kikinu gɔ lee, yakana gɔ lee sɔɔuwɔin, gin: «Wɛɛ.» Inɛ sɔɔ kɔɔ ɛgɛjɛ baŋa, u kanran «wɛɛ» gɛɛ. Inɛ diinɔɔrin woi sɛɛ baŋa wɛɛ. Inɛ ibɛɛ wɔɔ baŋa, dɔnrun wɔlɔ go ɔnmɔ dii gɔ jeɲɛ.
Mu Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi dɔn ɔn nɛ too gɔ inɛ ɛgaajɛ puu, mu kɔɔbaŋa le maa maa sɔɔuwɔn: Inɛ aai kanran konɛ kijɛ baraajɛ ye, dɔn ɔn nɛ jaabu sɔɔ too gɔbe, Ama, womɔ nɛ babarado.
Inɛ aai kanran, Ama bɛrɛ sɔɔ goi dɔn ɔn nɛ too gɔ nɛ gamaajɛ ye, dɔn ɔn nɛ ɔnmɔ tiun sɔɔ too gɔ lee, ana Ama dɛi dɛiin wɔɔ sɔɔ dɔn ɔn nɛ too gɔ lee nɛ, Ama gamulu womɔ gagamado.
Sɔɔ kɔɔbe dɛi sɛɛrɛ goonɛ baŋa gɔ sɔwaa gi: «Ee, mu bɛrii yawɛɛjɔn.» Amina, Inɛw Baŋa Yesu wɛɛ.
Inɛw Baŋa Yesu nɛɛma gɔ inɛw wooi le biyɛ.
